T02D1414:120a-1: m'u la tantra hri da ya sam gra ha aa
T02D1414:120a-2: bhi dh'a notta ra tantra m'u la m'u la bri
T02D1414:120a-4: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi snying po 'dus pa des par

T02D1414:120a-31: sgrub pa'i yan lag phun sum tshogs pa dang /

T02D1414:120a-38: de ltar rgyud 'bum pa'i stong phrag bcu rgyud 'di'i le'u phyed dang bzhis bshad do //

T02D1414:120a-43: le'u bcu bzhi pa rim pa bzhi pa bsgom pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang /

T02D1414:120b-0: rdzogs pa'i rim pa @120b gsum gyis rgyud 'bum pa'i
T02D1414:120b-1: rdzogs pa'i rim ba stong phrag gsum shad do //
T02D1414:120b-2: de de ltar na stong phrag sum cu tham pa

T02D1414:120b-4: do // le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa nas le'u
T02D1414:120b-5: bdun cu'i bar gyis rgyud 'bum pa'i stong phrag lnga
T02D1414:120b-6: bcu bsdus rgyud 'di'i le'u lngas bshad do //

T02D1414:120b-8: brgyad cu ni bsdus pa'i rgyud nges par brjod pa'i
T02D1414:120b-9: rgyud bla ma 'dis bsdus pa yin la /
T02D1414:120b-10: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang /

T02D1414:120b-14: rig pa rgyu mtsho'i rgyud bzhis stong phrag nyi shu bshad pa yin no //
T02D1414:120b-15: de ltar na bshad pa'i rgyud kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag brgya bshad pa yin no //
T02D1414:120b-16: rjod byed kyi rgyud de rnams kyi brjod bya'i rgyud ni gsum ste /

T02D1414:120b-20: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:120b-21: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang /

T02D1414:120b-27: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis bskyed rdzogs kyi don mngon du grub pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1414:120b-28: 'brel ba ni brjod bya dang rjod byed kyi rgyu
T02D1414:120b-29: las dgos pa'i shes pa bskyed pas de nyid las
T02D1414:120b-30: 'brel pa log shig na med do //
T02D1414:120b-31: de ltar dgos pa'i don bshad nas /
T02D1414:120b-32: bsdus pa'i don ni bzhi ste /
T02D1414:120b-33: gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba dang rgyud 'byung ba'i le'u gsum dang /
T02D1414:120b-36: le'u bzhi nas nyi shu'i bar ni dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo bcu bdun no //
T02D1414:120b-37: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa nas sum cu bdun gyi
T02D1414:120b-38: bar gyis ni dngos grub sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o

T02D1414:120b-40: rtsa bdun gyi bar gyis ni dngos grub kyi yan
T02D1414:120b-41: lag tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad do //

T02D1414:121a-1: drug gis thun mong gi 'khor lo bshad do //

T02D1414:121a-4: bshad do // de ltar bsdus pa'i don bshad nas /
T02D1414:121a-5: yan lag gi don bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:121a-6: yan lag gi don bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:121a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston te /
T02D1414:121a-8: 'di'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
T02D1414:121a-9: pas bshad pa ni de nyid dang sbyar gyi 'dir
T02D1414:121a-10: mi blang ngo // lcang lo can gyi pha brang
T02D1414:121a-11: du sdud pa po lag na rdo rje la bla
T02D1414:121a-12: gos lnga brgya gdan du bting nas /

T02D1414:121a-14: bde bar gshegs pas gang du gsungs /
T02D1414:121a-15: shes rab chen po khyod smros shig / rdo rje
T02D1414:121a-16: 'chang ba khyod smros shig / ces gsol ba btab
T02D1414:121a-17: pa dang / sdud pa pos gleng bslang ba'i tshigs 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D1414:121a-18: de la 'di skad ni lag na rdo rje'i yid
T02D1414:121a-19: kyi rnam par shes pa la rgyud kyi tshig dang
T02D1414:121a-20: sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs bral bar snang ba la
T02D1414:121a-22: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni bdag kho nas thos kyi brgyud pas sam /
T02D1414:121a-23: 'khor las sam sprul pa las sam /
T02D1414:121a-24: phrin gtang ba las ni ma yin no zhes bzhi gcod pa yin no //
T02D1414:121a-25: thos pas ni rang gis rtogs nas byas ba ma
T02D1414:121a-26: yin gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs nas thos pas gzhan
T02D1414:121a-28: yang 'khor rnams kyis dus gang gi tshe thos /
T02D1414:121a-31: 'khor su dang lhan cig tu thos /
T02D1414:121a-32: bshad pa'i chos ci thos she na /
T02D1414:121a-33: dri ba lnga'i lan du rgyud kyi gleng gzhi gsungs te /
T02D1414:121a-34: dus gcig na ni kun rdzob tu lan cig 'di thos la /
T02D1414:121a-35: dus gzhan gyi tshe ni gzhan dag kyang thos so //
T02D1414:121a-36: des na thos pa mang bar ston to //
T02D1414:121a-37: don dam par na rgyud kyi don rnam par thar
T02D1414:121a-38: pa'i sgo mtha' yas pas dus kyi mtha'i skad cig
T02D1414:121a-41: blo gros chen pos mthong rnams kyi //
T02D1414:121a-42: rnam pa thams cad cig car des //
T02D1414:121a-44: bcom ldan 'de ni bdud bzhi bcom pas sam /
T02D1414:121a-45: dbang phyug la sogs pa drug dang ldan pas so //

T02D1414:121b-2: // de'i 'khor lo rdo rje khro ba'i mkha' 'gro ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1414:121b-3: mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni dpa' mo sum cu rtsa bdun no //

T02D1414:121b-5: khro bo ni zhi bas mi 'dul ba la mngon spyod kyi sku'o //
T02D1414:121b-6: mkha' 'gro ni zhi gnas kyi nam mkha' bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T02D1414:121b-8: lhag mthong gi nam mkha' ni sa bcu gcig gi stong pa nyid do //
T02D1414:121b-9: de ltar rtogs shing 'gro bas na mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma zhes btags so //
T02D1414:121b-10: de'i dri ba ni mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i

T02D1414:121b-12: // gsang ba'i snying po ni 'dzam bu'i gling grub gsum ste /
T02D1414:121b-13: nyan thos dang rnga rgyal ba dang /
T02D1414:121b-15: khyab 'jug la sogs pas mi rtogs pas na gsang ba'o //

T02D1414:121b-17: bo dang dpa' mo bskyed pa'i gnas yin pas snying
T02D1414:121b-18: po'o // bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni lan cig
T02D1414:121b-19: de na bzhugs kyi dus gzhan gyi tshe na gzhan
T02D1414:121b-20: dag na yang bzhugs pas gcig gi tshig dang sdud

T02D1414:121b-24: gnas der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i
T02D1414:121b-25: klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyi 'khor 'dus

T02D1414:121b-31: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bos nas /
T02D1414:121b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D1414:121b-33: 'khor lnga bcu rtsa drug gi rdo rje khro bo'i

T02D1414:121b-35: dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa drug gi mkha' 'gro mang

T02D1414:122a-1: can gyi rgyud la bskyed pa'i gnas yin pas ni snying po'o //
T02D1414:122a-2: gsang ba ni rgyud 'bum par bshad pa byas slar snying po ngos mi zin pa'o //
T02D1414:122a-3: bshad du gsol ni rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di nyid du
T02D1414:122a-4: bsdus nas bshad du gsol zhes 'khor phun sum tshogs
T02D1414:122a-5: pas gsol ba 'debs pas zhar la rgyud kyi mtshan
T02D1414:122a-7: chos phun sum tshogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1414:122a-8: kye lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag
T02D1414:122a-9: po ni sangs rgyas kyi sdud pa po khro bo'i
T02D1414:122a-10: cha lugs 'chang ba rnam par thar pa'i sgo bsam

T02D1414:122a-15: drug bshad pa dang bcas pa nyon cig ces bod

T02D1414:122a-18: rnam par 'phrul pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /

T02D1414:122a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor thams cad kyis legs so zhes gsol te /
T02D1414:122a-27: lag na rdo rje 'khor rdo rje gtsug tor la
T02D1414:122a-28: sogs pa dang bcas pa thal mo sbyar nas 'dud

T02D1414:122a-30: le'u dang po'i rgyud kyi dgos 'brel gsungs pa ni /
T02D1414:122a-31: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba ni 'khor gyi bsam pa la ltos pa'i de nas so //
T02D1414:122a-32: gsang ba ni bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi brjod pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1414:122a-33: bshad bya ni slob mas khong du chud par bya sgra'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1414:122a-34: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas min ni le'u 'bum pa
T02D1414:122a-35: las mdor bsdus nas shlo ka 'bum pa las bskyungs
T02D1414:122a-36: pas na rgyas par ma yin pa ste rjod byed
T02D1414:122a-37: bstan to // brjod bya'i rgyas bshad ni dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor te /
T02D1414:122a-38: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i he ru ka longs sku dang sprul sku'i zlos gar bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:122b-0: rdzogs pa'i @122b rim pa chos kyi sku'i he ru ka'i zlos gang bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:122b-1: yang dag sbyor ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yul lha mo'i gzugs dang /

T02D1414:122b-3: rdzogs rim chos kyi sku ye shes kyi yul sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1414:122b-4: yang dag sbyor ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbus nyi

T02D1414:122b-6: rnam par rtog pa rang bzhin brgyad cu bkag nas
T02D1414:122b-7: bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sngom pa bde ba

T02D1414:122b-10: 'dod pa'i don kun gyi ni bsod nams kyi las
T02D1414:122b-11: kyi 'bras bu 'dod khams kyi mi lha dang 'khor
T02D1414:122b-13: thun mong gi dngos grub ni mi gyo ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mngon bar shes pa lnga'o //
T02D1414:122b-14: mchog gi dngos grub ni zag med kyi las kyi
T02D1414:122b-15: 'bras bu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye
T02D1414:122b-16: shes so // de ltar rgyud kyi dgos 'brel bshad nas /
T02D1414:122b-17: mtshan bshad pa ni bla ma ni bla ma zhes

T02D1414:122b-20: mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sngom ba ni rtsa'i 'khor lo dang /

T02D1414:122b-23: sngom pa ni bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sngom pa ste /
T02D1414:122b-24: rtsa dang rlung dang sems las bde ba mchog 'grub pas na mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sngom pa'o //
T02D1414:122b-25: don de dang ldan pa'i mtshan bshad pa'o //
T02D1414:122b-26: de ltar mtshan bshad nas rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:122b-27: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1414:122b-28: zhes pa ni gnas te gsang ba ni dga' ba'i gnas so //
T02D1414:122b-29: mchog ni mchog dga'i gnas so //
T02D1414:122b-30: dgyes pa ni lhan cig skyes dga'i gnas te 'dzam bu'i gling gru gsum na bzhugs ba'o //
T02D1414:122b-31: thams cad bdag nyid ni 'khor te /
T02D1414:122b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ris dang /

T02D1414:122b-38: drag po 'jigs byed gdul bya'i 'khor dang /
T02D1414:122b-39: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan pa'i 'khor dang /
T02D1414:122b-40: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo sprul pa'i 'khor dang /

T02D1414:123a-3: bzhugs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston pa yin no //
T02D1414:123a-4: ston pa dang sbyar ba na dbang mdzad pas bzhugs /

T02D1414:123a-8: 'bras bu'i he ru ka zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1414:123a-9: de la mkha' ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi nam mkha'o //
T02D1414:123a-10: 'gro ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa bcu gcig pa rtogs pa'o //
T02D1414:123a-11: kun gyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:123a-16: dur khrod brgyad kyi 'khor lo ste drug gi dbus
T02D1414:123a-17: na sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du 'bras bu'i he ru
T02D1414:123a-18: ka skyed byed kyi gtso bo yin pas na dngos

T02D1414:123a-20: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku te rgyu'i he ru
T02D1414:123a-21: ka'o / rdo rje ni stong pa nyid kyis ye
T02D1414:123a-22: zhes bya'o // shes so // sems dpa' ni snod
T02D1414:123a-23: bcud thams cad du snang ba'i longs sku ni rdo
T02D1414:123a-24: rje sems dpa' zhes bya bar rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i
T02D1414:123a-25: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nas bshad do //
T02D1414:123a-26: bde ba'i mchog ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye
T02D1414:123a-27: shes ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin pas
T02D1414:123a-28: bde mchog go // 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1414:123a-29: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02D1414:123a-30: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni don dam bas na
T02D1414:123a-31: zhes bya'o / rang 'byung ba ni rang rigs pa
T02D1414:123a-32: rgyu nus pa thogs med nyams su myong pa'i 'od
T02D1414:123a-33: gsal ba'i rgyu las skyes pa yin gyi /
T02D1414:123a-34: glo bur gyi rgyu rkyen las ma skyes pas na rang byung ngo //
T02D1414:123a-36: rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin //
T02D1414:123a-37: zhes bya ba rang gi sems kyi chos nyid nyams
T02D1414:123a-38: su myong ba 'dus byas dus gsum du me dmigs
T02D1414:123a-39: pas na rang byung zhes bshad do //
T02D1414:123a-40: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1414:123a-41: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag nyal phra mo spangs pas dpa' ba'o //
T02D1414:123a-42: de ltar sku gsum gyi ston pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:123a-43: chos phun sum tshogs pa ni mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sngom pa yin //
T02D1414:123a-45: bskyed pa'i rim pa lha'i 'khor lo sngom pa dang /
T02D1414:123b-0: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dman pa dbyibs rtsa'i 'khor @123b lo sngom pa dang /
T02D1414:123b-1: gsang bsngags rlung gi dra ba'i sngom pa dang /
T02D1414:123b-2: mthar thug chos sems kyi dra ba'i sngom pa gsum mo //
T02D1414:123b-3: de ltar kun rdzob tu phun sum tshogs pa lnga
T02D1414:123b-4: thos bsam gyi shes rab kyi thad kar bshad nas
T02D1414:123b-5: bsgom bzhes rab kyi dbang du byas nas /
T02D1414:123b-6: autpala lta bu'i gang zag chags lam pa'i ngor las
T02D1414:123b-7: kyi phyag rgya'i bla la dga' ba gsum 'byung bas
T02D1414:123b-8: na gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02D1414:123b-9: thams cad bdag nyid ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'o //
T02D1414:123b-10: sku gsum gyi ston pa ni lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte bar phyin pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D1414:123b-11: chos ni 'khor lo bzhi la bde bas khyab pa'o //
T02D1414:123b-12: padma lta bu'i gang zag grol ba'i lam pa'i dbang
T02D1414:123b-13: du byas nas gsang ba sngags su bshad pa ni
T02D1414:123b-14: / dbugs 'byung rngub gsum kyi gnas yin pas na gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02D1414:123b-15: thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dbugs ni khri chig
T02D1414:123b-16: stong drug brgya'i 'khor rdo rje / rtag du bzhugs
T02D1414:123b-17: pa ni rlung ni 'gog pa'i dus te /
T02D1414:123b-18: srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra chud pa'o /
T02D1414:123b-19: sku gsum gyi ston pa ni lte ba'i rlung dbus su chud nas /
T02D1414:123b-20: mig tshums gcig sdod pa dang /
T02D1414:123b-21: snying gar mig tshums gnyis sdod pa dang /
T02D1414:123b-22: lkog mar mig tshums gsum sdod pa'i rtog pa me pa'i shes pa gsum skyes pa'o //
T02D1414:123b-23: bshad pa'i chos ni dbugs nyid khri chig stong drug
T02D1414:123b-24: brgya'i dra ba bkag pa las sngom pa'i bde mchog
T02D1414:123b-25: skyed pa'i rin po che lta bu'i gang zag bdag
T02D1414:123b-26: byin gyis rlob pa'i lam la mthar chos kyi dbang
T02D1414:123b-27: du byas na chos kyi dbyings rnam par thar pa
T02D1414:123b-28: sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni
T02D1414:123b-29: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na'o //
T02D1414:123b-30: thams cad bdag nyid ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1414:123b-31: rtag tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus te /
T02D1414:123b-32: rang gi sems kyi stong nyis la rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1414:123b-33: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni gong bu'i gzugs
T02D1414:123b-34: las 'das pa gzugs bar rang bzhin med pa'i ye
T02D1414:123b-35: shes sprul sku'o // rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba
T02D1414:123b-36: mchog ni 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa longs sku'o
T02D1414:123b-37: shes sprul sku'o // // di ni rang 'byung bcom
T02D1414:123b-38: ldan dpa' ni sems kyis bsam mi khyab ces pa'i
T02D1414:124a-0: bshad pa'i chos ni sems kyi mkha' @124a * //
T02D1414:124a-1: 'gro ma dra ba'i sngom pa sgyu ma'i 'od gsal zung 'jug rtogs pa'o //
T02D1414:124a-2: de ltar gleng gzhi bshad nas /
T02D1414:124a-3: bskyed rim gyi lus mdor bstan ni /
T02D1414:124a-4: sgra'i tshul las nges par 'byung ba ni lta bskyed pa'i sgyur ste /
T02D1414:124a-7: nges 'byung ni 'khor lo lnga dang dur khrod dang
T02D1414:124a-8: bcas pa rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul ba'o
T02D1414:124a-9: // dam tshig spyod pa ni dbang thos pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o /
T02D1414:124a-10: sprod yul yin no lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:124a-12: thog mar tshad med pa dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1414:124a-13: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang tshogs bsags pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro /
T02D1414:124a-21: mtha' nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02D1414:124a-22: kun du spyod pa ste ldang ba ni rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1414:124a-24: thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med ni /
T02D1414:124a-26: dngos gzhi dang rjes kyi tshul gyis sprul pa'i sku
T02D1414:124a-27: dri ma med pa zag med kyi snang gas nga
T02D1414:124a-28: pa'o // de'i phan yon ce zhe na /
T02D1414:124a-29: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba se sa 'og
T02D1414:124a-30: sa bla sa steng du zag ba med pa'i spel
T02D1414:124a-31: pa'i sku rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02D1414:124a-32: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lus mdor gzhag pa ni /
T02D1414:124a-33: shes rab thabs kyi kun spyor las //
T02D1414:124a-34: zhes bya ba shes rab phyag rgya bzhi dang /
T02D1414:124a-35: thabs shes pa bzhi mngon sum gyi lam gyis kun
T02D1414:124a-36: du sbyor bas bde ba rtog pa med pa dang
T02D1414:124a-37: dbang po drug bde ba dga' ba dang /
T02D1414:124a-38: yul drug bde ba mchog dga' dang /
T02D1414:124a-39: rnam par shes pa drug bde ba lhan cig skyes dga' ni /
T02D1414:124a-40: 'chi med ji lta de lta bur //
T02D1414:124a-42: me dang chu dang rlung gi bar du mi 'chi bas na 'chi med do //
T02D1414:124a-43: de la sgyur ma dang 'od gsal bdag dang zung
T02D1414:124a-44: du 'jug pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
T02D1414:124a-45: ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin 'od gsal
T02D1414:124a-47: de rgyu gang las byung zhes na /
T02D1414:124a-48: gsang ba'i gnas byung zhes bya ba las chos dang
T02D1414:124a-49: dam tshig gsum las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyis lus
T02D1414:124a-51: las 'byung ba ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba de
T02D1414:124a-52: las skyes pa'i sgyur ma 'od gsal zung 'jug rtogs
T02D1414:124b-0: pa'o // de la nyes @124b bral ni sgyu ma'i brgyad dang mtshungs ba'i bdag byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1414:124b-1: rtag ba ni 'od gsal rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1414:124b-2: zhi ba ni zung 'jug ste 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas cig car rtogs pa'o //
T02D1414:124b-4: bla gros chen po mthong rnams kyis //
T02D1414:124b-5: rnam pa thams cad cig car nges //
T02D1414:124b-7: shes pa de gsung gi yul gang yin zhe na /
T02D1414:124b-8: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa skyed pa po ste /
T02D1414:124b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
T02D1414:124b-10: rgyu de yang rang bzhin dag pa las byung ste sems kyi chos nyid 'dus ma byas ba'o //
T02D1414:124b-11: dbang po bdag po'i rkyen bsam gtan de gang las skye zhe na /
T02D1414:124b-12: rnal 'byor ma yis bde ba ster //
T02D1414:124b-13: zhes bya ba las kyi phyag rgyas dang /
T02D1414:124b-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang gsum gyis bde ba ster ro //
T02D1414:124b-15: de'i mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen yid nang du chud pa ste rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D1414:124b-16: dbang po bdag po'i rkyen ni bsam gtan de dga' ba bzhi'o //
T02D1414:124b-17: sogs ni yul phyag rgyas bzhi dang /
T02D1414:124b-18: rgyu'i rkyen bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sa bon gyi bag chags so //
T02D1414:124b-19: de'i 'bras bu sbyor ba nyid chog gi ye shes
T02D1414:124b-20: ni rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i sbyor ba ni cho ga
T02D1414:124b-21: ste de'i rnam shes dga' ba gsum dang /
T02D1414:124b-22: ye shes sgyu ma 'od gsal zung 'jug shes pa'o //
T02D1414:124b-23: de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1414:124b-24: ngo bo nyid dang mthu dag gis /
T02D1414:124b-25: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub po //
T02D1414:124b-27: bkyed rdzogs kyi de nyid rgyud 'bum pa las gsungs pa dag /
T02D1414:124b-28: ba'i bdag po sdud pa po //
T02D1414:124b-29: lag na rdo rje rab tu nyon //
T02D1414:124b-31: dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang //
T02D1414:124b-32: zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi'i le'u stong phrag gsum
T02D1414:124b-33: las stong phrag gcig tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsam gtan
T02D1414:124b-34: bskyed pa'i stong phrag btung ba sgyur ma lta btung
T02D1414:124b-35: ba sgyur ma lta bu'i yi shes bskyed pa stong
T02D1414:124b-36: phrag gcig pho nya'i gtsang sbra song pa yid kyi
T02D1414:124b-38: de las dang por bsam gtan bskyed pa'i zas ni
T02D1414:124b-39: dbugs 'byin byang chub kyi sems dang bar ma rang
T02D1414:124b-41: mchog shad chen shad chen po dang /
T02D1414:124b-42: dri bshad pa'i dang sam dang /
T02D1414:124b-43: chu lci ba'i dang sam dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1414:124b-44: rta dang glang po dang khyi dang ba la dang mi'i shad de lnga la /
T02D1414:125a-0: aom aa: h'um gsum gyis bdud rtsir byas nas mkhas pa tshogs kyi @125a * //
T02D1414:125a-1: 'khor lo byed pas bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu byas
T02D1414:125a-2: ba'i khams kyi za de su la sbyin zhes na
T02D1414:125a-4: ce bya ste ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i padma dang /
T02D1414:125a-8: dur khrod brgyad kyi bar gyi dkyil 'khor drug la ro'i bdud rtsi mchod par bya'o //
T02D1414:125a-9: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02D1414:125a-10: 'byung po'i dus kyi khyad par la ste /
T02D1414:125a-13: zla ba gcig la gzhag sum cu thun bzhi'i dus kyi khyad par la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1414:125a-14: ro gcig pu yin nam zhe na /
T02D1414:125a-15: pho nya rnams kyis de la mchod //
T02D1414:125a-16: ces pas pho nya rnams ni rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma se /
T02D1414:125a-17: de'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang /
T02D1414:125a-18: rdo rje'i glu snyan pa dang /
T02D1414:125a-21: bdud rtsi lnga'i ro dang lag bcangs dang 'khyud pa
T02D1414:125a-22: la sogs pa'i reg bya lngas 'khor lo lnga'i lha
T02D1414:125a-23: la mchod do / mchod pa ni bsam gtan gyi
T02D1414:125a-25: de'i yul dmigs pa'i rkyen ni /
T02D1414:125a-26: mchog ye shes las skyes pa skyes rabs kyi byang chub sems ma'o //
T02D1414:125a-27: 'bring ni bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi 'thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:125a-28: tha ma ni slob dpon gyis ye shes pha nas
T02D1414:125a-29: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chu pa'i sngags skyes ma'o
T02D1414:125a-31: mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung ste /
T02D1414:125a-32: zhig gnas dang lhag mthong mngon par shes par lnga dang /
T02D1414:125a-33: zag pa zag pa'i ye shes thams cad 'byung ngo //
T02D1414:125a-34: de'i mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni yid ni nang du bsdus pa yis //
T02D1414:125a-35: zhes bya ba srog aa wa dh'u t'ir pas dbugs nyi khro cho stong drug brgyad dang /
T02D1414:125a-36: rnam rtog gi rang bzhin brgyad cu 'gags pa'o //
T02D1414:125a-38: yid nad du chud na 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsum bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1414:125a-39: sam gtan bdag po'i rkyen ni rang rdzas thig le
T02D1414:125a-40: spyi gtsug gi kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gtum
T02D1414:125a-41: mo drod kyis phab pa ste /
T02D1414:125a-42: dbang po bdag po'i rkyen yin no //
T02D1414:125a-43: gal te dga' bral du song nas sangs rgyas te phung po lnga dang /
T02D1414:125a-44: sems dpa' dbang po drug dang /
T02D1414:125a-45: 'byung ba yum lnga la mchog par bya'o //
T02D1414:125a-46: bdag nyid rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1414:125b-0: @125b gzhan rnal 'byor ma lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan
T02D1414:125b-1: pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la yang mchod par bya'o
T02D1414:125b-2: // las kyi phyag rgya spangs pa'i grol ba'i lam
T02D1414:125b-3: la yid nang du chud pa yul gang las bsgom
T02D1414:125b-4: // zhe na / mthong pa gzugs dang /
T02D1414:125b-7: dran pa chos kyi rdo rje ma la ma rmongs
T02D1414:125b-8: par dran pa'i 'du byed kyi chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D1414:125b-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la bsam gtan gyi ting
T02D1414:125b-10: nge 'dzin bsgoms na 'dod ai khams kyi sdig pa
T02D1414:125b-11: kun las grol zhing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1414:125b-12: ba dang / bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar
T02D1414:125b-13: shes pa de ltar grol ba'i lam gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1414:125b-14: pa 'di la skye bar the tshom med do //
T02D1414:125b-15: de ltar chags lam dang grol lam gyi tshogs kyi
T02D1414:125b-16: 'khor lo las skyes pa'i bsam gtan gyi ting nge
T02D1414:125b-17: 'dzin bshad nas / de'i phan yon shlo ka gcig gsungs pa ni /
T02D1414:125b-18: bsam gtan thob pa'i rnal 'bor pa nyid bsod rnam kyi tshogs mi g-yo ba'i las yin no //
T02D1414:125b-19: 'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa /
T02D1414:125b-20: bden pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba
T02D1414:125b-21: can bsam gtan dang bo'i ting nge 'dzin yin no
T02D1414:125b-22: zhes shes rab 'bum pa las gsungs pa'i dag byed
T02D1414:125b-23: ni kun 'byung nyon mongs pa dag pa'o //
T02D1414:125b-24: sdig pa 'jig par byed pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dag pa'o //
T02D1414:125b-25: sngags bzlas ni srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pas dben pas las skyes pa'o //
T02D1414:125b-26: dga' ba dang bde ba can ni bsam gan gyi dga' ba lus dang yid bde ba'o //
T02D1414:125b-27: myur du tshe 'di las dngos grub skyes bas na
T02D1414:125b-28: mngon sum gyi lam lhan cig skyes pa las 'grub
T02D1414:125b-29: pa'o // rgyud kyi sdud pa pos 'grel pa mdzad pa ni de nyid las shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:125b-30: rtsa ba'i rgyu bsdus pa rtsa rgyud phyi ma slob
T02D1414:125b-31: ma la snying po nges brjod kyi rgyud kyi dam
T02D1414:125b-32: tshig la 'jug pa'i le'u dang bo'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1414:125b-34: // / phyi ma'i phyi ma snying po'i le'u dan por
T02D1414:125b-35: sbas te lhag ma tshogs pa la bshad pa tsam
T02D1414:125b-37: de'i phyir slob ma dang tshogs pa dag la so sor bshad par bya'o //
T02D1414:125b-38: rgyud phyi ma yang phyi ma'o //
T02D1414:125b-39: stong phrag nyis kyi don gi ni rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1414:125b-40: dang mthun par le'u bzhin bcu rtsa brgyud pa las
T02D1414:125b-42: de ltar gleng gzhi'i le'u dang pa shad nas /
T02D1414:126a-1: gnyis pa ni de'i rjes thogs la de nas zhes gsungs so //
T02D1414:126a-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'bras bu'i he ru ka'o //
T02D1414:126a-3: rdo rje dbyings la rnams par rol pa zhes bya
T02D1414:126a-4: ba ni rdo rje bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings
T02D1414:126a-6: rnam par rol ba ni longs sku'i 'khor ro //
T02D1414:126a-7: 'khor de yang khro bo chen po'i gzugs su snang
T02D1414:126a-8: ba'i yul la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi gnas
T02D1414:126a-9: dang lhag mthong mnyam par zhugs nas /
T02D1414:126a-10: dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i lha rnams kyi ming gi gsang ba gsungs pa'o //
T02D1414:126a-11: su'i 'khor yin zhe na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i
T02D1414:126a-12: 'khor bcom ldan 'das rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang ba rnam
T02D1414:126a-13: par snang mdzad kyis snga ma'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1414:126a-15: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs
T02D1414:126a-16: rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1414:126a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sbrul
T02D1414:126a-18: nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phul pa ni
T02D1414:126a-20: dpa' bo chen po ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1414:126a-21: gzugs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje ni rnam par snang
T02D1414:126a-22: mdzad lta bu 'khor lo dang dril bu thogs pa
T02D1414:126a-23: dkar bo / tshor ba rdo rje ni rin po che dang dril bu thogs pa ser po /
T02D1414:126a-24: 'du shes rdo rje ni padma dang dril bu thogs pa dmar bo //
T02D1414:126a-25: 'du byed rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa ljang gu /
T02D1414:126a-26: rnam par shes pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa mthing ga'o //
T02D1414:126a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po thams cad la khyab
T02D1414:126a-28: pa'i chos kyi dbyings las skyes pa'i gtso bo dbang
T02D1414:126a-29: phyug chen po ni thod pa dang kha tv'am ga
T02D1414:126a-30: bsnams pa sku mdog mthing ga'o //
T02D1414:126a-31: gti mug rdo rje ni 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa sa'i snying po'o //
T02D1414:126a-32: rna ba'i rdo rje ni rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa mthing ga phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1414:126a-33: sna rdo ni rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa ser po nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D1414:126a-34: chags pa rdo rje ni padma dang dril bu bsnams pa dmar po spyan ras gzigs so //
T02D1414:126a-35: ser sna rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje dang
