T02D1414:132b-9: sngags zhe gsum pa rigs brgyas pas chos thams cad rigs brgyas dag go //
T02D1414:132b-10: dur khrod brgyad kyi ma mo brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe /
T02D1414:132b-11: sngags zhe bzhi pa ma mo dag pas chos thams cad ma mos dag go //
T02D1414:132b-12: gnas nyid shu rtsa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe sngags zhe
T02D1414:132b-13: lnga pa pi ta shuddha sarba dharm'a:pi ta shuddho& ham
T02D1414:132b-14: / de bzhin du aom pa pi ta shuddha sarba dharm'a:pa pi ta shudho& ham zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:132b-15: au pashma sh'a na shuddha sarba dharm'a: au pashma sh'a na shuddo& ham /
T02D1414:132b-16: zhes bya ba'i don ni de bzhin du ji srid
T02D1414:132b-17: du nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam
T02D1414:132b-18: par dag par shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:132b-19: thams cad la aom yod pa ni ye shes lda'o //
T02D1414:132b-20: thams cad cad la aa ham yod pa ni rang rig pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1414:132b-21: don gnyis pa sngags de rnams ni lha'i sku'i don
T02D1414:132b-22: bsgom par mi nus pa sngags brjod cing nga rgyal
T02D1414:132b-23: bsgom pa'i tha ma'i don yin no //
T02D1414:132b-24: rnal 'byor pa rab thos bsam bsgom gsum la mkhas
T02D1414:132b-25: pa don gsum pa bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid brgyad
T02D1414:132b-27: gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni pu pulli ra ma la ya nas /
T02D1414:132b-28: ku ku lu ta'i bar du yi ge nyi shu
T02D1414:132b-29: rtsa bzhes sngon 'byung yul nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang
T02D1414:132b-30: / rjes 'jug 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1414:132b-31: lus la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsdu na /
T02D1414:132b-32: sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i don
T02D1414:132b-33: yin te phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs
T02D1414:132b-34: pa'i shes pa bcu dag pa dag /
T02D1414:132b-35: dbang bcu rnam par dag pa bsgom pas 'khor lo
T02D1414:132b-36: gsum gyi gnas yongs su dag nas gnas nyid shu
T02D1414:132b-37: rtsa gzhi zag med kyis dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:132b-38: zag med kyi dge ba yin pa'i rgyu des dus gsum pas grol /
T02D1414:132b-41: rnal 'byor yid dga' ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi don te /
T02D1414:133a-0: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun las @133a * //
T02D1414:133a-1: 'bras bu lus dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i he ru
T02D1414:133a-2: ka'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bas nges brjod bla ma zhes
T02D1414:133a-3: mtshan btags te / gsang chen chos dang /
T02D1414:133a-4: mchog longs spyod dang dam pa sprul pa'i skul phyogs g-yon skor dang /
T02D1414:133a-5: mtshams g-yas skor gyis mchod pa dang lha dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:133a-6: sgom pa dang bzlas pa'i tshe bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1414:133a-8: gnyis pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan ma
T02D1414:133a-9: thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang gis sgyu ma dang
T02D1414:133a-10: stong pa nyid shes pas dag byed dang /
T02D1414:133a-14: ngan spyod kyi rnal 'byor gyi brda lnga bya'o //
T02D1414:133a-15: gang la mi bstan zhe na /
T02D1414:133a-17: rgyud 'dir bla mas dbang bskur ba las gzhan du 'bras bu med pa dang /
T02D1414:133a-18: glegs bam tsham thos nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed na phyi ma dmyal bar ltung ba dang /
T02D1414:133a-19: tshe 'di la phol mig la sogs pa nas tshogs
T02D1414:133a-20: bdag gis gsod cing phyi ma dmyal bar ltung ngo
T02D1414:133a-21: // de bas zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba ste /
T02D1414:133a-22: bla ma'i brgyud las dbang thob nas sngags myur du grub pa dang /
T02D1414:133a-23: gnyis med ye shes kyi sbyor ba lha bsgoms na mchog sangs rgyas nges bar thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:133a-24: gsum ba las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1414:133a-25: mi'i bu mo 'og nas 'byung ba mtshan nyid 'chad pa 'di 'dra ba spang ngo //
T02D1414:133a-26: de gang zhe na dam tshig me shes zhes bya
T02D1414:133a-27: ba nas phyag rgya spang bar bya zhes bya ba'i
T02D1414:133a-28: bar du'o // bla bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma ni gzugs bzang ba dang /
T02D1414:133a-29: lo nyi shu la sogs pas brgyan pa lhan cig la sems zin pa /
T02D1414:133a-30: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i brtul zhugs shes pa /
T02D1414:133a-31: dam tshig thams cad shes pa /
T02D1414:133a-32: dur khrod kyis mi 'jigs pas dpa' ba /
T02D1414:133a-33: sgyu mar shes pas chags pa dang bral ba /
T02D1414:133a-34: stong nyid shes pas 'dzem pa med pa /
T02D1414:133a-35: zag med shes pas nga rgyal med pa /
T02D1414:133a-36: lhag mthong shes pas ser sna med pa /
T02D1414:133a-37: dmangs rigs kyi bu mo mchog blang nas de dang
T02D1414:133a-38: lhan cig rig pa'i brtul zhugs bde ba stong pa
T02D1414:133a-39: nyid bsgom mo // gsum pa spyod pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1414:133a-40: mngon par shes pa skyes nas rdzu 'phrul thob pas
T02D1414:133a-41: 'jig rten gyis smod pas mi 'jigs pa //
T02D1414:133a-42: spros bcas kyi spyod pa dang /
T02D1414:133a-43: spros med kyi spyod pa srog aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1414:133a-44: chud pas sngags rig pa ni smig rgyu dang du
T02D1414:133a-45: ba dang srin bu me khyer dang /
T02D1414:133b-0: gron me dang nam mkha' stong @133b pa lta bu'i rtags rig nas bdag nyid brtul zhugs spyod do //
T02D1414:133b-1: ru pa'i phyag rgya lnga rtag rag tu bcang ngo //
T02D1414:133b-2: rus ba'i cod pan mgo la rgyan bya'o //
T02D1414:133b-3: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga bzung nas thal ba'i rdul gyis byung //
T02D1414:133b-4: sha che na bza' chang btung /
T02D1414:133b-5: ro'i ras bgo / lhag ma zos kyang ting nge 'dzin mi nyams /
T02D1414:133b-6: spros med rtogs na khrag gi btung bas tshim par bya'o //
T02D1414:133b-7: skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su stong pa nyid bsgoms pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1414:133b-8: nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang /
T02D1414:133b-9: 'jig rten gyi mu stegs skal pa med pa rdo
T02D1414:133b-10: rje theg pa la smod pa'i gtsug lag khang du
T02D1414:133b-12: der gnas na nyes pa ci yin zhe na /
T02D1414:133b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don 'grub pa'i dbul por 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:133b-14: gnas gang du gnas she na /
T02D1414:133b-15: dur khrod du gnas rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang stang stabs bya /
T02D1414:133b-17: tshig pa dang ma tshig pa'i sha chen bza'/
T02D1414:133b-19: ro yod pa'i dur khrod kyi gnas su bsgom mo //
T02D1414:133b-20: lnga pa phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni shin
T02D1414:133b-21: tu spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas las kyi
T02D1414:133b-23: phyag rgya chen po stong ba nyid khams gsum gyi
T02D1414:133b-24: dri ma spangs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D1414:133b-25: las byung ba yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1414:133b-26: phyin pa'i lha mo gzung 'dzin med cing brjod byed
T02D1414:133b-27: med pa 'dus ma byas dang gnyis su med par
T02D1414:133b-28: sems rtse gcig par bya nas spros med bsgom pa'i
T02D1414:133b-29: spyod pa lus bde ba dang sems dga' ba'i dngos
T02D1414:133b-31: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim pa ni phyag
T02D1414:133b-32: rgya chen po stong pa nyid dang nyid nges par
T02D1414:133b-33: rol pa'i sgom pa mngon sum du 'grub pas rnams
T02D1414:133b-34: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes sa dang po skyes
T02D1414:133b-35: pa khams gsum gyi nyes pa thams cad las grol
T02D1414:133b-36: bas tshe 'di la dngos grub thob po //
T02D1414:133b-37: drug pa phan yon gyi mtshan nyid ni sngon gyi
T02D1414:133b-38: bde mchog dang 'dra bar g-yon pa bde ba stong
T02D1414:133b-39: pa nyid ni yum shes rab po //
T02D1414:133b-40: g-yas pa bde ba med pa 'dod khams kyi sems
T02D1414:133b-41: dang stong nyid med pa kun rdzob kyi shes rab
T02D1414:133b-43: 'dus byas dang dus ma byas dang /
T02D1414:133b-44: kun rdzob dang don dam cig car shes pa'i sgom
T02D1414:133b-45: pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan na zung 'jug gi ye
T02D1414:133b-46: shes yin te / slar zhir gang la yang mi bslab //
T02D1414:133b-48: blo gros chen po mthong rnams kyis /
T02D1414:133b-49: rnam pa thams cad cig car nges //
T02D1414:134a-2: zung 'jug thob na mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1414:134a-3: tshang pa ngo 'thon stobs kyis mnan //
T02D1414:134a-4: dga' bde mi spong 'phrog nas ni //
T02D1414:134a-5: brgya byin ngo 'thob stobs kyis mnan //
T02D1414:134a-6: bde sogs ma yang 'phrog nas ni //
T02D1414:134a-7: zhes gsungs pas sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed
T02D1414:134a-8: ni lha dbang du byed pa longs spyod pa thim
T02D1414:134a-9: pa'o // thog ma'i dngos grub pa ni dang po thugs kyi dngos grub ster ba'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-10: gnod spyin ni zhing dang nye ba'i zhing gi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-11: srin po ni tshando ha dang nye ba'i tshan do ha'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-12: klu mo ni 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-13: lha ma yin ni dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-14: dri za mo ni nye ba'i gnas bzhi'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1414:134a-15: gzhan yang sna tshogs pa ni grong mtha' dang nye
T02D1414:134a-16: ba'i grong mtha' brgyad kyi mi'am ci'i lha mo brgyad
T02D1414:134a-17: do // 'dod pa'i longs spyod ces pa ni /
T02D1414:134a-18: gdong drug ngo 'thon stobs kyis mnan //
T02D1414:134a-19: gzhon nu ma yang 'phrog nas su //
T02D1414:134a-20: zhes bshad pas lha mo dang dri za mo dang /
T02D1414:134a-21: gnod sbyin dang srin mo dang klu mo dang lha ma yin mo dang /
T02D1414:134a-22: mi'am ci mo rnams la dga' bzhi'i longs spyod nas /
T02D1414:134a-23: a'a li k'a li thabs dang shes rab mnyam par
T02D1414:134a-24: bsgom pas don dam gyi bden pa de nyid sgyu
T02D1414:134a-26: zung 'jug thob pa'i thabs pa'i thabs gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang /
T02D1414:134a-27: dbang bzhi pa gong nas gong du bskor nas rang
T02D1414:134a-28: gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi gang zhag thams cad kyis
T02D1414:134a-29: rgyud sde bzhi thams cad le de bzhin du brtag
T02D1414:134a-30: par bya'o // bdun pa brda'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes babs pa'am /
T02D1414:134a-31: tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor mas brda rnams bstan pa ni /
T02D1414:134a-32: dpa' bo rnams kyis lag pa g-yon pas brda bya /
T02D1414:134a-33: rnal 'byor mas lag pa g-yas pas brda bya'o //
T02D1414:134a-34: rgyun ba sems dang me rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig
T02D1414:134a-35: rten gsum snod bcud kyi 'gro ba thams cad stong
T02D1414:134a-36: pa nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i g-yon pa las 'byung
T02D1414:134a-37: ba yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' mtheb mo la
T02D1414:134a-38: bzhugs so // rnam par snang mdzad mdzub mo la bzhugs so //
T02D1414:134a-39: gung mo la padma gar gyi dbang phyug / srin
T02D1414:134a-40: lag la dpal he ru ka / the'u chung la
T02D1414:134a-42: sen mo lnga la rta mgrin /
T02D1414:134b-0: dpa' bo rnams kyi gzhi ni sor mo @134b yin no //
T02D1414:134b-1: lag pa'i mthil du pho nya drug dbus dang 'dab ma lnga 'dus pa la bsgoms la /
T02D1414:134b-2: go cha bgo na ye shes sems dpa' bcug la /
T02D1414:134b-3: lag pa'i rgyab gzhal yas khang du bsams nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i brda bya'o //
T02D1414:134b-4: lag ba'i 'byung ba lnga ni lha mo lngar go sla'o //
T02D1414:134b-5: ldang ba'i tshe lag pa'i rgyab tu thim nas gshegs par bsam /
T02D1414:134b-6: dbang ma bskur ba la dam tshig tu mi bstan /
T02D1414:134b-7: tshogs kyi 'khor lo lhan cig za ba'i tshe bya /
T02D1414:134b-8: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad tshogs pa'i
T02D1414:134b-9: lag pa'i mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sngom pa yin no
T02D1414:134b-10: // brgyad pa thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D1414:134b-11: rgyud le'u bdun cu'i don thams cad shes pas tshogs
T02D1414:134b-12: kyi 'khor lo'i slob dpon bya'o zhes rtogs par bya
T02D1414:134b-13: // ba'i phyir / phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad dang //
T02D1414:134b-14: zhes bya ba ni le'u bzhi pa sku'i 'khor lo
T02D1414:134b-15: nas brtsams nas le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa go
T02D1414:134b-16: cha'i 'khor lo'i bar du dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa
T02D1414:134b-17: bzhir dpa' bo blta ba dang /
T02D1414:134b-18: tshur lha mo blta bas rjes 'gro thams cad ces bya'o //
T02D1414:134b-19: de ltar le'u sum cu rtsa bdun gyi sa gcod tshig rkang pa gcig bshad nas /
T02D1414:134b-20: le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa nas bzhi bcu rtsa
T02D1414:134b-21: bdun gyi par du dngos grub kyi yan lag le'u
T02D1414:134b-22: bcu pa'i sa gcod ni tshig rkang lda yin te
T02D1414:134b-23: / sna tshogs brda ni dag byed la sogs pa'i brda' bzhi'o //
T02D1414:134b-24: tshig ni pro tanggi pra ti por tanggi la sogs pa dang gis brda'o //
T02D1414:134b-25: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes las skyes pa'i lha mo //
T02D1414:134b-26: pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni zhing skyes dang sngags skyes so //
T02D1414:134b-27: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir ni sbyor ba gtsang spra gsum gyi mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:134b-28: dngos gzhi gtsang sbra gsum gyi brtul zhugs dang /
T02D1414:134b-29: rjes gtsang sbra gsum gyi spyod pa de dag thams cad dang /
T02D1414:134b-30: dbang bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu ma lus par 'chad pa yin no //
T02D1414:134b-31: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i sngar song ba'i sum cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1414:134b-32: phyis 'ong ba thams cad kyi rab gnas kyi le'u
T02D1414:134b-33: ras ris ba lang gi pags pa la sogs pa
T02D1414:134b-34: sna tshogs par bri ba dang /
T02D1414:134b-35: rdo rje dang rin po che dang ba so dang
T02D1414:134b-36: shing la sogs pa la 'bur du brkos pa'i sku
T02D1414:134b-37: gzugs dang / de bzhin bri ba ni tshon rtsi bshad do //
T02D1414:134b-38: dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag / mig sman chen po de bzhin te //
T02D1414:135a-2: rang byung me tog sa bon dang /
T02D1414:135a-3: rigs ngan bran ze gdol pa mo //
T02D1414:135a-4: g-yung mo las byung rang byung khrag / shu kra rakta'i khyad par dang //
T02D1414:135a-5: mi skra rus pa'i pir gyis bri //
T02D1414:135a-7: dam tshig dang le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa mdor bstan pas yan lag gis gcod de /
T02D1414:135a-8: dbang bskur ba'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig bshad pa'o //
T02D1414:135a-9: 'dir dbang bskur nas lha thams cad phyis bsgom mo zhes dgongs so //
T02D1414:135a-10: sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis //
T02D1414:135a-11: gang gi sgrub pa pos 'grub pa //
T02D1414:135a-12: zhes pa ni le'u bco brgyad pa'i mdor bstan dang yan lag gis gcod de /
T02D1414:135a-13: dkyil 'khor gang la bskyed pa'i rims pa'i dus su
T02D1414:135a-14: ye shes babs nas dbyangs skyong gi glu len pa
T02D1414:135a-15: dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dus su dga' bral
T02D1414:135a-16: du mi gtong pa ni dbyangs skyong ba ste dbyangs
T02D1414:135a-17: ni byang chub sems bde ba'o //
T02D1414:135a-18: de skyongs ba'i lha sku mdog dkar po 'ba' zhig gi khyad par bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:135a-19: sna tshogs dga' ba'i gsang sngags dang //
T02D1414:135a-20: zhes pa ni le'u gcig pa dang gnyis pa'i bsdus
T02D1414:135a-21: don gyis gcod de nye snying dang snying po'i sngags
T02D1414:135a-22: kyi 'khor lo'o // gzhung lugs sna tshogs dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:135a-23: ni nga gsum pa rnam dag gi le'u mdor bstan
T02D1414:135a-24: pa rgyas pa'i sa gcod do //
T02D1414:135a-27: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings te gzhung lugs sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1414:135a-28: yid 'ong dam tshig mchog rnams dang //
T02D1414:135a-29: zhes pa ni thabs kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bu [?] nga bzhi pa'i rtsa ba'am sa gcod do //
T02D1414:135a-30: sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma mchog dang //
T02D1414:135a-31: zhes pa ni le'i nga lnga pa'i rtsa ba'am sa gcod de /
T02D1414:135a-32: shes rab kyi 'khor lo grub gsum pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:135a-33: yid 'ong dpa' bo sna tshogs dang /
T02D1414:135a-35: zhes pa ni le'u bcu rtsa drug pa'i rtsa ba'am sa gcod de rgyud dang /
T02D1414:135a-37: 'bras bu'i rgyud dang gsum ston pa'o //
T02D1414:135a-38: mkha' 'gro ma yi man ngag dang //
T02D1414:135a-39: zhes pa ni le'u nga bdun pa rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba dang /
T02D1414:135a-40: nga brgyad pa go cha gnyis dang snying dang snying po'i sngags btu ba dang /
T02D1414:135a-41: nga dgu pa rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor dang /
T02D1414:135b-0: drug cu pa rdza rda bcing ba'i gnod mdzes 'khor lo'i rtsa ba dang sa gcod bstan @135b to //
T02D1414:135b-1: sna tshogs rigs mchog dam pa dang //
T02D1414:135b-2: zhes pa ni grong khyer dkrugs pa drug cu rtsa gcig dang /
T02D1414:135b-3: dngos grub len pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bong bu'i rnam par mdzad pa re gnyis pa dang /
T02D1414:135b-4: rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ba re gsum pa dang /
T02D1414:135b-5: lha mo bzhis zhus pa re bzhi pa dang /
T02D1414:135b-6: gshin rje'i 'khor lo re lnga pa'i rtsa ba dang sa gcod bstan to //
T02D1414:135b-7: bla ma brgyad pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D1414:135b-8: slob ma rnams la phan phyir ro //
T02D1414:135b-9: zhes pa ni le'u re drug pa skye ba bdun pa'i shas bskyar ba'i sa gcod do //
T02D1414:135b-10: bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas //
T02D1414:135b-11: sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs //
T02D1414:135b-12: zhes pa ni le'u re bdun pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sngags dang rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1414:135b-13: re brgyad pa so sor 'brang ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslab pa'o //
T02D1414:135b-17: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga'i rim pa
T02D1414:135b-18: rigs gsum ma ma rigs lnga'i lha'i khyad par rnams
T02D1414:135b-19: nges brjod rgyud kyi las nyid kyis te /
T02D1414:135b-20: phrin las rnam bzhin bshad pa las rgyud rdo rje
T02D1414:135b-21: mkha' 'gro bshad par bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di'i
T02D1414:135b-22: sngags pas rgyud gzhan gyi cho ga rnams lta ba
T02D1414:135b-23: mngon sum gyi lam dang spyod pa man ta tanta
T02D1414:135b-24: gsum gyis gzhan rmongs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:135b-25: le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pa'i rnal
T02D1414:135b-26: 'byor ma de rnams lha'i 'khor lor ji ltar 'gyur
T02D1414:135b-27: zhe na / skyes rabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra bar /
T02D1414:135b-28: rnal 'byor ma yis spyod pa dang //
T02D1414:135b-30: mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te //
T02D1414:135b-31: zhes ye shes las skyes pa dang /
T02D1414:135b-32: ma mo phyi rol phyag rgya ni //
T02D1414:135b-34: phyi rol ni rgyud tha dad pa'i bud med do //
T02D1414:135b-35: phag mo'i rigs las 'byung ba dang //
T02D1414:135b-36: zhes pa ni bsam gtan dang gang zag med kyi sngom pa yod la /
T02D1414:135b-37: gser rir dmangs rigs stong phrag bcu //
T02D1414:135b-39: de rnams dkyil 'khor la ji ltar gzhag ce na ye shes dang /
T02D1414:135b-43: dam tshig gi 'khor lo dpa' bo kun gyi spyod
T02D1414:135b-44: pa dang mthun pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod
T02D1414:135b-46: 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu sla ni thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams kyis byug pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-2: sku'i 'khor lo rdo thal gyis byug pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-5: kha tam ga cang te'u dang /
T02D1414:136a-6: srog aa wa dh'u ti'r chud pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-10: zung 'jug bsgom pa la shin tu bslabs pa phyi
T02D1414:136a-11: rol gyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug spros bcas dang
T02D1414:136a-12: / spros med dang shin tu spros med kyi spyod pa mkhas par shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:136a-13: de ltar spyod pa'i rgyas bshad byas nas slob dpon
T02D1414:136a-14: gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa ni dpal he ru
T02D1414:136a-15: ka'i rigs las byung ba dang /
T02D1414:136a-16: slob dpon gyi spyod pa bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i khyad par dang /
T02D1414:136a-17: yul gyi spyod pa sgra nyams dang sam skri ta'i skad dang /
T02D1414:136a-18: sangs rgyas spyan gyi rgyud mnyam sgyor dang /
T02D1414:136a-19: m'a ma k'i'i rgyud dgyes rdor dang /
T02D1414:136a-20: gos dkar mo'i rgyud bde mchog dang /
T02D1414:136a-21: sgrol ma'i rgyud sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud dang bzhi shes pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-22: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-24: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D1414:136a-26: rdo rje don yod pa'i rgyud lnga shes pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-27: bya ba'i rgyud dpung bzangs dang /
T02D1414:136a-28: rgyud kyi dbye ba rig pa mchog dang /
T02D1414:136a-29: sna tshogs rab tu grub pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-30: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D1414:136a-31: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D1414:136a-32: sangs rgyas kyi lung las 'grub pa'i bstan bcos mngon par 'dul ba mdo sde sde snod gsum dang /
T02D1414:136a-34: mdo'i sde dang skyes pa rabs kyi sde la sogs
T02D1414:136a-35: pa gsung rab mdo sde la sogs pa gsung rab
T02D1414:136a-36: mdo sde yan lag bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1414:136a-37: bla na med pa'i spyod pa skabs brgyad ston pa'i
T02D1414:136a-38: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyas 'bring
T02D1414:136a-39: gsum dang / phyi rol gyi bstan bcos ni slob
T02D1414:136a-40: dpon kha cig tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang khyab
T02D1414:136a-41: 'jug dang ma h'a de bas bshad pa'i bstan bcos
T02D1414:136a-42: dor byar shes pa'o zhes 'chad kyang /
T02D1414:136a-43: sga dang tshad ma shes pa spyod pa'i mchog 'jig
T02D1414:136a-44: rten pa ji ltar mos pa rig pa'i gnas lnga
T02D1414:136a-45: sna tshogs pa bslabs nas kyang zhes bya ba thabs
T02D1414:136a-47: de ltar thos bsam gyis shes nas rnal 'byor pa
T02D1414:136a-48: bsgom pa'i tshe 'khor lo bde mchog mthar mthar thug
T02D1414:136a-49: pa'i bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim sbyor ba dang dngos
T02D1414:136a-50: gzhi thams cad la bslab par bya'o //
T02D1414:136b-0: rjes ni bza' ba'i @136b tshe nang gi sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1414:136b-1: spyod pa thams cad ni snod bcud lha'i 'khor lor bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:136b-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:136b-3: yi ge brgya pas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir shr'i
T02D1414:136b-4: he ru ka sa ma nu p'a la ya zhes
T02D1414:136b-5: ming dang gcig tu spel la bzlas na lhag pa
T02D1414:136b-6: dang ma tshang ba bskang ngo //
T02D1414:136b-7: gsum pa rgyus du bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa ni /
T02D1414:136b-8: dngos grub gsum gyis don thams cad 'grub pa'i tsa ba'i sngags rtag tu bzla ba dang /
T02D1414:136b-9: sngags btu ba byas nas ge cha'i dang /
T02D1414:136b-10: yab yum gyi snying po dang nye snying dang srung
T02D1414:136b-11: ba gnod mdzes kyi sngags btus la bzlas par bya'o
T02D1414:136b-12: // gnas gang du btu snyam na /
T02D1414:136b-13: rdza rnga'i dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa'i dbus su yi ge bkod nas btu ba'am /
T02D1414:136b-14: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus kyi lte ba la
T02D1414:136b-15: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags
T02D1414:136b-16: bcu pos 'byung ba'i yi ge'i phyi mo dbyangs dang
T02D1414:136b-17: gsal byed bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bkod nas gsang sngags
T02D1414:136b-18: thams cad gsang ba'i gsang ba gru gsum gyi nang
T02D1414:136b-19: nas btu'o // yi ge phyi mo ni sngags kun
T02D1414:136b-20: gyi gnas yin zhing lha'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang
T02D1414:136b-21: bskyed pas sngags kyi yi ge'i dam tshig tu gzhan
T02D1414:136b-22: nas btu'o // la mi bstan / bstan na dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1414:136b-23: bzhi pa rnam dag gi thabs la mkhas pa ni
T02D1414:136b-24: phyis 'ong ba'i bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te
T02D1414:136b-26: bdud bzhi bcom pas 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1414:136b-27: dngos grub nam gyi tshe na thob ce na /
T02D1414:136b-28: tshe 'di la rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phangs 'thob po //
T02D1414:136b-29: phung po'i bdud las rgyal ba'i phyir //
T02D1414:136b-32: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor h'um las tshad med
T02D1414:136b-33: pa'i 'od zer bzhi spros nas 'gro ba'i phung po
T02D1414:136b-34: dang khams dang skye mched lhar byas pa dang /
T02D1414:136b-35: rang gi phung po dang khams dang skye mched bsdus
T02D1414:136b-36: pas lhar byas pa ni byams pa'i go cha bgos
T02D1414:136b-37: pa ste / snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
T02D1414:136b-39: shes rab kyi mtshon chas lha'i 'khor lo sgyu ma
T02D1414:136b-40: dang stong par bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las
T02D1414:136b-41: rgyal lo // le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i phyir
T02D1414:136b-42: bzlog chen mo'i srung bas ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1414:136b-43: dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rgyab tu rdo rje kha
T02D1414:137a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum las rdo rje
T02D1414:137a-3: padma 'khor lo'i phreng bas mtshan pas srung ba thams
T02D1414:137a-4: cad kyi mchog dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol
T02D1414:137a-5: bas 'chi bdag gi bdud las rgyal bar rgyud 'di
T02D1414:137a-7: lha'i bu'i bdud las rgyal ba ni /
T02D1414:137a-8: su mbha ni'i bka'i 'khor lo srung ba chen po'i phur bgegs med pa dang /
T02D1414:137a-9: logs su rdo rje'i rab dang /
T02D1414:137a-10: 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1414:137a-11: steng du mda'i dra ba dang /
T02D1414:137a-12: steng gi bla re me 'od kyi phreng ba rab
T02D1414:137a-13: tu dgyes pas gdug pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par
T02D1414:137a-14: bya zhes pa ni 'di ltar bsgom ste /
T02D1414:137a-15: 'og tu sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i sa gzhi gnyis las /
T02D1414:137a-16: logs su rdo rje rab dang dra ba gnyis /
T02D1414:137a-17: steng du mda'i bla re dang rdo rje'i bla re gnyis /
T02D1414:137a-18: thams cad gdug pa skrag pa'i me /
T02D1414:137a-19: phyis phur bu bcu gnyis pa bgegs med par byed pa'i cho ga'i go rims yin no //
T02D1414:137a-20: las dang po bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i rnam dang bshad nas /
T02D1414:137a-21: zab pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom pa shin tu spros med kyi spyod pa byed pa ni /
T02D1414:137a-22: rang rig pas sems kyi chos 'dus byas rtogs na
T02D1414:137a-23: phyi rol gyi bdud bzhi mi 'joms pas phyi rol
T02D1414:137a-24: gyi bdud dang bdud ma yin pa rang gi sems
T02D1414:137a-25: 'dus ma byas la bcings pas kun rdzob kyi bdud
T02D1414:137a-27: 'dus ma byas kyi sems ni dri yang de yin /
T02D1414:137a-29: g-yas ngos su ste'u 'jog pa dang /
T02D1414:137a-30: g-yon ngos su tsandan gyi sa skud pa la 'dus
T02D1414:137a-31: ma byas rtogs pas sems mnyam pa nyid yin te
T02D1414:137a-32: / mkhas pa'i phyir na mi dga' med //
T02D1414:137a-33: bsod rnams bsags pas sdug bsngal med //
T02D1414:137a-35: ste'us 'jog pa la bzod pa bsgom pa ni med tog yin la /
T02D1414:137a-36: sems kyis stong nyid la 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus ni gtor ma yang de yin /
T02D1414:137a-37: sems dag ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mar me yang de yin /
T02D1414:137a-38: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam nyid bsgom pa bdug pa yang de yin te /
T02D1414:137a-40: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
T02D1414:137a-41: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1414:137a-42: rang gis rang gi chos nyid mthong //
T02D1414:137a-43: mchog dang phyag 'tshal kun yin no //
T02D1414:137a-45: gang gsungs na ci de dang gi bskyed chog gi lugs dang zhen /
T02D1414:137a-47: sngon 'gro lda dang dngos gzhi gsum //
T02D1414:137b-0: @137b rjes brgyad thun mtshams bcu gnyis te //
T02D1414:137b-1: rgyas pa'i yan lag bzhi bcu brgyad //
T02D1414:137b-2: sbyor ba dang po'i chos dgu dang //
T02D1414:137b-3: dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog gi drug / las rgyal mchog brgyad bsdus pa'i dgu'o //
T02D1414:137b-4: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:137b-9: rgyud kyi lus mdor gzhag pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:137b-10: rgyud kyi don dang po dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dkyil
T02D1414:137b-11: 'khor bcu bdun las thog na sku'i 'khor lo ston
T02D1414:137b-12: par bzhed pas de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te
T02D1414:137b-13: / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni 'bras bu'i he ru ka'o //
T02D1414:137b-14: de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba ni sku gsum bsgrub pa'i thabs bcu bdun gsungs pa'o //
T02D1414:137b-15: de nos zhes bya ba ni 'khor rnams kyis bdud
T02D1414:137b-16: rtsi lngas phyag 'tshal nas zhus pa'i rjes la de
T02D1414:137b-18: gzhan yang bshad bya ba ni sku'i 'khor lo nges brjod rgyud kyi bla ma 'di rjod byed do //
T02D1414:137b-19: de'i brjod bya sgrub pa po la phan btags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1414:137b-20: sgrub thabs kyi rim pa ji ltar shes snyam na /
T02D1414:137b-21: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D1414:137b-23: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1414:137b-24: zhes sangs rgyas kyi bla ma dus gsum du brgyud
T02D1414:137b-25: pas bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag
T02D1414:137b-26: gis kyang bshad par bya ba tsa ba'i rgyud bsdus
T02D1414:137b-27: pa 'dis gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:137b-28: sgrub thabs la don gsum ste /
T02D1414:137b-29: sgrub pa'i rten gang zag dang /
T02D1414:137b-32: sgrub pa po rten gyi gang zag ni mtshan nyid bcu drug dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1414:137b-33: phyi rol 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i rnam par rtog pa spangs nas /
T02D1414:137b-34: dam tshig tshig bsrung ba dang yid gnyis med pa gtan la phab pa dang /
T02D1414:137b-35: bgegs la sogs pas mi 'jigs pa dang mtshan ma thob pas tshes grangs mi brtsi ba dang /
T02D1414:137b-36: skar ma mi lta ba dang /
T02D1414:137b-37: smyung ba mi byed pa dang /
T02D1414:137b-38: gtsang sbra khrus mi byed pa dang /
T02D1414:137b-39: kha zas la mi gtsang ba med pa dang /
T02D1414:137b-40: sgo dgu'i dbang po dri ma dang par mi byed pa dang /
T02D1414:137b-41: dus drug mi lta ba dang /
T02D1414:137b-42: chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis mi lta bas grol ba dang /
T02D1414:137b-43: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gnyis kyis dag pa spangs pa dang /
T02D1414:138a-1: mchog gi bzlas pa'i sngags dang /
T02D1414:138a-2: bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor shes pa dang /
T02D1414:138a-3: snying rjes sems can gyi don byed pa mtshan nyid bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1414:138a-4: sgrub pa'i gnas ni bcu bzhi ste /
T02D1414:138a-5: ris la nas bzi mdo'i bar du'o //
T02D1414:138a-6: gnas kyi 'bras bu ni dngos grub 'dod pa thams cad stsol ba'o //
T02D1414:138a-7: las dang po pas gnas pa brtag pa byas pa dang /
T02D1414:138a-8: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas yid gang du
T02D1414:138a-9: dga' ba der bsgrubs na dngos grub tu 'gyur te
T02D1414:138a-10: / sgrub pa'i thabs du bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:138a-11: dbye ba du mas bsgom pa ni dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa drug go //
T02D1414:138a-13: gdul bya'i mos pa bsam pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D1414:138a-14: de la sgrub pa'i thabs kyi yan lag ni /
T02D1414:138a-15: ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis sa gzhi byugs pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D1414:138a-17: bzod dang me tog 'thor ba'i 'bad pa brtson 'grus dang /
T02D1414:138a-18: sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya grol lam la chos kyi phyag rgya yid du 'ong ba bcu gnyis dang //
T02D1414:138a-19: bcu drug lang tshos brgyan pa'i gdan la dga' ba bzhi'i bsam gtan bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:138a-20: bying rmugs dang rgod 'gyod bsal nas rtse gcig pa'i sems shes rab /
T02D1414:138a-21: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgrub pa'i
T02D1414:138a-22: yan lag dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag dang
T02D1414:138a-23: ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ni gsum ste /
T02D1414:138a-27: de la sngon 'gro ni lnga ste /
T02D1414:138a-28: dang po sems can gyi don ni snying gar hr'i ;
T02D1414:138a-31: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las 'od zer dkar po //
T02D1414:138a-34: ljang gu bzhi 'phros pas sems can la tshangs pa'i
T02D1414:138a-35: gnas bzhis byams pas phung po lnga dang khams dan
T02D1414:138a-36: skye mched lhar bskyed pa'i bde ba dang phrad par
T02D1414:138a-37: byas / snying rjes khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral /
T02D1414:138a-38: dga' bas lha'i chos nyid rtogs /
T02D1414:138a-39: btang snyoms kyis sems can la dbri bkol med pas btang snyoms par byas pa'am //
T02D1414:138a-43: don mthun par byas nas sam /
T02D1414:138a-44: yang na 'od zer spros pas dge ba bcu la
T02D1414:138a-45: bkod pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba rnal 'byor
T02D1414:138a-46: bsrung ba'o // de'i 'od zer tshur 'dus pas phyi gzugs kyi phung po dang /
T02D1414:138a-47: nang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang
T02D1414:138a-48: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i lha bsgom
T02D1414:138b-0: @138b pa dang / phyi'i dbang po lnga dang nang
T02D1414:138b-1: yid kyi dbang po dang drug sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D1414:138b-2: sems dpa' drug tu bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:138b-3: phyi'i byung ba bzhi nam mkha' dang bcas pa lha mo ldar bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:138b-4: thams cad stong pa nyid du bltas nas zhes bya
T02D1414:138b-5: ba ni phung po khams dang skye mchod rnam par
T02D1414:138b-6: dag pa'i lha bsgom pa ste /
T02D1414:138b-7: de'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi tshogs zag pa
T02D1414:138b-8: med pa'i lha mchog dam pa rang gi sems kyi
T02D1414:138b-9: snang ba tsam la gnas par bya ba yin te
T02D1414:138b-10: bdag phung po'i bdud las bsrung ba'o //
T02D1414:138b-11: de nas tshogs bsags pa'i rnal 'byor ni /
T02D1414:138b-14: de'i dbus su ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:138b-15: de'i steng du h'um de kho na nyid mchog tu gyur pa las /
T02D1414:138b-16: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gsal ba 'phros pas /
T02D1414:138b-17: phyogs bcu kun du khyab pa dang /
T02D1414:138b-18: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nyon mongs pa zhi ba'i
T02D1414:138b-19: sku sngon grub pa'i sangs rgyas bskul nas sdig pa
T02D1414:138b-20: bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang
T02D1414:138b-21: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i byin byin gyis
T02D1414:138b-22: rlob par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1414:138b-23: de nas nam mkha'i khams lnga nyams dga' bar dkyil 'khor mchog lnga mthong ba ni /
T02D1414:138b-24: 'khor lo bde mchog gi lha drug cu rtsag nyis khro bo'i gzugs kyis khyab par mthong ste /
T02D1414:138b-25: gtso bo sangs rgyas lnga dang /
T02D1414:138b-26: 'khor byang chub sems dpa' drug cu rtsa gnyis phrag lnga dang /
T02D1414:138b-27: byang chub kyi sems 'khor lo bde mchog gi gzugs can bla ma gtso bo'i cha byad can dang /
T02D1414:138b-28: lha mo bcu gnyis sna tshogs pa mthong nas rnal
T02D1414:138b-29: 'byor pha bdag gis le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa
T02D1414:138b-30: nas 'byung ba bzhin du lha mo brgyad dam bcu
T02D1414:138b-31: drug gam nyi shus mchod la /
T02D1414:138b-32: bla ma dang dkyil 'khor la phyag bya /
T02D1414:138b-34: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D1414:138b-35: khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi ye shes lnga'i 'od zer spros pas rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02D1414:138b-36: 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams kyi gzugs bskyed nas 'god pa ni sdig pa bshags so //
T02D1414:138b-37: de la dga' ba ni rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D1414:138b-38: de nas 'do zer gyen la pas nam mkha'i dkyil
T02D1414:138b-39: kun khyab par sangs rgyas lnga'i dkyil 'khor mchog rnams
T02D1414:138b-40: bzhugs par mthong bas thugs kar bsdus nas byang chub
T02D1414:138b-41: kyi snying po'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
T02D1414:138b-42: su 'gro ba ni thugs kar zhugs pa'o //
T02D1414:139a-2: thugs ka'i yi ga 'bru ni chos so //
T02D1414:139a-3: bdag dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad buddha lnga'i
T02D1414:139a-4: thugs kar zhugs pa ni go 'phang de la bzhag
T02D1414:139a-5: pa zhes bya'o // der sgrub pa pos gsol ba gdab ces bas na /
T02D1414:139a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02D1414:139a-7: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1414:139a-8: lus phul nas dge rtsa bsngo ba ni /
T02D1414:139a-9: rtag tu skyabs su 'gro bar bya //
T02D1414:139a-11: de ltar tshogs bsags pa'i rnal 'byor bshad nas /
T02D1414:139a-12: gal te phung po khams dang skye mched lhar bsgoms
T02D1414:139a-13: pas bdag dang bdag gir blta pa rmongs pa'i phung
T02D1414:139a-14: po 'dis kham dang skye mched la gnyen po lha'i
T02D1414:139a-15: nga rgyal bsgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsam
T02D1414:139a-16: bzang po bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1414:139a-17: mgo bor gzugs kyi phung po'i gnyen por bh'um las
T02D1414:139a-18: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1414:139a-19: pa dkar po / tshor ba'i gnyen po lte bar
T02D1414:139a-20: aom las rdo rje nyi ma yin po che dang
T02D1414:139a-21: dril bu bsnams pa ser po //
T02D1414:139a-22: 'du shes kyi khams kyi gnyen po lkog mar hr'i ;
T02D1414:139a-23: las padma gar gyi dbang phug padma gar dang dril bu bsnams pa dmar po /
T02D1414:139a-24: rkang pa'i long bu gnyis su 'du byed kyi gnyen por ho ;
T02D1414:139a-25: las rdo rje rgyal po sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ljang gu /
T02D1414:139a-26: snying gar rnams shes kyi gnyen po h'um las rdo
T02D1414:139a-27: rje sems dpa' rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa
T02D1414:139a-28: mthing ga'o // nub ma'i bar du he las de
T02D1414:139a-29: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid he ru
T02D1414:139a-30: ka rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa sngon po
T02D1414:139a-32: mig tu aom las gti mug rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra'o //
T02D1414:139a-33: rna bar h'um las zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra /
T02D1414:139a-34: sna la hr'i:las phrag dog rdo rje rdo rje nyi ma dang 'dra /
T02D1414:139a-35: lce la aom las 'dod chags rdo rje padma gar gyi dbang phug dang 'dra /
T02D1414:139a-36: spyi bor kham ser sna rdo rje rdo rje rgyal po dang 'dra /
T02D1414:139a-37: snying gar skye mched thams cad la 'jug pa'i yid
T02D1414:139a-38: ham las dbang phyug rdo rje rdo rje dril bu
T02D1414:139a-40: snying gar sa'i dkyil 'khor lam las ltung byed ma
T02D1414:139a-41: gri gug dang ka pa la thogs pa ser mo
T02D1414:139a-42: / lte bar chu'i dkyil 'khor lam las gsod byed
T02D1414:139a-43: ma gri gug dang ka p'a la thogs pa dkar
T02D1414:139a-44: / mo / lte bar me'i dkyil 'khor la pam
T02D1414:139b-0: las 'gugs byed ma gri gug dang ka @139b p'a
T02D1414:139b-2: rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su
T02D1414:139b-3: tam las gar gyi dbang phug ma gri gug dang
T02D1414:139b-4: ka p'a la thogs pa ljang gu / mgo nam
T02D1414:139b-5: mkha'i dkyil 'khor bam las padma'i dkyil 'khor bam las
T02D1414:139b-6: padma'i dra ba can gri gug dang ka p'a la
T02D1414:139b-7: thogs pa nam mkha'i mdog can sngo skya'o //
T02D1414:139b-8: de ltar lha la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i phung po khams dang skye mched sbyangs nas /
T02D1414:139b-9: aom pra kri ti pa ri shu dha sarba dharm'a /
T02D1414:139b-10: par kri ti pa ri shudho& ham ;
T02D1414:139b-11: zhes bya bas phyi stong pa nyid du rnam par dag par bsgoms la /
T02D1414:139b-12: de'i rjes la de nas dkon mchog gsum la bdun rnam dag dang skyabs 'gro bya'o //
T02D1414:139b-13: de nas srung ba'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:139b-14: de nas bdag bsrung ba dang /
T02D1414:139b-15: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa skyabs 'gro
T02D1414:139b-16: / de nas ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa bya'o
T02D1414:139b-17: zhes go rims gsung pa yin no //
T02D1414:139b-21: yi ge gsum gyis sngags kyi skur gyur bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:139b-22: de nas 'od zer spros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can
T02D1414:139b-23: kun gyi don du he ru ka'i gzugs su bskyed
T02D1414:139b-24: nas bdag nyid he ru ka dang 'dra rdo rje
T02D1414:139b-26: gnyis pa'i g-yas g-yon nyung ba bzhi'i rngul phra rab tshun chad lta'i skur dgod par bya'o //
T02D1414:139b-27: de nas aom sva bh'a wa bi shu dha sarba dharm'a sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1414:139b-28: zhes bya ba lan gsum bzlas pas ye shes kyi tshogs bsag go //
T02D1414:139b-29: de nas srung ba'i rnal 'byor ni rang nyid rgyu'i h'um mdzad du bskyed la /
T02D1414:139b-30: de'i thugs ka nas khro bo brgyad sprul nas rgyu'i
T02D1414:139b-31: h'um mdzad de gyur pa las 'bras bu'i h'um mdzad
T02D1414:139b-32: bskyed do // de'i thugs ka nas steng 'og gi khro bo gnyis bskyed de /
T02D1414:139b-33: khro bo bcu la bka' bsgos nas bgegs gdan du
T02D1414:139b-34: bting ba'i rjes la bgegs mi 'jug pa'i srung ba
T02D1414:139b-35: 'di rnams bya'o // 'bras bu'i he ru thugs ka
T02D1414:139b-36: nas phyogs bcu srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rdo
T02D1414:139b-37: rje phra mo'i 'od zer 'phros pas 'od de gyur
T02D1414:139b-38: pa las de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang
T02D1414:139b-39: 'di rnams bya'o // / 'og gis gzhi gnyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1414:139b-40: phyogs dang mtshams kyi logs su rab dang dra ba nyis rim /
T02D1414:139b-41: steng du rdo rje bla re /
T02D1414:139b-43: de thams cad kyi phyi rol nas rdo rje me
T02D1414:139b-44: 'od 'bar ba rnal 'byor ba'i bsam pa dang mthun
T02D1414:139b-45: par 'dzam bu'i gling tsam phyi rol nas bskor ram
T02D1414:140a-0: / @140a * // gling bzhi tsam stong spyi phung tsam /
T02D1414:140a-2: stong gsum tsam du phyi rol nas srung ba'i 'khor lo dgod par bya'o //
T02D1414:140a-3: 'og gi sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i sa gzhi gnyis /
T02D1414:140a-4: aom me di ni badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1414:140a-6: aom badzra phra'a k'a ra badzra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1414:140a-7: nang gi rdo rje dra ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1414:140a-8: aom badzra pa nytsa ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1414:140a-9: steng du bye dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan pa /
T02D1414:140a-10: sangs rgyas bzhi dan spyi gtsug nang du mda'i dra ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1414:140a-11: aom badzra sha ra dz'a la tram sham tram /
T02D1414:140a-12: phyi rol nas bskor ba'i rdo rje me 'od kyi sngags ni /
T02D1414:140a-13: aom bam dzra dzrva la aa na l'a rka h'um /
T02D1414:140a-14: de ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo byas pa'i sngon du gang bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:140a-15: bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gis su mbha nis bka'
T02D1414:140a-16: bsgos pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i steng du
T02D1414:140a-17: / ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D1414:140a-18: de'i dbus su h'um las rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba shel ltar dkar ba /
T02D1414:140a-19: rang snang ba'i yum phyag rgya chen mo lha mo
T02D1414:140a-20: dang snyoms par 'jug pa yab yum gnyis kyil krung
T02D1414:140a-21: gis bzhugs pa rus pa las byas pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1414:140a-22: lnga'i rgyan can / mi bskyod pa ni gtsug gi lte ba la bzhugs pa /
T02D1414:140a-25: lag gdub dang do shal dang sen mo do dang /
T02D1414:140a-26: ska rags dang rkang gdub ste rgyan thams cad rdzogs pa /
T02D1414:140a-27: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1414:140a-28: dang po'i rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:140a-29: gnyis pa'i g-yas g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
T02D1414:140a-30: gsum pa'i g-yas g-yon na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1414:140a-34: de'i yab yum gyi thugs ka nas khro bo brgyad spros te /
T02D1414:140a-35: shar du rdor je drag po /
T02D1414:140a-36: byang du rdo rje nyi ma /
T02D1414:140a-37: nub tu rdo rje gtsug tor /
T02D1414:140a-39: shar lhor rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02D1414:140a-40: lho nub tu rdo rje nag po //
T02D1414:140a-41: nub byang du rdo rje stobs po che /
T02D1414:140a-42: byang shar du rdo rje 'jigs byed /
T02D1414:140a-46: shar lho du ba'i mdog can /
T02D1414:140a-50: thod pa las byas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1414:140a-51: rus pa'i rgyun gyis snga ma bzhin du thams cad brgyan pa /
T02D1414:140b-0: sna tshogs pa'i padma'i 'dab @140b mar nyi ma'i steng du /
T02D1414:140b-1: g-yas brkyang pas phyogs skyong brgyad zhabs kyis mnan par bsam mo //
T02D1414:140b-2: g-yas g-yon gyi dang po gnyis na thod pa dang
T02D1414:140b-3: kha tv'am ga / gnyis pa gnyis na lcags kyu
T02D1414:140b-4: dang zhags pa / cang te'u dang dril bus rang snang ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:140b-5: dbu skra dmar skra dmar ser mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa /
T02D1414:140b-6: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs la rdo rje dang
T02D1414:140b-7: sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gnas thams cad sbrul
T02D1414:140b-8: gyis kyang brgyan par shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:140b-9: khro bo brgyad bskyed nas rgyu'i h'um mdzad de gyur
T02D1414:140b-10: pa las bdag nyid 'bras bu'i h'um mdzad 'od zer
T02D1414:140b-12: zhal gsum phyag drug pa g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs /
T02D1414:140b-13: dang po rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa gnyi pa na lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
T02D1414:140b-14: gsum pa na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal can /
T02D1414:140b-15: rus pa'i rdo rje rgya gram gyi phreng ba'i skye rags can /
T02D1414:140b-16: gdug pa can thams cad kyi bdag po 'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan pa /
T02D1414:140b-17: sangs rgyas bzhi dang spyi gtsug na rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can bsgom mo //
T02D1414:140b-18: de'i thugs ka nas steng 'og gi khro bo gnyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1414:140b-19: steng gtsug tor dkar po 'og rdo rjes 'og mig sman lta bu sngon po //
T02D1414:140b-20: zhal gsum pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D1414:140b-21: dang po gnyis na rdor dril /
T02D1414:140b-22: gnyis pa gnyis na lcags kyu dang zhags pa /
T02D1414:140b-23: gsum pa gnyis na mdung rtse gsum pa dang 'khor lo //
T02D1414:140b-24: bzhi pa gnyis na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'chang ba /
T02D1414:140b-25: g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa bsgom //
T02D1414:140b-26: de ltar khro bo bcu bskyed nas yang 'bras bu'i h'um mdzad kyi thugs ka las /
T02D1414:140b-27: de nas stod khro bo smad phur bu'i rnam pa
T02D1414:140b-28: phyogs bcur spros nas bgegs la phur bus gdab pa'o
T02D1414:140b-29: // de nas 'bras bu'i h'um mdzad du bsgoms pa'i
T02D1414:140b-30: sngags pas khro bo bcu la gegs med par gyis
T02D1414:140b-32: sngags pas su mbha ni'i sngags dran zhing phyogs bzhir sdigs mdzub kyi se gol gyi phyag rgyas /
T02D1414:140b-33: shar du aom su mbha ni su mbha h'um h'um
T02D1414:140b-34: phat kyis brgya byin non cig ces bka' bsgo ba'o
T02D1414:140b-35: // byang du aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat kyis gnod sbyin gyi bgegs med par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1414:140b-36: nub tu aom gri hn'a pa ya h'um phat kyis chu lha'i bgegs med par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-1: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra r'a dza
T02D1414:141a-2: h'um h'um phat kyis gshin rje'i bgegs med par gyis
T02D1414:141a-3: shig pa'o // de bzhin du yang su mbha ni'i sngags brjod pas shar lho me'i bgegs dang /
T02D1414:141a-4: lho nub tu gri gnas srin po'i bgegs dang /
T02D1414:141a-5: nub byang du grihn'a pa yas rlung gi bgegs dang /
T02D1414:141a-6: byang shar du a'a na ya hos dbang ldan gyi bgegs med par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-7: lan gsum brjod pas steng gi lha'i bgegs dang /
T02D1414:141a-8: sa 'og gi lha ma yin gyi bgegs med par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-9: khro bo bcu la bka' bsgos pa'i rjes la 'og tu sa gzhi dang /
T02D1414:141a-11: logs su ra ba dang dra ba gnyis dang /
T02D1414:141a-12: steng du rdo rje'i bla re dang mda'i bla re gnyis /
T02D1414:141a-13: phyogs thams cad du me 'od bsams la sngar bskyed
T02D1414:141a-14: pa'i phur bus 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyi
T02D1414:141a-15: rgyal po 'dis phyogs skyong bcu bgegs kun gyi glang
T02D1414:141a-16: pa la lugs 'byung ba phyogs dang /
T02D1414:141a-17: lugs bzlog mtshams kyi phur bus gdab po //
T02D1414:141a-18: de'i sngags gha gha gsod pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-19: gh'a ta ya ni gsod par gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-21: sarba dusht'am bi bhn'am ni gdug pa'i bgegs thams cad do //
T02D1414:141a-22: k'i li k'i la ya ni phur bus so //
T02D1414:141a-24: sarba p'a pam ste sdig pa'i las byas pa thams cad la'o //
T02D1414:141a-25: h'um gsum dang badzra k'i la ya ni rdo rje phur bu sum cu bskyed pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-27: badzra dha ro a'adzny'a ya ti /
T02D1414:141a-33: sus gdab ce na badzra k'i la ya h'um phat de rdo rje phur bus so //
T02D1414:141a-34: phur bu 'debs pa'i tshe khro bo'i sdang mig gis bltas nas sngags bzlas shing gdab po //
T02D1414:141a-35: de nas khro bo thams cad kyi phyag g-yas pa'i
T02D1414:141a-36: rdo rjes bgegs bsad pa'i mngon spyod kyi blos brdung
T02D1414:141a-37: bar bya'o // aom badzra mu dha ra ni rdo rje tho ba'o //
T02D1414:141a-38: aom badzra k'i la ya ni rdo rje phur bu'o //
T02D1414:141a-39: a'a ko ta ya ni rdungs shig pa'o //
T02D1414:141a-40: de nas bgegs med par 'dod na khro bo bcu
T02D1414:141a-41: gcig gi bzlas pa la bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu'i
T02D1414:141a-43: sngags bcu gcig ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:141a-44: de lan nga gi sbyin sreg gi rdzas ni /
T02D1414:141a-45: mam sa sha dang rkang dang zhag / shu kra dang khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas /
T02D1414:141b-0: gsum gyis ri lu byas shing zos na @141b bgegs med pa'i dngos grub tu nges par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:141b-1: bzlas pa dang nang gi sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe
T02D1414:141b-2: khro bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa bsgom pa ni
T02D1414:141b-3: / rdo rje h'um mdzad dbus sngo ba g-yas ser pa g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-4: byang gi khro bo dbus ser ba g-yas gang pa g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-5: lho dang shar lho'i khro bo ni dbus sngo ba'i mdog dang g-yas ser ba g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-6: lho nub dang steng gi khro bo ni dbus dkar ba g-yas ser ba g-yon ljang ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-7: nub kyi khro bo ni dbus dmar ba g-yar ljang ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-8: shar dang nub byang shar dang 'og gi khro bo bzhi ni bdag po bzhin du dbus sngo ba /
T02D1414:141b-11: thams cad kyi spyi bor mi bskyod pa'i cod pan
T02D1414:141b-12: bsam pa nas nang gi sbyin sreg byas na rdo
T02D1414:141b-13: rje can kun mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:141b-14: de lta bu'i srung ba'i 'khor lo ni rlung ni rgyun las ldog pa yang srid /
T02D1414:141b-15: nyi ma dang zla ba dogs sa la lhung ba yang srid /
T02D1414:141b-16: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka'i dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
T02D1414:141b-17: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa drug brda
T02D1414:141b-18: la sogs pa du ma rnams la gtso bo'i bka'
T02D1414:141b-19: bsgom pas bgegs med par mthong nas sngags pas lnga
T02D1414:141b-20: bcu rtsa drug gi dkyil 'khor gang 'dod pa lnga
T02D1414:141b-21: bcu rtsa drug bsgom pa la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1414:141b-22: las dang po pa dang mtshan ma thob pa gnyis kas bsgom mam zhe na /
T02D1414:141b-23: gcer bu'am yang na mi gcer ba //
T02D1414:141b-24: skra grol thal bas byugs kyang rung //
T02D1414:141b-25: zhes gsungs pas gos med pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02D1414:141b-26: gos can gnyi gas kyang bya bar gsungs so //
T02D1414:141b-27: de ltar re zhig 'khor lo bzlas //
T02D1414:141b-28: zhes pa ni phyis 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga bcu
T02D1414:141b-29: rtsa drug gi sngags bzlas nas skyo bar gyur na
T02D1414:141b-30: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje la
T02D1414:141b-32: dpral ba dang lkog ma dang snying gar aom a'a:h'um
T02D1414:141b-33: gsum bkod la 'od zer spro bsdu yi ge gsum
T02D1414:141b-34: du bsdus nas stong par bsgoms te /
T02D1414:141b-35: aom thim pa'i tshe aom thim pa'i tshe aom sh'u n+ya t'a'i sngags brjod //
T02D1414:141b-36: a'a: thim pa'i tshe aom aa mi ta dznya na zhes bya ba mtshan ma med pa'i sngags so //
T02D1414:141b-37: h'um thig ler zhu ba'i tshe aa pra ti ha
T02D1414:141b-38: ta dzny'a na zhes bya bas smon pa med pa'i
T02D1414:141b-39: sngags bzla'o // de ltar na rta mchog pa ni shr'i lta bu tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:141b-40: byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:142a-1: nams kyi tshogs bsogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:142a-2: ye shes kyi tshogs stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:142a-3: srung ba'i 'khor los byas la nang gi sbyin sreg
T02D1414:142a-4: byas pa'i rjes la lha'i 'khor lo lnga bcu rtsa
T02D1414:142a-5: drug gang 'dod pa bsgoms nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1414:142a-6: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi stong pa nyid bsgom /
T02D1414:142a-7: mo// aindra bh'u ti lta bu bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1414:142a-8: zhabs su de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rdzogs
T02D1414:142a-10: padma rdo rje lta bu bskyed pa'i rim pa la mos pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs dang /
T02D1414:142a-12: sgong skyes la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa mngal skyes dang /
T02D1414:142a-15: rdzus skyes kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor gsum dang bsnyen gru bzhi dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:142a-17: de la dang po bshad zin nas bar ma aindra bh'u ti lta bu bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:142a-18: snang brnyan tsam gyi rnam par shes pa ni /
T02D1414:142a-19: rnam thar sgo gsum bsgom pa'i thig le'o //
T02D1414:142a-20: sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag / ces pa ni /
T02D1414:142a-21: thig le me long la rlangs pa zhu ba ltar mi snang bar song nas /
T02D1414:142a-22: gzung ba rang bzhin med pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab ste /
T02D1414:142a-23: sems rig pa tsam du bsgom mo //
T02D1414:142a-24: chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu de ni rnam par
T02D1414:142a-25: shes pa drug gis kyang mi dmigs pas 'dzin pa
T02D1414:142a-26: rang bzhin med pa mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab po
T02D1414:142a-27: // de'i mtshan nyid ni chos sems kyang ma yin
T02D1414:142a-28: chos nyid sems kyi stong pa yang ma yin na
T02D1414:142a-29: nam mkha' lta bur gzung 'dzin gos pa med cing
T02D1414:142a-30: gzhi lnga po dngos po med pas mtshan nyid gsum
T02D1414:142a-31: du gnas pa med pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas
T02D1414:142a-34: gang du snying gi padma kha sbyor zhes pa ni /
T02D1414:142a-35: snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D1414:142a-36: lte ba drug cu rtsa bzhi kha sbyar pa'i dbus na gsal zhes bya ba gtum mo drod de /
T02D1414:142a-37: phra bar blta ba ni rtsa dbu ma chu shin gyi snying po ltar drang ba /
T02D1414:142a-38: til gyi mar me ltar gsal ba /
T02D1414:142a-39: rgya skyegs kyi me tog ltar dmar ba /
T02D1414:142a-40: padma'i skud pa ltar phra ba la blta ba'o //
T02D1414:142a-41: rang 'byung ba ni spyi gtsug nas byang chub kyi
T02D1414:142a-42: sems babs pas dbang po drug bde par myong ba'i
T02D1414:142b-0: yul drug bde bar myong ba mchog @142b dga'i sems 'jug pa dang /
T02D1414:142b-1: rnam par shes pa drug bde bar myong ba lhan
T02D1414:142b-2: cig skyes dga'i sems 'jug pa khams gsum ma lus
T02D1414:142b-4: gnyis su med pa'i nye bar 'gro zhing rtogs pas
T02D1414:142b-5: rang rig pa mngon sum du gsal pa'i chos kyi
T02D1414:142b-6: dbyings sems kyi stong nyid de la bdag 'tshal lo
T02D1414:142b-7: // klu grub kyi zhal snga nas kyang //
T02D1414:142b-8: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang /
T02D1414:142b-9: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1414:142b-10: de ltar rang gi ye shes ni //
T02D1414:142b-11: legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
T02D1414:142b-13: so so skye bo yid kyi rnam shes kyi nges
T02D1414:142b-14: pa ma drangs par rang rig pa stong nyid la
T02D1414:142b-15: tshad mar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1414:142b-18: rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i //
T02D1414:142b-19: zhes pa ni dbang po yul drug la g-yo ba'i
T02D1414:142b-20: rta dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya yin la
T02D1414:142b-21: / de kun srog aa ba dh'u t'i'i nang du bcug nas nges pa'i rnal 'byor du 'gyur te /
T02D1414:142b-22: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di las kyang bsdus pas phyi ma'i rgyud las /
T02D1414:142b-23: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02D1414:142b-24: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya //
T02D1414:142b-26: ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa ni /
T02D1414:142b-27: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba ma lus pa'i sa bcu
T02D1414:142b-28: gcig gi ye shes dbugs bkag nas 'dod pa'i khams
T02D1414:142b-29: kyi sems rang bzhin brgyad cu bkag pa'i mtshungs pa
T02D1414:142b-30: de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang /
T02D1414:142b-31: gtum mo drod dmigs pa'i rkyen dang /
T02D1414:142b-32: spyi gtsug gi byang chub kyi sems dbang po bdag
T02D1414:142b-33: po'i rkyen las rnam par shes pa bsam gtan gyi
T02D1414:142b-35: de las khams gsum ma lus pa las 'das pa 'dus ma byas dang /
T02D1414:142b-36: gnyis su med pa mngon gsum gyis nye bar rtogs
T02D1414:142b-37: nas 'dus ma byas mthong pa'i ye shes nam mkha'
T02D1414:142b-38: dang 'dra ba khams gsum gyi gzung 'dzin dri ma
T02D1414:142b-39: dang bral bas dpal rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur ro
T02D1414:142b-40: // snying ga'i kha sbyor gyi ming ci zhe na /
T02D1414:142b-41: sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis //
T02D1414:142b-42: zhes bya ste snying ga'i rtsa brgyad sangs rgyas yab yum brgyad /
T02D1414:142b-43: dbu ma dpal he ru ka yin te de yang sangs rgyas spyan dang /
T02D1414:142b-44: chu'i rtsa m'a ma k'i dang /
T02D1414:142b-47: bshang ba'i dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa rnam snang /
T02D1414:142b-48: lci ba'i dangs ma 'byung ba'i rtsa rin 'byung /
T02D1414:143a-0: khrag gi dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa snang @143a * //
T02D1414:143a-2: sha'i dangs ma rgyu ba'i rtsa don yod grub pa /
T02D1414:143a-3: dbus ma byang chub sems dang mkha' rgyu ba'i rtsa he ru ka'o //
T02D1414:143a-4: de ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba rgyud kyi rim pa'o //
T02D1414:143a-5: chos rjes su dran pa'i sgom pa ni gtum mo drod de /
T02D1414:143a-6: g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa srub thag / dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'i'i srub shing /
T02D1414:143a-7: khrag gi thig le gtsub stan /
T02D1414:143a-8: dbugs 'byung rngub bkag nas gtsubs pa las gtum mo drod yin no //
T02D1414:143a-9: lte ba nas 'bar ba las 'khor lo bzhi bsregs
T02D1414:143a-10: pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba lus
T02D1414:143a-11: kyi khams nyid shu bzhi'i bar du bsregs pa ni
T02D1414:143a-12: / chos kyi skur ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02D1414:143a-13: zhes bya ste su chu la thim pas smig rgyu lta bu'i rtags dang /
T02D1414:143a-14: chu me la thim pas du ba lta bu'i rtags
T02D1414:143a-15: dang me rlung la thim pas srin bu me khyer
T02D1414:143a-17: rlung rnam par shes pa la thim pas nam mkha' stong pa lta bu'i rtags 'byung ba ni /
T02D1414:143a-18: chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin no //
T02D1414:143a-19: des spyi gtsug nas byang chub kyi sems phab nas
T02D1414:143a-20: snying ga'i dbus na 'byung ba lnga dang bdud rtsi
T02D1414:143a-21: lnga gcig tu gyur pa'i thig le ni /
T02D1414:143a-22: dge 'dun dkon mchog de las mngon sum gyis shes
T02D1414:143a-23: pa'i gsal byed dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig skyes
T02D1414:143a-24: dga'i rnam par lhan cig shes pa la ye shes
T02D1414:143a-25: kyi mchog bde ba stong pa nyid sa bcu gcig
T02D1414:143a-26: gi de kho na nyid kyi man ngag shes pa
T02D1414:143a-27: rnams kyis bla ma dam pa'i man ngal la brten
T02D1414:143a-28: nas shin tu bsgoms pa goms pa las /
T02D1414:143a-29: sa thob pa'i rtags dgu 'bar ba la sogs pa
T02D1414:143a-30: 'og nas le'u lnga bcu rtsa drug pa las bshad
T02D1414:143a-31: pa'i yon tan skye bar the tshom med do //
T02D1414:143a-32: rnal 'byor pas dus yun du byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1414:143a-33: rtag tu du bzhin du snying la gnas pa'i thig
T02D1414:143a-34: le rlung bkag pas yi ges rjod du med pa
T02D1414:143a-35: rnal 'byor pa'i skyes bus de bsgoms na sa bcu
T02D1414:143a-36: gcig gi ye shes skye ba la the tshom med
T02D1414:143a-37: do // sems can rjes rjes dran sbyor ba yis //
T02D1414:143a-38: sems can rjes dran bsgom par bya //
T02D1414:143a-39: zhes pa ni klu sgrub lugs kyis sems can rjes
T02D1414:143a-40: dran ni sems sgyu ma lta bu bdag byin gyis
T02D1414:143a-42: sems 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid dran pa dang /
T02D1414:143a-43: sems zung 'jug pa bde ba chen po rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:143b-0: rjes su dran zhes pa ni mngon sum @143b gyi tshad ma yin no //
T02D1414:143b-1: blo gros chen pos mthong rnams kyi //
T02D1414:143b-2: rnam pa thams cad cig car nges //
T02D1414:143b-3: zhes pas dran pa'i nges pa drangs pa'i tshad ma yin no //
T02D1414:143b-4: sems can rjes dran chos kyis ni //
T02D1414:143b-5: chos kyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:143b-6: zhes pa ni dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes
T02D1414:143b-7: sems can gyi don byed pa'i chos kyi sems dpa'
T02D1414:143b-8: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du 'gro ba mi
T02D1414:143b-9: gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po bsgom par bya zhes
T02D1414:143b-10: ba'o // tshigs bcad 'di rnams kyi 'brel ba ni
T02D1414:143b-11: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba'i
T02D1414:143b-12: sgrub pa'i thabs byas pa de yang blta bar bya'o
T02D1414:143b-13: ba'o // // bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa ni
T02D1414:143b-14: bskyed rim lnga bcu rtsa drug gis skyon sems ngal
T02D1414:143b-15: gso ba'i thabs rdzogs pa'i rim pa bde ba stong
T02D1414:143b-16: pa nyid bsgoms par nges pa'o //
T02D1414:143b-17: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga rdzogs nas /
T02D1414:143b-18: rten dang brten pa'i dang po sbyor ba 'byung ba
T02D1414:143b-19: bzhi'i ri rab gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa bskyed
T02D1414:143b-20: pa ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid yin yang
T02D1414:143b-21: snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis sems can la phan gdags
T02D1414:143b-22: pa'i phyir byang chub tu sems sems bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1414:143b-23: ba smon lam gyi dbang gis yam las rlung gi
T02D1414:143b-24: dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu kha dog sngon po zur
T02D1414:143b-25: bzhi pa ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1414:143b-26: ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar
T02D1414:143b-27: po 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa gru gsum du
T02D1414:143b-29: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po bum pas mtshan pa /
T02D1414:143b-30: de'i steng du lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil grub zhi ser po sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan pa /
T02D1414:143b-31: de'i steng du sum las byang ba'i ri rab zur bzhi pa /
T02D1414:143b-35: byang gser gyi kha dog / phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad kyi rtse mo mtho ba /
T02D1414:143b-36: de'i steng du bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad 'khor
T02D1414:143b-37: lo dang dril bu bsnams pa yongs su gyur pa
T02D1414:143b-38: la las sku'i 'khor lo gzhal yas khang steng du
T02D1414:143b-39: brtsegs pa tshad med pa bzhi zur bzhi dang /
T02D1414:143b-40: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi dang /
T02D1414:143b-41: bsam gtan bzhi dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa nyon
T02D1414:143b-42: mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spongs pa'i dra
T02D1414:143b-43: ba dra phyed kyis mdzes pa ye shes bzhi'i snang
T02D1414:143b-45: byang chub kyi yan la ga me tog phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1414:143b-46: zur dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su rdo rje rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02D1414:144a-1: ba ni sngon byung sprul pa dang /
T02D1414:144a-2: rjes 'jug bri ba gnyis ka zin par dgongs so //
T02D1414:144a-3: de'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:144a-4: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1414:144a-5: shar sngo ba lho ser ba nub dmar ba byang ljang ba /
T02D1414:144a-6: mtshams phyed gzugs kyi padma gri gug gi phreng bas bskor bar bsam mo //
T02D1414:144a-7: rten gyi dang po sbyor ba bstan nas nas brten pa lha'i dang po sbyor ba ni /
T02D1414:144a-8: zla ba me long ye shes k'a li /
T02D1414:144a-9: nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes a'a li /
T02D1414:144a-10: h'um bam gnyis dang po rdo rje dang gri gug so sor rtog pa /
T02D1414:144a-11: 'ong zer spro bsdu bya ba nan tan la sogs
T02D1414:144a-12: pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyu'i he ru
T02D1414:144a-13: ka rdo rje sems dpa' rim ma dad bcas pa
T02D1414:144a-14: mdun dkar ba / g-yas ser ba /
T02D1414:144a-17: mdun ma zhi ba'i nyams kyi zhal /
T02D1414:144a-18: g-yas dgod pa'i nyams kyi zhal /
T02D1414:144a-21: phyag dang po rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:144a-22: g-yas g-yon gyi gnyis pas tshangs pa'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1414:144a-23: g-yas g-yon gyi gsum pa ni gri gug dang thod pa /
T02D1414:144a-24: g-yas g-yon gyi bzhi pa na cang te'u dang kha
T02D1414:144a-25: tv'am ga / g-yas g-yon gyi lnga pa na dgra
T02D1414:144a-26: sta dang zhags / g-yas g-yon gyi drug pa na mdud dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo ste /
T02D1414:144a-29: dbu rgyan rus pa las byas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can /
T02D1414:144a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad can no //
T02D1414:144a-31: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las rdo rje bsgom pa'i shes rab /
T02D1414:144a-32: dril bu thos bsam gyi shes rab /
T02D1414:144a-33: tshangs pa'i pags pa bzod pa /
T02D1414:144a-41: tshangs pa'i mgo bo stobs te pha rol tu phyin
T02D1414:144a-42: pa bcu gnyis las byung ba yin no zhes gsungs
T02D1414:144a-43: pas dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi phyag bcu gnyis
T02D1414:144a-45: de'i thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1414:144a-46: ye shes sems dpa' zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa
T02D1414:144a-47: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig can
T02D1414:144a-48: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste sems dpa' sum brtsegs
T02D1414:144b-0: so // @144b ye shes sems dpa'i cod pan gyi
T02D1414:144b-1: dbus su rdo rje 'dzin ba ji ltar thabs la
T02D1414:144b-2: phyag rgya drug yod pa bzhin du shes rab de
T02D1414:144b-3: la phyag rgya lngas byin gyis brlabs pas zhal gcig
T02D1414:144b-4: phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams
T02D1414:144b-5: pa'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yab yum gyi zhal nas
T02D1414:144b-6: so // zhugs pas / lkog ma dang snying ga
T02D1414:144b-7: lte bar srid pa bar dor 'od zer dkar dmar
T02D1414:144b-8: yab yum gyi mkha' gsang gi gnas su rigs kyi
T02D1414:144b-9: dbye bas phye ba'i ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi
T02D1414:144b-10: so // zhugs pas / / sku'i 'khor lo yab
T02D1414:144b-11: yum bcu drug dam tshig gi lha mo brgyad de
T02D1414:144b-12: nyi shu rtsa brgyad mang la skyes kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:144b-13: gyi gnas la bkod pa ni yab yum gyi rdo
T02D1414:144b-14: rje dbyings kyi rgyu las lha nyi shu rtsa brgyad
T02D1414:144b-15: sras kyi tshul du bskyed pa ni dbang phyug mchog
T02D1414:144b-16: so // zhugs pas / / ces bya'o // de
T02D1414:144b-17: lta bu'i rgyu'i he ru ka longs skus mngal skyes
T02D1414:144b-18: kyi 'khor gyi lha mo sprul nas bde ba chen
T02D1414:144b-19: po chos kyi skur yab yum gyi mkha' gsang gi
T02D1414:144b-20: thad kar sku gnyis nyi zla'i thig ler zhu ba
T02D1414:144b-21: las lha mo rnams kyi glus bskul ba ni sku'i
T02D1414:144b-22: 'khor lo sa 'og nas gnas pa'i dbang po brgyad
T02D1414:144b-23: so // zhugs pas / / ces bya'o // dang
T02D1414:144b-24: / rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis
T02D1414:144b-25: chags pa'i mig gis blta ba dang /
T02D1414:144b-26: lag pa bskyod pa'i gar dang ngag gi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa ni /
T02D1414:144b-27: yum bzhis bde bar gshegs pa bde ba chen po /
T02D1414:144b-28: rab dga' bde chen mchog thob mdzod /
T02D1414:144b-29: aa la la la ho zhes brjod pa dang /
T02D1414:144b-30: yang sku'i 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad kyis kyang tshig de rang gi glu blangs pa dang /
T02D1414:144b-31: yang dam tshig gi lha mo rnams kyis de nyid
T02D1414:144b-32: glu blangs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis su 'gyur
T02D1414:144b-33: ro // glu 'di blangs pa cam gyis khams gsum
T02D1414:144b-34: gyi srid pa las grol ba'i chos ni sku'i bde
T02D1414:144b-35: bar gshegs pa sgrib pa rnam gnyis spangs pa'i dag
T02D1414:144b-36: pa chen po yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i tshul
T02D1414:144b-38: rnal 'byor pa kha cig ga mos pa'i dbang gis
T02D1414:144b-39: mngal skyes la dga' bas 'khor sngon du skyes pa
T02D1414:144b-40: chos kyi sku la sprul sku'i dkyil 'khor mngal skyes
T02D1414:144b-41: yin no // de nas de ma thag pa'i zhes
T02D1414:144b-42: pa'i sku'i mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i sku la sngar
T02D1414:144b-43: grub pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi

T02D1414:145a-1: gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i rim gyis phyag dang phyag

T02D1414:146a-5: mtshan bcas bsgom pa dang lnga yin la /

T02D1414:146a-8: zung 'jug bsgom pa dang gsum ste /

T02D1414:146a-14: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni gcig yin te /
