T02D1414:148a-14: bzod pa gsol nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo /
T02D1414:148a-16: thun mtshams kyi lha bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:148a-17: tsham dam gyi sngags kyis bsrung /
T02D1414:148a-21: dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gsum dang /
T02D1414:148a-22: rjes kyi cho ga brgyad dang /
T02D1414:148a-23: ldang ba'i cho ga bcu gnyis te gang zag gcig
T02D1414:148a-24: lha'i 'khor lo bsgoms la zhib mo rnam par 'thag
T02D1414:148a-25: pa'i dbang du byas nas don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad
T02D1414:148a-26: yin no // de ltar le'u bzhi pa nas drug
T02D1414:148a-27: cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du don zhib mos 'di
T02D1414:148a-31: // / sku la mos pa de bsgom pa'i thabs bshad
T02D1414:148a-32: nas gsung la mos pa'i don du de nas zhes
T02D1414:148a-33: bya ba de ma thag pa ston te /
T02D1414:148a-34: gzhan yang bshad bya ba zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo brjod par bya'o //
T02D1414:148a-35: 'dir yang gsung bsgom pa'i rten gyi gang zag de'i gnas dang /
T02D1414:148a-36: de bsgrub pa'i yan lag tshogs nas tshad med pa dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1414:148a-37: tshogs bsags pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1414:148a-39: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa bskyed nas /
T02D1414:148a-40: de'i rjes la gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgom ste /
T02D1414:148a-41: sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dus dag tu //
T02D1414:148a-42: zhes pa ni sngar sku'i dkyil 'khor dag bshad pa dang mthun pa yin no //
T02D1414:148a-43: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dbus su ye shes 'khor lo
T02D1414:148a-44: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad gri gug gis bskor
T02D1414:148a-45: ba de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dmar
T02D1414:148a-46: po'i mdog can la padma'i phreng bas bskor ba de'i
T02D1414:148a-47: nang sna tshogs padma'i lte bar snga ma bzhin du
T02D1414:148a-48: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas rgyu'i rdo
T02D1414:148a-49: rje sems dpa' zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa yab
T02D1414:148a-50: yum bskyed la / de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
T02D1414:148b-0: zhal nas @148b zhugs nas mkha' gsang du 'khor nyi
T02D1414:148b-2: phyir byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su gzhag pa
T02D1414:148b-3: ni snga ma bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no
T02D1414:148b-4: // de nas rgyu'i he ru ka yab yum zhu ba dang /
T02D1414:148b-5: ye shes dang gsung dang dam tshig gi 'khor los glus bskul ba ni /
T02D1414:148b-6: lha mos glu 'di blangs pa yis //
T02D1414:148b-7: sems can dge la mngon brtson pa //
T02D1414:148b-8: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin brten nas //
T02D1414:148b-9: chos rnams kun gyis bskul bar bya //
T02D1414:148b-10: zhes bya ba 'og nas gsungs pa'i glus 'dir bskul nas /
T02D1414:148b-11: thig le mngon bar byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas
T02D1414:148b-12: yongs su gyur pa las gsung gi mkha' 'gro rnam
T02D1414:148b-13: par bsgom pa ni zhal bzhi phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1414:148b-14: padma'i mkha' 'gro zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D1414:148b-15: padmas mtshan pa'i gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa
T02D1414:148b-16: la yab kyi phyag dang po padma dang dril bu
T02D1414:148b-18: dbang phyug chen po'i bags pa bshus pa phyag gnyis kyis brkyang nas 'dzin pa /
T02D1414:148b-19: gsum pa gnyis na cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga
T02D1414:148b-20: bzhi pa gnyis na gri gug dang ka p'a la
T02D1414:148b-21: / lnga pa gnyis na dgra sta dang zhags pa /
T02D1414:148b-22: drug pa gnyis na mdung dang dbang phyug chen po'i
T02D1414:148b-23: mgo bo bsnams pa ni snga ma'i rim pa bzhin
T02D1414:148b-24: du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D1414:148b-25: dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:148b-26: gsung gi 'khor lo dang dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnams kyis mnan la /
T02D1414:148b-27: dbang phyug chen po'i khyo shug ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis mnan par lta'o //
T02D1414:148b-31: g-yon dkar ba spyan gsum pa /
T02D1414:148b-32: ral ba gyen la brdzes pa la rus pa'i cod pan sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa /
T02D1414:148b-33: de la zhal bzhi pa ni ye shes bzhi'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:148b-34: spyan gsum ni rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
T02D1414:148b-35: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02D1414:148b-36: cod pan la padma'i phreng bas bcings ba ni gsung gi rigs kyi dbang rtags so //
T02D1414:148b-37: mche ba gtsigs pa ni bdud bzhi 'joms pa'o //
T02D1414:148b-38: zhal rnam par 'gyur ba ni sems can la thugs rje skyes ba'o //
T02D1414:148b-39: sgeg pa yab yum 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1414:148b-40: dpa' ba lta chen zhabs kyis mnan pa dang /
T02D1414:148b-41: 'jigs su rung ba ni zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis
T02D1414:148b-42: pa ni sku la tshor ba bde sdug btang snyoms
T02D1414:149a-2: rgyab mi sdug pa mche ba gtsigs pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-3: g-yon pa rngam pas lha chen po'i mgo bo zhal du stobs pa ni /
T02D1414:149a-4: gsung la chor ba 'de sdug gsum nub pa'i rtags so //
T02D1414:149a-5: yum la 'khyud pa'i phyag dang po gnyis snying rje'i nyams dang /
T02D1414:149a-6: thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pas zhi ba dang /
T02D1414:149a-7: klu'i rgyal po seng shas mi mgo lnga brgyus pas ngo mtshar ba'i nyams te /
T02D1414:149a-8: de ltar sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dgu dang /
T02D1414:149a-9: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pas stag gi pags pa mnabs pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-10: mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang bas 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig dag pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-11: phyag rgya drug pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rgyas btab pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-12: rang snang ba'i lha mo gcer bu 'jig rten gyi
T02D1414:149a-13: chos brgyad spangs pa dang nyon mongs pas las grol
T02D1414:149a-15: nyon mongs pa gcig dang du mar phye nas spangs pas dum bu'i skye rags can dang /
T02D1414:149a-16: bdud kyi khrag dang ldan pa'i thod pa phyag g-yon
T02D1414:149a-17: pas gzung bas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa dang
T02D1414:149a-18: / padmas mtshan pa'i gri gug gis nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-19: gzi brjid 'bar bas sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gyed pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-20: zhal nas khrag lta bu'i 'od zer dmar po 'dzag pas rgyud sde bzhi ston pa dang /
T02D1414:149a-21: byin pa gnyis kyis 'khyud pas stong pa nyid dang
T02D1414:149a-22: ye shes tha mi dad par ston pa dang dngos
T02D1414:149a-23: grub thams cad gsol ba ni gtso bo yab yum
T02D1414:149a-25: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i padma'i kha dog la
T02D1414:149a-26: khyad par med kyang shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma dkar
T02D1414:149a-27: / nub kyi dum skyes ma nag / lha mo
T02D1414:149a-28: gnyis ni sngar bshad pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang
T02D1414:149a-29: / mthun / g-yon gyi kha tv'am ga ni bsam gtan /
T02D1414:149a-31: g-yas pa'i cang te'u ni lhag mthong /
T02D1414:149a-33: mtshams bzhi'i bum pa ni rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang /
T02D1414:149a-34: snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang
T02D1414:149a-35: bzhi nang na bzhugs pa'i phyi rol bum par snang
T02D1414:149a-36: ba'o // bum pa'i steng gi thod pa'i bdud rtsi ni 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms so //
T02D1414:149a-37: padmas mtshan pa'i gri gug gi phreng bas bskor bas kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:149a-38: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa k'a ma ru pa la
T02D1414:149a-39: sog sa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang
T02D1414:149b-0: ba la zhing gi ming btags @149b myu gu can
T02D1414:149b-1: dang sa srung ma la sogs ma gnod sbyin dang
T02D1414:149b-2: srin po btul bas gdul bya'i ming gis btags /
T02D1414:149b-3: thams cad kha dog dmar por mi snang ba ni
T02D1414:149b-4: sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i dbang gis gdul bya'i nye ba
T02D1414:149b-5: la dgongs so // gsung gi 'khor lo ni 'dul byed snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs so //
T02D1414:149b-6: sa spyod ni gnod sbyin dang srin po 'dul ba'o //
T02D1414:149b-7: dpa' bo rnams phyag bzhi ni tshad med pa bzhi'o //
T02D1414:149b-8: spyan gsum ni rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
T02D1414:149b-9: ral ba gyen du brdzes pa ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gyed pa'i //
T02D1414:149b-10: cod pan lnga ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02D1414:149b-11: dar dbyangs ni snyan pa'i ba dan 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
T02D1414:149b-12: phyag dang po padma dang dril bus 'khyud pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1414:149b-13: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong /
T02D1414:149b-14: phyag rgya lnga ni pha rol du phyin pa lnga /
T02D1414:149b-15: g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs pa ni shes rab kyis srid pa la mi gnas /
T02D1414:149b-16: snying rjes zhi ba la mi gnas pa /
T02D1414:149b-17: lha mo brgyad kyi thod pas 'khyud pa ni 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms so //
T02D1414:149b-18: g-yas pa'i padma dang sdigs mdzub ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms /
T02D1414:149b-19: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i rul pa'i rgyan lnga ni phung po'i bdud 'joms /
T02D1414:149b-20: thod pa'i phreng ba'i mgul rgyan ni 'jig tshogs la
T02D1414:149b-21: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dag / dril bu
T02D1414:149b-22: g-yer ka'i ska rags ni gsung rab yan lag bcu
T02D1414:149b-23: gnyis kyi mdo sde 'chad pa'i rtags /
T02D1414:149b-24: kha'i gdong can la sogs pa bzhin ni mi'am ci'i
T02D1414:149b-25: khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i gzugs 'dul ba dang
T02D1414:149b-26: / mtshams bzhi'i lha mom phyed gzugs ma ni /
T02D1414:149b-27: gdul bya'i mi'am ci 'dul ba dang mthun no //
T02D1414:149b-29: 'khor bskyed pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1414:149b-30: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang khams kun sku'i 'khor lo bzhin du bsgom /
T02D1414:149b-34: sku ni h'um nam mkha'i mdog can 'khor thams cad
T02D1414:149b-35: kyang phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis
T02D1414:149b-36: brlabs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1414:149b-37: lus kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa bstan to //
T02D1414:149b-38: snga ma bzhin du snying ga'i ga'i h'um las 'od
T02D1414:149b-39: zer 'phro ba dang sngags dang phyag rgyas ye shes
T02D1414:149b-40: 'khor lo spyan drangs te de la bltas nas phyag
T02D1414:150a-1: bstod pa dang mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1414:150a-2: de nyid kyis bum pa dang gsang ba dang /
T02D1414:150a-3: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te thams cad
T02D1414:150a-4: ro gcig ba'i sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgoms nas dpral
T02D1414:150a-5: ba'i sku'i 'khor lo las sku'i 'khor lo spro ba
T02D1414:150a-6: dang / lkog ma'i gsung las gsung gi 'khor lo spro ba dang /
T02D1414:150a-7: thugs ka'i h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo spro bsdu
T02D1414:150a-8: bya ba ni ye shes kyi bzlas pa bsgom par
T02D1414:150a-9: bya'o // dpa' bo'i snying po ni chos kyi sku'i ye shes ston /
T02D1414:150a-10: nye ba'i snying po ni longs sku'i gzugs ston /
T02D1414:150a-11: yum gyi snying po ni chos kyi sku'i 'dus ma byas ston /
T02D1414:150a-12: yum gyi nye snying ni longs sku las sprul sku 'gyed pa ston /
T02D1414:150a-13: yum bzhi'i sngags ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i phrin las bzhi mdzad /
T02D1414:150a-14: gsung gi 'khor lo'i yab yum gyi sngags ni gsung
T02D1414:150a-15: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub 'thob
T02D1414:150a-16: / gong ma brgyad kyi sngags kyis ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:150a-17: sems can la phrin las bzhi mdzad /
T02D1414:150a-18: de ltar bzlas pa ni spro bsdu bsdu dag gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:150a-19: rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas //
T02D1414:150a-20: zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du thod pa bzhi'i
T02D1414:150a-21: bdud rtsi myangs la de nas bzlas pa byas pa'i
T02D1414:150a-23: yum bzhi'i bzlas pas ni dgug pa dang rgyas pa
T02D1414:150a-24: dang sna tshogs kyi las zhi ba dang mngon spyod
T02D1414:150a-26: gsung gi 'khor lo bzlas pas ni chos chen po'i
T02D1414:150a-27: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yid 'ong tshang pa'i
T02D1414:150a-28: gsungs dbyangs drug cu ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par
T02D1414:150a-29: 'gyur ro // yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa la mos na mchog ye shes skyes pa dang /
T02D1414:150a-31: tha ma sngags skyes kyi bud med mchod bsam gtan
T02D1414:150a-32: dang zag med kyi sngom pa la gnas pa de
T02D1414:150a-33: thams cad 'khor lo la bkod nas /
T02D1414:150a-34: gnas pa la 'dod pa'i chags pa dga' ba dang
T02D1414:150a-35: mchog dga' ba rjes su chags pa lhan cig skyes
T02D1414:150a-36: dga' 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa ni rnam pa
T02D1414:150a-37: thams cad kyis 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid bsgom
T02D1414:150a-38: pa'i sgrub pa po de'i dbang du 'khor gyi lha
T02D1414:150a-39: mo rnams gnas pa yin te /
T02D1414:150a-41: sna tshogs padma mdzes gnas nas //
T02D1414:150a-42: zhes pa 'khor lo bzhi'i padma la gtum mo drod
T02D1414:150a-43: kyis mdzes par gnas nas byang chub sems phab pas
T02D1414:150b-0: rnal 'byor @150b chen po rnam par spyod pa la
T02D1414:150b-1: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags spangs pa chos nyid stong
T02D1414:150b-2: pa nyid 'od gsal ba bsgoms pas bde ba can
T02D1414:150b-3: du rnam par bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar rdzogs pa'i
T02D1414:150b-5: langs pa'i dus su dri chen rnam snang dang /
T02D1414:150b-6: dri chu mi bskyod pa bza' zhing bdud rtsi myangs
T02D1414:150b-7: pas zag pa med pa'i chos kyi phung po lnga
T02D1414:150b-8: rdzogs nas stong pa nyid kyi rig pa'i rgyal po
T02D1414:150b-9: sangs rgyas dang / bde ba rig pa gzugs khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D1414:150b-10: bsod nams rig pa mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba 'grub bo //
T02D1414:150b-11: ldang ba'i tshe go chas lus la bsrung ba ni rgyud la gsal bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:150b-12: bzlas pa'i dus kyi mthar bkod nas //
T02D1414:150b-13: zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa zin nas go cha bgo ba'i dus bstan to //
T02D1414:150b-14: ji ltar bde bas spyad par bya //
T02D1414:150b-15: zhes pa ni thun mtshams su dpa' bo gcig pus gnas pa'o //
T02D1414:150b-16: dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu ba ni /
T02D1414:150b-17: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kye //
T02D1414:150b-18: zhes pa so so'i sngags brjod cing lus kyi go 'phang gi gnas la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1414:150b-19: dkyil 'khor thams cad snying spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:150b-20: gsung gi 'khor gcig phyag gnyis pa la dmigs te
T02D1414:150b-21: mnyam par gzhag pas tha mal pa'i gsung bar rkang
T02D1414:150b-22: pa brgyad pas bstod cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1414:150b-23: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1414:150b-24: chos rnams thams cad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
T02D1414:150b-25: lha mor bskyed nas rang dang gzhan la mchod pa
T02D1414:150b-27: de nas kha zas kyi rnal 'byor ni /
T02D1414:150b-28: rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang /
T02D1414:150b-29: sbrang rtsi rang byung gi me tog dkar dmar byang
T02D1414:150b-30: chub sems dang rkang sha chen dang lhan cig sbyar
T02D1414:150b-31: nas lce la / zla ba rdo rje'i 'od zer
T02D1414:150b-32: gyi bu gul dam tshig gi sbyor bas gsol bas
T02D1414:150b-33: snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' gsung gi 'khor lo
T02D1414:150b-34: snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag po'i dbu rgyan bsgoms
T02D1414:150b-36: shugs kyis lkog mar sku'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:150b-37: spyi bor thugs kyi 'khor lo bsgoms la lha'i gzugs
T02D1414:150b-38: su 'gyur bas 'dod pa'i lha drug gi bdag po
T02D1414:150b-39: brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i gzugs can 'thob par 'gyur
T02D1414:150b-40: ro // bza' ba bdud rtsi lnga dang 'o ma'i
T02D1414:150b-41: btung ba 'thungs na tshe 'di la na ba dang
T02D1414:150b-42: rgas pa rnam par spang ngo //
T02D1414:151a-0: langs pa'i rjes la tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe glu len @151a * //
T02D1414:151a-2: sngar thig le zhu ba las glus bskul ba'i don
T02D1414:151a-3: gnyis ka cig car gsungs pa ni sems can gyi
T02D1414:151a-4: don la dgongs pas glu blangs te /
T02D1414:151a-5: sems can gyi don la brtson 'grus bskyed nas mngon
T02D1414:151a-6: bar byang chub pa lha'i chos rnams kun bskyed pa'i
T02D1414:151a-7: phyir / bskul nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1414:151a-8: lag pa'i gar la brten nas sems can la thugs
T02D1414:151a-9: rjes 'bras bu'i he ru ka blang ba'i thugs kyis
T02D1414:151a-10: gsung gi 'khor gyi ngag gi dngos grub 'grub pa'i
T02D1414:151a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor ba aindra bh'u ti la
T02D1414:151a-12: sogs pa'i don du gsang ba mchog gi glu bstan
T02D1414:151a-13: du gsol/ zhes lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab
T02D1414:151a-14: nas dgongs pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1414:151a-15: sems can la 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyis phan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1414:151a-16: gsang ba'i chos kyi glus grol ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1414:151a-17: rdo rje'i glu ji ltar bstan pa'i grol bar mdzad
T02D1414:151a-18: ces sdud pa po lag na rdo rjes zhus pa
T02D1414:151a-19: yin no // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
T02D1414:151a-20: gyi lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa mchod pa'i
T02D1414:151a-21: yin no // glu dang / dam tshig gi gar
T02D1414:151a-22: ngo mtshar du 'gyur bas chags pa'i lta ba'i mig
T02D1414:151a-23: yin no // glu dang / phyag nas / rnal
T02D1414:151a-24: 'byor ma rnams kyis bskul ba'i bstod pa gsungs pa

T02D1414:157b-18: lhor gzugs can ma zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa khro mo drag po'i gzugs can dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:157b-19: mtshams bzhir bum pa'i steng du thod pa gzhag par
T02D1414:157b-20: bya ba ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad do
T02D1414:157b-21: // gtso bo bskyed pa bsnyen pa /
T02D1414:157b-23: lus kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa sgrub pa byas nas
T02D1414:157b-24: sgrub pa chen po ni sngags dang phyags rgya dang
T02D1414:157b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas
T02D1414:157b-26: / phyag bya ba dang bstod pa dang dbang bskur bar bsams nas bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1414:157b-27: dpral bar aom lkog mar a'a:snying gar h'um gsum las 'khor lo gsum bsgoms la /
T02D1414:157b-28: nu ma'i bar du he las ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1414:157b-29: lo bsgoms te dbugs 'byung rngub dang sbyar nas gsang
T02D1414:157b-30: sngags yid kyis bzlas pa bya ste sngags ni go
T02D1414:157b-31: sla'o // lus kyi 'khor lo las khro bo'i sprul
T02D1414:157b-32: pa spros pas khams gsum gyi 'gro ba 'khor lo
T02D1414:157b-33: gsum gyi lhar rdzogs par byas nas spro ba dang
T02D1414:157b-34: bsdu ba'i bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:158a-0: khams gsum ma lus pa kun sku gsung thugs kyi lhar bskyed nas ci bde bar bdud @158a * //
T02D1414:158a-4: gtor ma gtang ba ji ltar bde bar byas la /
T02D1414:158a-5: bsgoms pa las ldang ba'i dus su dpa' bo dang
T02D1414:158a-6: dpa' mo'i go cha gnyis bskon nas bsrung bar bya'o
T02D1414:158a-7: // de nas srid pa dang zhi ba'i dngos po
T02D1414:158a-8: thams cad snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1414:158a-9: du yab yum gyi snying po dang /
T02D1414:158a-10: nye ba'i snying po dang lha mo rnams kyi sngags bkod pa la /
T02D1414:158a-11: dbyi bas lha'i 'khor lo bsdu ba dang /
T02D1414:158a-12: de nas sngags kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sems la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1414:158a-13: sgrub thabs thams cad kyi lugs kyis sprul ba'i 'khor
T02D1414:158a-14: lo lus kyi dkyil 'khor sems kyi 'khor lo la
T02D1414:158a-15: bsdu ba ni / sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //
T02D1414:158a-17: de thams cad du shes pas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1414:158a-18: gyis spyod lam rnam pa bzhi la ji ltar bde
T02D1414:158a-20: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1414:158a-21: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga dang /
T02D1414:158a-22: dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang /
T02D1414:158a-24: thun mtshams kyi cho ga bcu gnyis te /
T02D1414:158a-25: sgrub pa'i thabs zhib mo rnam par 'thag par rnam
T02D1414:158a-26: pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyis sgrub pa'i thabs bsgom
T02D1414:158a-27: par bya'o // dman pa dbyibs bskyed rim /
T02D1414:158a-29: thabs rtsa rlung gi de kho na /
T02D1414:158a-30: mthar thug de kho na chos thams cad las byung
T02D1414:158a-31: ba ye shes kyi rim pa phyag rgya chen po
T02D1414:158a-35: // / de ltar mngal la skyes kyi 'khor lo lnga bshad nas /
T02D1414:158a-36: sgong skyes ston par bzhed pas byed pa mjug thogs kyi de nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1414:158a-37: gdul bya sgong skyes la dga' ba'i ngor de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya'o //
T02D1414:158a-38: de nas zhes bya ba tshad med pa dang /
T02D1414:158a-42: stong pa nyid dang lnga sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D1414:158a-44: sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D1414:158a-45: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba ni brten pa lha'i dang po sbyor ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:158a-46: dpa' bo gcig pas sgong skyes kyi tshogs ni /
T02D1414:158a-47: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo'i ngo skal du rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D1414:158b-0: de'i steng du @158b ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sna tshogs padma /
T02D1414:158b-1: de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan /
T02D1414:158b-2: de'i steng du thong pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba'i phyed tshal /
T02D1414:158b-3: de'i steng du a'a li lugs 'byung bcu drug dang /
T02D1414:158b-4: lugs bzlog bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis /
T02D1414:158b-5: gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1414:158b-6: lce rtsa las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis dang /
T02D1414:158b-7: phus 'debs pa'i yi ge gnyis dang /
T02D1414:158b-8: tsheg drag las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis te /
T02D1414:158b-9: yi ge drug gis bsnan pas gsal byed bzhi bcu lugs 'byung dang lcags bzlog gnyis kyis brgyad cu /
T02D1414:158b-10: dbyangs yig sum cu rtsa gnyis las mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi zla ba /
T02D1414:158b-11: gsal byed brgyad cu tham pa las dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu nyi ma /
T02D1414:158b-12: nyi zla kha sbyor gyi sgo da h'um gi khong
T02D1414:158b-13: par bam bcug pa'i byi'u phrug /'od zer spro bsdu
T02D1414:158b-14: / rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas dgyes pa'i h'um las 'byung ba /
T02D1414:158b-15: sgo da bcag nas byi'u phrug tshar pa lta bu
T02D1414:158b-16: sgong skyes kyi dpal he ru ka rang snang ba'i
T02D1414:158b-17: lha mo dang / thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:158b-18: de yang ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02D1414:158b-19: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis dag pa'i phyag bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1414:158b-20: snying rje dang shes rab kyi g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1414:158b-21: tshad med pa bzhi'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1414:158b-22: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi spyan gsum /
T02D1414:158b-23: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rjes zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1414:158b-24: sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D1414:158b-25: pha rol tu phyin pa drug phyag rgya drug gis dpa' bo'i lus la rgyas btab pa /
T02D1414:158b-26: 'khor ba dang mya nang las 'das pa 'joms pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pas /
T02D1414:158b-27: sgrib pa spangs pa'i stag lpags bsnams pa /
T02D1414:158b-28: chos nyid kyi phag mo la phyag gis 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:158b-29: phyag mtshan lhag ma ni go sla bsam bshad do //
T02D1414:158b-38: de'i mdun du a'a li k'a li'i sgo nga las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1414:158b-39: yum ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
T02D1414:158b-40: tshad med pa bzhi'i phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1414:158b-41: rnam thar gsum gyi spyan gsum pa /
T02D1414:158b-42: nyon mongs pa las grol ba'i dbu skra grol ba /
T02D1414:159a-0: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pas @159a * //
T02D1414:159a-2: gcig dang du ma bral ba mtshon pas dum bu'i ska rags can /
T02D1414:159a-3: phyag g-yon pa'i thod pa bdud rtsi lngas gang bas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa /
T02D1414:159a-4: g-yas kyi gri gung gis nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa /
T02D1414:159a-5: g-yas pa'i cang te'us lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa /
T02D1414:159a-6: g-yon pa kha tv'am gas phung po'i bdud 'joms pa /
T02D1414:159a-7: ba spu'i bu gnas bskal pa'i me'i gzi brjid can /
T02D1414:159a-8: zhal nas 'od zer dmar po khrag 'dzag pa lta bu 'phro ba /
T02D1414:159a-9: 'dus ma byas kyi byin pa gnyis kyis thabs kyi
T02D1414:159a-10: ye shes la 'khyud pa bde ba chen po'i bdag
T02D1414:159a-11: nyid can no // zhal mdun ma dmar ba /
T02D1414:159a-12: g-yon pa ljang gu / rgyab ser ba /
T02D1414:159a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mdog ci 'dra bar phyag bzhi sngon po /
T02D1414:159a-16: g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi dmar po /
T02D1414:159a-18: sprul pa'i sku'i sems kyis bris nas bsgom mo //
T02D1414:159a-20: rnal 'byor pa 'di nyid kyi lus la gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi la lha dgod pa ni /
T02D1414:159a-23: pulli mgo bor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1414:159a-24: thod pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum ma sngon
T02D1414:159a-25: mo / dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:159a-26: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas 'khyud pa bsam mo //
T02D1414:159a-27: yi ge dz'a las spyi gtsug nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:159a-28: keng rus chen mo dang gtum mig ma sngon mi
T02D1414:159a-29: / dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:159a-30: dpa' mi gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa'o //
T02D1414:159a-31: ye ge ao las rna ba g-yas par nyi ma'i
T02D1414:159a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su keng rus chen po dang
T02D1414:159a-34: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:159a-35: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /
T02D1414:159a-36: aa las ltag par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mche
T02D1414:159a-37: ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma sngon
T02D1414:159a-38: mo / dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:159a-39: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa'o //
T02D1414:159a-40: gnas ni sngon 'dzam bu'i gling lha btul ba'i ming
T02D1414:159a-41: gis btags te sa rab tu dga' ba'i snang ba'o
T02D1414:159a-42: // de bzhin du go las rna ba g-yon par
T02D1414:159a-43: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpa' bo dang
T02D1414:159a-44: dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:159a-45: ra las smin ma'i dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
T02D1414:159a-46: de las mig gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-0: ma las phrag pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil @159b 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-1: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:159b-2: nye ba'i gnas ni sngon dri za btul ba'i ming gis btags te sa gnyis pa'i snang ba dang /
T02D1414:159b-4: mkha' la spyod pa ni gdul bya lha btul ba
T02D1414:159b-5: dang lha dang dri za btul ba'i ming gis btags
T02D1414:159b-6: / ka las mchan khung gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1414:159b-7: 'khor la myu gu can dang sa srung ma la
T02D1414:159b-8: sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad dmar
T02D1414:159b-9: / mo / dpa' bo padma dang dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:159b-10: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /
T02D1414:159b-11: aom las nu ma gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:159b-12: la dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no
T02D1414:159b-13: // zhing ni sa gsum pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-14: tri las lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1414:159b-15: ko las sna rtser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:159b-16: nye ba'i zhing gi sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-17: ka las lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-18: la las mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshando ha sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-19: ka las snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-20: hi las rgyu zhabs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-21: nye ba'i tshando ha sa drug pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-22: gsung gi 'khor lo 'dul byed sa la spyod pa gnod sbyin dang srin po btul ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-23: pre las mtshan ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dpa' bo stobs po che dang /
T02D1414:159b-25: dpa' bo 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D1414:159b-26: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a las 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1414:159b-27: gri las bshang sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-28: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:159b-29: 'dus pa can sa bdun pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-30: so las brla gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-31: su las byin pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-32: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:159b-33: nye ba'i 'dus pas brgyad pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-34: na las rkang pa'i sor mo kun la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-35: si las rkang pa'i bol gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dur khrod sa dgu pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:159b-36: ma las rkang pa'i mthe bo gnyis la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-37: ku las pus mo gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:159b-38: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dkar mo /
T02D1414:159b-39: dpa' bo 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D1414:159b-40: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:160a-1: ni sa bcu pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:160a-3: sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang lha ma yin gdul bya'o //
T02D1414:160a-4: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis thams cad kyang /
T02D1414:160a-5: gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa g-yas brkyang
T02D1414:160a-6: pa'i gnas pas bzhugs pa sku mdog snga ma bzhin
T02D1414:160a-7: no // gnas ni rgyud nas gsal lo //
T02D1414:160a-8: bum pa dang byang chub kyi sems thod pa ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'o //
T02D1414:160a-10: lam las snying gar sa'i dkyil 'khor la ltung byed
T02D1414:160a-11: ma gri gug dang k'a pa la bsnams pa ser
T02D1414:160a-12: mo / mam las lto ba chu'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1414:160a-13: gsod byed ma gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams
T02D1414:160a-14: mo / pa / bam las lte ba me'i dkyil
T02D1414:160a-15: 'khor la 'gugs byed ma dmar mo gri gug dang
T02D1414:160a-17: ham las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su
T02D1414:160a-18: gar gyi dbang phyug ma gri gug dang ka p'a
T02D1414:160a-20: kham las mgo bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la padma'i
T02D1414:160a-21: dra ba can gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams
T02D1414:160a-22: pa sngon mo // phung po lnga dang dbang po drug ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:160a-23: snying gar h'um las yid mi 'khrugs pa thugs kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:160a-24: dag gi a'a: las lkog mar tshe dpag med gsung gi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:160a-25: lus ni spyi bor aom las rnam par snang mdzad sku'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'o //
T02D1414:160a-26: aom ha las snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa dkar po'o //
T02D1414:160a-27: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa ser po //
T02D1414:160a-28: gar gyi dbang phyug padma dang dril bu bsnams pa dmar po //
T02D1414:160a-29: he ru ka rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa
T02D1414:160a-30: mthing ga / nyi ma rin po che dang dril
T02D1414:160a-32: rta mchog sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ljang gu /
T02D1414:160a-33: phag mo la sogs pa lha mo drug ni thams
T02D1414:160a-34: cad kyang gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas
T02D1414:160a-35: g-yas brkyang pa'o // phag mo dmar mo //
T02D1414:160a-39: skrag byed ma du ba'i mdog can /
T02D1414:160a-41: de ltar go cha bskon nas /
T02D1414:160a-42: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:160a-43: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1414:160a-44: mig gyen du blta ba dang /
T02D1414:160a-45: nag pheem gyi sgra sgrogs pa ste bzhi dang /
T02D1414:160b-0: snying ga'i @160b padma dang zla ba'i h'um las 'od
T02D1414:160b-1: zer 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
T02D1414:160b-2: rten gyi khams kyi ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo
T02D1414:160b-6: mchod pa byas nas 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus dgug pa dang /
T02D1414:160b-7: zhags pas gtso po 'khor la gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:160b-8: lcags sgrog gis tha mi dad par bcing ba dang /
T02D1414:160b-9: dril bus dam tshig sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par dbang du bya'o //
T02D1414:160b-10: yang snga ma bzhin du lus ngag yid gsum gyi
T02D1414:160b-11: phyag rgyas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor mas bskor ba'i
T02D1414:160b-12: dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ldan nam mkha'i dbyings su
T02D1414:160b-14: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi 'khor lo ser po //
T02D1414:160b-15: mi bskyod pa'i 'khor lo mthing ga / snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'khor lo dmar po //
T02D1414:160b-16: don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo ljang gus gang bar bltas la /
T02D1414:160b-21: sgrol ma'i lha mo lnga thugs ka nas phyung nas
T02D1414:160b-22: bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dang
T02D1414:160b-23: / thod pas spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du
T02D1414:160b-24: rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi chus dri ma bkrus
T02D1414:160b-25: nas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D1414:160b-26: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:160b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka h'um zhes pa ni /
T02D1414:160b-28: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags te /
T02D1414:160b-29: rtags ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1414:160b-30: sa ma ya h'um zhes pas yab yum lnga'i mkha'
T02D1414:160b-31: gsang nas byang chub sems kha dog dkar dmar lce
T02D1414:160b-32: la bab pas sgyu mar rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba
T02D1414:160b-33: dang / dbang rtags ni lkog mar tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs dang /
T02D1414:160b-34: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu 'bur ba'o //
T02D1414:160b-35: shr'i ye h'um zhes bya bas shes rab ye shes kyi sngags te /
T02D1414:160b-36: lha mo lnga dang rang gi lha mo la zhugs
T02D1414:160b-37: pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang
T02D1414:160b-38: / spyi gtsug gyen du 'bur ba ste rtags so //
T02D1414:160b-39: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste /
T02D1414:160b-40: 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1414:160b-41: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum me 'od kyis mtshan pa /
T02D1414:160b-42: aa las byung ba'i ka p'a la rgya che ba bsams la /
T02D1414:160b-43: de'i nang du dbus su mu dang h'um las bee d'u rya lta bu'i gong bu /
T02D1414:160b-44: shar du bi dang bhr'um las shel lta bu'i gong bu /
T02D1414:160b-45: lho ru ra dang aom las gser btsom lta bu'i gong bu /
T02D1414:161a-1: tu shu dang dzr'am las padma r'a ga lta bu'i gong bu /
T02D1414:161a-2: byang du ma dang kham las margat lta bu'i gong bu /
T02D1414:161a-3: de'i steng du dbyangs yig bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:161a-6: zla ba'i dbus su a'a:sa byin gyis brlabs pa la /
T02D1414:161a-7: aom las sku'i 'khor lo brgyad spro bsdus zhu ba dang /
T02D1414:161a-8: a'a:bas gsung gi 'khor lo bskyed nas zhu ba dang /
T02D1414:161a-9: h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo bskyed nas zhu bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:161a-10: aom a'a:h'um gsum las 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor lo
T02D1414:161a-11: gsum gyi lhar bskyed pa mgron du bya'o zhes rin
T02D1414:161a-12: chen rdo rje dang gu na k'i rti dang /

T02D1414:161a-14: aom sa ma ya shuddha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1414:161a-15: sku gsum 'khor lo chos thams cad ro gcig par
T02D1414:161a-16: mnyam par gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1414:161a-17: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi lha thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshe /
T02D1414:161a-18: aom badzra aamri ta au da ka h'um /
T02D1414:161a-19: tha:tha:tram aa kham h'um zhes brjod pas 'thung bar bsam mo //
T02D1414:161a-20: de nas bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1414:161a-21: ye shes kyi bzlas pa spro bsdu bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:161a-22: dung chen gyi phreng ba blangs nas lha de rnams la ngag gi bzlas pa bya ba dang /
T02D1414:161a-23: rang gi srog rtsol zhes bya ba dbugs 'byung rngub
T02D1414:161a-24: bkag nas gtum mo drod spar nas dga' ba bzhi'i
T02D1414:161a-25: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rjes la bzlas pa bya'o
T02D1414:161a-26: // snying po dang nye snying gi sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:161a-27: de nas skyo bar ma gyur na yang sems kyi 'khor lo bsgoms la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:161a-28: byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:161a-29: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga sgyu ma lta bu /
T02D1414:161a-30: dpa' mo sum cu rtsa bdun sems kyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1414:161a-31: lus kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni mkha' 'gro mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161a-32: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid shes pa dang dran pa ni l'a mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161a-33: chos kyi phung po dang khams kyi stong pa nyid
T02D1414:161a-34: shes pa dran pa nye bar gzhag nas bsgom pa
T02D1414:161a-35: ni dum skyes mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161a-36: sems kyi stong nyid shes pa ni gzugs can mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161a-37: ye shes kyi padma don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam dag go //
T02D1414:161a-38: thugs kyi 'khor lo bdun pas grogs byas pa'i ting
T02D1414:161a-39: nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
T02D1414:161a-40: shar phyogs kyi rab gtum mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161a-41: brtson 'grus kyis grogs byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stong
T02D1414:161b-0: pa nyid ni @161b byang phyogs kyi gtum mig mar
T02D1414:161b-1: snang ngo // spyod pa'i shes rab kyis grogs byas

T02D1414:161b-4: sems kyis grogs byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stong nyid lho phyogs kyi sna chen mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-5: gnas kyi dang po lha mo rnam dag go //
T02D1414:161b-6: dad pas ma dad pa spangs nas rang gi rigs
T02D1414:161b-7: 'dra'i dbang po'i chos nyid ni shar lho'i brtan pa'i
T02D1414:161b-9: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'i stong pa nyid lho nub kyi mi thub mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-10: dran pa'i dbang po'i chos nyid nub byang gi lang ka'i dbang phyug mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-11: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i chos nyid shing grib
T02D1414:161b-12: mar snang ste sgyu ma lta bu brgyad ni dpa'

T02D1414:161b-15: dad pa'i stobs kyi stong nyid byang phyogs kyi 'jigs byed chen mor snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-16: brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi stong nyid nub phyogs kyi rlung gi shugs can mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-17: dran pa'i stobs kyi stong nyid ni lho phyogs kyi chang 'thung mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi chos nyid shar lho'i sngo bsangs mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-19: shes rab kyi stobs kyi chos nyid lho nub kyi shin tu bzang mor snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-20: ting nge 'dzin yang dag par 'dus ma byas pa
T02D1414:161b-21: byang chub sa dang po'i yan lag grogs nub byang
T02D1414:161b-22: gi rta rna mar snang ngo //

T02D1414:161b-25: gsung gi 'khor lo lus la dgod pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1414:161b-26: sku'i 'khor lo'i dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi

T02D1414:161b-32: snang ngo // snang ngo // // dran pa yang

T02D1414:161b-35: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /
T02D1414:161b-36: shar lho'i shin tu dpa' mor snang ngo //
T02D1414:161b-37: yang dag pa'i stong nyid kyi lta ba ni lho nub kyi stobs chen mar snang ngo //
T02D1414:162a-0: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni nub byang gi 'khor los sgyur @162a * //
T02D1414:162a-2: yang dag pa'i ngag ni byang shar gyi brtson 'grus chen por snang ngo //
T02D1414:162a-3: sgyu ma lta bu brgyad ni dpa' bor snang ngo //
T02D1414:162a-4: sku'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1414:162a-5: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la sogs pa bzhi

T02D1414:162a-7: ston to // yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal he ru ka nyid du snang ngo //
T02D1414:162a-8: chos kyi dbyings ni yum rdo rje phag mor snang ngo //
T02D1414:162a-9: yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni phyag g-yon pa bzhi'i lha mo'i rnam dag ston to //
T02D1414:162a-10: lus kyi rnam dag bstan pas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag shugs la go ba yin no //
T02D1414:162a-11: de ltar ma lus par bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:162a-12: sgrub pa pos ni nges par 'grub //
T02D1414:162a-13: ces pa ni sgong skyes kyi he ru lus kyi
T02D1414:162a-14: dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas dngos grub gsum nges par 'grub
T02D1414:162a-15: par 'gyur ro // le'u 'di la don gsum yod pa'i dang po bstan pa yin no //
T02D1414:162a-16: don gnyis pa mngal skyes lnga bsgom pa yang rung ste /
T02D1414:162a-17: sems can gyi don du rnal 'byor pas spros nas
T02D1414:162a-18: bdag nyid dang mnyam pa'i lha'i dam tshig spro bsdu
T02D1414:162a-19: bsgom pa ni mchog yin no //
T02D1414:162a-20: de ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:162a-21: sngar gyi mngal skyes kyi 'khor lo lnga so sor cho ga'i dbye bas bsgom pa'i tshe /
T02D1414:162a-22: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bcur bla na med pa'i
T02D1414:162a-23: mngal skyes kyi 'khor lo lnga so sor dbye bas
T02D1414:162a-24: spro ba'i tshe / lha so so'i dbye bas phye

T02D1414:162a-27: 'khor lo so so'i dbye bar gtso bor byas nas

T02D1414:162a-33: spro bsdu bsgom pa'i pha rgyud dang ma rgyud kyi
T02D1414:162a-34: man ngag thams cad rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di ma gtogs
T02D1414:162a-35: pa gzhan bshad pa'i rgyud gang na yang gsal ba
T02D1414:162a-36: med do // snga mas sprul pa'i 'khor lo phyi mas gtso bo byas pa /
T02D1414:162a-37: yang phyi mas gtso bo byas pa /
T02D1414:162a-38: des sprul pa'i 'khor lo la yang phyi mas 'khor byas la thug med ces bya'o //
T02D1414:162a-40: dpa' bo he ru kas gco bo byas nas bskor
T02D1414:162a-41: ba de bzhin du lha mos gtso bo byas pa
T02D1414:162b-0: yang thug pa @162b med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:162b-1: sku'i sangs rgyas kyi mkha' 'gros gtso bo byas pa la sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes ming brdar btags so //
T02D1414:162b-2: bha ga'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
T02D1414:162b-3: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:162b-4: de bzhin du gsum ka'i rnal 'byor la yang gang gtso bo byas pa de'i ming gis btags so //
T02D1414:162b-5: dbus ma mkha' 'gro ma lngas gtso bo byas na
T02D1414:162b-6: bha ga'i dbus su dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ldar
T02D1414:162b-7: 'gyur ro // padma'i mkha' 'gros gtso bo byas pa dang /
T02D1414:162b-8: rdo rje mkha' 'gros gtso bo byas pa dang /
T02D1414:162b-9: dam tshig gi mkha' 'gros gtso bo byas pa dang /
T02D1414:162b-10: ye shes mkha' 'gros gtso bo byas pa de bzhin
T02D1414:162b-11: du 'dir yang sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum
T02D1414:162b-13: spro ba'i tshe thams cad lha drug cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1414:162b-14: gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa bskor bar nges so
T02D1414:162b-15: // mngal skyes spro ba bshad nas /
T02D1414:162b-16: sgong skyes kyi dpa' bo gcig pu yum dang bcas
T02D1414:162b-17: pa bha ga'i gzhal yas khang pa'i sna tshogs padma'i
T02D1414:162b-18: dbus su sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi
T02D1414:162b-19: sgong skyes kyi he ru ka lngas thod pa'i byi'u
T02D1414:162b-20: tshang dang ldan pa yang na sgong skyes kyi rnal
T02D1414:162b-21: 'byor ma lnga dpa' bos snying gar sbas pa bsgom
T02D1414:162b-22: pa dang / dpa' bo lngas kyang rang gi snying
T02D1414:162b-23: gar rnal 'byor ma lngas sbas pa bsgom pa ste

T02D1414:162b-25: dpa' bo snying gar sbas nas phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:162b-26: phyag gzhan gri gug dang ka p'a la sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa /
T02D1414:162b-28: dpa' bo ni stong pa nyid shes rab yin la /
T02D1414:162b-29: dpa' bo thabs kyi kun rdzob yin pas dpa' bo
T02D1414:162b-30: mi snang ba dpa' mo'i thug med kyang bsgom mo
T02D1414:162b-31: // sgong skyes kyi thug med ni rnal 'byor pa
T02D1414:162b-32: sgom pa po mos pa rim pa bzhin du rnam
T02D1414:162b-34: yang na ldan pa 'dus pa drug ci rtsa gnyis kyis bskor ba bsgom pa'am /
T02D1414:162b-35: yang na sku la skus bskor ba'am /
T02D1414:162b-36: gsung la gsung gis bskor ba'am /
T02D1414:162b-37: thugs la thugs kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:162b-38: dam tshig la dam tshig gis bskor ba /
T02D1414:162b-39: 'khor lo so so'i dbye bas phye ba rnal 'byor
T02D1414:162b-40: pa ji ltar bsgom pa mos pa ltar bsgom mo

T02D1414:163a-0: @163a * // rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par bsgom //
T02D1414:163a-1: zhes pa ni lha phos gtso bo byas pa'i thug med bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:163a-2: lha mo'i dbye bas phye ba yis //
T02D1414:163a-3: bdag po yang rnam par bsgom pa ni lha mos gtso bo byas pa'o //
T02D1414:163a-4: gtso bo gang byed pa'i ming gi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la mkha' 'gro ma'i ming gis gdags so //
T02D1414:163a-5: yang na sku gsung thugs dbye ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1414:163a-6: re re la lha drug cu rtsa gnyis tshangs pas bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:163a-7: de yang so so'i 'khor lo la gtso bo'i dpa' bo dang /
T02D1414:163a-8: rnal 'byor ma'i ming gis gdags so //
T02D1414:163a-9: de ltar thug med bshad nas /
T02D1414:163a-10: mngal skyes dang sgong skyes kyi dbye ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:163a-11: mngal skyes glu dang bcas pa /
T02D1414:163a-13: rnal 'byor ma kha cig 'dod pas sgong skyes bstan /
T02D1414:163a-14: glu'i sgra spangs pas brjod bya rjod byed kyi dngos po med pas brjod bya mi gsal /
T02D1414:163a-15: brjod par bya ba'i don gnyis /
T02D1414:163a-16: shes pa'i gzung 'dzin dang bral ba ni /
T02D1414:163a-18: rgyas bshad ni mngal skyes la glu'i sgras bskul /
T02D1414:163a-19: rgyu'i he ru ka longs sku las khu ba chos
T02D1414:163a-20: kyi sku'i go 'phang mchog / bras bu'i he ru
T02D1414:163a-21: ka sprul pa'i sku stong pa dang snying rje'i bdag
T02D1414:163a-22: nyid / 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa sems can
T02D1414:163a-23: gyi don la bzod pa dang brtson 'grus can gyi
T02D1414:163a-24: nyid / sprul sku / mkha' 'gro ma'i glus bskyed pa la /
T02D1414:163a-25: rnal 'byor ma gzhan gyi mngal skyes kyis mi dmad [?] do //
T02D1414:163a-27: ho srid pa gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa gtso //
T02D1414:163a-29: zhes sngar le'u brgyad par bshad zin /
T02D1414:163a-30: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis padma la gnas pa'i 'khor
T02D1414:163a-31: gyi lha mos bstod pas mngon par byang chub pa
T02D1414:163a-32: lnga las / padma rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i yab yum bzhengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:163a-33: des na sku gsum gyi gzhi las bzhengs nas rgyal bas bskyed pa ni /
T02D1414:163a-34: chags can gyi ngor mngal skyes bshad do //
T02D1414:163a-35: sgong skyes kyi rgyas bshad kyis /
T02D1414:163a-36: rgyu'i he ru ka dang 'bras bu'i he ru ka'i cha shas spangs /
T02D1414:163a-37: sa bon dang phyag mtshan med /
T02D1414:163a-38: klu spangs rgyu'i he ru ka'i gzugs mi snang /
T02D1414:163a-39: rgyu'i he ru ka'i bde ba dang /
T02D1414:163a-40: chos kyi skur zhu ba las /
T02D1414:163a-41: chos kyi skur zhu ba'i sdug bsngal med /
T02D1414:163a-42: bskul bya dang skul byed med /
T02D1414:163a-43: rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po gnyis med /
T02D1414:163b-0: rtag pa'i yum thig ler zhu @163b ba med /
T02D1414:163b-2: chos ma yin pa thig le las grol /
T02D1414:163b-3: lha mo chags pa'i sdig pa'i nyes pas mi gos /
T02D1414:163b-4: gzung 'dzin gnyis las grol ba ni /
T02D1414:163b-5: sgong skyes kyi yon tan te /
T02D1414:163b-6: mngal skyes kyi shin du rgyas bshad do //
T02D1414:163b-7: ye shes kyi gnyid sad par byed /
T02D1414:163b-8: 'dras bu'i he ru ka ma rtogs pa rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1414:163b-9: sems can gyi don du mngal skyes kyi he ru ka'o //
T02D1414:163b-10: glus bskul ba ni lha mo ni sngon gyi su yin zhe na /
T02D1414:163b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi gtam rgyud gsungs pa ni /
T02D1414:163b-12: zhing skyes kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1414:163b-13: gnas skyes kyi lha mo dang /
T02D1414:163b-14: rigs skyes kyi lha mo gsum yin no //
T02D1414:163b-15: de yang mthar skyes kyi glu dang lha ma yin mo dang /
T02D1414:163b-16: bar snang spyod pa gsung gi lha mo dang /
T02D1414:163b-17: gnod sbyin ma dang srin mo dang //
T02D1414:163b-18: mkha' spyod lha dang dri za mo //
T02D1414:163b-22: sa spyod ni gsung sum rtsa gsum gyi lha mo ni thugs sa 'og ma ni sku /
T02D1414:163b-23: gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo ni gsung gi lha mo //
T02D1414:163b-24: klu mo dang lha ma yin mo ni sku'i lha mo //
T02D1414:163b-25: mi'am ci mo ni dam tshig gi lha mo //
T02D1414:163b-26: dri za mo ni lha'i 'khor nye ba'i gnas kyi mkha' spyod ma thugs so //
T02D1414:163b-27: lha mo 'di thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe
T02D1414:163b-28: na sngon grub pa'i gtam rgyud rnying pa yin no
T02D1414:163b-29: // dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyang bde bar

T02D1414:163b-31: par dga' ba thams cad phyi'i dkyil 'khor na gnas
T02D1414:163b-32: pa'i lha mos gtso bo mchod pa yin no //
T02D1414:163b-33: mngal skyes kyi shin tu rgyas bshad do //

T02D1414:163b-35: don gsum pa rten gyi dkyil 'khor gtor ma dang bcas pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:163b-36: sku'i dkyil 'khor spro ba'i tshe thams cad rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas so //
T02D1414:163b-39: dbang chen la dam tshig gnas so //
T02D1414:163b-40: dbang chen la ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang gnas so //
T02D1414:163b-41: thams cad kyang bha ga chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang su sna tshogs padma bsgom mo //
T02D1414:163b-42: sgong skyes ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpa' bo gcig tu bsgom mo //
T02D1414:163b-45: thugs la rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:164a-0: dam tshig la sna tshogs rdo rje'i @164a * //

T02D1414:164a-3: de'i phyi rol na dur khrod phyogs mtshams sna tshogs kyi mdog can brgyad la /
T02D1414:164a-4: shing kha dog sna tshogs brgyad /
T02D1414:164a-7: nub byang du 'jigs pa ro langs kyi /
T02D1414:164a-8: shar du bya rog gi / byang du 'ug pa'i //
T02D1414:164a-11: byang shar du ce spyang mo'i gdod can no //
T02D1414:164a-12: sa gzhi ni shar ro bsregs pa /
T02D1414:164a-14: nub byang gsal shing la bskyon pa /
T02D1414:164a-17: lhor mgo thod rje ngar lag pa dum bur gyur pa /
T02D1414:164a-18: shar lhor ce spyang gi sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D1414:164a-19: lho nub tu sprul pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar snang ba /
T02D1414:164a-20: shar gyi pho nya seng ge / byang gi pho
T02D1414:164a-21: nya phag / nub kyi stag / lho'i ra lug
T02D1414:164a-25: byang shar du rda mo sna tshogs /
T02D1414:164a-26: der dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i bza' ba sna tshogs /
T02D1414:164a-28: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma tshogs pas tshogs 'khor byed pa /
T02D1414:164a-29: dpa' bo thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
T02D1414:164a-30: lha'i rdza glong bu pi wang rdza rnga rnga rings brdung pa /
T02D1414:164a-31: ro'i mchog ni bza' ba sha sna tshogs dang /
T02D1414:164a-32: reg bya sna tshogs shar sham pa na /
T02D1414:164a-33: lhor aa li ka / nub tu tshu sha le /
T02D1414:164a-34: byang du mchog dga' dam pa byed pa'o //
T02D1414:164a-35: gnas der tshogs 'khor zin nas dur khrod kyi srin po dang ro langs dang /
T02D1414:164a-36: gnod spyin la sogs pa la rnal 'byor pa he ru ka'i gzugs bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:164a-37: gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1414:164a-38: cang te'u la sogs pa dkrol nas phyogs kyi gos can /
T02D1414:164a-39: phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi ge h'um phat kyi sgra 'byin cing /
T02D1414:164a-40: g-yas brkyang pa lag pa phed phed phyag rgya bcings
T02D1414:164a-41: la bdud rtsi lngas kha bskangs nas sngags dang phyag
T02D1414:164a-43: gtor ma'i cho ga ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:164a-44: thun mtshams bzhi ru mam sa bza' //
T02D1414:164a-45: zhes bya ba ni langs pa'i kha zas kyi spyod lam mo //
T02D1414:164a-47: sgong skyes bsgom pa la yang /
T02D1414:164a-48: sgrub thabs su byed na sngar bshad pa'i don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:164a-51: // / de ltar sgong skyes bshad nas /
T02D1414:164b-0: 'jam dpal rdo rje la @164b mos pa'i ngor de'i dkyil 'khor 'chad pas /
T02D1414:164b-1: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:164b-3: dag pa'i gnas kyi cho ga ni sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo 'ba' zhig gis bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:164b-4: gsang ba mchog ni chos sku'o //
T02D1414:164b-6: gzugs su gnyis ka gzung / sprul ba'i sku'i gsang sngags kun nas phrin las bzhi'o //
T02D1414:164b-7: dngos grub thams cad gsum gsol ba ni mdor bstan to //
T02D1414:164b-8: de nas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1414:164b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams dang /
T02D1414:164b-10: mngag gzhug pa khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'i sku
T02D1414:164b-11: gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma thams
T02D1414:164b-12: cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol
T02D1414:164b-13: pa / ae ma bde ba ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1414:164b-14: ae ma ho bde ba gtso bo ni longs sku'o //
T02D1414:164b-15: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ni sprul sku'o //
T02D1414:164b-16: sku gsum dang ldan pa'i gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1414:164b-22: gdul bya 'jig rten gsum bde bar byed pa bstan
T02D1414:164b-23: du gsol zhes brten pa lha la bstod pa dang
T02D1414:164b-24: / rten gyi dkyil 'khor ni shar rdo rje /
T02D1414:164b-27: byang sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rgyu'i rnam snang las 'byung bar bstan par gsol pa 'debs pa'o //
T02D1414:164b-28: lan du tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:164b-32: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms la /
T02D1414:164b-33: 'byung ba bzhi'i ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1414:164b-34: bhr'um las rnam snang gi gzhal yas khang de'i dbus
T02D1414:164b-35: su zur bzhi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i sku'i 'khor
T02D1414:164b-37: thugs rtsibs brgyad sngon po rdo rjes bskor ba /
T02D1414:164b-38: gsung rtsibs brgyad dmar po padmas bskor ba /
T02D1414:164b-39: sgo bzhi dang zur bzhi'i rtsig pa'i rtsar 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor pa /
T02D1414:164b-40: phyi rol gyi khyams kyi snam bu la 'dod yon
T02D1414:164b-41: gyi lha mo kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam par
T02D1414:164b-43: phyi rol gyi rtsig pa yi dgas ro'i phreng bas
T02D1414:164b-44: kha dog sna lnga'i mdog can 'dod yon lha mo
T02D1414:164b-46: lce bskyod nas glu len pa dbus su zla ba
T02D1414:165a-0: la yi ge h'um rgyu'i rdo rje sems dpa' @165a
T02D1414:165a-1: * // zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum rang snang
T02D1414:165a-2: ba'i lha mo dang snyoms par 'jug pa zhal dkar
T02D1414:165a-3: ba sngo ba dmar ba gsum //
T02D1414:165a-4: sku gsung thugs kyi stong nyid las skyes pa /
T02D1414:165a-5: rdo rje dang dril bu bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:165a-6: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'i bzod pa dang brtson 'grus can /
T02D1414:165a-7: cang te'u dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo tshul khrims dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:165a-8: rgyu'i he ru ka'i lus po la dpa' bo dang dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod /
T02D1414:165a-9: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi lha dgod /
T02D1414:165a-10: sku gsung thugs gsum yang rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D1414:165a-11: lha mo dang 'khyud pa'i snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus
T02D1414:165a-12: su ho dmar po gnyis kyi dbus su 'jam dpal
T02D1414:165a-14: sngon grub pa'i sangs rgyas lnga dang bcas pa zhal nas thugs kar zhugs pa /
T02D1414:165a-15: phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab pa'i de ma thag tu
T02D1414:165a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo srid
T02D1414:165a-17: pa bar ma do'i mam las mngal skyes kyi lha
T02D1414:165a-18: skyes par gyur cig / gtso bo la zhal bltas
T02D1414:165a-19: pas chags shing de la gnas so //
T02D1414:165a-20: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dgyes bzhin du zhu bar gyur to //
T02D1414:165a-21: de nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de rnams de ma thag tu langs te /
T02D1414:165a-22: thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba las cang
T02D1414:165a-23: te'u'i sgras bskul nas bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i
T02D1414:165a-24: glus bskul lo // de'i rjes la nam mkha'i khams
T02D1414:165a-25: thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sngon
T02D1414:165a-26: grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad dang
T02D1414:165a-27: glus bskul lo // / rnam par gzigs la sogs
T02D1414:165a-28: pa bde mchog gi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i gzugs
T02D1414:165a-29: kyis bskor ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo chen
T02D1414:165a-30: po du ma mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs
T02D1414:165a-31: glus bskul lo // / su gyur nas / phyi
T02D1414:165a-32: dang nang gi khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang
T02D1414:165a-33: glus bskul lo // / su gyur nas / /
T02D1414:165a-34: lha mo gos dkar mo la sogs pa bde mchog
T02D1414:165a-35: gi pho nya dang pho nya mo'i tshogs rgya che
T02D1414:165a-36: glus bskul lo // / su gyur nas / /
T02D1414:165a-37: bar gyur nas / blta zhing blta ba dang gar
T02D1414:165a-38: byed cing glus bskul ba ni /
T02D1414:165a-39: ae ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
T02D1414:165a-41: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i yum bzhis so //
T02D1414:165a-42: ae ma'o kun du bzang po'i don ni bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo //
T02D1414:165a-43: ae ma'o bde ba yang dag 'dus nas //
T02D1414:165b-0: ae ma'o pha rol phyin pa'i sa zhes pa'i @165b pha'i bar brgyad ni /
T02D1414:165b-1: thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad bskul ba'o //
T02D1414:165b-2: ae ma'o rig pa rjes 'jug pa nas /
T02D1414:165b-3: ae ma'o dga' ba'i gar chen de'i bar du brgyad ni /
T02D1414:165b-4: gsung gi 'khor lo la bskul ba'o //
T02D1414:165b-5: ae ma'o shin tu dri med glu /
T02D1414:165b-6: ae ma'o rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni /
T02D1414:165b-7: ae ma'o sgyu 'phrul lta bu nas /
T02D1414:165b-8: ae ma'o ngo mtshar sems can rnams kyi bar ni
T02D1414:165b-9: tshig bskang brgyad sgom dang mtshams ma brgyad kyi glu'o
T02D1414:165b-10: // ae ma'o ngo mtshar lha mo ni yum la bstod pa'o //
T02D1414:165b-11: glu 'di rnams kyi mgon po la bskul bas /
T02D1414:165b-13: rdo rje'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i mngon bar byang
T02D1414:165b-14: chub pas bskyed pa 'jam dpal gur gum gyi mdog
T02D1414:165b-15: lta bu rigs drug gi rang bzhin zhal drug pa
T02D1414:165b-16: / pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag bcu gnyis pa bde mchog gi rtags su phag mos brgyan pa /
T02D1414:165b-17: yang na skyil grung phyed pa /
T02D1414:165b-18: yang na g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1414:165b-19: zhal dang phyag mtshan lha rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:165b-20: padma'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jam pa'i rdo rje /
T02D1414:165b-21: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sbyor ba'i bde mchog las 'jam dpal gyi bde mchog yin no //
T02D1414:165b-22: bum pa bzhi las ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi bskyed /
T02D1414:165b-23: thog ma thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad du thugs kyi dpa' bo dang /
T02D1414:165b-24: dpa' mo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud las gsal lo //
T02D1414:165b-25: gnyis pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1414:165b-26: mo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud na gsal la
T02D1414:165b-27: / gsum pa sku'i 'khor lo ni zur bzhi dang sgo bzhir dgod de /
T02D1414:165b-28: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:165b-29: thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa yin /
T02D1414:165b-30: dpa' bo thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa yin no //
T02D1414:165b-31: yum rdo rje phyag mo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D1414:165b-32: snga ma'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du bsgom mo
T02D1414:165b-33: // dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bshad nas /
T02D1414:165b-35: ye shes kyi 'khor lo sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug nas /
T02D1414:165b-36: phyag dang mchod pa dang bstod pa byas nas ro gcig par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:165b-37: de nas go chas byin gyis brlabs nas dpa' bo
T02D1414:165b-38: dang rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi lus la
T02D1414:165b-39: dgod / phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi lha bskyed /
T02D1414:166a-3: nu ma'i bar du 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:166a-4: de'i thugs kar phyag mtshan gyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'/
T02D1414:166a-5: de nas dbang bskur ba'i lha spyan drangs nas phyag
T02D1414:166a-6: 'tshal mchod bstod de dbang bskur nas rang la thim
T02D1414:166a-7: par bsgom mo // de nas go chab gos la zhes bya ba ni sngar gyi rgyas bshad do //
T02D1414:166a-8: mkhas pas ye shes kyi bzlas pa ni spro bsdu bsgom pa'o //
T02D1414:166a-9: yang na srog rtsol bsdam pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzhi'i tshul gyis bsgoms la bzlas ba bya'o //
T02D1414:166a-10: dpral bar aom las sku'i 'khor lo'i spro bsdu dang /
T02D1414:166a-11: lkog mar a'a: las gsung gi 'khor lo'i spro bsdu dang /
T02D1414:166a-12: nu ma'i bar gyi mam las ye shes kyi 'jam dpal gyi spro bsdu dang /
T02D1414:166a-13: h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo'i spro bsdu bya'o //
T02D1414:166a-14: ngag gi bzlas pa ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:166a-15: ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshe dud chen gyi phreng ba dang /
T02D1414:166a-16: thun bzhi ru bsgom bzlas bya'o //
T02D1414:166a-17: gal te grub na bskyar ba'i cho ga ni tshogs
T02D1414:166a-18: kyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid phyag rgya dang ldan pas
T02D1414:166a-19: sngags pas rtag tu mchod cing /
T02D1414:166a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi dpa' bo dang /
T02D1414:166a-21: rnal 'byor ma bcu gnas rang gi lha'i skur bsgom
T02D1414:166a-22: zhing dkyil 'khor mchog dga' ba bzhis bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1414:166a-23: // de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs kyi 'khor los dngos grub thams cad thob bo //
T02D1414:166a-26: dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin gsum dang /
T02D1414:166a-28: thun mtshams kyi cho ga bcu gnyis kyis zhib mo
T02D1414:166a-29: rnam par 'thag pa'i sgrub thabs kyi 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D1414:166a-34: // / de ltar 'jam dpa'i rdo rje bshad nas rdo
T02D1414:166a-35: rje sems dpa' la mos pa'i gang zag gi ngor
T02D1414:166a-36: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bzhed pas
T02D1414:166a-37: / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:166a-39: rigs kyi dbye bas mchog dam pa ni le'u 'di la rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor yod do //
T02D1414:166a-40: gnas sogs rim pas sbyor ba ni /
T02D1414:166a-41: dkyil 'khor drug ka la gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhis bskor ro //
T02D1414:166a-43: phyogs kyi rim pas rnam par dbye //
T02D1414:166a-45: phyogs bzhir dpa' bo dang dpa' mo lnga lda nang
T02D1414:166b-0: du bzhi @166b ste nyi shu rtsa bzhis kun la
T02D1414:166b-1: bskor pa dang / lha mo bcu gnyis sgo dang
T02D1414:166b-2: mtshams kyi phyi rol du bzhag pas rnal 'byor chen
T02D1414:166b-3: po'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog rnal 'byor dbang phyug
T02D1414:166b-4: gi gang zag la dngos grub gsum rab tu ster
T02D1414:166b-5: bskor pa dang / ro // rigs drug ka'i rten
T02D1414:166b-6: gyi gang zag dkyil 'khor rnam par snang mdzad rdo
T02D1414:166b-7: rje'i sku lus las byung ba yin no //
T02D1414:166b-8: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:166b-9: de nas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1414:166b-10: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i rnal 'byor pas 'khor dang
T02D1414:166b-11: bcas pas 'dug ste bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1414:166b-12: chen po la dag ba'i mig dang /
T02D1414:166b-14: lag pa gnyis sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i gar bskyod
T02D1414:166b-15: nas mig zur gyis blta bas smin ma g-yo ba
T02D1414:166b-16: dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa
T02D1414:166b-17: / bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid ni //
T02D1414:166b-18: zhes bya ba chos kyi sku sems kyi dkyil 'khor srungs shig pa'o //
T02D1414:166b-19: rol pa'i bde ba chen po ni zhes pa nas
T02D1414:166b-20: aa la la la ho'i bar gyis longs sku'i sku
T02D1414:166b-21: lus kyi dkyil 'khor srungs shig pa'o //
T02D1414:166b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu dgyes pa zhes bya bas /
T02D1414:166b-23: sprul pa'i sku srungs shig pa'o //
T02D1414:166b-25: srid pa las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye
T02D1414:166b-26: shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor du ston pa yin no
T02D1414:166b-27: // de nas zhus pa'i lan du zhal 'dzum pa dang /
T02D1414:166b-29: smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pas zag med kyi sku gsung thugs las dkyil 'khor drug gsungs so //
T02D1414:166b-30: dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la mos
T02D1414:166b-31: pa'i ngor dkyil 'khor zlum po thugs kyi lha'i gnas
T02D1414:166b-32: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang gnyis pa rnam snang gi
T02D1414:166b-33: zla ba rgyas pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje
T02D1414:166b-35: gsum pa mi bskyod pa'i sngo nag 'bar ba sna
T02D1414:166b-36: tshogs pa'i rlung mel brten pa zla ba phyed pa
T02D1414:166b-37: lta bu'i rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1414:166b-38: bzhi ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin chen zur brgyad yid 'ong ba /
T02D1414:166b-39: nyi ma dang bcas pas rdo rje rin chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1414:166b-40: lnga pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi padma 'dab ma
T02D1414:166b-41: brgyad pa kha bye ba lta bu padma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:167a-0: ro // drug pa don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar @167a * //
T02D1414:167a-1: ba me'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1414:167a-2: bsgom pa'i tshe phyogs bcur spro ba'i lha drug cu
T02D1414:167a-3: rtsa gnyis re re la yang 'khor gyis bskor nas
T02D1414:167a-4: / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab brtags na //
T02D1414:167a-6: rgyud 'bum pa na drug tshang bar bzhed kyang 'dir
T02D1414:167a-7: rdo rje sems dpa' skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta
T02D1414:167a-8: ba bzhin du sprul nas bstan pa yin no //
T02D1414:167a-9: de la sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga byas
T02D1414:167a-10: nas rten 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo
T02D1414:167a-11: rje'i steng du nam mkha'i khams kun du bzang po'i
T02D1414:167a-12: bdag nyid kyi dbus su bhr'um las rnam par snang
T02D1414:167a-13: mdzad kyi gzhal yas khang brtsegs ma bsgoms la de'i
T02D1414:167a-14: dbus su sna tshogs padma'i gdan la rdo rje dbyings
T02D1414:167a-15: kyi dkyil 'khor ltar dkyil 'khor tshom bu lnga ji
T02D1414:167a-16: lta bu'i phyogs bzhi dang dbus su dgod do //
T02D1414:167a-17: dbus ma'i dbus su sgong skyes kyi rim pas he ru ka yab yum bsgoms te /
T02D1414:167a-18: sngar bshad pa'i sgong skyes bzhin du zhal lnga phyag
T02D1414:167a-19: bcu gnyis pa spyan gsum pa g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas
T02D1414:167a-20: pas bzhugs pa snga ma dang mthun no //
T02D1414:167a-21: de'i shar du pulli ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang rab gtum ma /
T02D1414:167a-23: de bzhin du byang nub lhor yang dbu gsum phyag drug pa bzhi bzhag ste /
T02D1414:167a-25: mtshams su ni bum pa bzhi thod pa dang bcas pa gzhag pa 'og nas 'chad //
T02D1414:167a-26: de'i shar phyogs kyi dbus su go ng'a ba rir
T02D1414:167a-27: lha dgra dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma zhal gsum
T02D1414:167a-28: phyag drug gzhag / de'i shar byang nub lhor yang
T02D1414:167a-29: dpa' bo dbu gsum phyag drug pa gzhag / byang
T02D1414:167a-30: gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ao ter rdo rje
T02D1414:167a-32: 'jigs byed chen mo dbu gsum phyag drug pa gzhag
T02D1414:167a-33: / de'i shar byang nub lhor dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1414:167a-34: mo dbu gsum phyag drug pa gzhag / ming rgyud
T02D1414:167a-35: na gsal / nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su k'anytsir 'jigs byed chen mo dang /
T02D1414:167a-36: rta rna ma zhal gsum phyag drug pa gzhag /
T02D1414:167a-37: de'i shar byang nub lhor dbu gsum phyag drug pa
T02D1414:167a-39: lho'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su su barna dv'i par nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D1414:167b-0: 'khor lo'i @167b go cha ma dbu gsum phyag drug
T02D1414:167b-1: pa gzhag / de'i shar byang nub lhor dpa' bo
T02D1414:167b-2: dang dpa' mo dbu gsum phyag drug pa gzhag /
T02D1414:167b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi sangs rgyas lnga dang sems dpa'
T02D1414:167b-5: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang /
T02D1414:167b-6: rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo zhal gsum
T02D1414:167b-7: phyag drug / spyan gsum pa dbus ma bzhi sngo
T02D1414:167b-12: dbus kyi mtshams su bum pa bzhi dang thod pa yod pa bzhin du /
T02D1414:167b-14: byang dang nub dang lho'i mtshams bzhi ru bum pa dang /
T02D1414:167b-15: thod pa nyi shu nges so //
T02D1414:167b-16: phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi cha bzhir mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1414:167b-17: la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi phyed skyes pa phyed
T02D1414:167b-18: bud med kyi gzugs can zhal gsum phyag drug spyan
T02D1414:167b-19: gsum pa / g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1414:167b-20: gri gug dang mgo'i thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dril bu dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02D1414:167b-21: dkyil 'khor lnga pa rdo rje'i phreng ba dang me 'od kyis bskor bar rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:167b-22: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhi yang phyed gzugs ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D1414:167b-24: g-yas g-yon gnyis bong bu'i gdong can /
T02D1414:167b-26: g-yas g-yon gnyis rnga mo'i gdong can /
T02D1414:167b-27: nub kyi khyi gdong ma g-yas g-yon gnyis ra'i gdong can /
T02D1414:167b-28: lho'i phag mo'i gdong ma g-yas g-yon gnyis byi la'i gdong can /
T02D1414:167b-29: mkha' 'gro ma dang khva gdong ma sngo /
T02D1414:167b-30: l'a ma dang 'ug gdong ma ljang /
T02D1414:167b-31: khanda ro hi dang khyi gdong ma dmar /
T02D1414:167b-32: gzugs can ma dang phag gdong ma ser /
T02D1414:167b-33: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi ni phyed gzugs ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D1414:167b-34: zhal dang phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni rgyud na gsal lo //
T02D1414:167b-35: rdo rje phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das ji lta
T02D1414:167b-36: ba de ltar zhal lnga phyag bcu gnyis phyag rgya
T02D1414:167b-37: lnga bud med kyi dbyibs dang ldan pa /
T02D1414:167b-38: zhal steng ma phag rgod kyi gdong can no //
T02D1414:167b-39: gnas ji lta bar brgyud pa'i rim pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1414:167b-40: drug ni rgyud 'bum sde'i 'khor lo'i go cha'i rim
T02D1414:167b-41: pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i rgyud rnams dang lnga
T02D1414:167b-42: bcu rtsa gnyis par gsang ste ming tsam yang ma
T02D1414:168a-0: bstan pa / rgyud kyi rgyal po man ngag thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud @168a * //
T02D1414:168a-1: thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa'i rgyud 'dir /
T02D1414:168a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u gcig pu gsungs te /
T02D1414:168a-3: gzhan yang bskyed pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D1414:168a-4: sgra yi tshul las nges byang ba //
T02D1414:168a-5: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin //
T02D1414:168a-6: zhes rdo rje mkha' 'gro nges par 'byung ba mchog gi le'u dang por bstan to //
T02D1414:168a-7: dkyil 'khor lnga'i ni shugs la go bas drug yod do zhes gsungs so //
T02D1414:168a-8: lnga pa lnga'i bdag nyid ni phyogs bzhi dang dbus su dkyil 'khor sde tshan lnga bkod pa ni /
T02D1414:168a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni /
T02D1414:168a-10: rgyu gser dngul las byas pa'i bum pa lha'i sku
T02D1414:168a-11: mdog dang mthun pa'i gos kyis mgul pa bcings la
T02D1414:168a-12: / bdud rtsi lnga dang sman lnga rin po che
T02D1414:168a-13: lnga 'bru lnga dang ldan pa nang gi mtshams su
T02D1414:168a-14: / bzhi / phyi'i mtshams su bcu drug gzhag go //
T02D1414:168a-15: 'dod yon gyi snam bu kha dog sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed pa /
T02D1414:168a-16: glu dang gar dang sna tshogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra
T02D1414:168a-17: dang bcas pas phyi rol gyi mu khyud kyi nang
T02D1414:168a-18: du 'dod yon gyi lha mos bskor ro //
T02D1414:168a-19: dur khrod brgyad sngar sgong skyes kyi lha dkyil 'khor bzhin du byas te /
T02D1414:168a-21: las kyi rgal mchog ni mdun du ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas /
T02D1414:168a-22: phyag 'tshal mchod bstod dbang bskur nas gcig tu thim
T02D1414:168a-23: par bsams pa la mkhas pas lus la gnas nyi
T02D1414:168a-24: shu rtsa bzhir / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dgod /
T02D1414:168a-25: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi lha bskyed /
T02D1414:168a-26: go cha gnyis kyang bgo /'khor kun la yang lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsams /
T02D1414:168a-27: lus la dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo //
T02D1414:168a-28: ngag lkog mar gsung gi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:168a-29: yid snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:168a-30: ye shes kyi 'khor lo lha mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba snying ga nu ma'i bar du dgod /
T02D1414:168a-31: sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i bdud rtsi'i thod pa nyi shu'i dam tshig gi lha mchod /
T02D1414:168a-32: ye shes kyi bzlas pa spro bsdu grangs med pa bya /
T02D1414:168a-33: dung chen gyi phreng ba blang nas ngag gi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:168a-34: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la rkang pa brgyad pas mchod /
T02D1414:168a-35: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags kyis bstod /
T02D1414:168b-0: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i smon @168b lam yang gdab /
T02D1414:168b-1: bzlas pa'i sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:168b-2: gtso 'khor rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1414:168b-3: dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i mchod cing bzlas pa byas
T02D1414:168b-4: nas lha thams cad dkar por bsgoms pas zhib 'grub
T02D1414:168b-5: / ser por bsgoms pas rgyas pa 'grub /
T02D1414:168b-8: dkyil 'khor 'di drug ka sgong skyes kyi dbye bas yin no //
T02D1414:168b-9: dngos grub bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor he ru
T02D1414:168b-10: ka'i gnas su rigs lnga gang la dang po bzhag
T02D1414:168b-11: nas gtso bo spro ba yin /
T02D1414:168b-12: bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur /
T02D1414:168b-13: bud med rnal 'byor ma la dga' na yang gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i zhal nas ston /
T02D1414:168b-14: bzlas pa bye ba byas na sngon 'grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ston /
T02D1414:168b-15: dkyil 'khor drug po 'di gzhan la bstan par mi
T02D1414:168b-16: bya zhes pa la sogs pa ni phan yon te
T02D1414:168b-17: rgyu des na tshogs pa la bshad pa'i phyir le'u
T02D1414:168b-18: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa bsdus pa yin la /
T02D1414:168b-19: rtsa ba'i rgyud bsdus pa 'di ni slob ma la
T02D1414:168b-20: bshad pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bsdus pa yin no
T02D1414:168b-22: rnal 'byor pa drug gis sngon 'gro dang rjes dang thun mtshams dang /
T02D1414:168b-23: spyod pa dang 'chags pa zhib mo rnam par 'thag
T02D1414:168b-24: pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang
T02D1414:168b-28: // / de ltar rigs drug gi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:168b-29: da ni phyed kyi dbang phyug ma la mos pa de'i ngor /
T02D1414:168b-30: de nas rnal 'byor bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:168b-32: 'dod pa'i don dngos grub gsum sgrub par byed pa
T02D1414:168b-33: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'bum pa las kyang rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1414:168b-34: 'di bsdus pa'i ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma mkha'
T02D1414:168b-35: 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sngom pa rgyud gzhan du gsang
T02D1414:168b-36: zhing ming tsam yad ma bstan pa phag mo mngon
T02D1414:168b-37: bar 'byung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud yang dag pa man
T02D1414:168b-38: ngag gi snying po bshad par bya zhes mdor bstan
T02D1414:168b-39: to // rgyas par bshad pa ni dngos grub gsum
T02D1414:168b-40: legs par ster ba rdzus skyes kyis rdo rje phag
T02D1414:168b-41: mo'i dkyil 'khor lha mo sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
T02D1414:168b-42: snying po bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1414:168b-43: de bsgom par 'dod na dang po tshad med pa dang /
T02D1414:168b-47: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:169a-1: bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang padma bskyed de /
T02D1414:169a-2: de'i lte ba'i dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1414:169a-3: a'a li k'a li mngon bar byang chub pa'i rim
T02D1414:169a-4: pas rdo rje phag mo gzhal yas khang dang bcas
T02D1414:169a-5: pa skad cig gi rnal 'byor gyis bskyed nas /
T02D1414:169a-6: de yang zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:169a-7: sku lus mdzes shing yid 'phrog pa //
T02D1414:169a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rgyud nas gsal te /
T02D1414:169a-9: ma phyed ces bya ba ni sku g-yas skyes pa g-yon bud med mtshan gnyis sbyor bar byed pa'o //
T02D1414:169a-12: shar phyogs kyi mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar mo seng ge'i gdong pa can /
T02D1414:169a-13: byang du l'a la ljang gu phag gi gdong can /
T02D1414:169a-14: nub tu dum skyes ma dmar mo glang po'i gdong can /
T02D1414:169a-15: lhor gzugs can ma ser mo rta'i gdong can /
T02D1414:169a-16: de'i phyir rol du rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:169a-17: mtshams su bum pa bzhi dang thod pa bzhi dgod do //
T02D1414:169a-18: de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bzhi dgod do //
T02D1414:169a-19: shar la sogs pa rtsibs drug gi dbus su shar du m'a ma k'i dbus sngo ba /
T02D1414:169a-20: g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1414:169a-21: byang du spyan ma dbus dkar ba g-yas sngo ba /
T02D1414:169a-23: nub tu sgrol ma dbus ljang gu g-yas dkar ba g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1414:169a-24: lhor gos dkar mo dbus dmar ba /
T02D1414:169a-27: phyag drug pa m'a ma k'i rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:169a-28: spyan ma 'khor lo dang dril bu /
T02D1414:169a-29: sgrol ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:169a-30: gos dkar mo padma dang dril bu bsnams nas padma ltar gar bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:169a-31: phyag gzhan bzhi ni thod pa dang kha tv'am g-yon na /
T02D1414:169a-32: cang te'u dang rdo rje gri gug g-yas kyis bsnams
T02D1414:169a-33: pa shar la sogs pa drug po thams cad du
T02D1414:169a-34: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang sbyar ro //
T02D1414:169a-35: shar gyi rtsibs sngon po drug la rab gtum ma
T02D1414:169a-36: la sogs pa drug gi dkar mo dang ljang gu
T02D1414:169a-37: phyed gzugs ma thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'khor
T02D1414:169a-38: lo dang cang te'u dang gri gug bsnams pa'o //
T02D1414:169a-39: byang gi rtsibs ljang gu drug la sngo ba dang ser ba'i phyed gzugs ma /
T02D1414:169a-40: rdo rje dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga cang te'u dang gri gug go //
T02D1414:169a-41: nub kyi rtsibs dmar po dug la lha mo dmar ba dang /
T02D1414:169a-42: ser ba'i phyed gzugs ma padma dang thod pa dang /
T02D1414:169b-0: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u dang @169b gri gug go //
T02D1414:169b-1: lho'i rtsibs drug la lha mo ser mo dang /
T02D1414:169b-2: dmar ba'i phyed gzugs ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D1414:169b-3: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u dang gri
T02D1414:169b-4: gug go // lha mo de dag thams cad zhal
T02D1414:169b-5: gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa rang dang
T02D1414:169b-6: mthun pa'i ro'i gdan nyi shu rtsa bzhi la bzhugs
T02D1414:169b-7: gug go // pa'o // shar gyi rtsibs drug la rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:169b-8: byang 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:169b-9: nub sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor /
T02D1414:169b-11: dbus rdo rje'i phreng pas bskor /
T02D1414:169b-12: zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyi steng
T02D1414:169b-13: du gshin rje brten ma la sogs pa'i lha mo
T02D1414:169b-14: bzhi bri / mtshams dang sgo thams cad sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor /
T02D1414:169b-15: shar khva gdong ma sngo dmar phyed gzugs /
T02D1414:169b-16: byang 'ug gdod ma ljang ba dang dmar ba dang phyed gzugs /
T02D1414:169b-17: nub khyi gdong ma dkar ba dang ser ba phyed gzugs /
T02D1414:169b-18: lhor phag gdong ma ljang ba dang sngo ba'i phyed gzugs /
T02D1414:169b-19: shar lhor gshin rje brtan ma ma he'i gdong /
T02D1414:169b-20: lho nub tu gshin rje pho nya mo bong bu'i gdong /
T02D1414:169b-21: nub byang du gshin rje mche ba mo rnga mo'i gdong /
T02D1414:169b-22: byang shar du gshin rje 'joms ma rta'i gdong /
T02D1414:169b-23: g-yon gyi dang bos thod pa dang kha tv'am ga gzung pa /
T02D1414:169b-24: g-yon gyi gnyis pas mgo bo skra dang bcas pa gzung pa dang /
T02D1414:169b-25: g-yas kyi dang po gri gug /
T02D1414:169b-26: gnyis pa cang te'u shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i nye bsnyen no //
T02D1414:169b-27: lhag ma'i mtshan nyid rgyan dang dbyi bas rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:169b-28: phyir rol nas bskor ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo ni /
T02D1414:169b-29: gzugs rdo rje ma me tog dang spos dang mar me thogs pa /
T02D1414:169b-30: dri rdo rje ma dri chab thogs pa /
T02D1414:169b-31: ro rdo rje ma lha bshos kyi phreng ba dang byug pa thogs pa /
T02D1414:169b-32: reg bya rdo rje ma lha'i gos thogs pa /
T02D1414:169b-33: sgra rdo rje ma sil snyan thogs nas mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02D1414:169b-34: de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog gi gling bu dang /
T02D1414:169b-36: rdza rnga dang rnga rings dang rnga dra ba can dang rnga zlum dang rnga po che dang /
T02D1414:169b-38: sgeg mo dang phreng ba ma dang glu ma dang gar ma dang /
T02D1414:169b-39: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i lha mo'o //
T02D1414:169b-40: dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyir rol gyi rtsig ba ni /
T02D1414:169b-41: panytsa r'a ga pha gu yi dgas kyi gzugs can
T02D1414:169b-42: ro sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang
T02D1414:170a-2: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:170a-3: lus la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1414:170a-4: so dang sen mo ni mgo bo'i ming yin no //
T02D1414:170a-5: snabs ni pus mo'i ming yin te /
T02D1414:170a-6: khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi lha mor bsgoms pas so zhes kha cig 'chad do //
T02D1414:170a-7: yang na khams nyid yin par 'thad do //
T02D1414:170a-8: de'i rgyas bshad ni pulli ra ma la yar nyi
T02D1414:170a-9: ma'i dkyil 'khor mgo bor gtum mig ma zhes bya
T02D1414:170a-10: ba nas / ku lu t'a pus mor nyi ma'i
T02D1414:170a-11: dkyil 'khor brtson chen ma'i zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D1414:170a-12: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbus su dpa' bo nyi
T02D1414:170a-14: sgo ma brgyad kyang mig la sogs pa'i sgo brgyad la dgod pa kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:170a-15: thugs kar ye shes kyi 'khor lor sa la sogs pa khams lnga'i lha mo snga ma bzhin /
T02D1414:170a-16: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'i lha yang snga ma bzhin /
T02D1414:170a-17: mig la sogs pa skye mched kyi lha yang snga ma bzhin /
T02D1414:170a-18: yid mi 'khrugs pa'i snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:170a-21: lus rnam snang dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'o //
T02D1414:170a-23: de ltar dgod pa byas nas ni //
T02D1414:170a-24: zhes pa dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha drug
T02D1414:170a-25: bskon nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te
T02D1414:170a-27: phyag bya ba mchod bstod lus la bcug nas lha'i
T02D1414:170a-28: dngos po kun dang tha mi dad pa'i de'i ngo
T02D1414:170a-29: bor bya'o // dbang bskur ye shes sems dpa' spyan dangs nas mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:170a-30: dam tshig gi chu la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:170a-31: tha mar ro gcig par bsgom mo //
T02D1414:170a-32: de'i snying ga nu ma'i bar du ma phyed kyi
T02D1414:170a-33: dbang phyug ma'i 'khor lo bsgom pa la bum pa
T02D1414:170a-34: bzhi'i thod pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros dkyil 'khor la mchod
T02D1414:170a-37: yid thugs kyi 'khor lo las dam tshig gi lha
T02D1414:170a-38: mo 'dod zar spros pas sems can yang lhar bskyed
T02D1414:170a-39: / sems med pa'i bems po snod kyi 'jig rten yang lhar bskyed /
T02D1414:170a-40: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa sgyu ma lta bu'i 'khor lo dang ye shes kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:170a-41: dam tshig gi mchog ngag gi bzlas pa ni yum gyi snying po dang nye snying ni gsal /
T02D1414:170a-42: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi sngags ni /
T02D1414:170a-43: aom d'a ki ni ye h'um h'um phat ces bya ba nas /
T02D1414:170a-44: aom ya ma ma th'a ni h'um h'um phat ces
T02D1414:170b-0: @170b pa'i bar du sngags kyi bzlas pa yongs su
T02D1414:170b-1: rdzogs par bya'o // bzlas pas dub na thod pa
T02D1414:170b-2: bzhi las zhi ba'i btung ba bdud rtsi myangs nas
T02D1414:170b-3: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgoms la lha
T02D1414:170b-4: thams cad la bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gis mchod do
T02D1414:170b-5: rdzogs par bya'o // // de nas sems kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:170b-6: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D1414:170b-7: chos bdag med pa'i stong pa nyid pa nyid la
T02D1414:170b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams bcug nas shes rab
T02D1414:170b-9: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med pa'i chos
T02D1414:170b-10: nyid bsgom mo // 'di ni don dam snying po las shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:170b-11: mtshan ma med pa bsgoms nas rten 'brel gyi chos
T02D1414:170b-12: mtshan ma med pa'i de nyid lha mo sum cu
T02D1414:170b-13: rtsa bdun gyi gnas der 'bras bu'i tshod tsam gyi
T02D1414:170b-14: thig le'i lha / lha'i mig gis blta bar bya'o //
T02D1414:170b-16: rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i thig le'i 'khor lo bsgom mo //
