T02D1414:170b-17: yang na skra'i rtse mo brgya stong du gshegs pa'i
T02D1414:170b-18: tshad tsam gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
T02D1414:170b-19: bha ga'i dbus su he ru ka dang bcas pa'i
T02D1414:170b-20: lha lo'i 'khor lo kha gdong ma la sogs pa
T02D1414:170b-21: brgyad kyis phyir rol nas bskor ba bsgom mo //
T02D1414:170b-22: de na rdzus skyes bshad nas mang la skyes 'di ltar bsgom ste /
T02D1414:170b-23: yang na ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma dang 'khyud
T02D1414:170b-24: pa'i bdag po he ru ka mkha' 'gro ma bzhis
T02D1414:170b-25: bskor ba mngal skyes kyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1414:170b-26: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo phan tshun bdag por byas nas /
T02D1414:170b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyu'i he ru ka dang /
T02D1414:170b-28: sogs pas lha mo'i 'khor lo mngal skyes nas bskyed pa dang /
T02D1414:170b-29: rgyu'i he ru ka zhu ba dang /
T02D1414:170b-30: 'bras bu'i he ru ka bskyed pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa mngal skyes kyis bskyed nas /
T02D1414:170b-31: grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi la
T02D1414:170b-32: sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor ba'i khams
T02D1414:170b-33: gsum gyi bdag po chen po dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1414:170b-35: lha'i mig med pa la mi snang ba'i sems can gyi don du sa la spyod pa 'grub bo //
T02D1414:170b-36: gal te mchog gi dngos grub ma grub na /
T02D1414:170b-37: tha ma mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba /
T02D1414:170b-39: gal te ma grub na bskyar ba'i cho ga tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:170b-40: sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D1414:170b-41: 'chi bdag phyogs ni bcom zhing zad //
T02D1414:171a-0: ces bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dis dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad @171a * //
T02D1414:171a-2: tshogs kyi 'khor los tshe ring ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i mchod pa gang gis bya zhe na /
T02D1414:171a-3: mtshams med pa la sogs pa mi dge ba byed
T02D1414:171a-4: pa'i sdig can mkhas pas sngags kyi mthus srog dang
T02D1414:171a-5: phral nas mchod pa bya'i las gzhan du dge ba
T02D1414:171a-6: byed pa sngom pa can srog dang phral na dngos
T02D1414:171a-8: srog dang 'bral ba'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1414:171a-9: bag zan la phyugs kyi gzugs byas la /
T02D1414:171a-10: de mar la btsos pa'i lingga gsod pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1414:171a-11: dum bur bcas nas rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa
T02D1414:171a-12: bdun la / sems can 'di ni mtshams med pa lnga byed pa /
T02D1414:171a-13: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa /
T02D1414:171a-14: rdo rje spun la sdang ba /
T02D1414:171a-15: dkon mchog gsum gyi dgra mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis srog dang phrol /
T02D1414:171a-18: pags pa shus zhes bzlas zhing che ge ma ma
T02D1414:171a-19: ra ya phat ces sngags kyi sbyor ka'i bsgrub pa'i
T02D1414:171a-20: sbyor bas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo dang /
T02D1414:171a-21: sring mo la dbul ba bam /
T02D1414:171a-24: bu mo sngags skyes dang lhan cig tu dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam par sbyor bas /
T02D1414:171a-25: dam tshig gi mchog mngon spyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1414:171a-26: rang gi lha'i 'khor lo'i spyor bas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang longs spyad cing dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1414:171a-27: de nas phag mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lte bar sdigs mdzub kyis phul nas /
T02D1414:171a-28: mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis kyang mdung
T02D1414:171a-29: rtse lta bu'i 'od zer gyis sgo dgu la zhugs
T02D1414:171a-30: nas / snying ga'i padma phug nas khrag 'thung bar bsam zhing /
T02D1414:171a-31: mkha' 'gro mas zos pas sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi /
T02D1414:171a-32: ngan song gsum la sogs pa gzhan du ma yin no //
T02D1414:171a-33: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1414:171a-34: ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor las sbyor ba sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:171a-35: dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1414:171a-37: thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor zhib mo rnam par 'thag
T02D1414:171a-38: pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgoms mo
T02D1414:171a-39: // 'dir ni dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan spro bsdu ba bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171a-40: sems kyi 'khor lo mtshan med bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171a-41: lha'i gnas su thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171a-42: lha mo'i bha ga'i dbus su phra mo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171b-0: @171b bha ga'i dbus su he ru ka yum bzhi dang bcas pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171b-1: mngal skyes kyi rim pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:171b-2: bskyar ba'i cho ga mngon spyod kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1414:171b-3: rtsa ba'i rgyud phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:171b-5: // / de ltar ma phyed kyi dbang phyug ma bshad nas /
T02D1414:171b-6: 'khor lo spangs pa'i re mig gi dkyil 'khor la dga' ba'i ngor /
T02D1414:171b-7: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:171b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1414:171b-9: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D1414:171b-10: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi gnas 'khor lo spangs pa'i
T02D1414:171b-11: re mig la dgod pa'i man ngag bshad par dam
T02D1414:171b-12: bca' ba'o // sngon grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1414:171b-13: kyi brgyud pa dang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bla
T02D1414:171b-15: gzhan du 'dod rgyal gyis dris pa ma yin no //
T02D1414:171b-16: de la sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ldan dang /
T02D1414:171b-17: ldang ba'i rnal 'byor bdun bskyed nas mngon par byang
T02D1414:171b-18: chub pa lnga'i rim pa las lha dang gzhal yas
T02D1414:171b-19: khang rdzus skyes kyis bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang ni
T02D1414:171b-20: thugs kyi 'khor lo spangs pa'i re mig dgu /
T02D1414:171b-21: gsung re mig dmar po brgyad /
T02D1414:171b-22: sku yang re mig dkar po brgyad de bcu drug go //
T02D1414:171b-23: re mig dgu pa'i dbus su ye shes kyi sna
T02D1414:171b-24: tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad de'i dbus su a'a li
T02D1414:171b-25: k'a li nyi zla kha sbyor me long lta bu
T02D1414:171b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od zer spro bsdu bya ba nan tan /
T02D1414:171b-29: de yongs su gyur pa las he ru ka rnam
T02D1414:171b-30: par bsgom pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so
T02D1414:171b-31: // zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:171b-32: thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myong //
T02D1414:171b-33: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:171b-35: shar gyi 'dab pa ma la mkha' 'gro ba zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:171b-36: he ru ka yi rnam par bsgom //
T02D1414:171b-37: zhes pa'i rab ni padma brgyad ye shes kyi 'khor lo gri gug gis bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:171b-38: de'i phyi rol sa gzhi sngon po ka ba brgyad dang /
T02D1414:171b-39: rdo rje ra ba gru bzhis bskor ba'i re mig
T02D1414:171b-40: brgyad la thugs kyi 'khor lo'i ming dang sku mdog
T02D1414:171b-41: ni gsal / de'i phyi rol du sa gzhi dmar
T02D1414:171b-42: po padma r'a ga'i ka ba brgyad padma'i phreng bas
T02D1414:171b-44: de'i re mig brgyad la gsung gi 'khor lo'i lha dgod pa gsal lo //
T02D1414:172a-2: sa bzhi dkar po la ye shes kyi ka ba brgyad 'khor lo'i phreng bas gru bzhir bskor ba /
T02D1414:172a-3: de'i nang du sku'i 'khor lo brgyad dgod do //
T02D1414:172a-4: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang rgyan ni rgyud na gsal lo //
T02D1414:172a-5: sgo srung dang zur gyi lha mo rnams ni gzhung lugs du ma mthong ba'i mkhas pas /
T02D1414:172a-6: khva gdong ma dbus ma khva dang g-yas pa bya rog dang /
T02D1414:172a-7: g-yon pa chu skyer gyi zhal yin no //
T02D1414:172a-8: bya gdong ni 'ug pa'i gdong can ma ni g-yas pa 'ug pa dang /
T02D1414:172a-9: g-yon pa byi la'i gdong can no //
T02D1414:172a-10: nub kyi khyi gdong can ni /
T02D1414:172a-11: g-yas pa khyi dang g-yon pa seng ge'i gdong yin no //
T02D1414:172a-12: lho'i sa 'dzin phag rgod ma ni g-yas pa phag dang g-yon pa lug gi gdong can no //
T02D1414:172a-13: lha mo thams cad dang dpa' bo thams cad kyang
T02D1414:172a-14: zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
T02D1414:172a-16: sprul pa'i sku ni gdul bya mos pa'i gtso bo
T02D1414:172a-17: yin pas 'khor lo med pa gru bzhi rim pa
T02D1414:172a-18: gsum gyi re mig la dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:172a-19: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs sgor dgod /
T02D1414:172a-20: khva gdong ma la sogs pa mtshams su bkod la
T02D1414:172a-21: rang dang 'dra ba'i khro bo brgyad dang 'khyud pa'i
T02D1414:172a-23: nang gi ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi yang sangs
T02D1414:172a-24: rgyas zhal gsum phyag drug pa bzhi dang 'khyud pa
T02D1414:172a-25: / sngon gyi sangs rgyas bla ma'i bkas gnas kyi
T02D1414:172a-26: gzhung lugs kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo ji ltar
T02D1414:172a-27: 'dod pa de ltar sems can gyi bsam pa'i khyad
T02D1414:172a-28: par gyis dpa' bo dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor bcu
T02D1414:172a-29: / gnyis bsgom mo // mtshams kyi bum pa dang
T02D1414:172a-30: thod pa yang bzhag / phyi rol 'dod yon gyi
T02D1414:172a-31: lha mos bskor ba'i tshul gyis sna tshogs kyi mkha'
T02D1414:172a-32: 'gor ma dpa' bo dang 'khyud pa sprul nas me
T02D1414:172a-33: tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod par bya'o
T02D1414:172a-34: / gnyis bsgom mo // // phyi rol gyi rtsig
T02D1414:172a-35: pa yi dgas kyi gzugs kyis yongs su bskor ba/
T02D1414:172a-36: sngon gyi bla ma sangs rgyas kyi man ngag gi
T02D1414:172a-37: bems po ro'i rtsig pa lnga'i dngos po ni /
T02D1414:172a-38: dngos med ye shes lnga'i snang ba yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1414:172a-39: gru bzhi rim pa gsum gyi ka zhu dang ka tan kyang rdo rje padma 'khor los mtshan pa /
T02D1414:172a-40: sa gzhi yang sngon po dmar po dkar po sna tshogs pas 'byed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1414:172a-41: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lus kyi 'khor lo bkod pa dang /
T02D1414:172b-0: khams @172b dang phung po dang skye mched kyi lha yang bkod nas /
T02D1414:172b-1: ye shes rdo rje'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1414:172b-2: ye shes kyi 'khor lo nu ma'i bar du dgod /
T02D1414:172b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum dpral ba lkog ma snying gar bkod de sgrub pa'o //
T02D1414:172b-4: sgrub pa chen po ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas phyi rol gyi mchod yon dang /
T02D1414:172b-6: mchod pa lngas mchod dam tshig sna tshogs pa rkang ba brgyad pa'i lha mos mchod /
T02D1414:172b-7: sna tshogs pa'i khyad par ni sha chen lnga po dag gis mchod /
T02D1414:172b-8: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha gnyis bskon /
T02D1414:172b-9: dbang bskur nas ma lus par ro gcig par bsgom
T02D1414:172b-10: lha thams cad la dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye
T02D1414:172b-11: shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' mkhas
T02D1414:172b-12: pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar /
T02D1414:172b-13: rnam dag sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom// yang na ye
T02D1414:172b-14: shes kyi bzlas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi spro bsdu
T02D1414:172b-16: dus bzhi ru bdud rtsi lnga'i dam tshig rnams kyang rnal 'byor pa mkhas pas bsrung bar bya /
T02D1414:172b-17: khams gsum khrag 'thung gi gzugs can du bsams nas /
T02D1414:172b-18: 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo 'od zer spros pas
T02D1414:172b-19: thug med kyi 'khor lo bzhin du srid pa sbyangs
T02D1414:172b-20: nas thugs kar gzhug par bya zhing /
T02D1414:172b-21: spro bsdu byas pas dngos grub myur du 'thob po //
T02D1414:172b-22: dung chen gyi phreng ba blangs nas ngag gis bzlas pa'i sngags ni rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:172b-23: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i 'bras bu'i sa'i rlung 'gags pas 'dar ba dang /
T02D1414:172b-24: chu'i rlung 'gags pas g-yo ba dang /
T02D1414:172b-26: rlung gi rlung 'gags pas mig 'bar ba dang /
T02D1414:172b-27: rnam shes kyi rlung 'gags pas tshig 'jam pa'i rtags
T02D1414:172b-28: drug ni rdo rje dbab pa'i 'bras bu yin no
T02D1414:172b-29: // rtags de rnams ma byung na srog dang rtsol
T02D1414:172b-30: ba dbugs 'byung rngub bkag nas yum lte ba'i aom
T02D1414:172b-31: las yab snying ga'i h'um kha sbyor chos kyi dbyings
T02D1414:172b-32: spro ba'i le'u bzhi'i dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran
T02D1414:172b-33: pa'i sgyu ma 'od gsal zung 'jug tu spros pas
T02D1414:172b-34: // / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mchog spros pa
T02D1414:172b-35: ste bskyed pa'i rjes la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom
T02D1414:172b-36: // / pa 'di ni / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can kun la phan pa dang /
T02D1414:172b-37: gdul dka' ba'i drag po 'jigs byed bstan pa yin no //
T02D1414:173a-1: tshe khams gsum pa thams cad rgyu ba dang mi
T02D1414:173a-2: rgyu ba'i snod bcud sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor
T02D1414:173a-3: bsams nas / 'jug pa'i tshe sngags pas bza' ba
T02D1414:173a-4: gang cung zad de thams cad bdud rtsi ltar dam
T02D1414:173a-5: tshig gis byas nas zos pas chos kyi dbang phyug
T02D1414:173a-6: snang pa mtha' yas su 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:173a-7: dam tshig nyams kyi dogs pa la bla ma la
T02D1414:173a-8: mchod pa byas nas chu'i khrus kyis bum pa'i dbang
T02D1414:173a-9: blang ba dang / lo bcu gnyis 'jam pa'i gdan phul nas gsang ba'i dbang blang ba dang /
T02D1414:173a-10: sangs rgyas dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dang
T02D1414:173a-11: lha mo bcu gnyis kyi mkha' 'gro ma lus la
T02D1414:173a-12: bkod nas yid kyi mchod par bshad pa /
T02D1414:173a-13: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:173a-14: langs pa'i tshe na nam mkha'i dbyings su dkyil 'khor bzhag la smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02D1414:173a-15: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba khams gsum pa thams
T02D1414:173a-16: cad lha'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dag par
T02D1414:173a-17: rang gi lha yi yum dang tha mi dad pa'i
T02D1414:173a-20: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad 'dir yang bsgom mo //
T02D1414:173a-21: dbang gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:173a-23: // / de ltar re mig dgod pa'i 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:173a-24: ro mnyam gyi 'khor lo gsungs pas /
T02D1414:173a-25: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1414:173a-26: gnas kyi 'dus pa mchog yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1414:173a-27: sku gsungs thugs kyi 'khor lo gcig pa dbyibs ro mnyam dgod pa la sogs pa yin no //
T02D1414:173a-28: don dam pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'dres
T02D1414:173a-29: pas ro gcig par 'gyur ba de las byung ba'i
T02D1414:173a-30: kun rdzogs tu ro mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni kha
T02D1414:173a-32: sku gsungs thugs kyi lha thams cad kha dog gsum du nges pa yin no //
T02D1414:173a-33: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:173a-34: tshad med pa dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1414:173a-37: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor byas nas 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1414:173a-38: bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzhal yas khang bskyed nas /
T02D1414:173a-39: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa /
T02D1414:173a-40: rta babs dang rdo rje ra ba dang me 'od kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1414:173a-41: de'i dbus su dbyibs ro mnyam gyi lha gsungs te /
T02D1414:173b-0: 'khor lo nyi @173b shu rtsa bzhi phreng ba gcig tu bskor ba /
T02D1414:173b-1: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba dang ge sar du bcas pa /
T02D1414:173b-2: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1414:173b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' ni bde ba chen po zhes
T02D1414:173b-4: bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i sems thig ler gnas pa
T02D1414:173b-5: las skar mda'i tshul du a'a li h'um la zhu
T02D1414:173b-6: ba dang sngar bshad pa bzhin du zla ba me
T02D1414:173b-7: long ye shes nyi ma mnyam nyid ye shes /
T02D1414:173b-8: yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D1414:173b-9: 'od zer spro bsdu bya ba nan tan /
T02D1414:173b-10: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje mchog he
T02D1414:173b-11: ru ka chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par
T02D1414:173b-12: bsgom mo // dus mtha'i me ltar drag po'i zhes
T02D1414:173b-13: pa nas zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes// zhes
T02D1414:173b-15: 'gro ba rigs drug 'dul ba'i zhal drug pa 'jigs
T02D1414:173b-16: su rung bas ha ha sgrogs pas g-yas pa sgeg
T02D1414:173b-17: pa dang bzhad pa gnyis kyis h'um h'um dang /
T02D1414:173b-19: g-yon pa drag pa dang dpa' bo gnyis kyis phat phat dang /
T02D1414:173b-21: steng ma ljags bskyod pa tra ta tra ta sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1414:173b-23: zhal drug pa rnal 'byor pa sus bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:173b-24: rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas su //
T02D1414:173b-25: zhes bya ba thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug
T02D1414:173b-26: pa'i bde mchog bsgom pa la som nyi med pa'o
T02D1414:173b-27: // bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos brlan pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir /
T02D1414:173b-28: dbyibs ro mnyam 'byung ba bzhi dang /
T02D1414:173b-29: ri rab gyur pa las nam mkha'i mtha' las gzhal
T02D1414:173b-30: yas khang sprul nas longs spyod cing sems can gyi
T02D1414:173b-31: don du zhal drug gis 'gro ba rigs drug gi
T02D1414:173b-32: srid pa rnam par spyod pa yin no //
T02D1414:173b-33: dbyibs ro mnyam gyi dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1414:173b-34: da ni gzhal yas khang gi dbus su kha dog ro mnyam gyi gtso bo dang 'khor bskyed pas /
T02D1414:173b-35: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab dang sna tshogs rdo rje gyur pa las /
T02D1414:173b-36: gzhal yas khang stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing rtog pa med pas zla ba dang po'o //
T02D1414:173b-39: so sor rtog pa mchog tu phra ba /
T02D1414:173b-40: spro bsdu bya ba nan tan /
T02D1414:173b-41: thig le'i sgra spangs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1414:173b-42: shes mnyam pa nyid dam tshig ye shes bzhi'i zhal
T02D1414:173b-43: can de mthong bas phyi'i gzhal yas khang kha dog
T02D1414:173b-44: bzhir snang ba'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang 'dra
T02D1414:174a-0: @174a * // ba'i zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:174a-1: de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa'/
T02D1414:174a-2: de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dbus su zla ba rdo
T02D1414:174a-3: rje h'um sa bon dang bcas pa'i sems dpa' sum
T02D1414:174a-4: brtsegs bsgom mo // gtso bo gnyis bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1414:174a-5: mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis //
T02D1414:174a-7: rim pa bzhi ni dgod par bya //
T02D1414:174a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar du ye shes kyi 'khor lo gri gug gis bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:174a-9: dang po shar phyogs nas zhes bya ba nas rdo
T02D1414:174a-10: rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ljang gu
T02D1414:174a-11: zhes bya ba'i bar du sku'i ro mnyam pa'i 'khor
T02D1414:174a-12: lo bshad do // yang na sku dang gsung dang
T02D1414:174a-13: thugs kyi dbye bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i kha dog
T02D1414:174a-14: tu bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1414:174a-15: kha dog ro mnyam gyi bde mchog zhal bzhi phyag
T02D1414:174a-16: bcu gnyis pa'i thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad nag pos
T02D1414:174a-17: bskor / gsung gi brgyad dmar pos bskor /
T02D1414:174a-18: sku'i 'khor lo dkar po brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:174a-19: thugs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:174a-20: gsung padma'i phreng bas bskor ba /
T02D1414:174a-21: sku'i 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba bri'o //
T02D1414:174a-22: sgo rnams su go rims bzhin du lha mo brgyad bri ba ni /
T02D1414:174a-23: dbyibs ro mnyam dang kha dog ro mnyam gyi sgo ma dang thun mong yin no //
T02D1414:174a-24: mtshams ma bzhi kha dog ro mnyam yin na phyed gzugs mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:174a-25: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba /
T02D1414:174a-26: dpa' mo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1414:174a-27: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu g-yon na thod
T02D1414:174a-28: pa dang kha tv'am ga / yum ni gri gug
T02D1414:174a-30: kha dog ro mnyam gyi 'khor lo bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:174a-31: yang na rigs gsum gyi dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan
T02D1414:174a-32: ma rdo rje dang dril bu thams cad 'dzin pa
T02D1414:174a-33: lha mo thams cad gri gug dang ka p'i la
T02D1414:174a-34: 'chang ba skra grol bas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1414:174a-35: khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni
T02D1414:174a-36: rang snang ba'i dpa' bo dang 'khyud pa nyi ma
T02D1414:174a-37: dang padma'i steng na gnyis su med pas bzhugs pa'o
T02D1414:174a-38: // yang na gang zag kha cig rjes su chags pas ma'i zhal nyid du mos te /
T02D1414:174a-39: lha mo bcu gnyis ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi la
T02D1414:174a-40: g-yon pas thod pa dang khva tv'am ga 'dzin pa
T02D1414:174a-41: / cang te'u dang gri gug dang mgo bo'i do shal 'chang ba /
T02D1414:174b-0: dkyil 'khor thams cad yi dags kyi gdan la @174b la bzhugs pa nye bsnyen gyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1414:174b-1: dpa' bo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor yan lag so sor dgod pa ni /
T02D1414:174b-3: so dang sen mo dag pa thod pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:174b-4: bsgoms ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// zhes bya ba /
T02D1414:174b-5: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi lus la dgod pa'o //
T02D1414:174b-6: pulli ra ma la ya mgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:174b-7: la rab gtum ma'o zhes pa nas ku lu t'a
T02D1414:174b-8: pus mo gnyis la brtson 'grus chen mo'i ba du
T02D1414:174b-9: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dag lus la dgod pa
T02D1414:174b-10: dang / sgo ma brgyad bu ga brgyad la dgod pa kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:174b-11: khams dang phung po dang skye mched kyi lha sngar bshad pa bzhin du blta'o //
T02D1414:174b-12: yid mi 'khrugs pa ni snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:174b-13: ngag 'od dpag med ni lkog mar gsung gi 'khor lo //
T02D1414:174b-14: lus rnam snang ni mgo bor rnam snang sku'i 'khor lo /
T02D1414:174b-15: lha mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba'i ye shes sems dpa'i nu ma'i bar du sgrub pa'o //
T02D1414:174b-16: sgrub pa chen po ni rang gi snying ga'i 'od
T02D1414:174b-17: zer lcags kyu lta bus ye shes sems dpa' spyan
T02D1414:174b-20: dgong pa nyid ni byas nas ni// zhes pa dpa'
T02D1414:174b-21: bo dang dpa' mo drug gi go cha dgod pa'o
T02D1414:174b-22: // de nas ri ma pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02D1414:174b-23: rdo rje lcags kyus dgug pa dang /
T02D1414:174b-24: 'od zer zhags pas gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:174b-25: 'od zer lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang /
T02D1414:174b-26: 'od zer dril bus rjes su chags pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1414:174b-27: dam tshigs sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gcig
T02D1414:174b-28: gi ngo bor thim par 'gyur nas go cha gnyis
T02D1414:174b-29: dgod de // aom ha las rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1414:174b-30: zhes bya ba nas yan lag thams cad kyi go
T02D1414:174b-31: cha'o zhes bya ba'i bar ni sngar bshad pa bzhin
T02D1414:174b-32: du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan blta bar bya'o //
T02D1414:174b-33: dbang bskur ba'i lha spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D1414:174b-34: mdzub mo mdud byas zhes bya ba nas 'ching ba
T02D1414:174b-35: dang dbang du bya ba yin zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1414:174b-36: du 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu zhags pa dang
T02D1414:174b-37: / lcags sgrog dang dril bu lta bu bzhis bkug la /
T02D1414:174b-38: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa byas
T02D1414:174b-39: nas 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma lngas
T02D1414:174b-40: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur
T02D1414:174b-41: pa'i sngags dang bcas pas chu'i dbang bskur ba dang
T02D1414:175a-1: bskul bas mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams dgyes nas
T02D1414:175a-2: rang gi gnas yum la thim pas dga' ba bzhi'i
T02D1414:175a-4: shes rab ye shes sa bcu pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dbang skur bar byed do //
T02D1414:175a-5: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bskul ba'i gru ni /
T02D1414:175a-6: dbang bskur rol pa'i bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i
T02D1414:175a-7: stong pa nyid do// mkha' 'gro dra pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1414:175a-8: mchog ni / tshul khrims kyi stong pa nyid do //
T02D1414:175a-9: dgyes chen bde chen las byung ba ni /
T02D1414:175a-10: bzod pa'i stong pa nyid do //
T02D1414:175a-11: mkha' 'gro bde mchog longs spyod ni /
T02D1414:175a-12: brtson 'grus kyi stong ba nyid do //
T02D1414:175a-13: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po ni /
T02D1414:175a-14: bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid do //
T02D1414:175a-15: aa la la la ho ni dga' ba bzhis mnyes pa'o //
T02D1414:175a-16: ye shes dang dam tshig ro gcig par gyur nas /
T02D1414:175a-17: 'khor lo kun yang ro gcig par bsgoms pas rtags ni /
T02D1414:175a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan ye shes lnga dang
T02D1414:175a-19: ldan pa 'byung ba ro gcig pa'i rtags yin no
T02D1414:175a-20: // snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1414:175a-21: steng du yab yum gyi snying po rim pa bzhin
T02D1414:175a-22: // dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags kyi rim pa lnga /
T02D1414:175a-23: go cha'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags kyi ri
T02D1414:175a-24: ma pa drung ga / rkang pa brgyad pa'i dpa'
T02D1414:175a-25: bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags dang rim pa bdun bkod
T02D1414:175a-26: pa la / thun bzhir spro bsdu bya ste /
T02D1414:175a-27: ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i rtsi ba'i sngags
T02D1414:175a-28: las tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs pa phyag rgya
T02D1414:175a-29: drug gi spros ba dang bsdu ba de las brtag
T02D1414:175a-30: go // phag mo'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags las mgrin pa'i mgul rgyan spro //
T02D1414:175a-31: snying po'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa las brgya phyed kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba spro /
T02D1414:175a-32: yi ge bdun pa'i sngags la zhal g-yas ser po /
T02D1414:175a-34: g-yon ljang gu las rna cha zlum po drug dang bcas pa spro /
T02D1414:175a-35: yum kyi nye snying las phyag g-yas pas pags pa
T02D1414:175a-36: bsnams pa/ cang te'u dang gri gug dang dgra sta
T02D1414:175a-38: tri sh'ul rtse gsum pa'i phyag lnga de las spro bsdu pa'i che yang sngags de la bsdu /
T02D1414:175a-39: go cha'i rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags las dril bu /
T02D1414:175a-40: g-yer ka drug cu rtsa bzhi dang bcas pa'i ska rags dang stag gi sham thabs spro /
T02D1414:175b-0: go cha'i da dpa' bo'i sngags las go cha'i lha drug @175b spro /
T02D1414:175b-3: l'a ma la sogs pa'i 'khor lo kun gyi rnal
T02D1414:175b-4: 'byor ma'i sngags pas thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1414:175b-5: dang / glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1414:175b-6: kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo
T02D1414:175b-7: po thogs pa'i phyag lnga de las spro zhing de
T02D1414:175b-8: las bsdu'o // yum gyi snying po'i sngags las thod
T02D1414:175b-9: pa'i cod pan lnga'i spyi gtsug gi sna tshogs rdo
T02D1414:175b-10: las bsdu'o // rje / rus pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa zla ba ches pa de las spro /
T02D1414:175b-12: sprul pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo nyi shu rtsa
T02D1414:175b-13: bzhi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa dang khams kyi
T02D1414:175b-14: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo la bsdu /
T02D1414:175b-15: de las spro bar yang rnam par brtag go //
T02D1414:175b-16: de ltar bsdus nas zhal gcig phyag gnyis par gyur pa la /
T02D1414:175b-17: gnod mdzes tsham dam gyi sngags kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D1414:175b-18: rkang pa brgyad pas mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:175b-21: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi 'jigs pa spangs te /
T02D1414:175b-22: rnal 'byor ma'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
T02D1414:175b-23: spro bsdu ye shes kyi bzlas pa sgrub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1414:175b-24: 'di'i yan lag tu bdung rtsi myang ba dang mchod
T02D1414:175b-25: pa dang bstod pa dang gtor ma gtang ba yang
T02D1414:175b-27: spro bsdu de lta bsgom pa la mi mos na /
T02D1414:175b-28: rdo rje khro bo'i thig le bsgoms te /
T02D1414:175b-29: rang gi mkha' gsang ni sna rtse'i bu ga la rgyu ba dang /
T02D1414:175b-30: mi rgyu ba'i snod bcud thams cad thig le'i lhar
T02D1414:175b-31: bstan nas nam mkha'i khams su spro'o// yang na khro
T02D1414:175b-32: bo phra mo rgyu ba dang mi rgyu pa'i thams
T02D1414:175b-33: cad pha mo'i ltar mngal skyes spangs nas blo dang
T02D1414:175b-34: ldan pa'i ba spu'i bu gnas khro bo phra mo'i
T02D1414:175b-36: yang na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun /
T02D1414:175b-37: dpa' bo rnams ni skyu ba lta bu /
T02D1414:175b-38: dpa' mo sum cu rtsa bdun ni stong pa nyid
T02D1414:175b-39: du bsgom pa ni sngar bshang ba bzhin du bya'o
T02D1414:175b-40: / de nas dam tshig gi bzla pa bya ba'i sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:175b-41: dung chen gyi phreng nga blang ba ni lag pa
T02D1414:175b-42: g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang srin lag gi sa blangs
T02D1414:175b-43: nas phyis ci bder bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1414:175b-44: bzlas pa zin nas thod pa bzhi la dam tshig
T02D1414:175b-45: gi sbyor bas bdud rtsi lnga'i dam tshig bza' bar
T02D1414:175b-46: bya'o / de nas gtor ma sbyin pa ni /
T02D1414:175b-47: gcer bu skra grol gyur ba yi //
T02D1414:176a-2: zhes pa ni mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
T02D1414:176a-3: rkang ba g-yas pa brkyang nas su //
T02D1414:176a-4: zhes bya ba spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags
T02D1414:176a-5: lan gsum mam bzhi 'dam lnga'i bar du brjod do
T02D1414:176a-6: // tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i tshe skra grol
T02D1414:176a-7: ba'i gcer bu stan mthon po la 'dug nas kha
T02D1414:176a-8: // lhor bltas te / mtshan phyed na gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1414:176a-9: de nyid las kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes pa ni /
T02D1414:176a-10: zhe ba la gtor ma dkar po bsams /
T02D1414:176a-13: mngon spyod la nag por bsam mo //
T02D1414:176a-14: de nyid gsum ni aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis lan lnga'i bar du sngags /
T02D1414:176a-15: brjod cing sngar bshad pa bzhin du byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1414:176a-16: gtor ma'i sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:176a-17: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs nas /
T02D1414:176a-18: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par 'dod pas /
T02D1414:176a-19: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad bde ba
T02D1414:176a-20: chen po babs pas sprul pa'i 'khor lo sku gsung
T02D1414:176a-22: 'khor lo bzhi'i brgyud pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1414:176a-23: a'a li k'a li g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa lte ba'i dbus su mnyam par byas nas /
T02D1414:176a-24: lte ba'i ba'i khrag gi thig le gtsub gtan la
T02D1414:176a-25: aa wa dh'u t'i chu shing gi snying po ltar
T02D1414:176a-26: drang ba'i reg gnas der g-yas g-yon gyi rlung mnan
T02D1414:176a-28: g-yas g-yon gyi srub thag gis gtsubs bas steng du
T02D1414:176a-29: 'khor lo bzhi la gtum mo drod 'bar ba'i tshul
T02D1414:176a-30: gyis spyi gtsug gi ham bsregs nas byang chub kyi
T02D1414:176a-31: sems phab pa ni dga' ba bzhi'i rgyu yin pa'i
T02D1414:176a-32: phyir ro // 'chi med thig le ni lkog mar dga' pa'i thig le /
T02D1414:176a-33: snying gar mchog dga'i thig le /
T02D1414:176a-34: lta bar lhan cig skyes dga'i thig le /
T02D1414:176a-35: 'di kun rdzob kyi sa bon yungs kar sngom po'i
T02D1414:176a-36: tshad mu rig gi mdog lta bu 'bab par 'gyur
T02D1414:176a-37: ro // de'i rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:176a-38: thabs byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1414:176a-39: shes rab khrag gi thig le la gtum mo srub
T02D1414:176a-40: shing gi 'khor lo'i dbye bas ye shes kyi me
T02D1414:176a-41: 'di 'og sgo dang steng sgo'i las kyi rlung gis
T02D1414:176a-42: bskyod pas / sa'i rlung 'gags pa'i rtags su du ba thul ba dang /
T02D1414:176a-43: me'i rlung 'gags pas gsal bar dka' ba dam tshig
T02D1414:176a-44: gi 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs par ming brtags pa'i
T02D1414:176b-0: rtsa brgyad bsregs / lkog mar rtsa bcu @176b drug
T02D1414:176b-1: gi de bzhin gshegs par grags pa'i longs spyod kyi
T02D1414:176b-3: dbugs 'byung rngub gsum gyis bar du thabs snying ga'i
T02D1414:176b-4: byang chub sems la dbugs 'byung rngub kyis bskor ba
T02D1414:176b-5: byas nas / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu r'a me
T02D1414:176b-6: shva r'i nas zhugs nas rna ba g-yas pa au
T02D1414:176b-7: dya na gyi gnas kyi sgo phye nas spyi bo'i
T02D1414:176b-8: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1414:176b-10: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zhu nas blangs te /
T02D1414:176b-11: spyi gtsug gi bu ga gser gyi sgo dz'a landha ra zhes bya ba'i ming can du zhugs so //
T02D1414:176b-12: de nas so mtshams kyi bu ga nas zhugs nas /
T02D1414:176b-13: lkog ma longs spyod kyi 'khor ngal bsos te /
T02D1414:176b-14: snying ga bsregs pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun dgyes pa bskyed nas /
T02D1414:176b-15: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bha sa nta
T02D1414:176b-16: ti la ka'i rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro
T02D1414:176b-17: // las dang po pa yis 'di'i aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug pa dang mi mthong ste /
T02D1414:176b-18: sgra'i rtse mo brgya stong du gshegs pa'i tshad tsam phra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1414:176b-19: de'i bsam gtan dang po'i lus dga' ba dang yid bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02D1414:176b-20: rnal 'byor pa zab pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom par 'dod pas /
T02D1414:176b-21: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnag gi lha'i sbyor ba thams
T02D1414:176b-22: cad kyi zhabs su thig le stong pa nyid du
T02D1414:176b-24: rdzing bu la rde'u bskyur bskyur bzhin du dbus su
T02D1414:176b-25: bu ga phu gnas rjes su gzhig pa'i stong pa
T02D1414:176b-26: nyid bsgom pa'am / me long la rlangs pa zhu
T02D1414:176b-27: ba'i dpe mtha' nas zad nas dbus su skra'i rtse
T02D1414:176b-28: mo'i tshad tsa du ril por 'dzin pa'i stong nyid
T02D1414:176b-29: nyid bsgom pa'am / bsgom pa ni / thig le
T02D1414:176b-30: de yang bsam gyis mi khyab par bsam mo zhes
T02D1414:176b-31: bya ba gzung par rang bzhin med pa rnam par
T02D1414:176b-32: snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab po //
T02D1414:176b-33: sems nyid rtag par mi bya'o /
T02D1414:176b-34: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba med pas 'bras bu
T02D1414:176b-35: 'dzin pa mi dmigs par bsgom pa mi bskyod pas
T02D1414:176b-37: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na //
T02D1414:176b-38: zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa'i sems kyi stong
T02D1414:176b-39: nyid bla ba'i man ngag gis yid kyi rnam shes
T02D1414:176b-40: kyi nges pa drangs nas rang rig pas stong nyed
T02D1414:176b-41: shes pa ni sa dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi mngon
T02D1414:177a-0: sum yin te / des so so yang dag pa'i rig pa @177a * //
T02D1414:177a-1: bzhi sa bcu gcig gi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:177a-2: des thob pa'i spros med kyi spyod pa ni /
T02D1414:177a-3: lag pa g-yon pas kha tv'am ga zhi gnas gzung /
T02D1414:177a-4: g-yas pas da ma ru shes rab lhag mthong bzung /
T02D1414:177a-5: nyin mo snang ba thams cad dpal la he ru kar mthong //
T02D1414:177a-6: mtshan mo mi snang ba thams cad mkha' 'gro ma shes par spyod pa yin no //
T02D1414:177a-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi sprul pa dag pa ni phag mo /
T02D1414:177a-8: 'dus ma byas dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni shr'i /
T02D1414:177a-9: 'das pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis stong pas na pad ltar
T02D1414:177a-10: gyi sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang bral bas ru
T02D1414:177a-11: / ma 'ongs pa 'khor ba gang du yang mi
T02D1414:177a-12: gnas pas ka / rang gi sems kyi stong nyid
T02D1414:177a-13: shes pa la ngal bso na de las tha dad
T02D1414:177a-14: pa'i chos kyi sku bstan du med do //
T02D1414:177a-15: rnal 'byor pa 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe ji ltar bya snyam na /
T02D1414:177a-16: phet phet kyis he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo spyan drangs nas /
T02D1414:177a-17: snying po'i phyag rgya dang yo ga shuddha'i sngags kyis thugs kar zhugs nas /
T02D1414:177a-18: lha rnams kyis me tog sum cu rtsa gnyis ni gtor /
T02D1414:177a-19: rol mo drug cu rtsa gnyis ni sgrogs /
T02D1414:177a-20: glu drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis mchod /
T02D1414:177a-21: 'jig rten pas 'chi ba zhes bya ba la rnam par rtog pa ni /
T02D1414:177a-22: rnal 'byor ba mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer ro //
T02D1414:177a-26: rjes rnam pa brgyad dang thun mtshams kyi cho ga
T02D1414:177a-27: bcu gnyis dang cas pa zhib mo rnam par 'thag
T02D1414:177a-28: pa don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgrub
T02D1414:177a-29: thabs zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa 'dir yang bsgom
T02D1414:177a-30: par bya'o // le'u bcu bzhi pa ro mnyam gyi 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:177a-32: // / de ltar ro mnyam gyi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:177a-33: drod gsher bskyed la mos pa'i gang zag gi dor /
T02D1414:177a-34: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:177a-40: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms nas nam mkha'i
T02D1414:177a-41: dbus su bhr'um las gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi sgo
T02D1414:177a-42: khyud dang rta babs dang bcas pa rdo rje rab
T02D1414:177a-43: me 'od dang bcas pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:177a-44: de'i dbus su dbyangs yig bcu gnyis kyi yi ge
T02D1414:177b-0: phyi mo las yab yum ri r'i li l'i @177b
T02D1414:177b-1: bzhi las ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi ka nas
T02D1414:177b-2: bh'a'i bar yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi las dpa'
T02D1414:177b-3: bo dang dpa' mo ya ra la wa brgyad las
T02D1414:177b-5: de nas yi ge phyi mo'i dbye bas lha thams
T02D1414:177b-6: cad kyi sngags kyi gnas kyang yi ge phyi mo
T02D1414:177b-7: yin la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun bskyed pa'i gnas yin pa dang /
T02D1414:177b-8: yi ge thams cad kyi khong na yod pas aas
T02D1414:177b-9: 'dus ma byas ston pas chos kyi sku thams cad
T02D1414:177b-11: thams cad mdzad pa'i longs sku dang kun la khyab pa'i sprul sku bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1414:177b-12: thud du drug gi sku gsum bskyed pa'i rgyus sangs
T02D1414:177b-13: rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gdul bya sems cad kun
T02D1414:177b-14: gyi snying la zag pa med pa'i sa bon byang
T02D1414:177b-15: chub kyi snying po gnas so //
T02D1414:177b-16: aom nas aa:'i bar gyi dbyangs yig bcu gnyes ring bo drug pos yum bskyed pa dang /
T02D1414:177b-17: thud du drug gis yab bskyed pa me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid yin no //
T02D1414:177b-18: dbus kyi h'um so sor rtog pa yin no //
T02D1414:177b-19: 'od zer spro ba sdu bya ba nan tan yin no //
T02D1414:177b-22: zla ba'i cha ltar dkar ba /
T02D1414:177b-24: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02D1414:177b-25: yum gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa /
T02D1414:177b-27: bzhi las yum bzhi zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa thams cad dkar ba'o //
T02D1414:177b-28: ka nas dza'i bar du yi ge brgyad pas thugs
T02D1414:177b-29: kyi 'khor la dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D1414:177b-30: bsnams pa'o // dzham nas tam gyis bar du gsung
T02D1414:177b-31: gi 'khor lo dkar po padma dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1414:177b-32: bsnams pa'o // ba'o // tham nas bham bar du
T02D1414:177b-33: sku'i 'khor lo dkar po 'khor lo dang dril bu
T02D1414:177b-34: bsnams pa'o // ba'o // bsnams pa'o // thod pa'i
T02D1414:177b-35: dum bu la sogs pa'i dba' bo nyi shu rtsa
T02D1414:177b-36: bzhi rab gtum ma la sogs ba'i dpa' mo nyi
T02D1414:177b-37: shu rtsa bzhi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum
T02D1414:177b-38: yab yam so sor bsgoms pas thugs kyi rtsibs bcu
T02D1414:177b-39: drug la rdo rjes bskor ba /
T02D1414:177b-40: gsung gi rtsibs bcu drug la padmas bskor ba /
T02D1414:177b-41: sku'i rtsibs bcu drug la 'khor los bskor ba /
T02D1414:177b-42: yab yum gnyis ka'i ring thung gnyis nas ring thung
T02D1414:177b-43: gnyis kyi bar du mi thig le dang bcas pa
T02D1414:177b-44: las bskyed do // ya ra la wa bzhin las
T02D1414:177b-45: khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i sgom bzhi dang sha
T02D1414:178a-1: bzhi las gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1414:178a-2: de thams cad ma'i thig le dang cas ba'o //
T02D1414:178a-3: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha bskyed pa'i sa bon bshad nas /
T02D1414:178a-4: yi ge kshas rdzogs pa'i rim ba ston te /
T02D1414:178a-5: ser sngags kyis ser ba 'bebs pa'am /
T02D1414:178a-6: dug sngags kyis dug gsod pa ltar /
T02D1414:178a-7: kshas gtum mo drod kyi gzugs bskyed pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-8: bde ba shukra'i gzugs 'bebs pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-9: bde ba stod pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-10: dag pa 'jig rten pa thams cad gzigs pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-11: 'gro ba rigs drug gis 'byung ba kun gyi stong nyid rtags pa'i gnas yin zhing /
T02D1414:178a-12: 'byung ba bzhi kun la khyab pa'i rtag tu stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1414:178a-14: gsung gi stong nyid phra ba /
T02D1414:178a-15: thugs kyi stong nyid mi 'gyur ba /
T02D1414:178a-16: de nyid srog gi dbang po de nyid thugs kyi
T02D1414:178a-17: dbang po rang rig pa gson pa'i chos nyid rang
T02D1414:178a-18: gi ngo bo nam mkha' lta bu 'chi ba'i 'od
T02D1414:178a-19: gsal ba'i bdag nyid rtogs na mkhas pas grol ba
T02D1414:178a-20: / ksha de nyid lte ba'i dbus su babs pa
T02D1414:178a-21: las dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang lhan cig skyes
T02D1414:178a-22: / dga' dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi 'od gsal ba skye ba'o //
T02D1414:178a-23: yi ge gcig po kshas rdzogs rin bskyed do //
T02D1414:178a-24: bskyed rim gyi rgyas bshad ni /
T02D1414:178a-25: 'khor lo gsum gyi yab yum so sor gnas pa
T02D1414:178a-26: gsang bas gzhan la mi bstan ro mnyam gyi 'khor
T02D1414:178a-27: lo bzhin du zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i phyag dang
T02D1414:178a-28: phyag mtshan dang ldan pa thams cad kyang dkar po
T02D1414:178a-29: / las kyi rgyal mchog ni dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1414:178a-30: mo'i go cha gnyis de bzhin du lha la bskon
T02D1414:178a-31: / la / sngar bshad pa bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' bcug la dbang bskur la /
T02D1414:178a-32: phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1414:178a-33: dpa' bo nyid shu rtsa bzhi yan lag rnam par dag pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-34: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sems kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:178a-35: sprul ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:178a-36: lugs 'byung lugs bzlog gis bkod la thams cad dkar po /
T02D1414:178a-37: dpa' mo thams cad gri gug dang ka p'a la thogs pa /
T02D1414:178b-0: dpa' bo thams cad rang gi mtshan ma dang dril bu bsnams @178b pa /
T02D1414:178b-1: 'khor lo rim pa gsum la rtsibs bcu drug pa
T02D1414:178b-2: gsum gyi steng du dpa' bo dang dpa' mo so
T02D1414:178b-3: sor dgod par rag snang ba'i thabs dang shes rab
T02D1414:178b-4: gnyis su med par gnas pa sngags bzlas pa dang
T02D1414:178b-6: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D1414:178b-8: snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02D1414:178b-10: kun du spyod pa kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:178b-11: rdo rje snying po dang dpa' bo rnams dang /
T02D1414:178b-12: rnal 'byor ma sba zhing gsang ba gsungs so //
T02D1414:178b-13: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad 'dir yang bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:178b-16: // / de ltar yig 'bru las bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1414:178b-17: so so'i skye bo las dang po'i ston par bzhed pas /
T02D1414:178b-18: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:178b-19: zhes bya'o las dang po pa'i bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:178b-20: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga byas nas 'byung
T02D1414:178b-21: ba bzhi dang ri rab kyi steng bu bh'um gyur
T02D1414:178b-22: pa las gzhal yas khang bskyed pa de'i dbus su
T02D1414:178b-23: nyi zla kha sbyor gyi dbus nas yi ge h'um
T02D1414:178b-24: las mngon byang lnga'i rim pas skad cig gis sa
T02D1414:178b-25: dgu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa mchog gsungs pa
T02D1414:178b-26: yin no zhes pa mdor bstan to //
T02D1414:178b-28: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa /
T02D1414:178b-30: dpa' bo g-yas brkyang gnas pa ste //
T02D1414:178b-32: gnyis su med par mnyam ldan pas //
T02D1414:178b-33: rjes su chags pas bde ba'o //
T02D1414:178b-34: zhes bya ba'i bar du dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:178b-35: las rgyal mchog ni ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1414:178b-36: zhes bya ba go cha bskon nas ye shes sems
T02D1414:178b-37: dpa' bcug la gcig tu thim pas ye shes sems
T02D1414:178b-38: dpa' de thob pas chos kyi rol bas 'khor lo
T02D1414:178b-39: thams cad dang ro gcig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:178b-40: de nas dbang bskur ba'i lha spyan drangs nas dbang bskur ro //
T02D1414:178b-43: snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo dam pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:178b-44: de nas bzlas pa ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo
T02D1414:178b-45: thams cad kyi ming gi thog mar aom dang tha
T02D1414:178b-46: mar h'um h'um phat dang bcas pas bzlas par bya
T02D1414:178b-47: / yab yum gyi snying po dang nye snying ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:179a-1: bsu ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02D1414:179a-2: baspu'i khung bu'i rtse mo nas lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor lo spros nas /
T02D1414:179a-3: re res kyang rang rnag gi 'khor lo spros pas
T02D1414:179a-4: thug med kyi chos kyi longs spyod kyi sems can
T02D1414:179a-6: 'gro ba rigs drug bsgral nas bde mchog gi go
T02D1414:179a-7: 'phang bla na med pa'i gnas su gzhag bar bya'o
T02D1414:179a-8: // sngags pas rgyas pa la dga' na /
T02D1414:179a-9: rigs lnga'i 'khor lo'i dbus su bde mchog bzhugs pa spro pa'am /
T02D1414:179a-10: yang na dpral ba las sku /
T02D1414:179a-12: snying ga nas thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum po 'ga' zhig spro bsdu'i dbye ba gnyis bya'o //
T02D1414:179a-14: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs bsgoms te /
T02D1414:179a-15: zhal dang phyag nyung ba las dang bo yin no //
T02D1414:179a-18: // / dbang po rtul po'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:179a-19: dbang po 'bring po zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa rdo rje snying po rab tu bshad pa ste /
T02D1414:179a-20: dbang po 'bring gi rnam par bsgom //
T02D1414:179a-21: zhes pa ni mdor bstan to //
T02D1414:179a-22: rgyas bshad ni tshad med pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba lnga bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:179a-23: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna chogs rdo rje dang /
T02D1414:179a-24: bh'um las gyur pa las gzhal yas khang bskyed la
T02D1414:179a-25: lha rnams mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas
T02D1414:179a-26: skad cig gis bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gtso bo rnam
T02D1414:179a-29: zhal bzhi ba la phyag bzhi ba //
T02D1414:179a-31: dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'dod pas khyab //
T02D1414:179a-32: chags pa'i mig gis rnam par blta //
T02D1414:179a-34: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi phyag dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:179a-35: las kyi rgyal mchog gi sngar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du go cha bskon pa dang /
T02D1414:179a-36: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:179a-39: gsang sngags dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rang gi ming nas brjod pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:179a-40: yab yum gyi sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:179a-41: las rgyas mchog gi rgyas bshad ni /
T02D1414:179a-42: dngos po kun gyi de ltar zhes bya ba dkyil
T02D1414:179a-43: 'khor rgyal mchog gi lha thams cad la bltas nas
T02D1414:179b-0: ye shes 'khor lo la bltas @179b te phyag 'tshal mchod pa bya /
T02D1414:179b-2: dam tshig sems dpa' dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D1414:179b-3: thod pa bzhi las bdud rtsi mchog yin gyis brlabs nas tshim par bya /
T02D1414:179b-4: ye shes kyi bzlas pa'i spro bsdu bya /
T02D1414:179b-5: sku gsungs thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pas spro bsdu byas pa'i rjes la /
T02D1414:179b-6: ngag gis bzlas pa bya yin no //
T02D1414:179b-8: 'dir yang zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i sgrub thabs yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa rtsa brgyad bsgoms la /
T02D1414:179b-9: zhal dang phyag nyung bas dbang po 'bring bo'i sgom pa yin no //
T02D1414:179b-12: // / de ltar dbang po 'bring po'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:179b-13: dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa bstan to /
T02D1414:179b-14: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:179b-16: dgos pa ni ba dang po rnon po'i sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyar /
T02D1414:179b-17: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa bshad do //
T02D1414:179b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyar na dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:179b-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
T02D1414:179b-20: dbang po 'bring po'i ni lam shes pa nyid yin
T02D1414:179b-21: la / dbang rtul po'i ni kun shes pa yin
T02D1414:179b-22: te / tshigs bcad gnyis bo de ni mdor bstan pa yin no //
T02D1414:179b-23: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga rdzogs nas /
T02D1414:179b-24: ldang ba'i rnal 'byor 'byung ba bzhi'i ri rab dang
T02D1414:179b-25: bcas pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang padma bskyed la
T02D1414:179b-26: / de'i lteng du a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba
T02D1414:179b-27: dpal he ru ka'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
T02D1414:179b-28: pa'i gzhal yas khang dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa
T02D1414:179b-29: rdo rje ra ba me 'od kyis bskor ba rdzus
T02D1414:179b-31: mgon po zhal gsum pa ni rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
T02D1414:179b-32: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug /'khor
T02D1414:179b-33: thams cad kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog
T02D1414:179b-34: dang phyag mtshan ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad
T02D1414:179b-35: do // gtso bo bskyed pa ni bsnyen pa /
T02D1414:179b-37: lus dkyil 'khor bsgur ba pa ni kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:179b-38: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ma lus par bsgoms na /
T02D1414:179b-39: las kyi mchog 'di ni go cha bskon la ye
T02D1414:179b-40: shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas mchod yon dang me
T02D1414:179b-41: tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:179b-42: nang gi bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:180a-0: dbang bskur nas ro gcig par bsgom @180a * //
T02D1414:180a-2: srog dang rtsol ba dbugs 'byung rngub bkag la shes
T02D1414:180a-3: shes kyi bzlas pa'i lha'i sbyor ba'i spro bsdu bsgom
T02D1414:180a-4: pa dang / bdud rtsi lngas lha thams cad la mchog pa dang /
T02D1414:180a-5: 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi ngag gi bzlas pa khro
T02D1414:180a-6: bo 'brug sgra lta mu'i tshig gi bzlas pa bya'o
T02D1414:180a-7: // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bzlas pa yang lha so sor mnyam par bzhag la /
T02D1414:180a-8: shes rab dang thabs kyi bzlas pa dang bo dang
T02D1414:180a-9: dpa' mo so so'i nga ro kha nas mgal me'i
T02D1414:180a-10: 'khor lo ltar bzlas na mngon sum du lha mthong
T02D1414:180a-11: nas mchog gi dngos grub stsol lo //
T02D1414:180a-12: bzlas pa'i sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:180a-13: bsgom pa dang bzlas pas du ba na /
T02D1414:180a-15: dal bsos nas lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1414:180a-19: dang po sbyor ba gnyis dang /
T02D1414:180a-23: thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor don bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1414:180a-24: mngal skyes la don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:180a-25: rdzus skyes kyang rgyu'i he ru ka zhub dang /
T02D1414:180a-26: glus bskul ba med kyang mngon bar byang chub pa lnga phye bas grangs mnyam pa yin no //
T02D1414:180a-27: de ltar zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom mo /
T02D1414:180a-30: // / dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:180a-31: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa'i phag mo kun gzugs 'chad pas /
T02D1414:180a-32: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:180a-34: mdor bsdus rnal 'byor sngom pa ste //
T02D1414:180a-35: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo lnga mdor bsdus nas
T02D1414:180a-36: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gyi sngom
T02D1414:180a-37: pa gsungs te / phag mo kun gzugs ni 'khor
T02D1414:180a-38: lo lnga'i lha sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam bar sbyor
T02D1414:180a-39: ba mkha' 'gro ma'i sngom pa'i mchog ston pa ni
T02D1414:180a-40: pa gsungs te / mdor bstan to // rgyas bshad
T02D1414:180a-41: ni sngon 'gro lnga dang ldad pa'i rnal 'byor bdun
T02D1414:180a-42: rdzogs nas rdzus skyes kyi skad cig rnam pa rten
T02D1414:180a-43: dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor cig car spro ba yin
T02D1414:180a-44: pa gsungs te / mdor bstan to // no //
T02D1414:180a-45: padma'i dbus su s'a li k'a li mngon par byang
T02D1414:180a-46: chub pa'i rim pa lnga las he ru ka zhal
T02D1414:180a-47: bzhi pa phyag bcu pa dbus sngo ba /
T02D1414:180b-2: steng gi zhal dkar po zhi ba'o //
T02D1414:180b-3: drug pa thod pa'i cod pa na la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1414:180b-4: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D1414:180b-5: mnyam par ldan bas phag mo'i sku rtsa btsir ba
T02D1414:180b-6: / g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga //
T02D1414:180b-7: g-yas gnyis na zhags pa dang lcags kyu /
T02D1414:180b-8: phyag gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i pags ba bsnams pa /
T02D1414:180b-9: gnyis kyi cang te'u dang tshangs pa'i mgo bos chos
T02D1414:180b-10: kyi sgras rab tu 'gengs pa ste phyag bcu yin
T02D1414:180b-11: no // phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma yin no //
T02D1414:180b-12: 'khor gyi lha mo bzhi ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad
T02D1414:180b-13: pa g-yon na cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga /
T02D1414:180b-14: g-yas na rdo rje mdung thung /
T02D1414:180b-15: gnyis kyis mi lpags bsnams pa /
T02D1414:180b-16: gnyis kyi dril bu dang cang te'u /
T02D1414:180b-17: gnyis kyis mgo bo dang gri khug bsnams ba ste /
T02D1414:180b-19: g-yer ka'i skra sgrogs ska rags ldan //
T02D1414:180b-20: zhes bya ba nas thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas
T02D1414:180b-21: zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog rdzogs nas dpa' bo
T02D1414:180b-22: dang dpa' mo'i go cha bskon pa /
T02D1414:180b-23: mtshan dang dpe byad can gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
T02D1414:180b-24: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la dbang bskur nas /
T02D1414:180b-25: ye shes kyi bzlas pa'i spro bsdu dang dag gis bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1414:180b-26: sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1414:180b-27: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa rim pas bdud rtsi myang
T02D1414:180b-28: ba'i dam tshig gi sngom pa la gnas pa'i phyir
T02D1414:180b-29: / sgron ma sha lnga bza' zhing gnas dur khrod du rtag tu bzlas pa ba'o //
T02D1414:180b-31: mtshan mo bdun gyis sbyor ba yis //
T02D1414:180b-32: phag mo kun gzugs bsgom pa nas //
T02D1414:180b-33: bdud bzhis mi 'jigs pa'i dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:180b-35: gong du smos pa'i zhal brgyad phyag stong yod pa bsgoms te /
T02D1414:180b-36: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi dang dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhal /
T02D1414:180b-37: bum pa bzhi rig bzhi'i zhal te /
T02D1414:180b-38: dpa' bo rnams kyi zhal sum cu rtsa gnyis rim pa brgyad du brtsegs pa dang /
T02D1414:180b-39: de'i steng du lha mo sum cu rtsa drug dur khrod brgyad kyi zhal dang /
T02D1414:180b-40: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang bdun cu rtsa drug yin la /
T02D1414:180b-41: bong bu'i he ru ka'i rnams sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D1414:180b-42: 'khor lo dud 'gro'i zhal nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste
T02D1414:180b-43: / brgya tham pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02D1414:181a-1: ldan 'das kyi phyag bcu gnyis dang yum gyi phyag
T02D1414:181a-2: gnyis dang bcu bzhi mngal skyes ldan dang sgong skyes
T02D1414:181a-3: lnga'i phyag mtshan dpa' bo dang dpa' mo drug cu
T02D1414:181a-4: tshan bcu dang / rdzus skyes dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1414:181a-5: mo drug cu'i phyag mtshan dang drod gsher skyes dpa'
T02D1414:181a-6: bo dang dpa' mo drug cu'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D1414:181a-7: bong bu'i he ru ka'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
T02D1414:181a-8: 'khor lo lha drag cu'i phyag mtshan dang sgyu 'phul
T02D1414:181a-9: dra ba'i lha drug cu dang /
T02D1414:181a-10: so sor 'brang ma'i lha dgu phyis 'byung ba'i dkyil
T02D1414:181a-11: 'khor gsum dang bcas pa'i phyag mtshan phyag stong yin
T02D1414:181a-13: sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che //
T02D1414:181a-14: rnal 'byor pa ni mi snang bzhugs //
T02D1414:181a-15: zhes pas thabs mi snang ba dang /
T02D1414:181a-16: bza' ba dang bza' min bdud rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1414:181a-17: bza' ba dang btung pa dang /
T02D1414:181a-18: btung min byin gyis brlabs nas btung ba dang phyogs
T02D1414:181a-19: kyi gos can gyi gar gyis myos shing smyos pa
T02D1414:181a-20: lta bur bsgoms na so so'i skye bos grib ma
T02D1414:181a-21: yang mi mthong bar rnal 'byor chen po sa steng
T02D1414:181a-22: na spyod do // shin tu spros med kyi rnal
T02D1414:181a-23: 'byor ma bas ma h'a ru ti r'a bdud rtsi
T02D1414:181a-24: na spyod do // lnga dang / zas kyi lhag ma dri chen dang /
T02D1414:181a-25: dri chu dang ldan pa'i sha sna tshogs pa sems rtse gcig pas bza' ste /
T02D1414:181a-26: nang gi bdag nyid sgyu ma dang 'od gsal dang
T02D1414:181a-27: zung 'jug gi sbyor pas nyin mo rtag tu gsang
T02D1414:181a-28: bas mtshan mo gnas par bya'o //
T02D1414:181a-29: de lta bu'i spyod pa'i dgos pa ci zhen /
T02D1414:181a-30: mnyam bar ma bzhag pa'i spros bcas dang spros med
T02D1414:181a-31: kyi spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ye shes yi shes
T02D1414:181a-32: kyi mig la sogs ba mngon par shes pa drug
T02D1414:181a-34: las dang po pa yin na zhib mo rnam par
T02D1414:181a-35: 'thag par yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom mchog
T02D1414:181a-36: tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin na mngon par
T02D1414:181a-37: byang chub pa lnga'i rim ba'i dang po sbyor bas
T02D1414:181a-38: / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi snod bcud cig car skyes la /
T02D1414:181a-39: las kyi rgyal mchog gi go cha bskon /
T02D1414:181a-42: bsgom pa'i tshe na spros bcas kyi spyod pa'am /
T02D1414:181a-44: shin tu spros med kyi spyod pas gnas pas bza'
T02D1414:181a-45: btung thams cad bdud rtsir 'gyur la ngag tu bzlas
T02D1414:181b-0: par 'gyur la / lag pa dang rkang pa'i phyag rgya ji snying gar gyi mchod pa @181b dang /
T02D1414:181b-2: dngos rjes kyi bsgom pa la tha dad med /
T02D1414:181b-3: gzhal yas khang dang stod gsum la tha dad med /
T02D1414:181b-4: 'gro ba drug dang lha'i 'khor lo la tha dad
T02D1414:181b-5: med par ye shes kyi mig gis mthong pa yin
T02D1414:181b-6: no // le'u bcu dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:181b-8: // / de ltar rdo rje phag mo kun gzugs bshad
T02D1414:181b-9: nas he ru ka phyag 'bum pa bsgom pa 'chad
T02D1414:181b-10: pa ni / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:181b-13: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'bum pa las rtsa ba
T02D1414:181b-14: thams cad tshar bar bsdus pa'i phyir 'di'i don rgyas
T02D1414:181b-15: par der ston pas na 'di nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1414:181b-16: yang dag pa'o // de'i phyir zhabs nas rgyud gzhan yan lag rgyud du zad ces gsungs so //
T02D1414:181b-17: chog bzang po gzhan du ste //
T02D1414:181b-18: zhes bya ba ni ro langs bsgrub pas gal te bgegs kyis 'jigs na /
T02D1414:181b-19: chog bzang po phyis 'chad pa'i zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug pa'am /
T02D1414:181b-20: yang na zhal bcu gnyis pa phyag nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'am /
T02D1414:181b-21: yang na zhal nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa /
T02D1414:181b-22: phyag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'am /
T02D1414:181b-23: yang na sna tshogs pa'i dud 'gro'i zhal can nam mkha' lding gi zhal nyi shu rtsa lnga pa /
T02D1414:181b-24: dud 'gro rkang bzhi pa'i seng gi la sogs pa'i zhal nyi shu rtsa lnga ste lnga bcu /
T02D1414:181b-25: phyag brgya phrag bcu yin no //
T02D1414:181b-26: yang na zhal stong yin te /
T02D1414:181b-27: rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02D1414:181b-28: sems dpa' nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1414:181b-29: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D1414:181b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02D1414:181b-36: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02D1414:181b-38: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
T02D1414:181b-39: zhal dang dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa zhal
T02D1414:181b-41: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyud sde bzhi'i lha tshogs kyi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1414:181b-42: 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'i 'gro ba rigs drug
T02D1414:181b-43: sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa phyag na bsnams pa
T02D1414:181b-44: dang / gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun /
T02D1414:181b-45: gzugs med mu bzhi'i lha phyag tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1414:181b-46: rig pa'i gnas lnga sgyu rtsal bco brgyad phag na bsnams pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-1: dang g-yon brkyang 'chol bar bzhugs pas 'jigs byed dang
T02D1414:182a-2: dus mtshan la sogs pa drag po 'jigs byed drug
T02D1414:182a-4: tshangs pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lhas bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-5: dbang po nye dbang gis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-6: drag po rtse gsum 'chang gis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-7: khyab 'jug lha ma yin gyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-8: kun 'gyed gzhon nu nam mkha' lding gis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-9: k'arti ka rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lhas bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-10: nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-11: dga' byed dbang phyug dri za'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-12: gshin rje mkha' 'gro mas bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-14: nyi ma dang zla ba gza' brgyad dang /
T02D1414:182a-15: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-16: 'chi bdag gi bdud dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-17: phung bo'i bdud nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-18: lha'i bu'i bdud gdon stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:182a-19: nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'dod chags khyim bya dang /
T02D1414:182a-21: gti mug phag la sogs pa thams cad kha sbub tu zhabs kyis mnan par blta ste /
T02D1414:182a-22: phyag stong phrag gcig zhal 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-23: phyag stong phrag gcig zhal bzhin 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-27: smin ma bcu ma pas mi sdug pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-28: mchu mnan pas rab tu 'jigs pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-29: spyan gdangs pas dpa' ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-31: lce brkyang bas rngam pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-32: smin ma bsdus pas khro ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-37: rnam par rol pa sna bug du ljags 'jug pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-38: ljags bskyod pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khe pas pa dang /
T02D1414:182a-39: sna tshogs pas ngo mtshar ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-40: mche ba lhag ger byung bas gshe ba dang /
T02D1414:182a-41: phyag stong phrag nyi shu'i zhal rin po che'i rigs /
T02D1414:182a-42: phyag stong phrag nyi shu'i zhal padma'i rigs /
T02D1414:182a-43: phyag stong phrag nyi shu'i zhal las kyi rigs /
T02D1414:182a-44: phyag stong phrag nyi shu'i zhal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02D1414:182a-45: phyag 'bum gyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i nyams kyi mchog
T02D1414:182a-46: gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed ston par mdzad
T02D1414:182b-0: pa yin no // thod @182b pa'i phreng ba stong zla ba phyed pa stong /
T02D1414:182b-1: sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu brgyan pa stong sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan stong /
T02D1414:182b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug na stong /
T02D1414:182b-4: zhabs stong la stag gi pags pa stong las sham thabs byas pa /
T02D1414:182b-5: mgo bo'i phreng ba lnga bcu rtsa gcig gis brgyan pa /
T02D1414:182b-6: phyag rgya drug las spyi gtsug gi rus pa'i 'khor lo stong /
T02D1414:182b-10: thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa 'bum dbung rgyan 'bum /
T02D1414:182b-12: yan lag la sbrul gyi rgyan 'bum /
T02D1414:182b-13: dbu la stong zhabs la stong gi sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1414:182b-14: yum rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1414:182b-15: rdo rje dang thod pas 'khyud pa can no //
T02D1414:182b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu stong gis 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:182b-17: thod pa dang kha t'am ga stong 'dzin pa /
T02D1414:182b-23: me long stong gi bar du stong phrag brgya'i phyag mtshan phyag 'bum gyi phyag rgyas 'dzin pa /
T02D1414:182b-24: cho ga sna tshogs pa'i phyag mtshan re re la
T02D1414:182b-25: 'khyud 'khor re res phrin las re re mdzad do
T02D1414:182b-26: zhes nam mkha' lding gi gdong can gyi le'u sum
T02D1414:182b-27: cu rtsa drug pa las bshad do //
T02D1414:182b-28: 'khor gyi mkha' bgro ma sum cu rtsa drug dpa' bo sum cu rtsa drug dang 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:182b-29: dbu gsum phyag drug sku mdog mtha' yas sna tshogs kyi mdog can /
T02D1414:182b-30: phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa bsgoms par bya'o //
T02D1414:182b-31: 'dod yin gyi snam bu la snang tshogs gar gyi longs spyod cing bdud rtsi lnga'i zad dang /
T02D1414:182b-32: me tog la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pas mchod par bsam mo //
T02D1414:182b-33: mdog sna tshogs pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyi zhing skyong mchog dam pa dang bcas pa /
T02D1414:182b-34: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog sngags pas bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:182b-35: las kyi rgyal mchog gi rnal 'byor ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:182b-39: bsgom pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1414:182b-40: yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dang bsreg pa'i phreng ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1414:182b-41: lha mo rdo rje phag mo yang phyogs kyi gos can /
T02D1414:182b-43: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1414:183a-1: rang bzhin bsgoms nas yab kyi phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02D1414:183a-2: 'bras bu dang bcas pa go sla'o /
T02D1414:183a-3: yum rdo rje phag mo'i sngags ring dang yab kyi rkang pa brgyad pa dang /
T02D1414:183a-4: yum gyi rkang pa brgyad pa yang go sla'o //
T02D1414:183a-5: ldang ba'i tshe a'a li k'a li rdo rje ni /
T02D1414:183a-6: phag mo'i bdag nyid bsgom byas nas// zhes bya ba
T02D1414:183a-7: lha'i 'khor lo thams cad snying gar bcug/ lus kyi
T02D1414:183a-8: zhal stong dang / zhabs stong dang /
T02D1414:183a-10: yum dang snying gar bcug par bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:183a-11: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bdag nyid la mchod nas /
T02D1414:183a-14: rdo rje khrab kyi steng du /
T02D1414:183a-15: zhal zhi ba'i khro bos byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1414:183a-19: a'a na ya ho byang du /
T02D1414:183a-20: yang na khro bo med pa kun rdo rje'i khrab tu bsam mo //
T02D1414:183a-21: de'i lte bar dpal he ru kar bdag nyid bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:183a-22: 'khor sgrub pa'i grogs po thams cad kyang de ltar gnod mdzes kyi khro bos bsrung du gzhug go //
T02D1414:183a-23: de ltar phyag 'bum pa bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:183a-24: mtshan ma thob nas ro langs bsgrub pa'i las tshogs bya ste /
T02D1414:183a-25: gong nas 'byung ba'i ji lta ba'i rim gyi nang
T02D1414:183a-26: du nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i dud 'gro la sogs
T02D1414:183a-27: pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bza' ba bsgrub pas bya ba
T02D1414:183a-28: dang / phyi rol du de bzhin du bde bar
T02D1414:183a-29: gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sdang ba'i le dag dang
T02D1414:183a-30: dang / / dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1414:183a-31: mtshams med pa byed pa dang /
T02D1414:183a-32: sngon slob dpon la smod pa dang theg chen la
T02D1414:183a-33: smod pa'i gro ba'i lingga byas la bsad nas mkha'
T02D1414:183a-34: 'gro ma dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1414:183a-36: 'bras phye'am bag phye srab par blings la glang po che'i sha'am /
T02D1414:183a-39: bya rog chu skyar sbyang ki khrung khrung /
T02D1414:183a-41: nas tsam sran ma tsam du mtshon rnon pos gtubs nas mar la bcos te /
T02D1414:183a-42: tshos pa dang bton nas tsha ba gsum dang mngar gsum dang /
T02D1414:183a-47: li shi dang sug smel dang /
T02D1414:183a-48: rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i phye ma'am lde gus btab nas /
