T02D1414:186b-29: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor mngon du byas nas /
T02D1414:186b-30: 'byung ba bzhi'i ri rab dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang bhr'um las gzhal yas khang bskyed nas /
T02D1414:186b-31: padma'i dbus su zla ba dang /
T02D1414:186b-34: 'od zer spro bsdu gyur ba las bdag nyid dpal
T02D1414:186b-35: he ru ka dpa' bo dang mkha' bgro mas bskor
T02D1414:186b-37: rten dang brten pa'i dang po sbyor ba'o //
T02D1414:186b-38: bcom ldan 'das ksha las skyes pa'i sku mdog dmar po /
T02D1414:186b-39: ye shes lnga las byung ba'i zhal lnga dbus dmar ba /
T02D1414:186b-40: g-yon pa sngo ga rgyab ljang ba /
T02D1414:186b-43: spyan gsum phyag bcu gnyis pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:186b-44: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bshad nas /
T02D1414:186b-46: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:187a-0: nu ma'i bar du ksha las byung ba'i ye shes sems dpa' snga ma'i sku mdog @187a * //
T02D1414:187a-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo //
T02D1414:187a-3: de'i thugs kar dbyangs yig bcu gnyis las byung ba'i
T02D1414:187a-4: zla ba'i steng du dam tshig sems dpa'i la gri
T02D1414:187a-5: bde ba chen bo'i zhes ming 'dogs pa thams cad
T02D1414:187a-6: mkhyen pa'i ye shes las byung bar bsam mo //
T02D1414:187a-7: de'i mgo bor aom las sku'i 'khor lo /
T02D1414:187a-8: lkog mar gsung gi 'khor lo snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:187a-9: 'od zer spro bsdu snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02D1414:187a-10: sngags kyi de nyid 'di ru bzlas te /
T02D1414:187a-11: aom zhes bya ba nas aom a'a:hu'm zhes bya ba'i
T02D1414:187a-12: bar du bcom ldan 'das ni dbyangs yig dang ksha
T02D1414:187a-14: yum gyi snying po yang de bzhin no //
T02D1414:187a-15: lha mo bzhi ni ma ning gi yi ge bzhi las skyes pa'o //
T02D1414:187a-16: dpa' bo rnams ni bha'i bar gsal byed kyi yi ge las skyes pa'i sa bon dang /
T02D1414:187a-18: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni ming mtshan gyi dang po sa bon dang snying po yin no //
T02D1414:187a-19: sgo ma bzhi ni ya ra la wa bzhi snying po yin no //
T02D1414:187a-20: mtshams ma ni sha sha sa ha bzhi yin no /
T02D1414:187a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1414:187a-22: 'byor ma'i gsang sngags 'di ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:187a-23: dang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ka bskyed pa'i rten
T02D1414:187a-24: yin te / bskyed pa'i sa bon de nyid snying po yin no //
T02D1414:187a-25: thugs dang gsung dang sku dang dam tshig gi lha
T02D1414:187a-26: mo rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rgyud
T02D1414:187a-27: na gsal lo // mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi ni /
T02D1414:187a-28: me long dang dri'i dung chos dang ro'i snod dang
T02D1414:187a-29: reg bya'o gos yid du 'ong ba gri gug spangs
T02D1414:187a-30: pa yin no // nang gi bzhi dang sgo ma rnams ni /
T02D1414:187a-31: g-yon pa thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang dril bu /
T02D1414:187a-32: g-yas pa gri gug dang cang te'u bsnams pa yin no //
T02D1414:187a-34: bstod pa dang gtor ma gtang ba ni kha bskang /
T02D1414:187a-35: yang na sdig pa bshags pa'i thabs gnyis pa ye
T02D1414:187a-36: shes kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas yab yum bcu sku
T02D1414:187a-37: gsung thugs kyi sems dpa' dang sems ma nyi shu
T02D1414:187a-38: dam tshig gi 'khor lo khro bo sna tshogs pa
T02D1414:187a-40: yang na gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa nya tshe
T02D1414:187b-0: drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi @187b 'khor
T02D1414:187b-1: lo la sdig pa bshags pa'o //
T02D1414:187b-2: yang na ma mo sum cu rtsa drug gi //
T02D1414:187b-3: gtso mo 'od zer can la mos pa skul byed
T02D1414:187b-4: ma la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1414:187b-5: phyin pa la mos pas gtso mo byas la lha
T02D1414:187b-6: mo'i dkyil 'khor la sdig pa bshags so //
T02D1414:187b-7: 'khor sna tshogs su ci'i phyir snang zhe ma gang
T02D1414:187b-8: dang gang la mos pa mi rnams yid de dang
T02D1414:187b-9: de la sbyor sa nor bu sna tshogs pa'i mchog
T02D1414:187b-10: shel yin no // yang na sdig pa bshags pa'i
T02D1414:187b-11: thabs lnga ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D1414:187b-12: dpa' zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'khor nams kyang zhal
T02D1414:187b-13: gcig phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyis 'gro
T02D1414:187b-14: ba dad pa'i gnas su gyur pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D1414:187b-15: pas sems can gyi don thams cad mdzad pa /
T02D1414:187b-16: kun la khyab pa'i bde ba chen po chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1414:187b-17: dkyil 'khor 'di yang zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa
T02D1414:187b-18: yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgrub
T02D1414:187b-20: le'u nyi shu gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:187b-22: // / de ltar sdig pa bshags pa'i 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:187b-23: go cha drug gi 'khor lo bshad par bzhed nas /
T02D1414:187b-24: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:187b-26: rigs drug gi mkha' 'gro bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bsrung ba'i don du gsungs so //
T02D1414:187b-27: rgyas par phyin rigs du ma rnam pa brgyar bshad
T02D1414:187b-28: pa'i las mdor bsdus nas sku gsung thugs kyi rigs
T02D1414:187b-29: gsum mam / ye shes lnga'i rigs lnga'i rgyud sde bzhi las bshad pa yin la /
T02D1414:187b-30: gdul bya khams gsum ma lus pa'i srog chags rnams
T02D1414:187b-31: kyang rigs drug gi bag chags las 'byung ba'i kun
T02D1414:187b-32: rigs drug tu yang dag par 'byung ba yin no
T02D1414:187b-34: dang po 'khor rnams kyi gleng bslang ba ni /
T02D1414:187b-35: de nas rigs kyi yum sangs rgyas spyan ma la
T02D1414:187b-36: sogs pa yum thams cad dbang bo drug bde ba'i
T02D1414:187b-37: dga' ba dang / yul drug bde ba'i mgu ba dang /
T02D1414:187b-38: rnam par shes pa drug bde ba'i rangs pa dang /
T02D1414:187b-39: 'dus ma byas rtogs pa'i yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:187b-40: de nas sdud pa rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D1414:187b-41: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga dang 'byung ba bzhi dang /
T02D1414:188a-0: ring ba dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang gzhal yas khang bskyed pas dbus @188a * //
T02D1414:188a-1: su dang po sbyor ba'i sa bon 'khor lo'i lte
T02D1414:188a-2: bar bam 'khor lo'i rtsibs lnga la h'um bhr'um aam
T02D1414:188a-3: tram kham sngags 'di gsungs pas sod kyi 'jig rten
T02D1414:188a-4: rab tu g-yo zhing sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa
T02D1414:188a-6: rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las mi
T02D1414:188a-7: 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i rigs lnga dang rdo rje
T02D1414:188a-8: sems dpa' dang drug bskyed par grags so //
T02D1414:188a-9: de la lnga ni mkha' 'gro he ru ka zhes bya ba la /
T02D1414:188a-10: drug pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D1414:188a-11: pa spangs pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo zhes grags so
T02D1414:188a-12: // de ltar mtshan bshad nas sku mdog bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:188a-13: nam mkha'i mdog ces bya ba nas /
T02D1414:188a-14: zla ba'i 'ong dang 'dra ba'i cad bya ba'i bar ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:188a-15: thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
T02D1414:188a-16: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1414:188a-17: cod pa na rus pa'i rgyu las byas pa'i phreng
T02D1414:188a-18: ba can gdan glang po che dang seng ge la
T02D1414:188a-20: phyag rgya rdo rjes la reg pa langs nas /
T02D1414:188a-21: dkyil 'khor drug bri bar bya zhes pa'i bar du gdan dang phyag mtshan bshad nas /
T02D1414:188a-22: rten gyas dkyil 'khor ston pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i dbus su /
T02D1414:188a-23: shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rjes bskor ba de bzhin
T02D1414:188a-24: du rtsibs gnyis pa la 'khor los gsum pa la
T02D1414:188a-25: rin po ches / bzhi pa la padmas /
T02D1414:188a-26: lnga pa la sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:188a-27: dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas bskor pa'i dkyil 'khol drug rnam par dgod do //
T02D1414:188a-28: dkyil 'khor drug la gnas nyi shu rtsa ba zhing
T02D1414:188a-29: dgod pa ni dbus kyi rdo rje sems dpa' bde
T02D1414:188a-30: ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs la gnas bzhis
T02D1414:188a-32: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:188a-33: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni lte ba'i gnas bzhis bzhis bskor bas gnyis pa ste /
T02D1414:188a-34: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:188a-35: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor la zhing dang nye
T02D1414:188a-36: ba'i zhing gis bskor bas gsum pa 'od byed pa'o
T02D1414:188a-37: // padma mkha' 'gro'i rtsibs bzhi pa la tshando ha dang /
T02D1414:188a-38: nye ba'i tshando ha ni lhas bskor bas bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'o //
T02D1414:188a-39: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rtsibs bzhi la 'du ba dang
T02D1414:188a-40: nye ba'i la dus pa'i lhas bskor ba sa lnga
T02D1414:188a-41: ba sbyang dka' ba'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:188b-0: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i rtsibs bzhi la dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod @188b kyi lhas bskor ba /
T02D1414:188b-1: sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1414:188b-2: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan thams cad ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:188b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du panytsa r'a ga ni yi dags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1414:188b-4: 'khor lo drug po de'i rgyab kyi zur bzhi la
T02D1414:188b-5: sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yum bzhi dgod do
T02D1414:188b-6: // bum pa bzhi dang thod pa bzhi ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su dgod /
T02D1414:188b-7: yum bzhi ni sa'i lha mo bzhi yin pa dang /
T02D1414:188b-8: mtshams kyi lha mo sgom dang bcas pa ni rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:188b-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyal mchog bshad nas /
T02D1414:188b-10: las kyi rgyal mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan
T02D1414:188b-11: drangs thugs gnas nu ma'i bar du bzhugs par lta'o
T02D1414:188b-12: // ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:188b-13: go cha dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:188b-15: bsgoms pa'i thugs kar h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:188b-16: nu ma'i bar du bam las ye shes kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:188b-17: lkog mar a'a las gsung gi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:188b-18: srog dang rtsol ba las dbugs 'byung rngub dang bcas pa spro bsdu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:188b-19: gtso bo lha lnga sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i steng du /
T02D1414:188b-20: rang gi nu ma'i bar du rang gi ye shes
T02D1414:188b-21: sems dpa' sa bon dang bcas pa bzhi bsgom par
T02D1414:188b-22: bya'o // ngag gi gsang sngags gsungs pa ni rgyud na gsal lo //
T02D1414:188b-23: 'khor kun gyis gsang sngags ni gtso bo dang 'khor
T02D1414:188b-24: gyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo bzhi bzhi mkha' 'gro
T02D1414:188b-26: yang na spro ba sdu mi bya bar dam tshig chen po /
T02D1414:188b-27: kha sbyor ba yis yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi
T02D1414:188b-28: zhal du thams cad kyi dam tshig dang shes rab
T02D1414:188b-29: kyi dam tshig mchog tu gyur pas gnyis su med
T02D1414:188b-30: pa'i sbyor ngas mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bzlas
T02D1414:188b-31: nas 'khor los sgyur ba drug gis dngos grub 'thob
T02D1414:188b-32: bo // yang rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su rnam
T02D1414:188b-33: snang la sogs pa'i rigs drug gang la dang pa'i
T02D1414:188b-34: rnal 'byor pas dbus su bzhag pas gnas la sogs
T02D1414:188b-35: pas bskor bas dkyil 'khor drug tu 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1414:188b-36: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma'i bka' dang /
T02D1414:188b-37: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma brgyud pas rigs drug tu 'gyur gyi /
T02D1414:188b-38: gzhan du na sngags pa rigs drug so so la
T02D1414:188b-39: dad kyang gtso bo gang gzhag pa mi 'gegs pas
T02D1414:189a-1: bka'i snang ba yang mi 'thob bo //
T02D1414:189a-2: 'di la yang bstod pa dang mchod pa dang gtor ma gtang ba kha ba skad do //
T02D1414:189a-3: zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa sgrub pa'i thabs yan
T02D1414:189a-4: lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa 'di yang
T02D1414:189a-5: bsgom par bya'o // le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1414:189a-8: // / de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la phyir bzlog gi 'chi bdag gi bdud las bsrungs /
T02D1414:189a-9: sdig ba zad pa'i 'khor los nyon mongs pa'i bdud las bsrungs /
T02D1414:189a-10: go cha'i 'khor los phung po dang lha'i bdud las bsrungs nas /
T02D1414:189a-11: mchod pa'i 'khor lo bstan par bzhed pas /
T02D1414:189a-12: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:189a-14: rnal 'byor gyi lam mchod pa'i 'khor lo rnyed par
T02D1414:189a-15: dka' bas rnal 'byor ma yab yum sbyor pa'i rkyen
T02D1414:189a-16: gnas kyi snying po las mngal skyes kyi gnas kyi
T02D1414:189a-17: rim pa 'khor rnams skad cig gis skur 'byung /
T02D1414:189a-18: skad cig gis phyag mtshan dang rgyan gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1414:189a-20: rgyas par bshad pa ni dang por sngon 'gro lnga dang /
T02D1414:189a-21: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal
T02D1414:189a-22: yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i dus su rgyu'i he
T02D1414:189a-23: ru ka mngon par byang chub pa lngas rdo rje
T02D1414:189a-25: mngal skyes kyi mchod pa'i 'khor spros nas /
T02D1414:189a-26: bde ba chen po bla na med par rgyu'i he ru ka yab yum zhu ba dang /
T02D1414:189a-27: de la 'khor gyi lha mo dang /
T02D1414:189a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1414:189a-29: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis gsol ba 'debs shing glus bskul ba ni /
T02D1414:189a-30: khro bo bde ba dgyes pa yis //
T02D1414:189a-31: bde ba'i longs spyod las byung ba //
T02D1414:189a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad drug gis glus bskul ba ni phyi nas ston to /
T02D1414:189a-33: thigs le de yongs su gyur pa las 'bras bu'i
T02D1414:189a-34: he ru ka de'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rim
T02D1414:189a-35: pas skad cig gis zar ma'i me tog lta bu
T02D1414:189a-36: kha dog sngo skya 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
T02D1414:189a-37: pa'i phyag / ye shes bzhi'i zhal zhes bya ba
T02D1414:189a-38: nas / lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan bzhugs //
T02D1414:189a-39: zhes bya ba'i bar gtso bo yab yum bskyed pa bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1414:189a-41: mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod //
T02D1414:189b-1: byang chub sems kyis rab gang ba //
T02D1414:189b-3: ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:189b-4: phyi rol gyi 'khor lo gsum la thugs kyi 'khor lo la kee ri la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D1414:189b-5: gsung gi 'khor lo pi wang ma la sogs pa brgyad ni /
T02D1414:189b-6: lag pa g-yon pa'i tshul can ni /
T02D1414:189b-7: so'i phreng ba thogs pa'i bzhad pa ma'o //
T02D1414:189b-8: rdo rje dril bu'i tshul can ni sgeg mo'o //
T02D1414:189b-9: khar khrol gyi tshul can ni glu mkhan ma'o //
T02D1414:189b-10: padma'i gar bskor ba'i tshul can ni gar ma'o //
T02D1414:189b-11: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1414:189b-13: sku'i 'khor lo'i me tog ma la sogs pa brgyad zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
T02D1414:189b-14: g-yas pas me tog dang bdug pa dang /
T02D1414:189b-15: mar me dang byug pa dang /
T02D1414:189b-16: mtshams su me long dad ro'i snod dang /
T02D1414:189b-18: chos kyi dbyings gru gsum pa thogs pa /
T02D1414:189b-19: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis cang te'u dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma'o //
T02D1414:189b-20: bsgoms bzhin dang mtshams kyi lha mo ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:189b-22: sgrub pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni snying gar nu
T02D1414:189b-23: ma'i bar du ye shes sems dpa' lha mo bcu
T02D1414:189b-25: dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo dkar po /
T02D1414:189b-26: lkog mar gsung gi 'khor mo dmar po /
T02D1414:189b-27: snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo sngon po /
T02D1414:189b-28: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad zhal gcig phyag
T02D1414:189b-29: gnyis pa man dag gis rjes la bsgom pa ni
T02D1414:189b-30: sgrub pa'o // sgrub pa chen po las kyi rgyal mchog ni /
T02D1414:189b-31: snying ga'i padma dang zla ba dang h'um gi 'od
T02D1414:189b-32: zer lcags kyu lta bus ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1414:189b-33: bkug la / phyag 'tshal mchod pa dang bstod pa'i
T02D1414:189b-34: rjes la dbang bskur nas gcig tu gyur pas bsam
T02D1414:189b-35: bkug la / mo // de'i rjes la bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:189b-36: spro bsdu ye shes kyi bzlas pa srog rtsol dbugs rngub pa dang bsgrags nas /
T02D1414:189b-37: dpral ba nas sku'i 'khor lo spro ba dang /
T02D1414:189b-38: lkog ma'i a'a:las gsung gi 'khor lo spro ba dang /
T02D1414:189b-39: snying gar h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo spro ba dang /
T02D1414:189b-40: nu ma'i par gyi h'um las lha mo bcu gnyis spro ba dang /
T02D1414:189b-41: ngag gi bzlas pa'i sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:190a-0: bzlas pas skyo na bum pa bzhi'i bdud rtsi'i @190a * //
T02D1414:190a-2: thabs rang du sbas pa'i shes rab kyi lha mor
T02D1414:190a-3: rang snang ba'i thabs dang rig pa'i lus gnyis su
T02D1414:190a-4: med pa gdul bya 'gro ba gsum po mchod pa'i
T02D1414:190a-8: snying ga thugs la bsdu nas /
T02D1414:190a-10: mi rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad lha'i 'khor lor blta bar bya ba ni /
T02D1414:190a-12: dkyil 'khor ni mang la skyes yin pas rgyu'i he
T02D1414:190a-13: ru ka zhu ba las dam tshig can 'bras bu'i
T02D1414:190a-14: he ru ka langs pa'i dus su /
T02D1414:190a-16: khro bo'i bde ba dgyes pa yi //
T02D1414:190a-17: zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig ye shes kyi lha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa'i glu yin no //
T02D1414:190a-18: bde chen bde bza'i gar gyis rol //
T02D1414:190a-20: a'a ralli ho zhes pa'i bar gyi ni thugs kyi
T02D1414:190a-21: 'khor lo'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma'i glu'o
T02D1414:190a-22: // rab dgyes mgon po dgyes bzhugs mdzod //
T02D1414:190a-23: ces pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gi 'khor lo'i pi wang ma la sogs pa bzhi'i glu'o //
T02D1414:190a-24: thar pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i khyon //
T02D1414:190a-25: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gcig ni me tog ma la sogs pa lha mo brgyad kyi glu'o //
T02D1414:190a-26: chags pa'i 'dam gyis khyod ma sgyur //
T02D1414:190a-27: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gis dam tshig gi 'khor
T02D1414:190a-28: lo ste ye shes lnga ston pa'i glu yin no
T02D1414:190a-29: // 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni //
T02D1414:190a-30: 'bras bu'i he ru ka bzhengs pas dkyil 'khor nges par 'grub bo //
T02D1414:190a-31: snyan cing 'jam pa'i dbyang zhes pa tshigs bcad phyed
T02D1414:190a-32: dang gnyis ni mngal skyes kyi glu'i phan yon ston
T02D1414:190a-33: to // 'dir 'chad pa'i go rims ci yin zhe na /
T02D1414:190a-34: rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i dus su dbyang yig bcu gnyis
T02D1414:190a-35: kyi cha dang ldan pa'i zla ba rdo rje la
T02D1414:190a-36: thim nas / bsgom pa'i dus su dgyes pa'i glu
T02D1414:190a-37: 'dis bskul nas bde ba chen po la slong ba'i
T02D1414:190a-38: glu yin bas rgya'i he ru ka slong ba dang
T02D1414:190a-39: thim nas / / zla ba rdo rje las slong
T02D1414:190a-40: ba gnyis ka zin pa'i phyir phyi nas bshad do
T02D1414:190a-41: thim nas / / // ldang pa'i tshe bsrung ba
T02D1414:190a-42: ni yi ge brgya pa ste thog ma dbang gi
T02D1414:190a-43: thim nas / / // dus dang / bar du bsgom pa'i dus dang /
T02D1414:190a-44: tha mar ldang ba'i dus gsum du yi ge brgya pa bzla'o //
T02D1414:190a-45: gnas gang du dgod ce na /
T02D1414:190a-46: ldang ba'i tshe snying gar phyir zlog chen mo'i 'khrul 'khor bkod la /
T02D1414:190b-0: de'i 'dab ma bcu drug la yid kyis bris la @190b bzlas pa byas nas /
T02D1414:190b-1: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bskang bas bdag nyid brtan par byed do //
T02D1414:190b-2: langs ba'i tshe stong gsum gzhal yas khang rang gi lhag pa'i lhar khams gsum po blta bar bya'o //
T02D1414:190b-3: bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
T02D1414:190b-4: zab pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D1414:190b-5: bskyed pa'i rim pa la brtan pa thob nas srid
T02D1414:190b-6: pa'i dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i ngo bo
T02D1414:190b-7: nyid de'i sring ba bdag gi blta bas stong pa
T02D1414:190b-8: dang rang gi lus dag yid gsum bdag tu blta
T02D1414:190b-10: de ltar bdag med pa'i sems kyi stong nyid la gnas na /
T02D1414:190b-11: bskyed pa'i rim pa 'di dka' thub la sogs pa gang yang bya mi dgos /
T02D1414:190b-12: rdo rje 'chang chen po dngos yin pas rang rangs
T02D1414:190b-13: pa'i 'dus ma byas la bdag dang bdag gir lta
T02D1414:190b-14: bar dgag ba nyid kyang mi mdzad do //
T02D1414:190b-15: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
T02D1414:190b-16: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1414:190b-17: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid ni /
T02D1414:190b-18: mthong ba mchod pa'ang de yin no //
T02D1414:190b-19: de'i rgyu mtshan can gyis rdzogs rim ni gtum mo
T02D1414:190b-20: drod sbar nas snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi thig
T02D1414:190b-21: le bzhus pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dga' ba bzhir
T02D1414:190b-22: rdzogs par lte ba'i dbus su babs nas gnas bsams
T02D1414:190b-23: pa dang / yi ge gnas kyi mchog srog aa
T02D1414:190b-24: wa dh'u t'ir chud pas de'i dbus su gnas par
T02D1414:190b-25: pa dang / bsams te / de yang sku byang
T02D1414:190b-26: chub kyi sems dang gsung khrag gi thig le dang
T02D1414:190b-27: pa dang / bsams te / / thugs srog gi
T02D1414:190b-28: rlung phyir mi 'byung bar gnas pa rdo rje can
T02D1414:190b-29: bsam gtan gyi lha'i sku yin no //
T02D1414:190b-30: de ltar mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim las mtshan ma
T02D1414:190b-31: med par sgoms pa'i gzung ba rang bzhin med pa
T02D1414:190b-32: dang / 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa'i 'du shes med pa'am /
T02D1414:190b-33: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du sems rgyun
T02D1414:190b-34: 'chad pa ma yin pa chags pas sems brtag pa
T02D1414:190b-35: ma yin chags par rgyun 'chad pa ma yin /
T02D1414:190b-36: gnyi ga 'dres pa ma yin pa'i ye shes snying ga'i dbus na /
T02D1414:190b-37: dmigs pa med pa 'dus ma byas la gnas pa
T02D1414:190b-38: rjes dpag gi gtan tshigs ma yin pas mngon sum
T02D1414:190b-39: gyi yul phyag rgya bzhi'i bud med thams cad kyi
T02D1414:190b-40: rnal 'byor ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i thugs rdo
T02D1414:190b-41: rje kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las skyes
T02D1414:190b-42: pa'i dga' ba bzhi'i mchod pa bha ga zla chos
T02D1414:190b-43: kyi steng du byang chub kyi sems kyi yul sa
T02D1414:191a-1: shes pa la mngon sum du snang bas mchog tu bshad pa'o //
T02D1414:191a-2: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dbugs nyi
T02D1414:191a-3: khri chig stong drug brgya 'gags pas ni mi shigs
T02D1414:191a-4: pa ste / yul phyag rgya bzhi dang dbang po
T02D1414:191a-5: bdag po'i rkyen kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1414:191a-6: pa ste / bde ba dang / mtshungs pa de
T02D1414:191a-7: ma thag pa'i rkyen srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud
T02D1414:191a-8: pa las sa dang po'i ye shes kyi byang chub
T02D1414:191a-9: skyes pa'i ming ni rnyog pa med pa'i gzhung mngon
T02D1414:191a-10: sum gyi lam don dam snying po yin la /
T02D1414:191a-11: gzhung gzhan rjes dpag gis gtan la phab pa'i stong nyid ni log lta'i 'od gsal yin no //
T02D1414:191a-12: sogs pa'i sgras ni mu stegs can gyi don dam thams cad bsdu'o //
T02D1414:191a-13: shes rab dman pa dang thabs ngan pas mngon gsum
T02D1414:191a-14: gyi lam la smad na mnar med par ltung ngo
T02D1414:191a-15: // de ltar le'u bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gis rdzogs rim dang /
T02D1414:191a-16: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rim pa bzhi bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:191a-17: le'u 'di'i thig le bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:191a-18: rgyud 'bum pa'i stong phrag gsum gyi don bsdus pas
T02D1414:191a-19: phan tshun gcig gis gcig 'grel pa yin no zhes
T02D1414:191a-21: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:191a-23: // / de ltar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1414:191a-24: bdud rtsi myang ba'i dkyil 'khor ston pas /
T02D1414:191a-25: de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:191a-27: sangs rgyas thod pa'i nang du bskyed pa mchog sku /
T02D1414:191a-29: sbyor ba kun gyi mchog thugs /
T02D1414:191a-30: des dngos grub thams cad gsol ba 'bras bu kun
T02D1414:191a-31: rdzob tu aom sba zhing a'a:gsang ba dang h'um su
T02D1414:191a-33: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi snying la gnas pa'i
T02D1414:191a-34: aom a'a:h'um gsum de nyid mchog tu bzung na sbas
T02D1414:191a-36: gsang ba 'od gsal dang zhes pa zung 'jug bla ma'i zhal nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:191a-37: de bsgom pa'i gnas ni tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
T02D1414:191a-38: sngos 'gro lnga dang 'byung pa bzhi ri rab sna
T02D1414:191a-39: tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i
T02D1414:191a-40: dbus su nyi zla kha sbyor gyi lte ba'i h'um
T02D1414:191a-41: de yongs su gyur pa'i spro bsdu las sangs rgyas
T02D1414:191a-42: thod pa can gyi mchog bskyod do //
T02D1414:191a-43: de'i rgyu'i rgyas bshad ni zla ba me long lta
T02D1414:191a-44: bu'i gnas med pa nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyis
T02D1414:191a-45: zhi ba h'um so sor kun du rtog pa dag
T02D1414:191a-46: pa / spro bsdu rnam rtog spangs pa bya ba nan tan /
T02D1414:191b-0: de lta bu'i a'a li k'a li @191b las byung
T02D1414:191b-1: ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba
T02D1414:191b-2: zhi ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhes bya ba
T02D1414:191b-3: nas / 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag / sred dang ldan pa zhabs kyis gnon //
T02D1414:191b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar du go sla'o //
T02D1414:191b-5: de'i nu ma'i bar du ye shes sems dpa' lha
T02D1414:191b-6: mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D1414:191b-7: pa'i gzugs can bh'um las byung ba bsgom mo /
T02D1414:191b-8: snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo sngon po /
T02D1414:191b-9: lkog mar gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po /
T02D1414:191b-10: dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo dkar po /
T02D1414:191b-11: 'khor lo gsum pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa bsgom pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:191b-12: nu ma'i bar gyi ye shes sems dpa' la mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1414:191b-15: gzugs can ma bzhi padma'i phyogs la dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:191b-16: thod pa bzhi mtshams su dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:191b-17: phyi rol gyi padma brgyad la khva gdong ma dang /
T02D1414:191b-18: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa dgod do //
T02D1414:191b-19: mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi ni phyag g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas me long dang /
T02D1414:191b-20: gling bu dang dri'i snod dang chos dang ro yis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1414:191b-21: g-yon pas thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa lha mo cang te'u dang gri gug bsnams pa'o //
T02D1414:191b-22: de ltar lugs kyi nang dus bcu'i rim pa sku
T02D1414:191b-23: gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba bsgoms nas byang chub kyi
T02D1414:191b-24: phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam par
T02D1414:191b-26: dpa' bo rnams kyi snying po ni /
T02D1414:191b-29: aom gam h'um h'um phat ces bya ba nas bham
T02D1414:191b-30: h'um h'um phat ces bya ba'i bar dpa' bo nyi
T02D1414:191b-31: shu rtsa bzhi'i snying po yin no //
T02D1414:191b-32: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mid nyid snying po yin no //
T02D1414:191b-33: sku'i brgyad la aom dang spel /
T02D1414:191b-34: gsung gi brgyad la a'a:dang spel /
T02D1414:191b-35: thugs kyi brgyad la h'um dang spel ba ni /
T02D1414:191b-36: dpa' bo rnams kyi yin no //
T02D1414:191b-37: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i ni ma ning gi yi ge bzhi dang /
T02D1414:191b-38: ming mtshan gyi dang ba bzhi sngags su 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:191b-39: sgo ma bzhi la ya ra la wa /
T02D1414:191b-40: mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi la sha sha sa ha /
T02D1414:191b-41: thog ma'i aom dang tha ma'i h'um gnyis phat dang sbyar ba ni snying po'o //
T02D1414:191b-42: dbus kyi sangs rgyas thod pa'i go sla'o //
T02D1414:191b-43: lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba lnga sangs rgyas /
T02D1414:191b-44: skye mched drug sems dpa' yig 'bru la sogs pa bzhin du bskyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1414:192a-1: mchog ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba dang /
T02D1414:192a-4: gcig tu gyur par bsgoms la /
T02D1414:192a-5: mtshams kyi lha mo bzhi'i phyag na gnas pa'i mchod pa bzhi sngags kyis mchod par bya ste /
T02D1414:192a-8: aom ra sa badzr'i hi zhes sangs rgyas thod pa dang /
T02D1414:192a-9: lus kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gsang
T02D1414:192a-10: ba'i mchod pa bzhi po bzlas nas mchod par bya'o
T02D1414:192a-11: // bsgom pa ni 'khor lo gsum gyi spro bsdu snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1414:192a-12: bzlas pa yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:192a-15: gtor ma gtang ba yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1414:192a-16: sangs rgyas thod pa ni bsgom pa'i 'bras bu ni gsum ste /
T02D1414:192a-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i thabs ni /
T02D1414:192a-18: gsang sngags kun gyi dam tshig ni //
T02D1414:192a-20: ye shes lha yi 'chi med mchog / ces bya
T02D1414:192a-21: bas thod pa'i bdud rtsi myangs pas dam tshig bskang
T02D1414:192a-22: ba dang po'o // yang na rang gi ming dang sngags bzlas pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1414:192a-23: gsum pa dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing
T02D1414:192a-24: skal ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor
T02D1414:192a-25: ma'i 'khor lo las dbang bskur ba dus bzhi ru
T02D1414:192a-26: phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya ba dang /
T02D1414:192a-27: slar yang bla ma la gsol ba btab nas gsang
T02D1414:192a-28: ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba
T02D1414:192a-29: blangs nas nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur ro
T02D1414:192a-30: // le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:192a-32: // / de ltar sangs rgyas thod pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:192a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ston par bzhed pas /
T02D1414:192a-34: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:192a-36: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:192a-37: snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'i
T02D1414:192a-38: dbus su 'byung ba bzhi ri rang dang sna tshogs
T02D1414:192a-39: rdo rje gyur pa las ae gru gsum gyi dbus
T02D1414:192a-40: su gzhal yas khang ae gru gsum gyi dbus su
T02D1414:192a-41: gnas pa'i don bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:192a-42: gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed par dka' ba bstan pa dang /
T02D1414:192a-43: g-yo ba snod bcud kyi 'gro ba thams cad dang /
T02D1414:192a-44: sngags kun bskyed pa'i rgyu yi ge ae de'i gzhi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02D1414:192a-45: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas ae gru gsum chos kyi
T02D1414:192b-0: dbyings mi zad pa'i @192b rang bzhin thog ma dang
T02D1414:192b-1: tha ma dbus su dri ma mad pas gru gsum
T02D1414:192b-2: des bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rdo
T02D1414:192b-3: rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa ni go
T02D1414:192b-4: sla'o // nu ma gnyis kyi bar du ye shes
T02D1414:192b-5: sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo bcu gnyis
T02D1414:192b-6: kyis bskor ba sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsum
T02D1414:192b-8: aom las bskyed pa'i lus kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:192b-9: ai las phyag rgya chen po zhal gsum phyag drug
T02D1414:192b-10: pa 'khor lo gsum gyi lte ba'i dbus su bsam
T02D1414:192b-11: mo // a'i las yab yum gsum bha ga'i padma can bsam mo //
T02D1414:192b-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bshad nas /
T02D1414:192b-13: las kyi rgyal mchog gi go cha dgod pa ni /
T02D1414:192b-14: au las snying ga'i rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02D1414:192b-15: a'u las gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1414:192b-16: ae las mgo la rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1414:192b-17: ae las spyi gtsug tu padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D1414:192b-18: / ao las phrag pa gnyis su dpal he ru
T02D1414:192b-19: ka / aoo las mig gnyis rdo rje nyi ma
T02D1414:192b-21: aa:las yan lag la rta mchog / li las sangs rgyas spyan shar du /
T02D1414:192b-22: ri las dam tshig sgrol ma byang du /
T02D1414:192b-23: l'i las gos dkar mo nub tu /
T02D1414:192b-24: r'i las rin po che sgrol ma lhor /
T02D1414:192b-25: dkar ba ljang ba dmar ba ser ba /
T02D1414:192b-27: de dag sgo'i thad ka'i padma'i dbus su zla ba'i gdan la dgod do //
T02D1414:192b-28: grva bzhir mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1414:192b-29: phyag dang po ral gri 'dzin pa'i dod du me
T02D1414:192b-30: long dang pi wang dril bu dang dung dang bcud
T02D1414:192b-32: g-yas kyi lhag ma gnyis na mda' dang lcags kyu /
T02D1414:192b-33: g-yon gsum na rin po che dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1414:192b-35: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i sngon du ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas /
T02D1414:192b-36: dam tshig can gyi phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D1414:192b-39: gcig tu bsdus nas 'khor lo gsum po spro ba dang /
T02D1414:192b-40: bsdu ba'i sbyor ba bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:192b-41: sngar gyi sngags bzlas pa la bdud rtsi myang ba dang /
T02D1414:192b-42: gtor ma gtang ba kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:192b-43: ldang ba'i dus kyi tshe khams gsum ma lus pa rdo rje 'dzin par bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:193a-0: dus gsum gyi sems can sku gsum gyi go 'phang la @193a * //
T02D1414:193a-2: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02D1414:193a-3: rang bzhin gyi ni de 'grub bo //
T02D1414:193a-4: zhes gsungs pas lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02D1414:193a-5: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:193a-7: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1414:193a-8: 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pu ston par bzhed pas /
T02D1414:193a-9: de nas mchog gzhan bshad pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1414:193a-10: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga dang /
T02D1414:193a-11: nam mkha' stong pa'i dbus su gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1414:193a-12: gzhal yas khang med par zla ba'i gdan la yi
T02D1414:193a-13: ge mam las 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhal gsum phyag
T02D1414:193a-14: drug pa bsgom pa ni rgyud na gsal /

T02D1414:193a-19: gar 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su sngar bshad pa'i
T02D1414:193a-20: gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo dang dpa' mos
T02D1414:193a-21: ba / bskor nas / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D1414:193a-22: 'khor bzhin du yi ge gsum gyi sngags rjes su

T02D1414:193a-25: dang rtsol ba dbugs 'byung rngub dang 'grogs pa'i 'khor
T02D1414:193a-26: lo gsum gyi lha spros nas thun bzhir brtul zhugs
T02D1414:193a-28: thun bzhir bzlas pa zin nas snying gar bsdu /
T02D1414:193a-30: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D1414:193a-31: gtor ma gtang ba kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:193a-32: le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /

T02D1414:193a-40: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung zad par byed do //
T02D1414:193a-41: sdug pa thams cad zad par byed pa'o //

T02D1414:193a-43: gis blta ba'i rnam par rtog pa bcom par thad

T02D1414:193b-0: rgyas par bshad @193b pa ni sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga bsgom nas /
T02D1414:193b-1: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gyur
T02D1414:193b-2: pa las 'byung ba'i gzhal yas khang nam mkha' dang

T02D1414:193b-17: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ma bsgoms par de la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la /

T02D1414:193b-23: brgyal ba la sogs pa'i las 'grub par the tshom med do //
T02D1414:193b-24: khva gdong ma'i zhal gsum ni dbus ma khva g-yas g-yon lug /'ug gdong ma'i g-yas g-yon rnga mo /

T02D1414:193b-28: mche ba ma'i g-yas g-yon ma he /

T02D1414:194a-20: phyag bcu drug stong nyid bcu drug pa /

T02D1414:194a-32: h'um las dpral par sku'i 'khor lo 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //

T02D1414:194a-37: nas ye shes kyis bzlas pa'i sbyor ba lha mo

T02D1414:194b-19: chos sems kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom
T02D1414:194b-20: zhing chos thams cad stod pa nyid du ro gcig

T02D1414:196b-8: bzhi phyogs kyi kha dog can no //
T02D1414:196b-9: sngon grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rab gtum ma la
T02D1414:196b-10: sogs pa sku gsung thugs dang dam tshig gi lha
T02D1414:196b-12: mkha' 'gro ma de dag thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1414:196b-13: dang po na rdo rje gsor ba dang dril bu gnyis /
T02D1414:196b-14: gnyis kyi g-yas na cang te'u /
T02D1414:196b-15: g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga //
T02D1414:196b-16: gsum pa gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang /
T02D1414:196b-18: gzhal yas khang bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:196b-19: nang gi pho brang re mig dgu sgo bzhi dang
T02D1414:196b-20: bcas pa phyi'i lha rnams phyi'i sgo ma bzhi dang
T02D1414:196b-21: cas pa / rta babs bzhis brgyan pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:196b-23: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni /
T02D1414:196b-24: byang chub kyi phyogs sems kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:196b-25: dbus kyi 'khor lo sa bcu gsum khyams kyi lha
T02D1414:196b-26: mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnas dang nye ba'i gnas
T02D1414:196b-27: la sogs pa sa bcu'i rang bzhin du bsgom pa
T02D1414:196b-28: dang / thugs kar ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma lha mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba /
T02D1414:196b-29: phung po dang khams dang skye mched lhar bskyed pa dpa' bo dang /
T02D1414:196b-30: dpa' mo'i go cha gnyis po lus la bkod pa
T02D1414:196b-31: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas su rtsibs nyi shu rtsa
T02D1414:196b-32: bzhi la sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro gsum bkod
T02D1414:196b-33: pa sgrub pa lus kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1414:196b-34: sgrub pa chen po ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo
T02D1414:196b-35: bkug nas mchod pa dang ye shes kyi chus dbang
T02D1414:196b-36: bskur ba dang / ba spu'i ba thams cad las sku gsungs thugs kyi gsang ba gsum spros nas /
T02D1414:196b-37: sems can ma lus pa thams cad sku gsum gyi
T02D1414:196b-38: mkha' 'gror bskyed nas thun bzhir slar bsdu ba dang
T02D1414:196b-39: / gnyis pa sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir 'khor
T02D1414:196b-40: lo gsum pa ba spu'i bug nas spros nas mchod
T02D1414:196b-41: pa dang gsum pa tshar bcad pa dang phan gdags
T02D1414:196b-42: pa'i phyir rdo rje gsum gyi lha srog rtsol dang
T02D1414:196b-43: lhan cig tu spro bsdu 'brug gi sgra ltar sngags
T02D1414:197a-1: dbugs phar 'gro ba dang chur bsdu ba'i sbyar bas
T02D1414:197a-2: mi smra ba'i lha'i cha byad kyi brtul zhugs chen
T02D1414:197a-3: po zhag bdun gyis mngon par shes pa 'grub ste
T02D1414:197a-4: de'i rtags ni / g-yo ba sa'i rlung 'gags pa dang /
T02D1414:197a-5: 'dar ba chu'i rlung 'gags pa dang/'khrug pa me'i rlung 'gags pa dang /
T02D1414:197a-6: 'phar ba nam mkha'i rlung 'gags pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1414:197a-7: rtags byung na nad dang ldan pa tshar bcad pa
T02D1414:197a-8: dang / nad med pa phan 'dogs pa 'grub po //
T02D1414:197a-9: de ltar bsgom pa byas nas zhes bya ba tshigs bcad phyed ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
T02D1414:197a-10: don lnga pa rtogs byung nas srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'i nang gi sbyor ba dang /
T02D1414:197a-11: ldan pas bdud rtsi lnga zos nas tshe lo stong
T02D1414:197a-12: thub na sangs rgyas kyi gnas su nges par 'jug
T02D1414:197a-13: go // snying po dang gnas ni rgyud na gsal ba ma bshad do //
T02D1414:197a-14: thun bzhi'i bsgom bzlas zin nas dkyil 'khor kun gcig
T02D1414:197a-15: tu byas te bsdus nas rnal 'byor chen po lus
T02D1414:197a-16: gzi brjid can gyi sngags khri'am 'bum bzlas na /
T02D1414:197a-17: ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ni phan yon no //
T02D1414:197a-18: gal te rang gi lus rgas na byis pa gzhon
T02D1414:197a-19: nu ma lo brgyad pa mtshon dang rims kyis ma
T02D1414:197a-20: rig pa glo bur bu shi ba'i ro rnyed na
T02D1414:197a-21: gzhan gyi lus su zhugs nas 'gro ba pa su
T02D1414:197a-22: ra pra bi sha zhes bya ste /
T02D1414:197a-23: rdzu 'phrul dang mi snang ba dang gzugs du ma ston pa la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:197a-24: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gtor ma btang ba ni kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:197a-25: le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:197a-27: // / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa dam tshig gi sngom pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:197a-28: mngon shes bsgrub pa'i spros bcas kyi spyod pa ni /
T02D1414:197a-29: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:197a-31: gang zag skye ba snga ma nas tshul khrims goms
T02D1414:197a-32: pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis bsrung ba de
T02D1414:197a-33: ni lung gi rim pas tshul khrims kyi phung po
T02D1414:197a-34: yin la lung dang bral na mu stegs can yin
T02D1414:197a-35: no // rnal 'byor pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
T02D1414:197a-36: su song nas chos kyi dbyings shes rab kyi pha
T02D1414:197a-37: rol tu phyin pa la dmigs te /
T02D1414:197b-0: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis lha mo bcu gnyis su bskyed @197b pa ni /
T02D1414:197b-1: tshul khrims kyi phung po yin la /
T02D1414:197b-2: dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
T02D1414:197b-3: sgyu ma 'od gsal zung 'jug gis rgyas btabs nas shes rab kyi phung po yin no //
T02D1414:197b-4: rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:197b-5: gong du bstan pa'i sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba lnga dang /
T02D1414:197b-6: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D1414:197b-7: padma'i steng mngon par byang chub pa lnga skad cig
T02D1414:197b-8: gi rnam pa rdzus skyes kyi sbyor bas gtso bo
T02D1414:197b-9: dang 'khor thams cad cig car bskyed pa /
T02D1414:197b-10: gtso bo zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas 'khyud pa bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1414:197b-11: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs brgyad du mi dang seng ge la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02D1414:197b-13: gtum mo dang srin mo dang drag mo dang bzhi ste /
T02D1414:197b-14: lha mo bcu gnyis rab tu byung ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02D1414:197b-17: stan gcig pa gsum ni zas la ma chags pa'o //
T02D1414:197b-20: phying ba pa ni gos la ma chags pa'o //
T02D1414:197b-21: cog pu pa dang gzhi ji bzhin pa ni gnas mal la ma chags pa'o //
T02D1414:197b-22: bla ga ba med pa dang /
T02D1414:197b-25: dur khrod pa ni gnas la ma chags pa ste /
T02D1414:197b-26: de rnams kyi lha mo ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go //
T02D1414:197b-27: las kyi rgyal mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas go cha bskon pa dang /
T02D1414:197b-29: bdud rtsi myang ba ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog //
T02D1414:197b-30: ro gcig par ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1414:197b-31: zhes pa sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo lus ngag yid gsum gyi spro bsdu bya ba dang /
T02D1414:197b-32: ye shes sems dpa' nu ma'i bar ni sbyangs pa'i
T02D1414:197b-33: yon tan lha mo bcu gnyis kyi spro bsdu bsgom
T02D1414:197b-34: mo // snying po ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:197b-37: byang mche ba gtsigs pa dang /
T02D1414:197b-44: sgo bzhir drag cing khro ba'i nyams can sgom mo //
T02D1414:198a-0: rab tu byung ba'i chas gon nas ji ltar khros @198a * //
T02D1414:198a-2: sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod pa na /
T02D1414:198a-3: stong pas rgyas btab na bla med ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
T02D1414:198a-4: kha zas bdung rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas 'chi
T02D1414:198a-5: med bde ba'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu rnyed do
T02D1414:198a-6: // sems can thams cad lhar bsgoms pas zag med kyi go 'phang mchog thob po //
T02D1414:198a-7: 'di ni las dang po'i spyod pa ma yin pas
T02D1414:198a-8: mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa yin
T02D1414:198a-9: pas / sngon 'gro dang dngos gzhi dang rjes thams cad tshang bar mi dgos so //
T02D1414:198a-10: le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:198a-12: // / de ltar spros bcas kyi spyod pa bshad nas
T02D1414:198a-13: rgyas par char dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bzhed
T02D1414:198a-14: pas / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:198a-16: gong gi sngon du 'gro ba'i rnam pa lnga byas
T02D1414:198a-17: nas 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1414:198a-18: dang gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padma 'dab ma
T02D1414:198a-19: brgyad pa'i dbus su yi ge h'um las rdo rje
T02D1414:198a-20: de yongs su gyur pa las sku lus sngon po
T02D1414:198a-21: zhal bzhi ba mche ba gtsigs pa phyag brgyad kyi
T02D1414:198a-22: dang pos rdo rje mtha' yas gcig pa /
T02D1414:198a-23: g-yon gyi dang po sdig mdzub nor rgyas kyi zhags pa can /
T02D1414:198a-24: g-yon pa na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga la 'jog po bcings pa /
T02D1414:198a-25: g-yas pa'i lcags kyu la padma bcing pa /
T02D1414:198a-26: g-yon pa'i mdung la padma chen po bcings pa /
T02D1414:198a-27: dbang po'i pags pa bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyi gdu bu dud skyong dang stobs kyi rgyus byas pa /
T02D1414:198a-28: g-yas pa'i cang te'u la ma dros pas brgyan pa /
T02D1414:198a-30: yang na phyag bcu gnyis pa gri gug dang /
T02D1414:198a-31: tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang rdo rje dang dril bus
T02D1414:198a-32: 'khyud pa rang snang ba'i rdo rje phag mo zhal
T02D1414:198a-33: gcig phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang ka p'a la
T02D1414:198a-34: bsnams pa / 'jam bu chu bo'i mdog lta bu'i sngon bo bsam mo //
T02D1414:198a-35: nam mkha' lding gi gdong can zhal lnga pa phyag brgyad pa ni yum spangs pa yin la /
T02D1414:198a-36: phyag bcu gnyis ni yum dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1414:198a-37: gnyi ga yang khyad par du nam mkha' lding gi gdong can yin no //
T02D1414:198b-0: chu lha chung ma dang bcas pa @198b kha dog
T02D1414:198b-1: dkar po thal mo sbyar nas bka' nod par byed
T02D1414:198b-2: pa g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'o //
T02D1414:198b-3: padma 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad thal mo sbyar
T02D1414:198b-4: nas chung ma dang bcas pa bka' nod par bsam
T02D1414:198b-5: / klu rnams kyi mjug ma chu lha'i 'og tu mnan par bsam mo //
T02D1414:198b-6: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bshad nas /
T02D1414:198b-7: las kyi rgyal mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang /
T02D1414:198b-9: dbang bskur nas bsgoms pa'i tshe /
T02D1414:198b-10: snying gar nu ma'i bar du ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1414:198b-11: de'i sku mdog dang phyag rgya dang zhal lnga dang
T02D1414:198b-12: ldan pa bskyed / ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs
T02D1414:198b-13: kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse mo
T02D1414:198b-14: lnga la h'um nam h'um dgod do //
T02D1414:198b-16: lkog mar gsung gi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin bsams /
T02D1414:198b-17: klu brgyad kyi snying gar h'um lam h'um gsum dgod /
T02D1414:198b-18: khams gsum sku gsungs thugs kyi spro bsdu bsgom 'og
T02D1414:198b-19: nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po khro bo'i
T02D1414:198b-20: tshig bzlas brjod byed pa'am 'bum mam khri bya //
T02D1414:198b-21: bstod pa dang mchod pa bya /
T02D1414:198b-23: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1414:198b-24: las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub pa'i gnas bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:198b-26: rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu yod pa'i gnas su bsgom bzlas bya /
T02D1414:198b-28: nyin re zhing thun bzhi gzhag bdun gyi bar du las la sbyar bas char dbab /
T02D1414:198b-29: ma babs na bskyar ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1414:198b-31: sbrang rtsi bza' zhing 'o ma dang mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya /
T02D1414:198b-32: 'o mas gang ba'i bum pa brgyad kyis klu la khrus bya /
T02D1414:198b-33: phyogs mtshams brgyad du gtor ma 'o ma dang bcas pa sbyin no //
T02D1414:198b-34: klu brgyad kyi sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:198b-35: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02D1414:198b-36: klu brgyad kyi snying po khri tsam du bzla /
T02D1414:198b-38: de mi nus na 'o ma dang mar dang 'bras snying bza'/
T02D1414:198b-39: tha mal pa'i tshig gis mi smra bar nam mkha'
T02D1414:198b-40: lding gi gdong can bris pa'i sku gzugs rab gnas
T02D1414:198b-41: byas pa'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po
T02D1414:198b-42: 'bum bzlas / ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi sku lugs ma dri chu dang /
T02D1414:199a-2: chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1414:199a-3: mgo dgu pa byas la chus dbang bskur na char
T02D1414:199a-5: las la sbyar ba'i cho ga bshad nas /
T02D1414:199a-6: da ni spyir btang ba'i cho ga 'chad pa ni /
T02D1414:199a-7: las tshogs brgya byed pa'i dus su khro bo gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzugs su bsgom pa'i tshe /
T02D1414:199a-8: rgyud sde bzhi'i lha tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brang yang /
T02D1414:199a-9: lha de'i snying gar nam mkha' lding gi gdong can gyi he ru ka bsgoms na /
T02D1414:199a-11: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D1414:199a-12: de'i snying gar phyir bzlog chen mo la sogs pa
T02D1414:199a-13: las brgya byed pa'i dus lha'i snying gar bsgoms nas
T02D1414:199a-14: las brgya byed do zhes bsdus pa las kyang gsungs
T02D1414:199a-15: so // gal te snying gar mi bsgom na phyag
T02D1414:199a-16: mtshan gyi dbus su bsgoms nas kyang las tshogs byed
T02D1414:199a-17: so // pa ni / mdung rtse gsum pa la
T02D1414:199a-18: nam mkha' lding gi gdong can gyi 'khor lo bris
T02D1414:199a-19: na ser ba gcod pa can te'u la bris nas
T02D1414:199a-20: me rengs par byed ces bya ba nas glang po
T02D1414:199a-21: che'i pags pa la bris na /
T02D1414:199a-22: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro 'ong byed do //
T02D1414:199a-23: snying gar mi bsgom na phyag rgya drug las 'khor
T02D1414:199a-24: lo bris na mi snang ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D1414:199a-26: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:199a-28: // / de ltar klu 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D1414:199a-29: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:199a-30: zhes bya bas phur bu'i lha ston to //
T02D1414:199a-31: rgyud sde bzhi las phur bu'i srung ba sna tshogs bshad pa /
T02D1414:199a-32: gsang ba mchog gi rgyud 'dir mdor bsdus na gsungs pa ni /
T02D1414:199a-33: phur bu bsgom par 'dod pas sngon du 'gro ba
T02D1414:199a-34: lnga dang 'byung bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1414:199a-35: dang gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02D1414:199a-36: padma'i lte bar yi ge h'um las skad cig gis
T02D1414:199a-37: rdzus skyes kyi he ru ka zhabs gcig pa bsgom
T02D1414:199a-38: pa ni dang po sbyor ba'o //
T02D1414:199a-39: sku dog sngon po zhal drug pa phyag bcu gnyis
T02D1414:199a-40: pa zhabs gcig pa yum rdo rje phag mo zhabs
T02D1414:199a-41: gcig par bsgoms te go sla'o //
T02D1414:199a-43: shar lho mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma glang po che'i gdong can zhabs gcig pa /
T02D1414:199b-0: nub byang mtshams su gshin rje mche ba @199b ma ri dags kyi gdong can zhabs gcig pa /
T02D1414:199b-1: byang shar gyi mtshams su gshin rje 'joms byed ma seng ge'i gdong can ma zhabs gcig pa'o //
T02D1414:199b-2: phyogs bzhi ni phur bu'i lha'i gtso bo zhal drug
T02D1414:199b-3: pa rta'i gdong can zhal nub tu gzigs pa yin
T02D1414:199b-4: pas dang po khyi gdong ma'i phur bus gdab bo
T02D1414:199b-5: // gnyis pa byang du 'ug gdong ma'i phur bus gdab po //
T02D1414:199b-6: gsum pa lhor phag gdong ma'i phur bus gdab po //
T02D1414:199b-7: 'di rnams la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug go cha
T02D1414:199b-8: bskon dbang bskur bdud rtsi myangs bsgom pa dang bzlas
T02D1414:199b-9: pa byas / mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
T02D1414:199b-10: gtor ma btang nye bar bsdu ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:199b-11: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid /
T02D1414:199b-12: sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po yin //
T02D1414:199b-14: dbyibs snying ga'i sngags la bsdu //
T02D1414:199b-15: yang na phur bu lnga bya ste /
T02D1414:199b-16: dbus su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ma /
T02D1414:199b-17: shar du mtha' yas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba
T02D1414:199b-18: lhor rnam par rgyal pa las 'jam dpal gshin rje
T02D1414:199b-19: gshed / nub tu sprin sgra las rta mchog //
T02D1414:199b-20: byang du stobs po che las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
T02D1414:199b-22: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las grags pa bzhin du thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad pas /
T02D1414:199b-23: ji ltar sems can 'dod pa'i sku lus phur bu'i
T02D1414:199b-24: lha lta bu yang 'chang bar mdzad pa yin no
T02D1414:199b-25: // de ltar rnal 'byor pa dad pas bsgom zhing
T02D1414:199b-26: yun ring ba bar chad med par rnam par bsgoms
T02D1414:199b-27: na nor mchog shel bzhin du bdag nyid chen po
T02D1414:199b-28: sna tshogs pa rnam par rol par 'gyur te /
T02D1414:199b-30: yang dag yang dag ma yin pa //
T02D1414:199b-31: dngos po gang dang gang zhig la /
T02D1414:199b-32: bsgom pa'i don ni rdzogs pa na /
T02D1414:199b-33: de gsal mi rtog blo 'dras skyes //
T02D1414:199b-35: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:199b-38: yum gyi snying po'i yi ge bcu gsum las skyes pa'i lha mo bcu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D1414:199b-39: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:200a-0: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga rdzogs nas rten @200a * //
T02D1414:200a-1: gyi dang po sbyor ba 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang bskyed /
T02D1414:200a-2: mngon par byang chub pa lngas phag mo'i sku bdag
T02D1414:200a-3: nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom pa ni dang po
T02D1414:200a-4: sbyor ba'o // dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni /
T02D1414:200a-5: sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi //
T02D1414:200a-7: 'khor gyi phyag mtshan go rims bzhin //
T02D1414:200a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar go sla'o //
T02D1414:200a-9: las rgyal mchog ni go cha bskon pa dang /
T02D1414:200a-10: ye she sems dpa' spyan drangs pa dang /
T02D1414:200a-13: bsgom pa de'i snying ga'i nu ma'i bar du ye shes kyi lha mo bcu gsum /
T02D1414:200a-14: dpral ba dang lkog ma dang snying gar sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
T02D1414:200a-15: ye shes kyi 'khor lo yang de dang 'bra bar bcug nas ro gcig tu gyur par bsgoms te /
T02D1414:200a-16: ye shes kyi bzlas pa'i spro bsdu bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:200a-17: ngag gis bzlas pa yang bya'o //
T02D1414:200a-18: ldang ba'i tshe rang gi lha'i rnal byor gyis sems
T02D1414:200a-19: can thams cad la lha'i skur brtag / stong gsum
T02D1414:200a-21: stor gsum lha yi 'khor lo'i sku /
T02D1414:200a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi chos gsang ba gsum la gzhag go //
T02D1414:200a-23: gsang ba gsum pa yang sems kyi chos nyid bdag
T02D1414:200a-24: med pa chos dang chos ma yin pa la 'das
T02D1414:200a-25: pa'i 'dus ma byas la gzhug go //
T02D1414:200a-26: le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1414:200a-28: // / de ltar rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor bshad
T02D1414:200a-29: nas go cha drug gi dkyil 'khor ston pa ni
T02D1414:200a-30: / de nas gzhal yas khang bshad bya //
T02D1414:200a-32: sngon du 'gro ba lnga pa sgoms nas 'byung ba
T02D1414:200a-33: bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang
T02D1414:200a-34: gi nang du rnal 'byor ma drug gi yig 'bru
T02D1414:200a-35: las drod gsher skyes kyi cho ga'i rim pa dang
T02D1414:200a-36: po sbyor ba'o // dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni mtshan bzhir 'gyur te /
T02D1414:200a-37: go cha drug gi lha mo bzhi la dpa' bos 'khyud pa ni /
T02D1414:200a-38: 'khor zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ni dang po yin no //
T02D1414:200a-39: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo so so bsgom pa'i 'khor lo /
T02D1414:200a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa dang /
T02D1414:200a-41: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ni gnyis pa yin no //
T02D1414:200b-0: gtso bo @200b phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal drug pa
T02D1414:200b-1: la go cha'i lha zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa lngas
T02D1414:200b-2: bskor ba ni gsum pa yin no //
T02D1414:200b-3: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la go cha drug gi lhas bskor ba ni bzhi pa yin no //
T02D1414:200b-4: de la dad po ni lte ba ge sar gyis
T02D1414:200b-5: khyab pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i dbus
T02D1414:200b-6: su phag mo zhal drug pa 'khor gshin rje ma
T02D1414:200b-7: las sogs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1414:200b-8: g-yon pa na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga /
T02D1414:200b-9: g-yas pa na cang te'u dang gri gug / phag
T02D1414:200b-10: mo rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:200b-11: tsandi k'a rta mchog dang 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1414:200b-12: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:200b-13: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug
T02D1414:200b-14: pa phag mo dang gnyis dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs
T02D1414:200b-15: bcu la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dpa'
T02D1414:200b-16: bo lnga dang / shin rje ma la sogs pa
T02D1414:200b-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma so sor bsgom pa ste
T02D1414:200b-18: bo lnga dang / gnyis pa'o // yang na gtso bo phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal drug pa /
T02D1414:200b-19: 'khor rnams zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa bsgoms pas mi'i 'khor los sgyur pa drug thob pa dang /
T02D1414:200b-20: yang na lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba drug lha ma yin g-yul gyis mi 'pham zhing rgyal 'thob pa'am /
T02D1414:200b-21: mchog gi dngos grub stobs chen mngon par shes pa
T02D1414:200b-22: drug dang ldan pa bdud bzhi'i pha rol gnon pa
T02D1414:200b-24: 'gro ba drug gi sems can bsgral ba /
T02D1414:200b-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs pa gru gsum pa'o //
T02D1414:200b-26: yang na 'khor lo zur drug la go cha drug gi lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang /
T02D1414:200b-27: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa bkod nas /
T02D1414:200b-28: de'i dbus su 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhal lnga pa
T02D1414:200b-29: phyag bcu pa gru kum dmar po'i mdog lta bu
T02D1414:200b-31: skra grol ba la phyag gos can zhes pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go sla'o //
T02D1414:200b-32: las kyi rgyal mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa dang /
T02D1414:200b-36: bsgom pa'i tshe snying ga'i nu ma'i bar du ye
T02D1414:200b-37: shes kyi 'khor lo sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1414:200b-39: go cha chen po gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi la
T02D1414:200b-40: dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod pa ni
T02D1414:201a-0: @201a * // sprul pa'i 'khor lo sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhi ru
T02D1414:201a-1: khva gdong ma la sogs pa lha mo brgyad zhal
T02D1414:201a-2: gcig phyag bzhi pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1414:201a-3: bsgom pa'i tshe sgro bsdu'i sbyor bas ye shes kyi bzlas pa bya ba dang /
T02D1414:201a-4: ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshe sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs
T02D1414:201a-5: khams gsum gyi 'gro ba sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor
T02D1414:201a-6: lo bsgoms la ngag gi bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1414:201a-7: sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid gsum gyi sngags ni /
T02D1414:201a-8: dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i ming gis mthar h'um h'um phat dang /
T02D1414:201a-9: thog mar aom dang bcas pas lus kyi nang gi 'khor lo gsum gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:201a-10: sbul pa'i 'khor lo'i go cha drug gi lha dang sgo ma brgyad kyi sngags ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:201a-11: go cha gnyis po 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi snying gar bkod dam /
T02D1414:201a-13: lus la go char bkod na dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu gsol ba ni phan yon no //
T02D1414:201a-14: de'i rnam dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni go cha drug go //
T02D1414:201a-15: bzhi ni khva gdong ma la sogs pa sgo ma bzhi /
T02D1414:201a-16: bden pa bzhi ni gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1414:201a-17: 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1414:201a-20: gtor ma btang ba dang nye bar bsdu ba ni kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:201a-21: 'di'i mtshan ni gsang ba chos kyi sku dang /
T02D1414:201a-22: yang gsang ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1414:201a-23: mchog tu sbas pa sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D1414:201a-26: gtso bo zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa'am /
T02D1414:201a-27: 'jam pa'i rdo rje dbus su bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:201a-28: thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T02D1414:201a-29: yang na lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo lnga dang
T02D1414:201a-30: sen mo dang drug la dpa' mo drug / g-yas
T02D1414:201a-31: pa'i sor mo lnga dang sen mo dang drug la
T02D1414:201a-32: dpa' bo drug / lag pa'i mthil du dpa' bo
T02D1414:201a-33: dang dpa' mo'i 'khor lo bsgom pa go cha gnyis
T02D1414:201a-34: po gsal bar he ru ka 'byung ba nas gsungs
T02D1414:201a-36: le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:201a-38: // / de ltar le'u bzhi pa nas nyi shu'i bar du dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:201b-0: nyi shu gcig pa nas sum @201b cu rtsa bdun
T02D1414:201b-1: gyi bar du dngos grub sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1414:201b-2: bstan nas / da ni dngos grub kyi yan lag gi le'u bcu ston par bzhed pas /
T02D1414:201b-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:201b-5: spyir dkyil 'khor bdun yod pa las rnal 'byor pho
T02D1414:201b-6: mo'i 'khor lo ston pa rdzogs rim gyi spyod pa
T02D1414:201b-7: yin te / de la rigs gsum yod de skye
T02D1414:201b-8: ba snga ma sa dang po nas sa bcu'i bar
T02D1414:201b-9: du ye shes dang ldan pa las sems can gyi
T02D1414:201b-10: don du skyes rabs kyi mdo sde bzhin du /
T02D1414:201b-11: 'dir skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo la zag med
T02D1414:201b-12: kyi las las byung bas ye shes las skyes ma
T02D1414:201b-13: zhes bya'o // yang na bsam gtan bzhi dang /
T02D1414:201b-14: gzugs med bzhi thob pa las mir skyes pa'i rnal
T02D1414:201b-15: 'byor pho mo tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi sprul
T02D1414:201b-16: pa gtan du mi g-yo ba'i las bsam gtan gyi
T02D1414:201b-17: sngom pa las 'byung ba ni zhing skyes zhes bya'o
T02D1414:201b-18: // tshe 'di la rdo rje slob dpon gyi stobs
T02D1414:201b-19: kyis bsam gtan dang zag med kyi sngom pa skyes
T02D1414:201b-20: ba ni sngags skyes zhes bya'o //
T02D1414:201b-21: de la dang po sngom pa dang ldan par shes
T02D1414:201b-22: pa'i rtags ni ngag gi brda dang lus kyi brda
T02D1414:201b-23: dang yan lag gi brda gsungs te /
T02D1414:201b-24: de la ngag gi brda ni yi ge'i brda dang tshig gi brda'o //
T02D1414:201b-25: lus kyi brda ni mig gi brda dang mchu'i brda'o //
T02D1414:201b-26: yan lag gi brda ni yan lag dang nyid lag gi ste /
T02D1414:201b-27: de skad du yang chos bcu pa'i mdo las /
T02D1414:201b-28: du ba las ni mer shes te //
T02D1414:201b-29: chu skyar las ni chu yin te //
T02D1414:201b-30: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis //
T02D1414:201b-31: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
T02D1414:201b-33: de'i brda dbang ma bskur ba la mchog tu gsang
T02D1414:201b-34: ba'i brda mi shes na de 'grub par mi 'gyur
T02D1414:201b-35: la / gang zhig brda legs par shes na dngos
T02D1414:201b-36: grub bsgrub par the tshom med pa'i phyir brda bstan
T02D1414:201b-37: la / to // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:201b-38: da zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnas gtsang ma'i brda
T02D1414:201b-39: mtshan ma thob pa'i skyes bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1414:201b-40: pa'o // di zhes bya ba dbang bskur nas mtshan
T02D1414:201b-41: ma thob pa'i bud med sum cu rtsa drug go
T02D1414:201b-42: pa'o // // du zhes bya ba 'khyud pa ston //
T02D1414:201b-43: su zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga'i bza' ba ston /
T02D1414:202a-0: ma zhes bya ba rdo rje slob dpon dang dus mnyam @202a * //
T02D1414:202a-1: du srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra chud pa ston /
T02D1414:202a-2: bi zhes bya bas rang dang dus mnyam du dbang bskur ba ston /
T02D1414:202a-3: bu zhes bya bas slob ma dbang bskur ba ston /
T02D1414:202a-4: lu zhes bya bas rang gi dbang bskur ba ston /
T02D1414:202a-5: pri ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rang byung gi me tog ston /
T02D1414:202a-6: so ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i zhi ba'i btung ba ston /
T02D1414:202a-7: pi ni sman sna brgya rtsa brgyad bskol pa'i tsva ru'i sha ston /
T02D1414:202a-8: su zhes bya ba tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'dus pa ston te /
T02D1414:202a-9: gsang ba'i dbang bskur brda yin no //
T02D1414:202a-10: shes rab ye shes dag byed kyi lha mo'i brda ni /
T02D1414:202a-11: pi zhes bya ba sems 'dzin pa'i gnas dur khrod do //
T02D1414:202a-12: pri zhes bya ba skye ba bdun ba'i ro kha zas su bza' ba'o //
T02D1414:202a-15: tri ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02D1414:202a-18: dza ni zag med kyi lha mo rnams dang sems 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-19: dpa' bo'i lha mo'i brda bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:202a-21: bha zhes bya ba phyag 'tshal ston /
T02D1414:202a-23: mi ni nya la sogs pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-24: ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i bza' ba'o //
T02D1414:202a-25: bhyo ni bdud rtsir byin gyis ma brlabs pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-26: byo ni bdud rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs pa'i btung ba'o //
T02D1414:202a-27: byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i btud pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-28: ga ni dbang bskur ba la skrod pa dang dbang ma bskur ba /
T02D1414:202a-29: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i rig ma bsten
T02D1414:202a-30: par dga' ba dang zhes bya ba'i ltung ba bung
T02D1414:202a-32: bkas gnang ba'i lha mo'i brda ni /
T02D1414:202a-33: ka zhes bya ba rigs lnga'i lha mo so sor 'dod par bya'o //
T02D1414:202a-34: sa zhes bya ba skyes pa gzhan gyi drung du mi 'gro'o //
T02D1414:202a-35: ra ni bdag po med pa'i mchog ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1414:202a-36: ngan par spyod pa'i brda ni /
T02D1414:202a-38: su zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la dad pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-39: na zhes bya ba mu stegs pa la dad pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-40: sa zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thob pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-41: a'a zhes bya ba dang pas 'ongs pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-42: na zhas pa dad pa med pas ma 'ongs pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-43: so ni yid du 'ong ba'i yul dam par gyur pa'o //
T02D1414:202a-44: yi ge re re'i brda 'di dag tshor ba sdug
T02D1414:202a-45: bsngal btang snyoms tshor ba bde ba rtog pa med
T02D1414:202b-0: pa mngon sum gyis lam bsgom pa la sbyin @202b
T02D1414:202b-1: par bya'i ma dad pa la mi sbyin no //
T02D1414:202b-2: grol ba'i lam pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1414:202b-3: dus nam gyi tshe sbyin zhe na /
T02D1414:202b-4: dbang bskur ba'i dus su rnal 'byor pas ye shes babs nas brda byed pa dang /
T02D1414:202b-5: dbang bskur thob na sa de'i 'og tu bde ba
T02D1414:202b-6: stong pa nyid dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa gus
T02D1414:202b-8: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i dus dang /
T02D1414:202b-9: chogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1414:202b-10: le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:202b-12: // / brda shes pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D1414:202b-13: de nas gzhan yang mtshan nyid bshad par bya ba ni /
T02D1414:202b-14: rnal 'byor ma'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam
T02D1414:202b-15: dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes pa tsam
T02D1414:202b-16: gyis sgrub pa po la rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhan
T02D1414:202b-17: cig skyes pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1414:202b-18: bcom pa mo lha'i bshes gnyen la nor bzangs kyis bde ba stong pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa'am /
T02D1414:202b-19: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la rtag tu dus sems bskyed pa bzhin du'am /
T02D1414:202b-20: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi dang mnyam
T02D1414:202b-21: pa'i btsun mo rin po che bde ba stong pa
T02D1414:202b-22: nyid ston pa lta bur 'gyur bas de'i kha dog
T02D1414:202b-23: gi mtshan nyid ni bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar
T02D1414:202b-24: zhing zhes pa kha dog dkar po dang /
T02D1414:202b-25: dbyibs mig dkyus ring ba dang /
T02D1414:202b-26: gos dkar la dga' ba dang /
T02D1414:202b-27: tsandan gyi dri yod pa dang /
T02D1414:202b-28: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D1414:202b-29: gsung gi 'khor lo la dgod do //
T02D1414:202b-30: mi gang btso ma'i gser lta bu //
T02D1414:202b-36: ye shes kyi 'khor lo la dgong ngo //
T02D1414:202b-37: thams cad autpala ltar sngo bsangs zhes bya ba ni he ru ka'i rigs te /
T02D1414:202b-39: bud med pad dkar mdog 'dra gang //
T02D1414:202b-40: zhes pa tshig rkang gsum ni rdo rje'i rigs yin te /
T02D1414:202b-41: thugs kyi 'khor lo la dgod do //
T02D1414:202b-42: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1414:202b-43: zhes pa ni phag mo'i rigs te /
T02D1414:202b-44: dbus kyi 'khor lo la dgod do //
T02D1414:202b-45: ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1414:202b-46: zhes bya ba ni las kyi rigs rnams kyi gnas su dgod do //
T02D1414:202b-47: bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar //
T02D1414:202b-49: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs te /
T02D1414:203a-2: de ltar rnal 'byor ma bdun bde ba stong pa
T02D1414:203a-3: nyid g-yon pa'i spyod pa la dga' ba sems kyi
T02D1414:203a-4: rtags dang / lus kyi rtags snga ma bzhin du kha dog dang dbyibs dang ldan par skyes la /
T02D1414:203a-5: ngag gi rtags tshig gi thog mar aom mam h'um ngam /
T02D1414:203a-7: rang gi phyag rgya ma bslabs par rigs drug gi phyag rgya 'ching zhing sngags brjod pa'o //
T02D1414:203a-8: shes rab kyi rtags g-yon las 'gro ba'i bud med
T02D1414:203a-9: gang zhes bya ba rtag tu bde ba stong pa
T02D1414:203a-11: thabs kyi rtags bde ba stong pa nyid kyi ched du mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:203a-12: bde stong gi ched du blta ba dang /
T02D1414:203a-13: bde ba stong pa'i ched du smra ba dang /
T02D1414:203a-14: bde stong gi ched du bud med gang gis bstan
T02D1414:203a-15: pa'i don de nyan cing gzhan la yang bde ba
T02D1414:203a-16: stong pa nyid kyi rigs kyi sa bon gzhan la
T02D1414:203a-17: ston pa'o // bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rigs
T02D1414:203a-18: mi spong zhing bde ba stong gi mdor bstan pa
T02D1414:203a-19: ston pa'o // dang / rgyas bshad mi 'dor ba dang /
T02D1414:203a-20: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi rig pa zlo bar
T02D1414:203a-21: byed pa de ni rtag tu du bzhin du nyin
T02D1414:203a-22: mo dang mtshan mo yid la mi byed bde ba
T02D1414:203a-23: stong pa nyid yid la byed pa'i dam tshig dang
T02D1414:203a-24: ldan pa'o // phyag 'tshal ba yang bde ba stong pa nyid kyi ched du 'dud pa dang /
T02D1414:203a-25: lha mo rnams dang kun du smra ba ni /
T02D1414:203a-26: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi ched du rtag tu du bzhin du sa dang bor 'gro'o //
T02D1414:203a-27: thabs kyi rtags bshad nas mi'i lus la bsam gtan bskyed pa'i thabs bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:203a-28: bsam gtan dang po'i dga' ba dang dbang po drug bde ba skyes nas /
T02D1414:203a-29: mthe bo g-yon pas sa la ri mo 'dri ba dang /

T02D1414:206b-26: dpral ba'i ri mo gsum zlum por gyur pa ni /

T02D1414:207a-1: rigs rgyal mtshan me long can 'dri ba dang /
T02D1414:207a-2: sku'i rigs kyi mdung rtse gsum pa me long can 'dri ba dang /
T02D1414:207a-3: las kyi rigs kyi me long nyis brtsegs 'dri ba

T02D1414:207a-22: // / mi'i 'khor lo lnga po ma bcos pa don rang
T02D1414:207a-23: gi mtshan nyid ni lus la bsam gtan dang zag
T02D1414:207a-24: med ji ltar skye ba'i thabs rnam par thar pa'i

T02D1414:207b-8: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas 'dod khams kyi

T02D1414:207b-13: / dbyibs dang spyod lam gyi rtags kyis shes so //

T02D1414:207b-17: slob dpon med de lung dang rnges dpag la mi rten /
T02D1414:207b-18: mngon sum gyi yul bskal pa rnam pa gsum gyi

T02D1414:207b-31: sa dang po skye ba'i pho nya'i gtsang sbra'i rnam
T02D1414:207b-32: yin te / spang / bsgom mo // thar ma
T02D1414:207b-33: ni / bdud 'byung bas bar chad kyi bgegs sel
T02D1414:207b-34: ba'i srung ma khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad
T02D1414:207b-35: kyis spros med kyis spyod pa shes rab ye shes
T02D1414:207b-36: la bde ba la log par byed /
T02D1414:207b-37: stong pa nyid la dad par /
T02D1414:207b-38: 'dus ma byas rtag pa'i dam tshig brgyad bskyang ba'i rnal 'byor pa la srung bar byed do //
T02D1414:207b-39: sa dang po 'dus ma byas kyi dam tshig brgyad
T02D1414:207b-40: gang zhe na lha mo gzhan stong pa nyid ma
T02D1414:207b-41: mthong ba la kun du sbyor ba yang rang gi
T02D1414:207b-42: 'dod chags dang gti mug la sogs pa rang bzhin
T02D1414:208a-0: brgyad cu spangs / bde ba gsal po med pa'i 'du shes med @208a * //
T02D1414:208a-1: bzhin du gzung 'dzin gnyis med pa spangs /

T02D1414:208a-8: bsgom bde ba gsal po'i bsam gtan dang /

T02D1414:208a-27: gang zag su la bstan zhe na /

T02D1414:208a-40: ldan na skye ba snga ma'i bsam gtan dang zag
T02D1414:208a-41: med las skyes pa yin pa dus rtag tu brtul
T02D1414:208b-0: bskal pa @208b gsum gyis ma bskal pa'i pho nya
T02D1414:208b-1: ral gri'i so dang 'dra zhing las dang nyon mongs
T02D1414:208b-3: bde ba ston pa nyid kyi bsod nams 'phel bar byed /

T02D1414:208b-15: tu brtags te / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mchod

T02D1414:208b-22: // / dngos gzhi dang rjes ro mnyam pa'i thabs kyi spyod pa ni /

T02D1414:208b-30: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rgyu tshogs pa

T02D1414:209b-29: spros bcas bsam gtan gyi dga' bde bzhi bsgom pa
T02D1414:209b-30: 'khor lo lnga'i lha bsam gtang gi snod gcig tu
T02D1414:209b-31: za ba ni gsum pa yin te /
T02D1414:209b-32: skye ba'i rim pas tshogs kyi lam gyi dga' ba bzhi bsam gtan bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:209b-33: sbyor ba'i lam sgyu ma lta bur bsgoms nas pho
T02D1414:209b-34: nya'i gtsang sbras dang po 'dus ma byas kyi ye
T02D1414:209b-35: shes skye ba gtsang sbra'i rim pa 'di dag bskyangs
T02D1414:209b-36: pas tshe gcig la gtang ma dag pa'i rnam par
T02D1414:209b-37: thar pa'i rim pa mngon sum gyi lam gyis mthong
T02D1414:209b-38: nas dngos grub ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur te
T02D1414:209b-39: 'byung ngo // mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las /
T02D1414:209b-40: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02D1414:209b-41: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub po //
T02D1414:210a-2: sa dang po'i ye shes skyes na de nyid bsdus pa nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1414:210a-3: bde mchog mnyam sbyor las gsungs pa dang /
T02D1414:210a-4: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsung pa dang /
T02D1414:210a-5: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa dang /
T02D1414:210a-6: dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa dang /
T02D1414:210a-7: rdo rje 'jigs byed las gsungs pa'i dngos grub kyang
T02D1414:210a-8: rgyud 'dir bsam gtan gsum gyis gtsang sbra tsam gyis
T02D1414:210a-9: sngags pas 'grub ste phan yon dang po'o //
T02D1414:210a-10: las kyi phyag rgya sbang pa'i grol lam chos kyi
T02D1414:210a-11: phyag rgya bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas
T02D1414:210a-12: kyang / gtsang sbra gsum po rtog bral ma 'khrul ba mngon sum gyis lam 'di spyad na /
T02D1414:210a-13: grol ba'i lam gyi sa dang po 'thob pa'i bsod
T02D1414:210a-14: nams tha mal pa kha cig gis brjod par mi
T02D1414:210a-15: nus so // phan yon gnyis pa'o /
T02D1414:210a-17: // / dpal he ru ka'i bde ba stong pa nyid
T02D1414:210a-18: kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa sa dang po'i
T02D1414:210a-19: mtshan nyid kun nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa sa
T02D1414:210a-20: bcu'i bsod nams kyi chu 'thud pa nyams pa dag
T02D1414:210a-21: / sdig pa 'jig / grol ba'i lam pa'i mig
T02D1414:210a-26: lus kyis reg pas kyang sdig pa kun las grol nas /
T02D1414:210a-27: zag med kyi lus dag skyon med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:210a-30: // / gang zhig spyod pa byed pa de'i tshe 'di
T02D1414:210a-31: las brtsams te skye ba thams cad du de bzhin
T02D1414:210a-34: bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba phan yon bzhi pa'o //
T02D1414:210a-35: de ltar sa dang po thob nas 'jig rten pa'i
T02D1414:210a-36: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu
T02D1414:210a-37: la gtor ma byin nas sems can gyi don byed
T02D1414:210a-38: pa'i phrin las rnam pa bzhi 'chol ba'i gtor ma'i
T02D1414:210a-39: cho ga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas bshad pa
T02D1414:210a-40: bzhin du bya'o // de ltar sa dang po rang
T02D1414:210a-41: don rdzogs nas sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa
T02D1414:210a-42: nas sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi bar gyis
T02D1414:210a-43: gzhan don gyi spyod pa bslab pa ni /
T02D1414:210a-44: zag med kyi mchod pa rnam par dag pa /
T02D1414:210a-46: yan lag drug cu sems kyis sprul nas /
T02D1414:210a-47: bdag nyid gtso bor byas pa dang mchod pa dang /
T02D1414:210a-48: bum pa bzhi sangs rgyas sogs kyi yum bzhi dang
T02D1414:210b-0: sras dang bcas pa dpa' bo nyi shu @210b rtsa
T02D1414:210b-1: bzhi dang / rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug brten pa gzhal yas khang sbrul pa dang /
T02D1414:210b-2: g-yo ba lha'i spun dang sdug pa dang /
T02D1414:210b-3: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-6: lha'i cha byad byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum las 'das pa'i sgra'i tshul nges par 'byung ba /
T02D1414:210b-7: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul can //
T02D1414:210b-8: zhes bya ba sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02D1414:210b-9: de ltar mdor bstan nas brgyad par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:210b-10: zla ba'i 'dus pa mngon sum gyi las 'dir 'jig rten pa'i spun dang /
T02D1414:210b-11: bu la sogs pa la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-12: sngags sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D1414:210b-13: phyag rgya 'od gsal ba bsgom pa yang bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-15: dam tshig dang ldan pa la dag byed kyis zas tshogs 'khor dang /
T02D1414:210b-16: sngags sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D1414:210b-18: gnas ci rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-19: blang dor gyi gang zag bshad nas /
T02D1414:210b-20: mchod pa dngos bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:210b-21: pho nya gsum ma gtogs pa yul gzhan dang sems
T02D1414:210b-22: bde ba stong pa ma gtogs pa 'dod chags dang
T02D1414:210b-23: gti mug la sogs pa bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-24: thar pa sa bcu 'dod pas pho nya 'dus ma byas bsrung /
T02D1414:210b-25: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags bzhin du 'dus ma byas dang /
T02D1414:210b-27: pho nya ma ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhe na /
T02D1414:210b-28: skye gnas dman pa bsam gtan dang zag med las
T02D1414:210b-29: ma skyes pas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lus la bsnyen
T02D1414:210b-30: bkur gyi mchod pa mi bya'o //
T02D1414:210b-31: bsrung ba'i pho nya gang zhe na /
T02D1414:210b-32: 'dus ma byas thob pa'i ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1414:210b-33: 'dus ma byas de'i 'bras bu ci zhe na /
T02D1414:210b-34: rgya che ba lha'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:210b-35: zab pa bzhin du stong pa nyid 'grub bo //
T02D1414:210b-36: 'dod pa'i khams kyi skye gnas dman pa la nyes pa ci yod ce na /
T02D1414:210b-37: bsam gtan dang zag med kyi dka' thub zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:210b-38: bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen lta bu dang /
T02D1414:210b-39: rtag tu ngu'i tshong dpon gyi bu mo bzhin du
T02D1414:210b-40: lhan cig snyom par zhugs pas 'dus ma byas kyi
T02D1414:210b-41: ye shes 'dren par bye pa de ltar rdzas rgyu
T02D1414:210b-42: rkyen tshogs pa rnam par nges pa gtan la phab
T02D1414:211a-0: pa yin no // de ltar gzhan gyi mchod pa @211a * //
T02D1414:211a-2: brtul zhugs ni rnal 'byor la rtag tu du bde ba stong pa nyid kyis spyod /
T02D1414:211a-3: rkang pa bde stong gi ched du 'dor lag pa
T02D1414:211a-4: bde stong gi ched du bsgyur g-yon pa'i phyed bde
T02D1414:211a-5: bas mchod / lus kyi bde ba stong pa nyid du bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:211a-6: shin tu'am rnam par g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1414:211a-7: bde stong gi ched du tshim zhing za /
T02D1414:211a-8: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi brtul zhugs las ma nyams na brtul zhugs rdzogs pa yin no //
T02D1414:211a-9: sgrub pa bo zag med kyi dam tshig la brtson pa dang /
T02D1414:211a-10: zag med kyi rigs la spyod pa dang /
T02D1414:211a-11: zag med kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i zas la spyod pa dang /
T02D1414:211a-12: rigs lnga'am rigs bzhi 'dus ma byas kyi rigs gcig tu bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:211a-14: de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la mchod
T02D1414:211a-15: na yul gyi bsod snyoms don yod pa za bar
T02D1414:211a-16: yin no // stong pa nyid thob pa'i spros bcas kyi spyod pa ni /
T02D1414:211a-17: sha lngas dkyil 'khor gru gsum la mngon spyod byed pa phyi'i sbyin sreg go //
T02D1414:211a-18: de bzhin du dpa' bo'i zas phrin las rnam bzhi
T02D1414:211a-19: sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas dpal he ru
T02D1414:211a-20: ka'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02D1414:211a-21: sbyin sreg gi bstan bcos rgya chen po pha rol
T02D1414:211a-22: gzhan las byung ba bzhin du nang gi sbyin sreg
T02D1414:211a-23: bya ba dang / gtum mo drod rtag tu bzung
T02D1414:211a-24: bar byas nas phrin las rnam bzhi kun la gtum
T02D1414:211a-25: mo drod kyi 'khor lo bzhi bsregs nas byang chub
T02D1414:211a-26: kyi sems phab pa bsrungs na bgegs mi 'byung bas
T02D1414:211a-27: gsang ba'i sbyin sreg 'di la dngos grub gzhan du
T02D1414:211a-29: chags pa'i lam gyi sbyin sreg ni bcom pa ma
T02D1414:211a-30: lha'i bshes gnyen lta bu'i pho nya mchog bzang po
T02D1414:211a-31: dang ting nge 'dzin brtson zhing lhan cig ldan pa
T02D1414:211a-32: pas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu bzhin du
T02D1414:211a-33: btsun mo'i bha ga thab khung gsang ba'i rdo rje
T02D1414:211a-34: dbang gzar / byang chub sems kyi dbang blugs ma
T02D1414:211a-35: chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pas dga' bral gyi
T02D1414:211a-36: rjes rnam par 'byed pa spong ba yin no //
T02D1414:211a-37: bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i don stong pa nyid
T02D1414:211a-38: du bsgrubs nas bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg tu
T02D1414:211a-39: 'gyur ro // de ltar gzhan gyi don gyi mchod
T02D1414:211a-40: pa dang bstod pa dang brtul zhugs rdzogs nas 'bras
T02D1414:211a-41: bu dbang bzhi bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:211b-0: rdo rje spun @211b dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi spun dang /
T02D1414:211b-1: gtso bo bde mchog pha dang /
T02D1414:211b-2: yum dang lhan cig bde mchog nyid du lha'i mig gi mngon shes kyi mthong ba de'i tshe /
T02D1414:211b-3: lce sbom zhes bya ba dung can ma'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1414:211b-4: mig dmar ser zhes bya ba padma can gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1414:211b-5: rtsub bcing zhes bya ba ri dags can gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1414:211b-6: spu ni dmar ser yin zhes bya ba phreng ba
T02D1414:211b-7: can gyi mtshan nyid mi slob pa'i stong pa nyid
T02D1414:211b-8: bskyed pa'i lha mo ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i le'u
T02D1414:211b-9: lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa las bshad pa'o /
T02D1414:211b-11: // / de la rnal 'byor bzhi bskyed pa skye ba'i rim pa ni /
T02D1414:211b-12: dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyu aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D1414:211b-13: bde stong gi brtul zhugs la dga' ba la dran
T02D1414:211b-14: pa'i nges pa drangs nas mngon sum gyi chad ma
T02D1414:211b-15: dang yang dag par ldan pas gnas nyi shu rtsa
T02D1414:211b-16: bzhi'am mkha' 'gro ma spyod pa mngon shes dang /
T02D1414:211b-17: grol ba rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum gyi 'bras bu ster ba dung can ma yin no //
T02D1414:211b-18: rjes su rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i don dngos grub kun
T02D1414:211b-19: bsgrubs na rtsa ba'i sngags srog aa wa dh'u t'ir
T02D1414:211b-20: chud pa zlos shing snod bcud kyi 'jig rten gsum
T02D1414:211b-21: gyi 'bras bu yid nang du chud pa'i sngags 'di
T02D1414:211b-23: de'i padma can dang snyoms par 'jug pa yin no //
T02D1414:211b-24: shin tu rnal 'byor ni sgrub pa po dngos grub la brtson ba rgyu'i rkyen dang /
T02D1414:211b-25: sngags yid nang du chud pa mtshungs pa med pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang /
T02D1414:211b-26: phyag rgya dang ldan pa dmigs pa'i rkyen las gal te /
T02D1414:211b-27: tshogs pa ma tshad na yul dmigs pa'i rkyen phyag rgya ri dags can lta bu dang bral na /
T02D1414:211b-28: yid nang du chud pa'i gsang sngags kyi lus can
T02D1414:211b-29: rnal 'byor pas la sems kyi stong nyid rtogs par
T02D1414:211b-31: skye ba'i dus ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag
T02D1414:211b-32: ces bya ba gtum mo drod kyi byang chub kyi
T02D1414:211b-33: sems phab pas dbang po bdag po'i rkyen dang bzhi
T02D1414:211b-34: tshogs na shin tu rnal 'byor rtogs par 'gyur ro
T02D1414:211b-35: // rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i don zung 'ug gi rnal 'byor chen po ni /
T02D1414:211b-36: blo gros chen po mthong rnams kyis //
T02D1414:211b-37: rnam pa thams cad cig car nges //
T02D1414:211b-38: zhes bya ba 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas thams
T02D1414:211b-39: cad mkhyen pa 'bras bu mi slob pa'i ye shes
T02D1414:212a-0: yin no // rgyud bde mchog gi lugs kyi phyag rgya bzhi mngon sum gyi lam la @212a * //
T02D1414:212a-1: brten nas tshogs lam yang snod gcig tu za ba dang /
T02D1414:212a-2: sbyor lam bzhi ba'i btung ba dang /
T02D1414:212a-3: mthong lam pho nya'i gtsang sbra dang /
T02D1414:212a-4: bsgom lam gzhan don gyi brtul zhugs dang /
