T02D1414:212a-5: mi slob pa'i lam la dung can ma dang /
T02D1414:212a-7: phreng ba can zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi
T02D1414:212a-8: 'khor los sgyur ba'i btsun mo rin po che dang
T02D1414:212a-9: 'dra ba'i reg bya'i stong pa nyid las mi slob
T02D1414:212a-10: pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum skye bar gsungs so
T02D1414:212a-11: // de lta bu'i lam de la gnas pa'i rnal
T02D1414:212a-12: 'byor pa la gang zhig snang na khyi'i skye gnas
T02D1414:212a-13: // dag / sme sha can du 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:212a-14: mngon sum gyi lam bor nas lha'i 'khor lo la
T02D1414:212a-15: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsgoms kyang chu bsrubs pa las
T02D1414:212a-16: mar mi 'byung ba bzhin du nyon mongs par zad
T02D1414:212a-17: do // bsod nams kyi tshogs thos pa dang 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1414:212a-18: mchod pa byed pa ni tshe 'di la mchod pa la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:212a-19: me la sbyin sreg sbyor dang ldan //
T02D1414:212a-20: bzlas pa yis ni bag chags zad //
T02D1414:212a-22: rnal 'byor gzhan bsod nams kyi tshogs la brten yang
T02D1414:212a-23: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyud la don med par
T02D1414:212a-24: 'gyur ro // de ltar nyes dmigs bshad nas phan yon bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:212a-25: sems kyi stong nyid rtogs pa'i dpa' bo yul mtha'
T02D1414:212a-26: 'khob na gnas sam rigs dan kla klo yin yang
T02D1414:212a-27: yul de sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su rtag pa
T02D1414:212a-28: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems can
T02D1414:212a-29: gzung ba'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D1414:212a-30: g-yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas byin gyis
T02D1414:212a-31: gzung ba'i phyir / rlob po // le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:212a-33: // / de ltar rdzogs rim gyi 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:212a-34: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags kyi las tshogs bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:212a-35: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:212a-37: mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa bdun dang dpa' bo
T02D1414:212a-38: nyi shu rtsa lnga kun gyi snying po 'di dran
T02D1414:212a-39: pa tsam gyis sa g-yon bar byed pa ni phan
T02D1414:212a-40: yon no // sngags 'di las thams cad byed pa dang /
T02D1414:212a-41: dngos grub gsum bskyed pa ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1414:212a-42: sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che zhes bya ba yab kyi nye snying ngo //
T02D1414:212b-0: 'dis kyang phrin las rnam @212b bzhi byed par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsum sgrub par byed pa yin /
T02D1414:212b-1: lha thams cad kyi sngags su grags pa yin pa ni phan yon no //
T02D1414:212b-2: 'bras bu ni sa 'og la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D1414:212b-3: gsum na gang cung zad yod pa'i dngos grub thams
T02D1414:212b-5: yab yum gyi snying po'i phan yon dang 'bras bu dang /
T02D1414:212b-6: yab kyi snying po'i phan yon dang 'bras bu bzhi
T02D1414:212b-7: bshad nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas 'byung
T02D1414:212b-8: ba bzhi dang ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas
T02D1414:212b-9: khang bskyed la mkha' 'gro ma bzhin dang /
T02D1414:212b-10: lha mo bcu gnyis bcom ldan 'das yab yum dang bcu bzhi h'um las skyes /
T02D1414:212b-11: dpa' bo'i mchog bum pa bzhi ha ha he he las skyes /
T02D1414:212b-13: a'a: las gsung gi 'khor lo skyes /
T02D1414:212b-14: h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo skyes /
T02D1414:212b-15: 'khor lo'i gnas su bzhugs pa'i lha drug cu rtsa gnyis la go cha bskon dbang bskur /
T02D1414:212b-16: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug / bdud rtsi myang rtag
T02D1414:212b-17: tu mchod dngos grub 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1414:212b-18: mnyam par gzhag dngos grub kyi rgyur sngags kyi bzlas
T02D1414:212b-19: pa bya / yab yum gyi snying po dang nye
T02D1414:212b-20: snying gi 'khrul 'khor bya ba zhes sngon gyi sangs
T02D1414:212b-22: dpa' bo byed bas kyang gsungs so //
T02D1414:212b-23: lha 'di rnams da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na bzhugs
T02D1414:212b-24: sam zhe na khyim dang gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1414:212b-25: dang / nye ba'i grong brgyad la sogs pa gnas
T02D1414:212b-26: sum cu rtsa bdun mdun du mkha' 'gro ma re
T02D1414:212b-27: re la 'khor bye ba bye bas bskor nas bzhugs
T02D1414:212b-28: pas bskyed rim gyi bsgom pa dang bzlas pas dngos
T02D1414:212b-29: grub kun skye bar byed pa dge zhing shis pa'i
T02D1414:212b-30: dang / lam yin no // le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:212b-32: // / dngos grub yi yan lag gi le'u bshad nas /
T02D1414:212b-33: thun mong gi 'khor lo le'u bcu drug bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:212b-34: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:212b-36: de la dang po lugs su blugs pa'am /
T02D1414:212b-38: sku gzugs mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i ras
T02D1414:212b-39: ris sam mi'i rus pa las 'bur du brkos pa
T02D1414:212b-40: las dang po ba'i rnal 'byor pas rtag tu bcang
T02D1414:212b-41: / mchod pa bdud rtsi lngas bya /
T02D1414:213a-0: mi'i sha skam gyi bdug pas bdugs na bla na med pa'i @213a * //
T02D1414:213a-1: dngos grub dang rgyal srid nyid kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro /
T02D1414:213a-2: de ltar las dang po bshad nas /
T02D1414:213a-3: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa phyis 'chad pa'i
T02D1414:213a-4: rnal 'byor pas glang po che'i pags pa la sogs
T02D1414:213a-5: pa mtshan ma thob pas zhag bdun du ras ris
T02D1414:213a-6: kyi mdun du bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub /
T02D1414:213a-7: gal te ma grub na yang rnal 'byor ma dang
T02D1414:213a-8: bla ma'i rgyud la gnas skyes kyi mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1414:213a-9: rnams kyi bstan nas grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1414:213a-10: // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:213a-11: mkha' bsgrub glang po che'i pags pa la bya'o zhes
T02D1414:213a-12: bya ba nas rgyal mtshan gyi gos la bri'o zhes
T02D1414:213a-13: bya ba'i bar du ras ris nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1414:213a-14: go sla'o // rengs par byed pa rdo leb la bri ba dang /
T02D1414:213a-15: ce sbyang mo'i pags pa la bri ba'i bar ni bris sku la rab gnas bya'o /
T02D1414:213a-16: gser dngul la sogs pa lugs ma dang /
T02D1414:213a-17: rdo leb la sogs pa la 'bur du brkos pa dang /
T02D1414:213a-18: shing ngam dus pa la sogs pa la rko ba'i bye brag dang /
T02D1414:213a-22: gang pa las byas pa'i lder so la rab gnas bya'o //
T02D1414:213a-23: de ltar rab gnas bshad nas /
T02D1414:213a-25: dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag / ces bya ba nas /
T02D1414:213a-26: cho ga bzhin du sku gzugs bri //
T02D1414:213a-28: mi'i skra las pir dang thig skud bya ba dang /
T02D1414:213a-29: mi'i ro'i gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lha bshos bya ba dang /
T02D1414:213a-30: der ni phyugs bdun dbul bar bya //
T02D1414:213a-31: zhes bya ba mchod pa'i rdzas go sla'o //
T02D1414:213a-32: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
T02D1414:213a-35: zhes bya ba rab gnas bsgrub pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba ste /
T02D1414:213a-37: rab tu gnas pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D1414:213a-38: nyis 'gyur tshogs pa bsags byas te //
T02D1414:213a-40: chun 'phyang dag gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1414:213a-41: zhes pa'i bar ni rab gnas kyi rdzas dbul ba ste go sla'o //
T02D1414:213a-42: don du pa lha la dbang bskur ba'i bum pa ni /
T02D1414:213a-43: ras kyi mgul pa bcing pa bdud rtsi lnga dang gser dang dngul dang /
T02D1414:213a-45: byi ru dag dang dung ste rin po che lnga dang /
T02D1414:213a-46: thabs kyi sman lnga shes rab kyi sman lnga ste bcu dang /
T02D1414:213b-0: ga bur dang tsandan la sogs pa dri'i bye brag dang aargha'i snod @213b tsu ta'i shing dang /
T02D1414:213b-1: tsam pa ka'i yan lag dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1414:213b-2: bum pa'i nang du thub kyi snam aambu tsambu dang /
T02D1414:213b-7: drug pa ni danydza danydza dang /
T02D1414:213b-8: bdun pa ke ru karni ka dang /
T02D1414:213b-9: brgyad pa ae na ra bi da dang /
T02D1414:213b-10: dgu pa ha sa de ba dang /
T02D1414:213b-11: bcu pa tsam bu ste sman rnams bum par bcug la /
T02D1414:213b-12: sku'i sman ai ma na dang /
T02D1414:213b-13: gsung gi sman dz'a ti pha la dang /
T02D1414:213b-14: thugs kyi sman gla gor zho sha dang bcas pas sku khrus gsol ba dang dbang bskur ro //
T02D1414:213b-15: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i rjes la gser gyi mchod phyir
T02D1414:213b-16: thogs cod pan dang bcas pa dang phyag rgya drug
T02D1414:213b-17: gi brgyan nas / lha la na bza' gsol te /
T02D1414:213b-18: sgrub pa po rnams rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
T02D1414:213b-19: sems gcer bus gar byed cing stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1414:213b-20: sems kyis rab gnas byas pa'i lha la dad pa
T02D1414:213b-21: sngon du 'gro bas dus gsum du mchod pa'am /
T02D1414:213b-22: tshe bcu'am yar ngo mar ngo'i chos bco lnga la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1414:213b-24: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:213b-27: spyan dbye ba rna ba dang sna dang zhal dbye ba na bza' gsol la yo byad dbul /
T02D1414:213b-28: de nas mchod pa rgyas pa bya ba kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:213b-29: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:213b-31: // / de ltar rab gnas bshad nas dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo 'chad pa ni /
T02D1414:213b-32: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:213b-34: dkyil 'khor thams cad du dngos grub bsgrub pa rtsa
T02D1414:213b-35: ba'i rgyud kyi le'u dang po ro mnyam gyi dkyil
T02D1414:213b-37: dkyil 'khor gyi snying lha thams cad skyes pa'i le'u 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1414:213b-38: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni //
T02D1414:213b-39: shin du mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
T02D1414:213b-40: zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis rten gyi gang zag bstan to //
T02D1414:213b-41: sprang mi mtshal dang ga bur bcas //
T02D1414:213b-42: zhes bya bas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dngos te sbrang rtsi ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1414:213b-44: ga bur ni byang sems so //
T02D1414:213b-45: tsandan dmar ni sha chen no //
T02D1414:214a-0: sbyar ba ni rnam par snang mdzad dang go cha'i lha'i rigs tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i nang @214a * //
T02D1414:214a-1: du bum pa bzhi'i gnas su bzhag nas /
T02D1414:214a-2: kha zas kun gyi mchog tu bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:214a-3: tshogs kyi lha de rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1414:214a-4: rdo rje kun 'khor dang mchog gtso bo mtshan ma thams cad rdo rje'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa'o //
T02D1414:214a-5: bcud len du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1414:214a-6: aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1414:214a-7: grol ba'i lam pas sbom po mtheb mo dang /
T02D1414:214a-8: mtha' ltag srin lag gi rtse mo sbyar nas rnal
T02D1414:214a-9: 'byor pas sgyu ma lta bu rigs pas btung bar
T02D1414:214a-10: bya'o // chags lam gyi dbang du byas na /
T02D1414:214a-11: rdo rje gdan bzhi las sbom po mtha' ltag bha
T02D1414:214a-12: ga rtse sbyar ba aa wa dh'u t'i ra phrad
T02D1414:214a-13: nas bde ba sgyu ma lta bur rig pas rtag
T02D1414:214a-14: tu spyad pa'o // rnal 'byor pa gnyi ga la
T02D1414:214a-15: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen srog aa wa
T02D1414:214a-16: dh'u t'ir sod pa dang dbang po bdag po'i rkyen
T02D1414:214a-17: bsam gtan thob nas chags lam grol lam gnyi g-yul
T02D1414:214a-18: ro dang reg bya yin pas sgyu mar 'gro ba
T02D1414:214a-20: dper na mu stegs can la ri bo ba di
T02D1414:214a-21: ra las rtsva so ma na btus nas w'a r'a
T02D1414:214a-22: na s'i'i bya ka ra gi wang yod pa'i ba
T02D1414:214a-23: ser mo'i pags par btums nas rig byed kyi sngags
T02D1414:214a-24: kyis byin gyis brlabs nas gang zag gis 'thungs pas
T02D1414:214a-25: srid pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dpe de bzhin
T02D1414:214a-26: du bdud rtsi lnga myang nas na dngos grub rtag
T02D1414:214a-28: gal te sgyu ma lta bum rtogs na mi 'chi
T02D1414:214a-29: bar tshe ring ba dang nad med par 'gyur te
T02D1414:214a-30: / 'jig rten gyi dngos grub thams cad la 'jug go //
T02D1414:214a-31: de ltar zhi ba'i btung ba sgyu ma lta bur
T02D1414:214a-32: rtogs nas sngags 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor byar rung
T02D1414:214a-33: / gnyis pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur
T02D1414:214a-34: ba mchod pa'i bzhi rdo rje'i rigs la stong nyid
T02D1414:214a-35: / bsgom pa dang / rin po che'i rigs la mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D1414:214a-36: padma'i rigs la smon pa med pa dang /
T02D1414:214a-37: las kyi rigs la 'od gsal ba'i mchod pa bzhi
T02D1414:214a-38: ye shes las skyes pa bsgom pa de bzhin du
T02D1414:214a-39: / dpa' bo rnal 'byor pa ni las dang po
T02D1414:214a-40: pa'i dang par spyod pa la yang dbang po gnyis
T02D1414:214a-41: kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'i reg bya las don dam
T02D1414:214a-42: pa'i de kho na nyid 'dus ma byas sems kyis
T02D1414:214a-43: 'dzin cing rtogs pa ni bsnyen pa yin no //
T02D1414:214b-0: des kyang @214b gtso bo la 'bum dang me tog phog pa'i lha la 'bum /
T02D1414:214b-2: bde ba stong pa nyid de lha dang mi'i bde
T02D1414:214b-3: ba zag bcas pas zag med kyi bcu drug char
T02D1414:214b-4: yang mi phod do zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D1414:214b-5: te / 'dir zag med las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang brtags nas bshad do //
T02D1414:214b-6: bsnyen pa bstan nas sa'i cho ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1414:214b-7: gnas bshad pa gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod la
T02D1414:214b-8: sogs par dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya zhes bya ba
T02D1414:214b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshon nyid ni gdul bya drag
T02D1414:214b-11: po 'jigs byed dur khrod du spyod pa dang mthun
T02D1414:214b-12: pa'i ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye ma las nag
T02D1414:214b-13: po rus phye la dkar po /
T02D1414:214b-14: so phag tshig pa las dmar po /
T02D1414:214b-16: dur khrod shing lo las ljang gi bya ste /
T02D1414:214b-17: phyug na rin po che dang bsre /
T02D1414:214b-18: dbul na rin po che med pa'o //
T02D1414:214b-19: tshon gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas bzhi pa slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1414:214b-20: lus gang yid gsum thams cad zag med dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1414:214b-21: zag bcas kyi mtshan nyid kun spangs pa /
T02D1414:214b-22: sems kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyud snga bzhi 'dus ma
T02D1414:214b-23: byas zhes pa ni 'dus byas lha'i 'khor lo shes
T02D1414:214b-24: pa / sngags zhes pa ni ngag go //
T02D1414:214b-25: khro med snying rje can gtsang ba /
T02D1414:214b-26: ltung ba med pa mkhas pa de nyid bcu shes
T02D1414:214b-27: pa sbyor zhes zhi gnas dang ldan pa ye shes
T02D1414:214b-28: lhag mthong gis 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba
T02D1414:214b-29: spyi gtsug rus pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pas brgyan
T02D1414:214b-30: pa nas phyag rgya drug la thal bas byugs pa
T02D1414:214b-31: / go cha drug gis lus brgyan pa rus pa'i
T02D1414:214b-32: phreng ba'i tshangs pa'i skud pa can rna rgyan la
T02D1414:214b-33: sogs pa rus dang ldan pa dum bu gcig las
T02D1414:214b-34: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo byas pa /
T02D1414:214b-35: rus phreng gi do shal yod pa lag pa g-yon pas kha tv'am ga gzung ba /
T02D1414:214b-36: g-yas pas cang te'u thogs pa /
T02D1414:214b-37: gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1414:214b-38: 'jig dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1414:214b-39: byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang /
T02D1414:214b-40: ting 'dzin mchod pa nye bar bsdu //
T02D1414:214b-41: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sta gon gyi lha bsgoms pas bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas /
T02D1414:214b-42: de'i 'og tu bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i cho ga byed pas /
T02D1414:215a-0: snying gar 'khor lo nyi shu la bcug nas bdag nyid go cha chen po lus kyi @215a * //
T02D1414:215a-1: 'khor lo la bgos te ra ba rnams phyogs bzhir dgod /
T02D1414:215a-2: 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas
T02D1414:215a-3: khang dang 'dra ba steng du mda'i dra ba bdag
T02D1414:215a-4: nyid la go cha drug bskon /
T02D1414:215a-5: logs su rdo rje'i ra ba steng du rdo rje'i
T02D1414:215a-6: bla re me 'od kyi phreng ba phur bus gdab
T02D1414:215a-7: pa byas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang
T02D1414:215a-8: po brgya byin gyis kyang gzhig par mi nus phan
T02D1414:215a-9: yon no // de nas lha lhag gnas /
T02D1414:215a-10: bum pa spyin sreg / slob ma lhag gnas kha
T02D1414:215a-11: bskang de ltar sta gon rdzogs na bdag nyid la
T02D1414:215a-13: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa'i lhar bskyed nas /
T02D1414:215a-15: zhes pa ni mdor bstan to //
T02D1414:215a-16: rgyas bshad ni de nas sems med ro'i skra'am /
T02D1414:215a-18: ro g-yogs kyi ras kyi skud pas thig gdab pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:215a-19: de'i dbus su tshon dgye ba ni /
T02D1414:215a-20: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba dang ge sar
T02D1414:215a-21: du bcas pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi
T02D1414:215a-22: spyan gsum phyag bcu gnyis las glang po che'i pags
T02D1414:215a-23: pa smin mtshams kyi thad du bsnams pa /
T02D1414:215a-24: rdo rje dang dril bu 'gying bas snying gar 'khyud pa /
T02D1414:215a-25: kha tv'am ga dang phyag mtshan lnga bstan pas phyag
T02D1414:215a-26: mtshan bdun le'u bcu bzhi pa ro mnyam gyi 'khor
T02D1414:215a-29: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo drug cu yang ro mnyam bzhin du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bya'o //
T02D1414:215a-30: dngos grub 'dod na lha yab yum tshang pa la
T02D1414:215a-31: dbang bskur bya ma tshang na dngos grub mi thob
T02D1414:215a-32: bo // thig gdab pa dang tshon dgye ba bstan nas bum pa bsgrub pa ni /
T02D1414:215a-33: rtsa ba nag po med pa mtshan nyid do //
T02D1414:215a-34: mu tig la sogs pa ni rin che lnga'o //
T02D1414:215a-35: grangs shar phyogs su rgyal ba dang bkra shis //
T02D1414:215a-36: lho phyogs su dngos grub dang rnam 'phrul /
T02D1414:215a-37: nub tu rgyal ba dang rnams rgyal /
T02D1414:215a-38: byang du grub pa dang srung ba /
T02D1414:215a-39: rnam rgyal dang grub pa la gser dul gyis phyag
T02D1414:215a-40: mtshan bris la mu tig gi phreng bas kha brgyan
T02D1414:215a-41: pa'o // de ltar bum pa bsgrub pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:215a-43: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byor na rin po che gser la sogs pas bris na dngos grub thob po //
T02D1414:215a-44: kun nas sgo'i bum pa las thams cad rnam par rgyal ba'i dri'i chus bsang la /
T02D1414:215b-0: mar @215b me zhes bya ba sems gsal bar byed
T02D1414:215b-1: pa'i sha rgyas nye bar mtshon pa'i me tog bdug
T02D1414:215b-2: pa mar me dri chab lha bshos kun rgyan yin
T02D1414:215b-3: no // de ltar rdzas bsags nas don lnga pa ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba ni /
T02D1414:215b-4: mkha' 'gro ma yid la gzhug pa dang sa steng gsung la gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-5: sa 'og sku la gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-6: ma mo bcu gnyis phyogs mtshams su gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-7: dur khro brgyad dang gzhal yas khang yang shugs kyis rtogs so //
T02D1414:215b-8: don drug pa mchod pa'i rdzas dbul ba ni /
T02D1414:215b-9: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma re re la dngos grub 'dod pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1414:215b-11: dmar ba gsung dang re ba ye shes kyi 'khor la dkar ba sku /
T02D1414:215b-14: sna tshogs pa mtshams bzhi la mda' phur bu brgyad kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D1414:215b-15: bza' ba dang btung ba tshogs 'khor la'o //
T02D1414:215b-16: de ltar drug pas dkyil 'khor mchod nas /
T02D1414:215b-17: slob mas 'dod yon lnga'i dngos po kun gyis slob dpon mnyes par byas la /
T02D1414:215b-18: dngos grub 'dod pas ci nus kyi yon dbul lo //
T02D1414:215b-19: de nas slob dpon gyi bdag 'jug bya ste /
T02D1414:215b-20: dril sbyang lo bcu gnyis ma dang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-21: sgra snyan dril bu bcu drug ma dang bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-22: brda nyi shu pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa
T02D1414:215b-23: ha brgyad kyis ye shes bab kyi bar du bsgom
T02D1414:215b-24: la de nyid kyi dga' bral du mi gtang bar
T02D1414:215b-25: bya'o // de ltar slob ma'i gdong la dar gyis bcings nas /
T02D1414:215b-26: snyim par me tog gzhag pa phyi'i 'jug pa bdun rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-28: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-30: phyi rol bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:215b-31: sgo bzhi nas zhugs nas padma'i gar bskor bas phyag bya ba dang /
T02D1414:215b-32: slob ma sras por lha'i dam tshig bsgrags pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-33: slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-35: snyim pa'i me tog gtor ba /
T02D1414:215b-36: gang du babs pa rang gi lhar shes par bya
T02D1414:215b-37: ba'i phyir lan cig bskor ba byas nas shin tu
T02D1414:215b-38: mnyam par bzhag pas ye shes dbab pa dang /
T02D1414:215b-39: grod khyer mchog gi nang du gzhug pa'o //
T02D1414:215b-40: de nas slob mas lho phyogs su lus kyis gnas
T02D1414:215b-41: te sngar me tog 'phangs pa ma phog na slar
T02D1414:216a-2: gang la bab pa de'i rigs bstan /
T02D1414:216a-5: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba bya /
T02D1414:216a-8: slob dpon legs par mnyam par bzhag pas phyag rgya
T02D1414:216a-9: lha mo rnams ye shes phab nas bum pa dang
T02D1414:216a-14: de nas nyin zhag gnyis pa la sangs rgyas mnyam
T02D1414:216a-15: sbyor gyi rgyud las bdud rtsi lnga la mtshal chen
T02D1414:216a-16: gyi ming gis btags pa la /
T02D1414:216a-17: aom a'a:h'um gsum gyi bzlas pas gnas gsum du thig le byas la /
T02D1414:216a-18: lce la bdud rtsi lnga bzhag nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o /
T02D1414:216a-19: de nas nyin zhag gsum pa la slob ma'i gdong phye la lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02D1414:216a-20: bde ba stong pa nyid bskyed pa'i lha'i gnas rtsa
T02D1414:216a-21: dbu ma gang yin pa der 'dus ma byas kyi
T02D1414:216a-22: stong nyid de yang bstan par bya'o //
T02D1414:216a-23: de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur nas
T02D1414:216a-24: slob mas slob dpon la phyag bya bskor ba bya
T02D1414:216a-25: / yon dbul ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:216a-26: de ltar bla ma nyes pa dang /
T02D1414:216a-27: dbang bskur ba nges par byas nas de'i rjes la
T02D1414:216a-28: sgrub pa pos yon dbul ba rab tu nges par
T02D1414:216a-29: bya'o // de ltar byas pa'i phan yon ni //
T02D1414:216a-30: sgrub pa po de la mkha' 'gro ma kun mnyes
T02D1414:216a-31: pas sgrub pa po'i mngag gzhug byed pa dang po'o
T02D1414:216a-32: // rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub tu 'gyur ba mi snang ba gnyis so //
T02D1414:216a-33: sgrub pa po rang 'dod pa tsam gyis gzugs du ma byed pa dang /
T02D1414:216a-34: tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa gsum pa'o //
T02D1414:216a-35: sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bas dngos grub mi 'thob pa dang /
T02D1414:216a-36: sku gsum gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na lha la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T02D1414:216a-37: de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa las khyad par du 'gyur ba ston to //
T02D1414:216a-38: de ltar phan yon lnga bshad nas /
T02D1414:216a-39: 'di'i brjod bya bshad zin pa'i don dang ma bshad pa'i don thams cad kyis brjod bya dang /
T02D1414:216a-40: dpal he ru ka'i snang ba yin par ston to //
T02D1414:216a-41: le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:216a-43: // / de ltar dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo bshad nas /
T02D1414:216b-0: de nas gzhan yang @216b bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:216b-2: chags pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1414:216b-3: chags bral gyi mtshams gang du chags bral gyi chus
T02D1414:216b-4: mi gos shing 'dod pa'i khams kyi chags pa spangs
T02D1414:216b-5: pa'i mtshams der stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas
T02D1414:216b-6: / sems can thams cad kyi srid pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02D1414:216b-7: de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni
T02D1414:216b-8: gong du bstan pa'i rim pas sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor
T02D1414:216b-9: lnga dang / dngos gzhi 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa bskyed nas /
T02D1414:216b-10: he ru ka dbyangs skyong gi lha mngon par byang
T02D1414:216b-11: chub lnga'i rim pas rdzus skyes cig car 'byung ba'i
T02D1414:216b-16: thun bzhi ru ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1414:216b-18: zhas gsum phyag drug pa'i sku mdog dkar po dbyangs skyong gi lha bsgoms nas /
T02D1414:216b-19: dbyangs skyong gi bstod pa'i don ni rnal 'byor pas lha thams cad bsgom pa la dga' bral /
T02D1414:216b-20: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems su mi gtong zhes bstod pa yin no //
T02D1414:216b-21: de la rdzogs rim bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:216b-22: dga' ba bzhi'i gnas 'khor lo bzhi dang aa thung
T02D1414:216b-23: dang ham las bden pa bzhi dang phag mo dang
T02D1414:216b-24: khrag 'thung ba'i ming gis btags pa la rtsa 'dab
T02D1414:216b-25: drug cu rtsa bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang
T02D1414:216b-26: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ngag la dga' bral du
T02D1414:216b-27: mi 'gyur ba'i lam bde ba chen po stong pa
T02D1414:216b-28: nyid bsgom pa la dbyangs skyong zhes bya'o //
T02D1414:216b-29: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshams su /
T02D1414:216b-30: rjes su sgrub pa'i don bskyed pa'i rim pas zhal
T02D1414:216b-31: gsum phyag drug pa'i lha'i sku bsgoms nas bdud rtsi
T02D1414:216b-32: lnga myangs te dbyangs skyong gi sngags kyis mnyam par
T02D1414:216b-34: de la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:216b-35: go cha bgo ba dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:216b-36: bdud rtsi myangs nas bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:216b-37: bzlas par bya ba shes so //
T02D1414:216b-38: de la dbyangs skyong gi 'bras bu dang po phrin
T02D1414:216b-39: las rnam bzhi kun byed pa gnyis pa dus ma
T02D1414:216b-40: yin pa'i 'chi ba las rgyal ba /
T02D1414:216b-41: gsum pa zhi ba la sogs pa 'grub pa /
T02D1414:216b-42: bzhi pa dus gsum shes pa /
T02D1414:216b-43: lnga pa stong phrag gcig bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa /
T02D1414:217a-0: drug pa zhag gsum gyis lha'i @217a * //
T02D1414:217a-2: bdun pa mngon shes drug rig pa /
T02D1414:217a-3: brgyad pa skye rga na 'chi spangs pa'o //
T02D1414:217a-5: gal te de ma thob na bskyar ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1414:217a-6: 'byung po'i nyin zhag gsum la tshogs 'khor byas la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang /
T02D1414:217a-7: gal te mngon sum mthong na phyag bya mchod yon dbul /
T02D1414:217a-8: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas dngos grub blang /
T02D1414:217a-9: mngon bar shes pa drug mnga' ba'i dpa' bo thams
T02D1414:217a-10: cad mkhyen pa khams gsum gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro
T02D1414:217a-12: 'di ni dpa' bo chen po ste /
T02D1414:217a-13: gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1414:217a-14: zhes pa bdag lta'i gzung 'dzin dang bral nas sa
T02D1414:217a-15: gzhi rgya mtsho dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba rigs drug
T02D1414:217a-16: gi don la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:217a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi bstod pa mngon par brjod pa le'u lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:217a-19: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:217a-20: thams cad kyi nye ba'i snying po yi ge bdun
T02D1414:217a-21: pa'i lha bsgom pa ni gong du bstan pa'i sngon
T02D1414:217a-22: 'gro lnga byas nas 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab
T02D1414:217a-23: sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur pa'i rang bzhin gzhal yas
T02D1414:217a-24: khang gi dbus su yi ge h'um las byung ba'i
T02D1414:217a-25: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sku
T02D1414:217a-26: mdog dang phyag mtshan go sla'o //
T02D1414:217a-27: lha mo drug ni h'um dang phat kyi bar du yi ge drug las bskyed do //
T02D1414:217a-28: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:217a-32: byang chub yan lag bdun bsgom pa dang bzlas pa ni snga ma bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D1414:217a-33: khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste //
T02D1414:217a-34: mnyam med gsang sngags bzla bar bya //
T02D1414:217a-35: zhes bya ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bkod pa
T02D1414:217a-36: de la yi ge bdun pa bkod nas bzlas na
T02D1414:217a-37: zhag bdun gyis the tshom med par 'grub ste n'a
T02D1414:217a-38: ro pas dgyes pa'i rdo rje yan lag drug gis
T02D1414:217a-39: 'chad pa'i 'grel pa mdzad nas mtshan thog thag gcig
T02D1414:217a-40: gis ti lo pa'i lung bstan thob pa'i phyir te
T02D1414:217a-41: / gdams ngag drug 'grub nas sh'anti pa las gsang 'dus zhus /
T02D1414:217a-42: he badzra'i 'grel pa mtha' drug tshul bzhi pa mdzad do //
T02D1414:217a-43: ma grub na bskyar ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1414:217b-0: dpyi zla tha chungs kyi nya la tshogs @217b kyi
T02D1414:217b-1: 'khor lo byas na tho rangs he ru ka dang
T02D1414:217b-3: mngon par brjod pa las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:217b-5: // / de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi snying po bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:217b-6: sngon 'gro lnga 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02D1414:217b-7: de'i dbus su yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig las
T02D1414:217b-8: drod gsher skyes kyi lha sems cad kun la phan
T02D1414:217b-10: h'um dang shr'i gnyis gtso bo yab yum zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1414:217b-11: padma 'dab ma brgyad la aom shir du /
T02D1414:217b-15: de las 'khor mkha' 'gro ma bzhi zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1414:217b-16: mtshams bzhi ru bum pa bzhi dang thod pa /
T02D1414:217b-17: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs brgyad zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa mdog sngon po sha stag go //
T02D1414:217b-18: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhir lha mo brgyad zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1414:217b-19: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud las go sla'o //
T02D1414:217b-20: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:217b-24: bsgom pa'i tshe dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo /
T02D1414:217b-26: snying gar thugs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bsdu bsgoms la /
T02D1414:217b-27: lha nyi shu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyi snying po /
T02D1414:217b-28: aom shri badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um
T02D1414:217b-29: phat d'a ki n'i dzv'a la samba ram sv'a h'a
T02D1414:217b-31: gal te rnam dag bsgoms na zhal brgyad rnam thar
T02D1414:217b-32: brgyad phyag bcu drug stong nyid bcu drug / nang
T02D1414:217b-33: gi yul bzhi so sor yang dag par rig pa
T02D1414:217b-34: bzhi / 'khor lo rtsibs kyi phyogs bzhir lha mo ston pa bzhi /
T02D1414:217b-35: mtshams bzhi'i lha mo chos kyi mdo bzhi /
T02D1414:217b-36: phyi rol gyi sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1414:217b-37: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu k'a li nyi ma las bcom ldan 'das skyes /
T02D1414:217b-38: dbyangs yig sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las yum skyes par bsgom mo //
T02D1414:217b-39: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D1414:217b-41: nye bar bsdu ba kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:217b-42: le'u lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:217b-44: // / de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D1414:218a-0: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas gtum mo drod kyis byang chub kyi sems @218a * //
T02D1414:218a-1: phab pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin /
T02D1414:218a-2: sku'i rang bzhin sa'i cha ni spyan du snang /
T02D1414:218a-3: rtsa 'khor lo'i char phye ba thig skud rnam snang du snang /
T02D1414:218a-4: khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdul tshon sna tshogs dang mchod pa sna tshogs su snang /
T02D1414:218a-5: mgo po pull'i ra m'a la'i rlung lte ba'i padma brgyad du snang /
T02D1414:218a-6: spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra'i rlung thugs kyi 'khor lor snang /
T02D1414:218a-7: rna ba g-yas pa ao dya na gyi rlung gsung gi 'khor lor snang /
T02D1414:218a-8: rtag pa aarbu da'i rlung sku'i 'khor lor snang /
T02D1414:218a-9: rna ba g-yon pa go d'a ba ri'i rlung logs bzhir snang /
T02D1414:218a-10: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i rlung shar lho mtshams su snang /
T02D1414:218a-11: mig de b'i ko t'i rlung bden bral mtshams su snang /
T02D1414:218a-12: phrag pa m'a la be'i rlung nub byang gi zur du snang /
T02D1414:218a-13: mchan khung k'a ma r'u pa'i rlung dbang ldan gyi zur du snang /
T02D1414:218a-14: nu ma ao te'i rlung shad sgor snang /
T02D1414:218a-15: lte ba tri sha ku ne'i rlung lho sgor snang /
T02D1414:218a-16: sna rtse ko sa la'i rlung nub sgor snang /
T02D1414:218a-17: kha ka ling+ga'i rlung byang sgor snang /
T02D1414:218a-18: mid pa lampa ka'i rlung shar gyi rta babs su snang /
T02D1414:218a-19: snying ga k'anytsi'i rlung lho'i rta babs su snang /
T02D1414:218a-20: rgyu zhabs kyi hi ma la'i rlung nub kyi rta babs su snang /
T02D1414:218a-21: gsang ba'i gnas pre ta pu ri'i rlung byang gi rta babs su snang /
T02D1414:218a-22: gri ha de ba ta'i rlung lha'i snam bur snang /
T02D1414:218a-23: brla soo r'ashta'i rlung rin chen pha gur snang /
T02D1414:218a-24: byin pa gser gyi gling rlung dur ba dra phed du snang /
T02D1414:218a-25: sor mo n'a ga ra'i rlung rda yab la sogs par snang /
T02D1414:218a-26: rkang po la sindh'u'i rlung rdo rje'i thig zlum por snang /
T02D1414:218a-27: rkang pa'i mtheb mo ma ro'i rlung sgo khyud bzhir snang ngo //
T02D1414:218a-28: pus mo ku lu t'a'i rlung zur rnams kyi rdo rje rin po cher snang /
T02D1414:218a-29: de ltar padma dkar po lta bu'i gang zag gcig
T02D1414:218a-30: srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud nas bde ba stong
T02D1414:218a-31: pa nyid skyes pa'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1414:218a-32: lor snang / gsang ba snags su bshad pa'i gsung gi rnam dag go //
T02D1414:218a-34: byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D1414:218a-35: gang tshe 'dir ni yongs gang ba //
T02D1414:218a-36: de tshe lus kyi dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D1414:218a-38: autpala lta bu'i gang zag lus byang chub sems kyis
T02D1414:218a-39: gang ba'i rkang ba dang lag pa don yod grub
T02D1414:218a-40: pa'i snang ba dkyil 'khor gyi nang khong stong kun
T02D1414:218a-41: du snang ngo // dpral ba'i snang ba sku'i 'khor lo /
T02D1414:218b-0: lkog ma'i snang ba gsung gi @218b 'khor lo //
T02D1414:218b-1: snying ga'i snang ba thugs kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:218b-2: lte ba'i snang ba dbus kyi padma sgo bzhi dang
T02D1414:218b-3: rta babs dang dur khrod la sogs pa rnams su
T02D1414:218b-4: snang ngo // lus kyi tshor ba bde ba rtog med kyi snang ba sku'i 'khor lo //
T02D1414:218b-5: 'du shes bde ba rtog med gsung gi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:218b-6: 'du byed bde ba rtog med thugs kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:218b-7: rnam shes bde ba rtog med nang gi padma 'dab
T02D1414:218b-8: brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pas ye shes ri
T02D1414:218b-9: mo lngar snang / khams kyi dpa' bo nyi shu
T02D1414:218b-10: rtsa bzhi'i snang ba panytsa r'a ga phyogs bzhi'i nyi
T02D1414:218b-11: mo lngar snang / shu / sa gzhi'i kha dog bzhi dang nyi shu rtsa bzhir snang ngo //
T02D1414:218b-12: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhir snang ngo //
T02D1414:218b-13: lte ba khung gi thig le rdo rje phag mor snang ngo //
T02D1414:218b-14: snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi sa bon khrag 'thung mchog tu snang ngo //
T02D1414:218b-15: snying ga'i rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma bzhir snang ngo //
T02D1414:218b-16: de ltar na dman pa dbyibs su bshad pa rtsa
T02D1414:218b-17: dang khams kyi bde ba las skyes pa'i snang ba
T02D1414:218b-18: yin te / sems can la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu yin la /
T02D1414:218b-19: de'i rgyu gsang sngags rlung las bde ba skyes pa'i snang ba'am /
T02D1414:218b-20: dman pa dbyibs rtsal bde ba skyes pa'i snang ba bshad pa yin no //
T02D1414:218b-21: mthar thug chos su byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D1414:218b-22: sum cu rtsa bdun rin po che lta bu'i gang
T02D1414:218b-23: zhag mthar thugs chos bsgom pa ni /
T02D1414:218b-24: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1414:218b-25: lha de yang yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1414:218b-26: phyag mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa drug tu snang ste go sla'o //
T02D1414:218b-27: mthar thug chos sems dang sbyar na /
T02D1414:218b-28: dbus kyi padma sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i snang ba nas /
T02D1414:218b-29: rta babs chos kyi sprin gyi snang ba las dngos
T02D1414:218b-30: grub rgya che ba thob par 'gyur ba ni go
T02D1414:218b-31: sla'o // de ltar na rnam dag bshad nas /
T02D1414:218b-32: de kho na nyid bzhi bshad pa'i dang po 'khor
T02D1414:218b-33: lo bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye
T02D1414:218b-34: shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1414:218b-35: / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1414:218b-36: dbang bzhi pa bskur ba'i rin chen sems kyi stong
T02D1414:218b-37: nyid gnyis med kha sbyar gyi dkyil 'khor dang gsum
T02D1414:218b-38: yin no // dang po dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid bshad nas /
T02D1414:219a-0: gnyis pa bdag gi de nyid ni gtso bo'i lha'i ting nge 'dzin yin @219a * //
T02D1414:219a-2: gsum pa lha'i de nyid ni 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02D1414:219a-3: sngags kyi de nyid ni phyag rgya stang stabs sngags zlos pa'o //
T02D1414:219a-4: de ltar na de nyid bzhi yin no //
T02D1414:219a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi mjug bsdu ba ni /
T02D1414:219a-6: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhi dang /
T02D1414:219a-7: rta babs bzhi la sogs pa'i yul gyi yan lag kun las 'das pas zhes pa rtog bcas dang /
T02D1414:219a-8: rtog med spangs pa brjod phyi mo thig le las
T02D1414:219a-9: 'das pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi dkyil 'khor de
T02D1414:219a-10: mchog yin no // de la lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas /
T02D1414:219a-11: lus kyi rtog pa chos dge mi dge sgyu ma
T02D1414:219a-12: lta bur rnam par spyod pa rten dang brten pa'i
T02D1414:219a-13: dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa khams nam
T02D1414:219a-14: mkha'i 'ja' tshon dang mtshungs pa ni bdag byin gyis
T02D1414:219a-16: gnyis pa dkyil 'khor bha ga ni 'khor ba'i chags pa dang /
T02D1414:219a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chags med du mnyam pa
T02D1414:219a-18: padma r'a gas kha bsgyur ba'i chu bzhin du rang
T02D1414:219a-19: gi sems kyi chos nyid bde bas kha bsgyur ba
T02D1414:219a-20: bde ba stong nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mchog yin
T02D1414:219a-21: no // gsum pa chos kyi 'khor lo ni /
T02D1414:219a-22: 'dod khams gnas rigs nyi shu gzugs khams gnas rigs
T02D1414:219a-23: bcu bdun gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi las 'das
T02D1414:219a-26: le'u lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:219a-28: // / dkyil 'khor thams cad la mtshan ma thob na tshogs kyi 'khor lo ji lta bu snyam na /
T02D1414:219a-29: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:219a-31: sems can mtshan ma thob pa thams cad la phan
T02D1414:219a-32: pa'i dngos grub gsol ba a'a li k'a li mngon
T02D1414:219a-33: par byang chub pa lnga las chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1414:219a-34: grong khyer dang bcas pa cig car rdzus skyes byed
T02D1414:219a-35: pa'o // de ltar mdor bstan bshad nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:219a-36: rnal 'byor pho mo 'tshogs nas sngon 'gro tshogs sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1414:219a-37: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje padma dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02D1414:219a-38: de'i lte ba'i dbus su mngon bar byang chub pa
T02D1414:219a-39: lnga'i rim pas gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa dus
T02D1414:219a-41: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad la ye shes kyi
T02D1414:219a-42: 'khor lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thugs
T02D1414:219b-0: gtso bo zhal @219b bzhi phyag brgyad pa /
T02D1414:219b-1: lha mo yang zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa /
T02D1414:219b-2: ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1414:219b-3: thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad sngar gang la mtshan ma
T02D1414:219b-4: thob pa'i lha'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan de bzhin
T02D1414:219b-5: du bsgom mo / thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rgyab tu gsung gi 'khor lo shar dang /
T02D1414:219b-6: byang du dmar po rtsibs brgyad nub dang /
T02D1414:219b-7: lho ru dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D1414:219b-8: mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa /
T02D1414:219b-9: sgor khva gdong ma la sogs pa ye shes kyi
T02D1414:219b-10: lha yab yum gdong rgyan can lha mo bcu gnyis
T02D1414:219b-12: rams sam mthing shun gyis byugs pa /
T02D1414:219b-13: byang thams cad spangs mas byugs pa /
T02D1414:219b-16: phyogs bzhi'i kha dog can de bzhin du thugs kun la rams kyis byugs pa nag po /
T02D1414:219b-18: sku rdo thal gyis byugs pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i
T02D1414:219b-19: khyad par rdo rje snying pos bshad pa'i gnas nyi
T02D1414:219b-20: shu rtsa bzhir dpa' bor mos na rnal 'byor pa
T02D1414:219b-21: nyi tshe'i bya'o // kha cig dpa' mo la mos na rnal 'byor ma nyi tshe bya /
T02D1414:219b-22: sngar bshad pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod lam sna tshogs pas rigs ji ltar 'dod pa bsgom /
T02D1414:219b-23: gzhan yang zhal dang phyag mtshan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du gnas kyi rim pas dgod do //
T02D1414:219b-24: de la yang ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa /
T02D1414:219b-27: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam dag bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:219b-28: a'a li k'a li las byung ba bsgom pa dga' ba /
T02D1414:219b-29: rnam par bsgom pa mchog dga'/
T02D1414:219b-30: bsgom pa lhan cig skyes dga'/
T02D1414:219b-31: mchog 'od gsal ba dga' ba bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:219b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer rnam par dag pa
T02D1414:219b-33: 'di ni rdul tshon dang lugs su blugs pa dang
T02D1414:219b-35: ri mor bris pa ma yin te /
T02D1414:219b-36: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can
T02D1414:219b-37: gyi khams rab tu bcug nas gsang ba'i tshogs kyi
T02D1414:219b-38: 'khor lo 'di su la yang mi bstan to //
T02D1414:219b-39: le'u lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:219b-41: // / de nas gzhan yang shes rab kyi tshogs 'khor bshad par bya ba ni /
T02D1414:220a-0: bha ga'i padma shes rab la @220a * //
T02D1414:220a-1: mos pa bsgom pa rdo rje snying pos zhugs pa la bka' stsal pa ni /
T02D1414:220a-2: shes rab kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni nges par gsang ba'o //
T02D1414:220a-3: rnal 'byor pho mo 'tshogs nas sngon 'gro lnga bsgom /
T02D1414:220a-4: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje padma 'dab ma gsum pa bskyed /
T02D1414:220a-5: de'i dbus su mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim
T02D1414:220a-6: pas rdo rje phag mo dang he ru ka ma'i
T02D1414:220a-7: slob dpon lte ba la bsgom /
T02D1414:220a-8: gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa rdzus skyes kyi 'dab
T02D1414:220a-9: ma gsum la ye shes kyi lha mo mkha' 'gro
T02D1414:220a-10: ma l'a ma dum skyes ma gsum bsgom /
T02D1414:220a-11: bcom ldan 'das dang lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:220a-12: gru gsum gyi padma'i phyi rol du thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lha brgyad dgod /
T02D1414:220a-13: dbus kyi padma'i logs gsum du thod pa gsum dang
T02D1414:220a-14: bum pa gsum gzhag / dkyil 'khor gyi zur gsum
T02D1414:220a-15: gyi shar gyi zur la sku'i 'khor lo brgyad /
T02D1414:220a-16: nub byang gi zur la dam tshig gi 'khor lo brgyad /
T02D1414:220a-17: lho nub mtshams su gsung gi 'khor lo brgyad //
T02D1414:220a-18: bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:220a-19: ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo
T02D1414:220a-20: dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnal 'byor pho mo gang
T02D1414:220a-21: mos pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan can bsgoms te
T02D1414:220a-22: / thams cad rang gi cod pan can //
T02D1414:220a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar ni rgyud kyis gsal lo //
T02D1414:220a-24: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de dag mkha' 'gro
T02D1414:220a-25: bla ma'i brgyud pa'i rim pas lus kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1414:220a-26: bsgom pa dang / go chad dgod pa dang /
T02D1414:220a-27: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang sku gsung thugs lha'i 'khor lo spro bsdu dang /
T02D1414:220a-28: rang rang gi bzlas pa ni rnal 'byor ma ye
T02D1414:220a-29: shes babs pa'i zhal brgyad pa'i rim pa la mnyam
T02D1414:220a-30: par gzhag cing rtag tu bsgom mo //
T02D1414:220a-32: su'i rna bar yang ma brjod na dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pas dngos grub 'thob po //
T02D1414:220a-33: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing //
T02D1414:220a-34: bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya //
T02D1414:220a-35: zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la bya ste /
T02D1414:220a-36: rang gi lha mo bgrod min gzhan gyi lha mo
T02D1414:220a-37: la dus bzhir gtum mo drod dang byang chub sems
T02D1414:220a-38: 'char nub bsten na sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:220b-0: le'u lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel @220b pa'o /
T02D1414:220b-2: // / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyu'i rgyud kyi gang zag gi mtshan nyid can /
T02D1414:220b-3: thabs kyi rgyud bskyed rdzogs gnyis te 'bras bu'i rgyud sku gsum ston pas /
T02D1414:220b-4: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:220b-9: de'i rig pa lha dang sngags phyag rgya chen po bshad pa ni mdor bstan to //
T02D1414:220b-11: log pa'i shes pa'i lta ba la //
T02D1414:220b-12: cung zad ngas ni ma bstan gang //
T02D1414:220b-13: zhes pa dor bya'i gang zhag go //
T02D1414:220b-14: ji ltar bla ma'i rim pa bstan pa //
T02D1414:220b-15: zhes tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis ni skye ba snga
T02D1414:220b-16: ma bsam gtan dang zag med las skyes pa'i skal
T02D1414:220b-17: ldan blang bya ba'i gang zhag go //
T02D1414:220b-18: skugs shing glen la sdig ngan can //
T02D1414:220b-19: zhes bya ba tshigs bcad phyed dang gsum ni skal med dor bya'i gang zag bshad do //
T02D1414:220b-20: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis //
T02D1414:220b-21: zhes bya ba tshigs bcad gsum ni sngags skyes kyi
T02D1414:220b-22: rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D1414:220b-23: phab pas mthong ba reg pa thos pa dran pa
T02D1414:220b-24: las kyang sdig pa las grol bar the tshom med
T02D1414:220b-26: thams kyi rgyud bskyed rim thams cad kyi lha bzlog
T02D1414:220b-27: ste bkod pa sngags bzlog ste zlo ba ni g-yas
T02D1414:220b-28: skor dang g-yon skor gyis ming bzlog pa zhes brtags
T02D1414:220b-29: te / bskyed rim 'di ni rgyud sde bzhi thun
T02D1414:220b-30: mong du sems can yongs su ma smin pa las
T02D1414:220b-31: dang po pa la de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs dbyung
T02D1414:220b-32: te / ba gsungs pa / bsod nams chung ba'i
T02D1414:220b-33: rnal 'byor pas kyang lha mnyes par byas pas dngos
T02D1414:220b-35: bskyed rim bshad nas zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa
T02D1414:220b-36: bde ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa la bsrung med
T02D1414:220b-37: bza' med ces bya ba nas mdor na sems ni
T02D1414:220b-38: mnyam nyid bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:220b-39: bla ma mnyes pa la brtson 'grus yod na rnam
T02D1414:220b-40: shes dga' ba bzhi dang ye shes sgyu ma 'od
T02D1414:220b-41: gsal zung 'jug goms pas mngon gsum gyi lam ni
T02D1414:220b-43: bstan bcos rjes dpag gis ma yin /
T02D1414:220b-44: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i thams kyi sems
T02D1414:220b-45: bde ba stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang rig
T02D1414:221a-0: dpa' bo rang yin par bstan pa dang bde stong mngon sum @221a * //
T02D1414:221a-2: skad cig gi rnal 'byor phyag rgya lha kun dang
T02D1414:221a-3: gnas thams cad sngags kun skad cig ma gcig gis
T02D1414:221a-4: rtogs so // de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan
T02D1414:221a-5: nas pus mo sa la gtsug nas sgrub pa po
T02D1414:221a-6: lag na rdo rjes 'bras bu'i rgyud la gsol ba
T02D1414:221a-7: rtogs so // btab pa / mya ngan las 'das
T02D1414:221a-8: pa chos sku phyag rgya chen po longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1414:221a-9: pa'i ston pa gang nas gang du gnas par gyur
T02D1414:221a-11: g-yo ba sprul pa'i chos kyi rol pa bstan du gsol zhes pa dang /
T02D1414:221a-12: lan du legs par nyon la zhes skabs phye nas
T02D1414:221a-13: don dam par chos kyi sku las gzhan na med
T02D1414:221a-14: / rnam rtog gi gzung 'dzin gyis bsam du med /
T02D1414:221a-15: gzhan dbang gi gzung 'dzin dang bral ba'i sems kyi
T02D1414:221a-16: rang rig pa'i chos nyid la rtag tu da ltar
T02D1414:221a-17: byung ba bzhin du bzhugs so //
T02D1414:221a-19: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1414:221a-20: zhes sngar bshad pa'i don ni rnal 'byor ba'i dkyil
T02D1414:221a-21: 'khor lus la brten pa'i dbus nas gtum mo'i drod
T02D1414:221a-22: spar nas / byang chub kyi sems phab pas rang
T02D1414:221a-23: rig pa'i stong nyid la nges pa drangs pa la
T02D1414:221a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya /
T02D1414:221a-25: rdo rje can de na bzhugs par byed pa 'dus ma byas dang /
T02D1414:221a-26: cha dang bcas pa 'dus byas spangs pa'i lus ni
T02D1414:221a-27: btsun mo'i bha ga zhes bya bas lus kun la
T02D1414:221a-30: 'byung ba rnams lha mor rol pa ste /
T02D1414:221a-31: bde bar gshegs pas ji srid gsungs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
T02D1414:221a-32: mdor na phung po lnga dag ni //
T02D1414:221a-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
T02D1414:221a-34: khams dang skye mched mang po kun //
T02D1414:221a-35: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D1414:221a-36: sa chu spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
T02D1414:221a-37: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
T02D1414:221a-38: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02D1414:221a-39: srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing //
T02D1414:221a-41: rang rig pa'i stong nyid rtogs pa ni lus la gnas kyang lus las ma skyes pa ste /
T02D1414:221a-42: lus las dang nyon mongs pa'i snang bas ma bskyed pas na 'das zhes bya'o //
T02D1414:221a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung ma byung yang
T02D1414:221a-44: rung ba'i zag pa med pa'i sa bon byang chub
T02D1414:221a-45: kyi snying po ni glo bur gyi dri mas gos
T02D1414:221a-46: pa med do // 'o na mya ngan las 'das
T02D1414:221b-0: pa dang 'khor ba @221b ji ltar snang zhe na
T02D1414:221b-1: pa med do // / mes du ba la phan
T02D1414:221b-2: 'dogs pa bzhin du rang rig pa don dang sems
T02D1414:221b-4: lus kun la ni rnam par grol //
T02D1414:221b-6: du bas me la phan mi 'dogs pa bzhin du
T02D1414:221b-7: dge mi dge zag bcas kyi lus las skyes pa
T02D1414:221b-8: ni chos sku dang longs sku bshad nas /
T02D1414:221b-9: sprul pa'i sku ni snang bar 'chad pa ni /
T02D1414:221b-10: la lar gzugs can dag tu bshad //
T02D1414:221b-12: gang zhig thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs //
T02D1414:221b-13: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zag pa med pa'i sa bon rang rig pa /
T02D1414:221b-14: gnyis med 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1414:221b-15: thams cad kyi bdag nyid la bzhugs pa de ni
T02D1414:221b-16: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid lag na rdo rje khyod
T02D1414:221b-18: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni sprul pa'i sku
T02D1414:221b-19: thams cad kyi bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni bshad zin
T02D1414:221b-20: to // chos kyi sku'i gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni /
T02D1414:221b-21: lha gang gi cha shas spangs pa sgyu ma sna
T02D1414:221b-22: tshogs pa'i 'di snang yang rtag tu bsam gyis mi
T02D1414:221b-23: khyab pa'i ye shes bha ga chos nyid la bzhugs
T02D1414:221b-24: pa yin no // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na /
T02D1414:221b-25: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs pa ni lte
T02D1414:221b-26: ba'i dbus nas padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa la
T02D1414:221b-27: yi ge dbugs 'byung rngub kyis dbugs bkag nas rtsa
T02D1414:221b-28: dang gnas pa'i rlung sbyar nas de'i dbus na sems
T02D1414:221b-29: kyi stong pa nyid sprul pa'i sku 'byin zhes pa
T02D1414:221b-30: dang / sdud par byed pa nyid don dam pa'i
T02D1414:221b-31: de kho na nyid 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes
T02D1414:221b-32: rang byung bas 'dus byas kun la khyab pas chos
T02D1414:221b-33: dang / sku'o // de ni sangs rgyas dngos zhes sprul pa'i skur mtshan brtags pa dang /
T02D1414:221b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces kyang
T02D1414:221b-35: mtshan brtags pas thams cad mkhyen pa 'dus byas kyang
T02D1414:221b-36: kun du 'gro zhing 'dus byas kyi mi shigs pas
T02D1414:221b-37: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rgyud kyi gleng
T02D1414:221b-38: gzhi'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i
T02D1414:221b-39: mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa'i sku gsum dang mi
T02D1414:221b-40: mthun pa rjes su mthun pa'i sku gsum 'bras bu'i
T02D1414:221b-41: rgyud bshad do // rdzogs rim thob pa'i rtags bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:221b-42: skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha'i tshad tsam ni aa wa dh'u t'i yin no //
T02D1414:221b-43: phra ba'i rdul ni byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i rgyun 'dzag pa yin no //
T02D1414:222a-0: stong pa nyid yang ma yin zhes pa ni rang rig pas @222a * //
T02D1414:222a-2: dmigs su med ces pa ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-3: de ni dga' ba ste dbang po drug bde ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-4: yi ge med pa ni brjod bya rjod byed dang bral ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-5: stong pa ma yin zhes pa ni yul drug bde ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-6: rdul med ces pa ni tshogs drug gis 'dzin pa med pa'o //
T02D1414:222a-7: srog med pa ni rlung dbus ma la brten pa'i
T02D1414:222a-8: rang rig par mngon par mi zhen pa lhan cig
T02D1414:222a-9: skyes dga'o // gzugs pa med ces bya ba ni mtshan gzhi lnga dang bral ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-10: mtshan ma med ces pa mtshan nyid gsum 'gags pa ste rnam par thams cad kyi 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1414:222a-11: rnam par shes pa'i dngos po ni dga' ba gsum
T02D1414:222a-12: de'i ye shes ni sgyu ma 'od gsal zung 'jug
T02D1414:222a-13: go // ye shes skye ba'i rtags ni /
T02D1414:222a-14: sgron ma lta bu dang po dang /
T02D1414:222a-15: mkha' snang lta bu gnyis pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-16: dkar po'i 'od zer 'phro ba gsum pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-17: 'dod pa'i lha'i longs spyod snang ba bzhin pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-18: gzugs kyi lha'i bde bar snang ba lnga pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-19: gzugs med kyi ye shes bdun pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes brgyad pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-21: rgyud sde bzhi lha dgu ste 'dus ma byas kyi
T02D1414:222a-22: ye shes kyi rtags dgu skyes nas sa bcu'i dbang
T02D1414:222a-23: phyug thob pas khams gsum pa'i ye shes pa gzhan
T02D1414:222a-24: dag snying po med pa rtsva dang mtshungs so //
T02D1414:222a-25: de ltar rgyu'i rgyud skal ldan dang skal med gnyis dang /
T02D1414:222a-26: thabs kyi rgyud bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang 'bras bu'i rgyud sku gsum dang /
T02D1414:222a-27: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags drug bstan nas /
T02D1414:222a-28: las dang po pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa ji ltar bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-29: bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar bsgom pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:222a-30: de kho na nyid don dam pa'i bden pa shes pa ni rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las te /
T02D1414:222a-31: srog chags rnams kyi srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud
T02D1414:222a-32: pa aa na ha mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba
T02D1414:222a-33: khyab byed kyi rlung de mtshungs pa de ma thags
T02D1414:222a-34: pa'i rkyen yin pas sems kyi 'dus ma byas shes
T02D1414:222a-35: pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dpal he
T02D1414:222a-37: phyir rgyu ba skyes pa dang /
T02D1414:222a-38: nang du 'jug pa bud med dang /
T02D1414:222a-39: gnas pa bum pa'i rlung la ma ning zhes grags pa'o //
T02D1414:222a-40: de la sogs pa zhes pa ni dbugs nyid khri
T02D1414:222a-41: chig stong drug brgyad bkag pa'i rlung dbus ma phra
T02D1414:222b-0: ba'i snying po 'dzin pa'i ye @222b shes skye ba
T02D1414:222b-1: de la brten nas sa bcu dang /
T02D1414:222b-2: bstan bcos mngon shes drug dang rgyud sde bzhi rig byed kyi dngos grub dang /
T02D1414:222b-3: gang ji snyed gnas pa rnams srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra chud pa 'di las byung ngo //
T02D1414:222b-4: tshe 'di dang phyi mar yang rgyu rkyen tshogs pa
T02D1414:222b-5: med na dngos grub mi thob pas rgyud sde bzhi
T02D1414:222b-6: rig byed grub mtha' la ye shes skye ba'i snying
T02D1414:222b-7: po gcig pu kho nas bshad do //
T02D1414:222b-8: yul dmigs pa'i rkyen 'dus ma byas tshogs ma bsags
T02D1414:222b-9: sgrib pa ma spangs kyang sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad las
T02D1414:222b-11: gzhon nu ma'i lus dang yid bde ba bsam gtan
T02D1414:222b-12: gyi cha dbang po bdag po'i rkyen yang rnyed sla
T02D1414:222b-13: / bag chags rgyu'i rkyen zag pa med pa'i sa
T02D1414:222b-14: bon byang chub kyi snying po yang rgyu yin pas
T02D1414:222b-15: / rnyed sla'o // rkyen gsum po rnyed par sla yang /
T02D1414:222b-16: yid nang du chud pa rlung 'gags pa'i 'dod pa'i
T02D1414:222b-17: khams kyi sems can med pa ni rnyed par dka'
T02D1414:222b-18: bas man ngag gi gtso bo 'di yin no //
T02D1414:222b-20: ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis //
T02D1414:222b-21: rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo //
T02D1414:222b-22: zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:222b-23: bskyed pa'i rim pa thams cad kyi mdor bsdus pa'i yan lag bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:222b-24: 'dug pa'am gnas pa ni sngon 'gro lnga'o //
T02D1414:222b-25: ldang ba ni 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje padma dang bdun no //
T02D1414:222b-26: 'jug pa ni nyi zla kha sbyor du sems 'jug pa'o //
T02D1414:222b-27: rdzogs pa ni sprul pa dang lus dang sems kyi 'khor lo /
T02D1414:222b-28: byin rlabs ni go cha dang ye shes sems dpa' 'jug pa gnyis so //
T02D1414:222b-29: dbang bskur ba ni mchod pa dang bstod nas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1414:222b-30: ting nge 'dzin ni bsgom bzlas so //
T02D1414:222b-31: mchod pa ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang rkang pa brgyad pa dang gtor ma gtong ba'o //
T02D1414:222b-32: nye bar bsdu ba ni dkyil 'khor lus la gzhug pa'o //
T02D1414:222b-33: spyir de ltar yin pa las skabs 'dir cho ga'i
T02D1414:222b-34: ming ni gzhan dag thabs shes rab kyi spro bsdu
T02D1414:222b-35: zhes bya ste / dbyangs yig bcu drug ni shes rab bo //
T02D1414:222b-36: gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi ni thabs so //
T02D1414:222b-37: de gnyis nyi zla kha sbyor gyi lha mo las lha thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1414:222b-38: don dam pa dang kun rdzob ston pa'i chos kyi
T02D1414:222b-39: sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang yi ge phyi
T02D1414:222b-41: sngags kyi spyod pa phrin las rnam bzhi thams cad
T02D1414:222b-42: kyi rgyud shes rab dang thabs a'a li k'a li
T02D1414:223a-1: ma'i dbyangs dang gsal byed ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dge ba'i lha'am /
T02D1414:223a-2: dbang dang mngon spyod mi dge ba'i lha'i lus kyi
T02D1414:223a-3: dkyil 'khor rgyan nam ska rags lta bu a'a li
T02D1414:223a-5: de ltar las dang po pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzus skyes kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02D1414:223a-6: rdzogs rim gyi dbang du byas nas a'a li k'a
T02D1414:223a-7: li khrag dang byang chub sems kyi thig le la
T02D1414:223a-8: sogs te lte ba'i khrag gi thig le gtsub gtan
T02D1414:223a-9: / dbus ma rtsa aa wa dh'u t'i srub shing /
T02D1414:223a-10: g-yas g-yon gyi rlung srub thag / bsrubs pa las
T02D1414:223a-11: khrag gi thig le las byung nas snying ga'i a'a
T02D1414:223a-12: li k'a li byang chub kyi sems bzhus pas gzhon
T02D1414:223a-13: nu ma'i bde ba lta bu ngal so //
T02D1414:223a-14: bde ba skyes pa la sems kyi chos nyid bsam
T02D1414:223a-15: gnyis mi khyab pa 'dus ma byas kyi sems myong
T02D1414:223a-16: bar mi rtag / sems de nyid don dam par
T02D1414:223a-17: bsams na 'dzin pa rdo rje 'chang thob par 'gyur
T02D1414:223a-18: ro // 'di ni nang gi a'a li k'a li
T02D1414:223a-19: don rang gi mtshan nyid de rgyud sde bzhi gsang
T02D1414:223a-20: ba lag na rdo rje khyod la bshad pa yin
T02D1414:223a-21: ro // no // bsod nams kyi tshogs lha'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1414:223a-22: ye shes kyi tshogs 'dus ma byas rtogs pa gnyis
T02D1414:223a-23: ka'i rgyud bum pa so btang ba lta bu mi
T02D1414:223a-24: 'jigs pa thig le bsgom pa 'di 'bar bas spar
T02D1414:223a-25: bar bya'o // bskyed rim gyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyang 'dis 'thob /
T02D1414:223a-26: nges brjod bla ma'i rgyud kyi mngon sum gyi man ngag 'di snod min la mi bshad /
T02D1414:223a-28: tshe phyi mar mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thob bo //
T02D1414:223a-29: bum pa rlon pa lta bu ni bskyed rim lha'i
T02D1414:223a-30: 'khor lo yun ring por bsgoms kyang rnam rtog gi
T02D1414:223a-32: ye shes kyi tshogs dbu ma lta bu rjes dpag
T02D1414:223a-33: gi stong pa nyid bsgom pa yang bskal pa grangs
T02D1414:223a-34: med gcig gis sa dang po thob pas rnam rtog
T02D1414:223a-35: yun ring bas rdzogs par 'gyur la /
T02D1414:223a-36: srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra chud nas bde ba
T02D1414:223a-37: stong nyid bsgom pa ni 'dus ma byas mngon sum
T02D1414:223a-38: gyis mthong ba'i lam bum pa so btang ba lta
T02D1414:223a-39: bu phyir mi ldog pa'i lam mi 'jig pa yin
T02D1414:223a-40: no // dper na bud med dang byis pa tshogs nas phan tshun kun du smra /
T02D1414:223a-41: rjes su yi rang pas bsten yang don med pa
T02D1414:223a-42: de bzhin du bskyed rim dang rjes dpag gis lam
T02D1414:223b-0: dge ba zag bcas @223b zag med ma bshad pas
T02D1414:223b-2: mi'i lus po 'jim ba lta bu bskyed rim gyis bum ba lta bur bcos /
T02D1414:223b-3: rjes dpag gis don dam pa'i lhar bcos kyang rung /
T02D1414:223b-4: dge ba zag bcas bum pa rlon pa dang 'dra /
T02D1414:223b-5: srog aa wa dh'u t'i ra chud nas bde ba
T02D1414:223b-6: stong pa mngon sum gyis grub pa'i tshe rnal 'byor
T02D1414:223b-8: g-yo ba tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed rnam par
T02D1414:223b-9: shes pa kun dpal he ru ka'i sku'i yan lag
T02D1414:223b-10: bcu gnas bcur mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ming btags pa
T02D1414:223b-11: / mtho ris thugs dang sa steng gsung dang sa
T02D1414:223b-12: 'og sku'i dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g-yo thams cad
T02D1414:223b-13: he ru ka'i phyag dang zhabs dang mig spyan du
T02D1414:223b-17: 'jig rten na yod pa thams cad g-yogs pa bzhin
T02D1414:223b-18: du mngon sum du grub nas brjod byar bzhugs so
T02D1414:223b-19: // a'a li k'a li bum pa so btang ba
T02D1414:223b-20: lta bu'i thig le'i 'khor lo bde mchog bstan pa
T02D1414:223b-21: // yin no // da ni mngal skyes kyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:223b-22: de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba //
T02D1414:223b-24: mngal skyes kyi bsam gtan gyi sems don bcu bzhis
T02D1414:223b-25: sa bcas pa sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir
T02D1414:223b-26: gsungs so // de nas gzhan yang mdo sde dang
T02D1414:223b-27: rgyud dag tu sbas pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
T02D1414:223b-29: gos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang phyag mtshan lnga
T02D1414:223b-30: cod pan dang rgyan la sogs pa ni lus kyi
T02D1414:223b-31: kun du spyod pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-32: shes rab mdun du gzhag pa ni gsum mo //
T02D1414:223b-33: phur bu dang dra ba la sogs pa ni srung ba'i 'khor bzhi pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-34: a'a li k'a li brjod pa bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa lnga pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-35: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rgyud la sogs pa stong pa ye shes kyi tshogs ni drug pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-36: nyi zla kha sbyor du sems 'jug pa'i yig 'bru
T02D1414:223b-37: dang phyag mtshan la sogs pas lhar bskyed pa ni
T02D1414:223b-38: bdun pa'o // rgyu'i he ru ka gsungs pa ni brgyad pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-39: glu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni dgu pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-40: bdud rtsi tshim byed myang ba dang ye shes sems dpa' bcu pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-41: lag pa'i mchod pas go cha bskon pa ni bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D1414:223b-42: dbang bskur ba ni bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1414:224a-0: go cha chen po lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang sems kyi dkyil @224a * //
T02D1414:224a-1: 'khor bsgom pa ni bcu gsum pa'o //
T02D1414:224a-2: sngags kyi mchod bstod gtor ma gtang ba ni bcu bzhi pa'o //
T02D1414:224a-3: mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa //
T02D1414:224a-4: zhes bya ba tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis ni smon lam dang yon no //
T02D1414:224a-5: 'bras bu ni zla ba nyal mtshan ma thob nas
T02D1414:224a-6: dngos grub blangs nas zag med kyi ye shes dang
T02D1414:224a-7: ldan pas mtho ris kyi longs spyod lha'i 'khor los
T02D1414:224a-9: mi'i 'khor los sgyur ba dngos grub tha ma /
T02D1414:224a-10: rnal 'byor pa 'pho ba'i tshe mkha' spyod kyi gnas bde ba can nam /
T02D1414:224a-11: mngon bar dga' bar khrid nas skyes pa ni dngos grub rab bo //
T02D1414:224a-12: le'u lnga bcu rtsa drug gi 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:224a-14: // / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sngags btu ba /
T02D1414:224a-15: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:224a-16: zhes bya ba smos te rgyud 'dir btu ba'i thabs kyang bzhi /
T02D1414:224a-18: de la rtsa ba'i rgyud las ae gru gsum gyi
T02D1414:224a-19: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad la sde tshan brgyad
T02D1414:224a-20: bkod pa ni btu ba'i gnas dang po'o //
T02D1414:224a-21: rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gzhal yas khang gi dbus
T02D1414:224a-22: su re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu gris pa ni
T02D1414:224a-24: rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa nas
T02D1414:224a-25: rdza rnga'i dbyibs kyi nang du re'u mig bzhi bcu
T02D1414:224a-26: rtsa dgu byas nas btu ba'i gnas gsum pa'o //
T02D1414:224a-27: mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma las padma 'dab ma
T02D1414:224a-28: brgyad dang mtshams bzhi dang bcas pa las byung ba
T02D1414:224a-29: ni bzhi pa'o // btu ba'i thabs ni bzhi ste dbyangs dang gsal byed kyis btu ba dang /
T02D1414:224a-33: 'bras bu ni bcu gcig ste yab yum gyi snying po bzhi dang /
T02D1414:224a-34: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i sngags gnyis dang go cha gnyis dang rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags gnyis dang /
T02D1414:224a-35: gnod mdzes kyi sngags dang bcu gcig go //
T02D1414:224a-36: 'dir sngags btu ba ni dben pa'i gnas su bdud rtsi lngas byugs la /
T02D1414:224a-37: bdag nyid he ru kar bskyed nas dmangs rigs kyi
T02D1414:224a-38: khrag gis thig le dang me tog dgod pa dang
T02D1414:224a-39: bdug pa dang mar me dang cang te'u dang glu
T02D1414:224a-40: gar gyis mchod nas phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i
T02D1414:224a-41: lus kyis srung ba'i 'khor lo byas te /
T02D1414:224a-42: ae gru gsum gyi dbus su /
T02D1414:224b-0: a'a li k'a li sde tshan brgyad bsdebs @224b pas
T02D1414:224b-1: bzhi bzhi brgyad du byas nas dang por rtsa ba'i
T02D1414:224b-2: sngags kyi gsal byed btu ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:224b-4: ka ra ka ra la sogs pa rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba yin no //
T02D1414:224b-5: de'i phan yon ni rig pa rgyal ba'i gsang sngags
T02D1414:224b-6: te bya ba dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa zag
T02D1414:224b-7: bcas kyi 'jig rten gsum na dpal he ru ka
T02D1414:224b-8: zag med kyi sngags shes na mchog yin no //
T02D1414:224b-9: le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:224b-11: // / de nas gzhan yang yab kyi snying po yi
T02D1414:224b-12: ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa lha dang sbyar nas
T02D1414:224b-14: nye ba'i snying po yang lha dang sbyar nas btus zin /
T02D1414:224b-15: ya tshogs brgyad pa ha la dbyangs bcu gnyis dang
T02D1414:224b-16: sbyar ba ha ring po la sogs pa drug phyi
T02D1414:224b-18: ha thung du drug dang aom na ma sv'a h'a
T02D1414:224b-19: boo sha ta h'um h'um phat kyi sngags dang sbyar
T02D1414:224b-20: bas gnas drug tu go cha drug tu 'gyur ba
T02D1414:224b-21: ni go sla'o // de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ni ao /
T02D1414:224b-22: yi ge gnyis pa ni ma dag dang sbyor ba ni mor 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:224b-23: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa ni ae /
T02D1414:224b-24: yi ge drug pa ni ha /
T02D1414:224b-26: dbyangs kyi zhi ba ni pa'i /
T02D1414:224b-27: yi ge bdun pa ni ba /
T02D1414:224b-29: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa ni aee yi ge brgyad pa nir /
T02D1414:224b-30: mkhas pas sbyar ba ni rer 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:224b-31: dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni a'a /
T02D1414:224b-32: yi ge dgu pa ni sha /
T02D1414:224b-33: brgyad pas ni sh'a ring por 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:224b-34: de ltar na na mo bha ga wa te b'i re sh'a ya'i sngags su 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:224b-36: yab kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po go
T02D1414:224b-37: bzlog nas bris pa ni mngon spyod dbang las zlos
T02D1414:224b-38: pa'o // yum gyi snying po dang go cha'i lha
T02D1414:224b-39: mo drug gi ming dang po dang bsdebs pas sngags
T02D1414:224b-41: go cha'i sngags gnyis ni phyed btus pa'o //
T02D1414:224b-42: le'u lnga bcur tsa brgyad pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1414:224b-44: // / de nas gzhan yang lha mo'i snying po yi
T02D1414:224b-45: ge bcu gsum pa lha bskyed pa'i sa bon 'khrul
T02D1414:224b-47: snying po bla med bshad par bya //
T02D1414:224b-50: 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang drug bskyed nas /
T02D1414:224b-51: de'i dbus su drod gsher skyes kyi yum gyi snying po dang sbyor ba'o //
T02D1414:224b-52: dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni padma'i dbus su phag mo ha las bskyed pa dang /
T02D1414:225a-0: 'dab ma brgyad pa gsal byed la aom las @225a * //
T02D1414:225a-7: ye las zung ldan ma dang brgyad do //
T02D1414:225a-8: h'um las shar sgor h'um mdzad ma /
T02D1414:225a-9: h'um rings las lho skor sreg mdzad ma /
T02D1414:225a-10: phat las nub sgor phat mdzad ma /
T02D1414:225a-11: sv'a las byang sgor zhi mdzad ma /
T02D1414:225a-12: drod gsher skyes kyi 'khor los yum gyi snying po yang btus so //
T02D1414:225a-13: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud na gsal /
T02D1414:225a-14: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:225a-19: lha mo bcu gnyis kyi spyi'i snying po bzlas pa dang /
T02D1414:225a-21: gtor ma btang bas kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:225a-22: le'u lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:225a-24: // / de nas gzhan yang gnod mdzes kyi sngags btu ba bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:225a-25: rdo rje rol pa rta'i 'gros dang /
T02D1414:225a-26: yi dgas srin po'i gdong dang /
T02D1414:225a-27: gshin rje dbyig pa 'chang ba dang /
T02D1414:225a-28: ma mo rigs kyi 'khor lo gnod mdzes kyi sngags
T02D1414:225a-29: las bung bas shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste
T02D1414:225a-30: / 'khrul 'khor de rnams gang zhig gis shes pa tsam gyis myur du dngos grub thob bo //
T02D1414:225a-31: mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:225a-32: sa'i cha mnyam pa las tsandan gyis byugs nas me tog dang spos kyis mchod la /
T02D1414:225a-33: bdag nyid shes rab kyi yan lag dang bcas pas phyogs bcings la /
T02D1414:225a-34: rdza rda kha bzhi pa bri ste /
T02D1414:225a-35: re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la yi ge'i
T02D1414:225a-36: phyi mo bkod pa gnas de las dpa' bo sumbha
T02D1414:225a-37: ni btu'o // rim gyis btu ba'am rim las bzlog nas btu ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:225a-41: rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs par shar sngo ba /
T02D1414:225a-44: byang ljang ba'i 'khor bo bzhi dang /
T02D1414:225a-45: mtshams su phyed gzugs kyi khro bo brgyad dang bcas
T02D1414:225a-46: pa dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du steng 'og gi
T02D1414:225a-47: gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i khro bo bcu bsgom pa'am
T02D1414:225a-48: / yang na khro bo bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:225a-49: sha chen la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lus
T02D1414:225a-50: le'u bzhi pa las bshad pa bzhin du nang gi
T02D1414:225a-51: sbyin sreg byas nas rdo rje can brgya byin yang
T02D1414:225b-0: dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i khams su padma 'dab @225b
T02D1414:225b-1: brgyad kyi lte ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um las
T02D1414:225b-2: h'um mdzad zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug par bsgom pa
T02D1414:225b-4: khro bo bzhi ni shar du 'dod pa'i rdo rje sngo ba /
T02D1414:225b-5: byang du rdo rje rnon po ljang ba /
T02D1414:225b-6: nub tu stobs rdo rje dmar ba /
T02D1414:225b-7: lho ru mi g-yo rdo rje ser nag bdud bzhi gnon pa /
T02D1414:225b-9: lhor rin po che dang dril bu /
T02D1414:225b-10: nub tu padma dang dril bu /
T02D1414:225b-11: byang du rgya gram dang dril bu /
T02D1414:225b-12: rang gi mtshan ma dril bur bcas //
T02D1414:225b-13: zhes pa thams cad kyang khams gsum rnam par rgyal
T02D1414:225b-14: ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa
T02D1414:225b-15: bsgoms la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang go
T02D1414:225b-16: cha bskon pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1414:225b-17: dpral ba lkog ma snying gar sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba bsgom /
T02D1414:225b-18: sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam dag yang bsgom /
T02D1414:225b-20: ma grub na bskyar ba'i cho ga nang gi sbyin
T02D1414:225b-21: sreg khyi'i gzugs kyi linggas zhes sngags bza' ba dang
T02D1414:225b-22: / phag gi linggas gti mug bza' ba dang /
T02D1414:225b-23: khyim bya'i linggas 'dod chags bza' ba dang /
T02D1414:225b-24: mkha' 'gro la yang gtor ma bya ba dang /
T02D1414:225b-25: dung dang nya phyis dang mu tig rnams srog chags
T02D1414:225b-26: kyi rgyu las byung ba khyad par med kyang mi'i
T02D1414:225b-27: thod pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1414:225b-29: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyan byas pa la smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1414:225b-30: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1414:225b-33: // / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba
T02D1414:225b-34: grong khyer dgug pa'i sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa
T02D1414:225b-35: ni / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba smos
T02D1414:225b-36: te slob dpon a'arya de bas shar phyogs dri za'i
T02D1414:225b-37: yul du phyin nas 'gro ba mi dad pa las
T02D1414:225b-38: sde tshan brgyad kyi yi ge'i lha bkod nas sngags
T02D1414:225b-39: drag po bzlas pas rgyal po dang bcas pa g-yo
T02D1414:225b-40: ni / ba dang / sems dga' bas btul ba bzhin du /
T02D1414:225b-41: sde tshan brgyad kyis bsgom pa 'byung ba bzhi dang
T02D1414:225b-42: ri rab bzhi 'gyur ba'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gzhal
