T02D1414:229a-9: phyag dang po rdo rje dang dril bu /
T02D1414:229a-10: rdo rje dang thod pa mdung dang cang te'u /
T02D1414:229a-11: mgo bo dang gri gug thogs pa'o /
T02D1414:229a-12: yang na ma he'i gdong can zhal dgu phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:229a-13: ma he'i gdong can ni phyag sum cu rtsa bzhis
T02D1414:229a-14: sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa ma he'i zhal
T02D1414:229a-16: zhal lhag ma brgyad kyis ha ha hi hi h'um h'um phat phat brgyad sgrogs pa dang /
T02D1414:229a-17: dpa' bo gcig pu 'od zer 'phros pas 'jigs par
T02D1414:229a-18: mdzad pa phyogs skyong ba brgyad dang chung ma mkha'
T02D1414:229a-19: 'gro ma brgyad gdul dka' thams cad 'dul bar mdzad
T02D1414:229a-20: pa ye shes sems dpa' bcug go cha bskon dbang
T02D1414:229a-21: bskur sgom pa'i tshe sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo
T02D1414:229a-22: spro dam tshig gi spro bsdu byas nas bzlas /
T02D1414:229a-23: phan yon ni khams gsum gyi sdig pa za ba dang /
T02D1414:229a-24: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa za ba dang /
T02D1414:229a-27: las la sbyor ba'i tshe na gdug pa can dang gnod pa can gyi ling+ga byas la /
T02D1414:229a-28: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa pho nya spros nas ma rungs pa bkug nas /
T02D1414:229a-29: ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bzla zhing sha lnga bdud
T02D1414:229a-30: rtsi lnga za zhing gcer bu skra grol ba lus
T02D1414:229a-31: kyi spyod pa lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag pas
T02D1414:229a-32: bzung nas sngags khri phrag stong bzlas na khams gsum
T02D1414:229a-34: yang na mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa drug 'khor
T02D1414:229a-35: gyis bskor bar bsams la thams cad kyang rdo rje
T02D1414:229a-36: mkha' 'gro'i khro bo dgra bo'i snying du zhugs nas
T02D1414:229a-37: snying dang rgyu ma la sogs pa drangs nas za
T02D1414:229a-38: bar byed par bsams nas zhag bdun gyi nyi ma
T02D1414:229a-39: phyed dang mtshan phyed na kha lhor bltas nas tsher
T02D1414:229a-40: ma can gyi me la h'um phat ram ram zhes
T02D1414:229a-42: mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg byas na rdo
T02D1414:229a-43: rje 'dzin pa brgya byin yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1414:229a-44: // rang la 'bangs byas skyabs su song na 'o
T02D1414:229a-45: ma can gyi shing la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya
T02D1414:229b-1: le'u drug cu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:229b-3: // / gal te tshe 'di la bsnyen pa byas kyang
T02D1414:229b-4: ma grub na rten 'brel gyi mthu skye ba bdun
T02D1414:229b-6: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:229b-8: skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1414:229b-9: lha'i gzugs can ni rtags dang po'o //
T02D1414:229b-10: snyan par smra ba gnyis pa /
T02D1414:229b-11: gsum pa bde bar gshegs la dga' ba /
T02D1414:229b-13: lnga pa mig dkyus ring ba /
T02D1414:229b-14: drug pa mig padma lta bu /
T02D1414:229b-15: bdun pa rdul dri zhim pa dang /
T02D1414:229b-16: brgyad pa glang po'i dri yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-17: dgu pa ga bur gyi dri yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-18: bcu pa bshad gci gla rtsi'i dri yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-20: bcu gnyis pa lag pa rkang pa 'jam pa /
T02D1414:229b-21: bcu gsum pa autpala'i dri yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-22: bcu bzhi pa skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa /
T02D1414:229b-23: bco lnga pa lus mdangs dang ldan pa /
T02D1414:229b-24: bcu drug pa snying dang glad pa ni gi'u wang yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-25: bcu bdun pa grib ma bdun yod pa /
T02D1414:229b-26: bco brgyad pa ngang pa'i 'gros su 'gro ba /
T02D1414:229b-27: bcu dgu pa snying rje can /
T02D1414:229b-28: nyi shu pa dkon mchog gsum la dad pa /
T02D1414:229b-29: rtags nyi shu rtsa gcig pa pha rol du phyin
T02D1414:229b-30: pa drug dang ldan pa de lta bu rnal 'byor
T02D1414:229b-31: pas rtogs na / de la phyi rtags dus ma
T02D1414:229b-32: yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyis mi tshugs seng ge
T02D1414:229b-33: dang stag dang sbyang gis mi za des mtshan mo
T02D1414:229b-34: mthong la nyin mo mi snang /
T02D1414:229b-35: de lta bu rtogs nas khyod grongs na bdag la
T02D1414:229b-36: khyed kyi lus sbyin par mdzad du gsol zhes blang
T02D1414:229b-37: bar bya'o // de nas rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi
T02D1414:229b-38: lnga lcags gsum gyis dkris pa khar bcug nas yab
T02D1414:229b-39: yum gyi snying po lhar bskyed dbang po sbyangs nas
T02D1414:229b-40: nye ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na de 'chi ba'i
T02D1414:229b-41: tshe ro lag tu byin nas mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing
T02D1414:229b-42: bar bya'o // khams su skye'o // de nas dben
T02D1414:229b-43: pa'i gnas su khyer nas bdud rtsi'i bsgrub pa byas
T02D1414:229b-44: na dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:229b-45: skye ba bdun skra dang dud 'gro'i spu bsres nas
T02D1414:229b-46: srad bu byas nas mgul du bcings na de'i gzugs
T02D1414:229b-47: su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1414:229b-48: de'i gi wang zos na lus 'dir rang dang lhan
T02D1414:229b-49: cig tu khams gsum gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1414:229b-50: bya ba las tshogs lnga bcu pa yin no //
T02D1414:229b-51: le'u drug cu rtsa drug pa'i 'grel ba'o /
T02D1414:230a-0: // / rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams las zhi khro tshang bar 'gyur @230a * //
T02D1414:230a-2: zhi ba'i lha gang dang gang yin shes par bya
T02D1414:230a-3: ba dang de la mos pa'i ched du zhi ba
T02D1414:230a-4: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ston pa ni /
T02D1414:230a-5: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:230a-7: gong du bstan pa'i cho gas sngon 'gro lnga dang /
T02D1414:230a-8: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur
T02D1414:230a-9: pa las gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rang gi
T02D1414:230a-10: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge las drod gsher skyes
T02D1414:230a-11: kyi lha bdag med pa'i chos kyi snang ba bsgom
T02D1414:230a-12: mo // de ltar mdor bstan nas rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:230a-13: rang gi chos kyi yi ge h'um las ye shes las skyes pa'i chos kyi lus su 'gyur /
T02D1414:230a-14: he las ni 'bras bu'i he ru kar bsgom mo //
T02D1414:230a-15: hi las tshogs pa bsgom mo /
T02D1414:230a-16: h'um las srung ba'i 'khor lo'i tshe rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom mo //
T02D1414:230a-17: h'um las ni tshogs sogs pa'i lha mi bskyod pa bsgom mo //
T02D1414:230a-18: bam las ni gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom mo //
T02D1414:230a-20: sku gsung thugs ye shes kyi yi ge dang bzhi las skyes so //
T02D1414:230a-21: lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro yang yi ge bzhi las skyes /
T02D1414:230a-22: nub padma'i mkha' 'gro yang yi ge bzhi las skyes /
T02D1414:230a-23: byang las kyi mkha' 'gro yang sku gsung thugs ye shes bzhi las skyes so //
T02D1414:230a-24: yum lnga ni ming mtshan gyi dang po yi ge re re las skyes so //
T02D1414:230a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge he ru ka dang /
T02D1414:230a-27: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa sgyu 'phrul dra
T02D1414:230a-28: ba dang sbyar na 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D1414:230a-29: pa'i sems dpa'i ming ni go sla'o //
T02D1414:230a-30: lha mo rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje
T02D1414:230a-31: pho nya mo zhes bya ba nas rdo rje 'jigs
T02D1414:230a-32: pa zhes bya ba'i bar du sngon grub pa'i dpa'
T02D1414:230a-33: bo dang / lha mo'i aom bar du ming tha
T02D1414:230a-34: mar h'um phat sv'a h'a dang bcas pa snying po
T02D1414:230a-35: de nyid kyis dngos grub stsol lo //
T02D1414:230a-36: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo brgyad yin te /
T02D1414:230a-37: dkar mo la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang gnyis
T02D1414:230a-38: su med pa sgo dang mtshams kha sbyar gyis gzhug
T02D1414:230a-39: pa thog mar aom bar du ming tha mar h'um
T02D1414:230a-40: phat sv'a h'a dang bcas pa'i snying po yin no
T02D1414:230a-41: // mtshams kyi gzugs rdo rje mas shar lho'i bum pa gzung /
T02D1414:230a-42: sgra rdo rje mas lho nub kyi bum pa gzung /
T02D1414:230a-43: dri rdo rje mas nub byang gi bum pa gzung /
T02D1414:230a-44: ro rdo rje mas byang shar gyi bum pa gzung /
T02D1414:230b-0: @230b reg rdo rje mas gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' gzung /
T02D1414:230b-1: yum chos kyi dbyings lngas thabs ye shes lnga gzung ba yin no //
T02D1414:230b-2: las kyi rgyal mchog ni go cha bskon ye shes sems dpa' gzhug //
T02D1414:230b-4: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1414:230b-6: ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med gzhug //
T02D1414:230b-8: rnal 'byor ma dbang rtogs par bya //
T02D1414:230b-10: rgyud 'bum pa rig pa'i rgya mtsho zhes grags pa de la dpa' bo rnams rgyas par bshad pa /
T02D1414:230b-11: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'dir bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1414:230b-12: gzhung lugs sna tshogs bzang po 'di la bshad pa'i rgyud bzhi yod de /
T02D1414:230b-13: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang sgyu ma bde mchog dang /
T02D1414:230b-14: rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba'i rgyud dang gsang ba'i rgyud do //
T02D1414:230b-15: nges brjod bla ma rgyud de dag gis rtsa ba'i
T02D1414:230b-16: rgyud kyi man ngag sems can bsam pa'i khyad par
T02D1414:230b-17: gang la mos pa rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D1414:230b-18: gzhung lugs sna tshogs kyi man ngag gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ster ro //
T02D1414:230b-19: dbus kyi 'khor lo la rigs lnga yab yum bcu thugs rdo rje phreng bas bskor /
T02D1414:230b-21: sku 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rigs lnga dang byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang /
T02D1414:230b-23: dkar mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis phyogs skyong brgyad
T02D1414:230b-24: mnan nas 'khor gyi mchog dang sgo dang mtshams su
T02D1414:230b-25: dgod par bya'o // sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud na gsal bas go sla'o //
T02D1414:230b-26: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas dang mu stegs can la gsang ba dang /
T02D1414:230b-27: mchod pa dang bstod pa gtor ma gtang ba bla ma'i zhal nas sam /
T02D1414:230b-28: rmi lam du rnal 'byor ma'i drin gyis bstan nas /
T02D1414:230b-29: lha rnams kyi rnam dag sum cu rtsa drug bsgom pa dang /
T02D1414:230b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rtogs pa dang /
T02D1414:230b-32: dang po sbyor ba dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog las rgyal mchog gi sbyor ba gsum /
T02D1414:230b-33: rnam par dag pa'i don dri ma med pa'i mchog bsgom pa ni mjug gi sngom pa yin no //
T02D1414:230b-34: le'u drug cu rtsa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:230b-37: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu bshad bya ba //
T02D1414:230b-39: bdag nyid bsgom pa'i go cha'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1414:231a-1: bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur pa las
T02D1414:231a-2: gzhal yas khang de'i nang du so sor 'brang ma'i
T02D1414:231a-4: gtso bo zhal lnga pa phyag sum cu rtsa gnyis la /
T02D1414:231a-5: 'khor gyi lha mo m'a ma k'i dang /
T02D1414:231a-12: sa 'dzin ma dang brgyad ni zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa gtso bo rdo rje'i skyil mo krung /
T02D1414:231a-13: 'khor sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bsgom mo //
T02D1414:231a-14: yang na rang gi ming las byung ba'i khro bo brgyad shar sngo lho ser /
T02D1414:231a-15: nub dmar byang ljang shar lho gang / lho nub dkar //
T02D1414:231a-17: byang shar sngo ba sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can ma
T02D1414:231a-18: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa khro ba'i mchog 'byung po
T02D1414:231a-19: 'dul byed ni dbus su mig sman sngon po'i mdog
T02D1414:231a-20: can rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub na bza' sngon po
T02D1414:231a-21: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can sprul gyis brgyan
T02D1414:231a-22: pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i tshe yang zhal gcig
T02D1414:231a-23: phyag gnyis pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:231a-24: phra ba nang gi rdo rje can bsgom pa ni snying ga'i nu ma'i bar du khro bo dgu /
T02D1414:231a-25: gnas gsum du 'khor lo gsum gyi lhas 'gro ba
T02D1414:231a-26: gsum po dag par byas pa ni mchod pa dang
T02D1414:231a-27: po'o // gang gi rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'dod pa'i
T02D1414:231a-28: yon tan lnga'i rdo rjes mchod pa ni gnyis pa'o
T02D1414:231a-29: po'o // // mchod pa lnga me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1414:231a-30: stong pa nyid bzhi yum bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1414:231a-31: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1414:231a-35: gtor ma gtang ba ni kha bskang ngo //
T02D1414:231a-36: le'u drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:231a-38: // / lha'i 'khor lo sngar bshad pa rgyud 'bum pa las sngags dang de nyid rgyas par bstan /
T02D1414:231a-39: rgyud 'dir mdor bstan pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ni don dam pa ma yin /
T02D1414:231a-40: gal te don dam pa'i shes pa skyes na ston
T02D1414:231a-41: pa po dang bstan pa lha'i 'khor lo yang med
T02D1414:231a-42: do // 'o na su'i don du bstan zhen /
T02D1414:231a-43: 'khor ba 'dir sgyu ma sdug bsngal can gyis skyes
T02D1414:231a-44: pa la lha nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo gnas
T02D1414:231a-45: dang bcas pa sgyu ma can bstan pa don dam
T02D1414:231b-0: pa'i bden par @231b ni ma yin no //
T02D1414:231b-1: gal te don dam par med na lha'i 'khor lo 'khrul pas ci zhig bya /
T02D1414:231b-2: 'on te don dam pa'i ye shes la rnam pa
T02D1414:231b-3: lha'i 'khor lo yod na 'khrul pa ci yod ce
T02D1414:231b-4: na / gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pas
T02D1414:231b-5: sgyu ma sdug bsngal can spangs nas sgyu ma bde
T02D1414:231b-6: ba dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1414:231b-7: yang don dam pa'i bsgom pa mi nus pa 'dod
T02D1414:231b-8: pa'i yon tan lnga la bag mad par spyod pa'i
T02D1414:231b-9: mi la thams cad lha'i 'khor lo byas nas gnas
T02D1414:231b-11: ngas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo du ma bshad pa ni /
T02D1414:231b-12: sems can bsam pa sna tshogs yod pas bsam gtan
T02D1414:231b-13: gyi bde bar bsgom pa'i phyir lha'i 'khor lo bshad
T02D1414:231b-14: do // rnal 'byor pa phyi rol gyi zhing rmo ba dang /
T02D1414:231b-17: spyod lam rnam bzhi sdug bsngal bas khams zad par
T02D1414:231b-18: 'gyur ba la de spangs nas snod kyi 'jig rten
T02D1414:231b-19: gzhal yas khang 'gro ba rigs drug lha'i 'khor lo
T02D1414:231b-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mchod pa'i rol pas gnas
T02D1414:231b-22: de la sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas gzigs nas ci
T02D1414:231b-23: 'dod pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas ba'i dngos grub stsol
T02D1414:231b-24: lo // don dam par med kyang kun rdzob tu bsod nams kyi tshogs bsgom pa bshad nas /
T02D1414:231b-25: brtan pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa des rje btsun gyi ye shes la 'bad de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1414:231b-27: lha sna tshogs kyi mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i lus po lha'i chad byad bya /
T02D1414:231b-28: gang yang rung ba'i kha zad bdud rtsir bsam /
T02D1414:231b-29: nyal ba gcer bu'am ma nyal ba gos dang bcas pa rang gi lha'i rnam pa'i nga rgyal bya /
T02D1414:231b-30: lkugs pa bzhin du mi smra bar bzlas pa byas
T02D1414:231b-31: na zla drug gis lha gang 'dod pa gsal bar
T02D1414:231b-32: 'gyur ro // de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyod pa dang rtul zhugs bshad nas /
T02D1414:231b-33: phan yon gyi mngon par shes pa skyes nas padma'i
T02D1414:231b-34: rdzing bu lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa la dpa' bo
T02D1414:231b-35: dang rnal 'byor ma rnams ngang pa'i tshogs bzhin du
T02D1414:231b-36: 'du ba dang / yid mig 'phrul mkhan sgyu mkhan
T02D1414:231b-37: ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1414:231b-38: 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar the
T02D1414:231b-39: 'du ba dang / tshom med do // phan yon bshad nas /
T02D1414:232a-0: gdams ngag ston pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i @232a * //
T02D1414:232a-1: dkyil 'khor 'di la nges par sna gtad nas dad
T02D1414:232a-2: pa skad cig tsam bshad pa nyan pas sems dga'
T02D1414:232a-3: bar gyis shig ces gsol ba 'debs so //
T02D1414:232a-4: dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa drug gi thams cad ldan
T02D1414:232a-5: pa'i tshe rdo rje drag po h'um mdzad kyi sbyor
T02D1414:232a-6: ba dang ldan pa'i snying gar sngags bkod pa la
T02D1414:232a-7: 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyor bas lus kyi
T02D1414:232a-8: dkyil 'khor sngags la bsdus nas sngags chos kyi dbyings
T02D1414:232a-9: sems kyi 'khor lo chos kyi dbyings su brtag go
T02D1414:232a-10: // rang gi chos kyi yi ge go cha drug
T02D1414:232a-11: gis skye mched drug gzung 'dzin dang bral bar bsgom
T02D1414:232a-12: // mo // ji ltar lha'i 'khor lo rtag pa'i snying gar bsdus nas /
T02D1414:232a-13: thun mtshams su zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gzhan gyi gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1414:232a-14: sems yid gti mug pa mos pa mtha' yas pa
T02D1414:232a-15: la gzugs sna tshogs su bstan par blta bar bya'o
T02D1414:232a-16: // le'u drug cu rtsa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D1414:232a-19: // / rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnam zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gcig ni rgyud brjod bya'o //
T02D1414:232a-20: rgyud rdzogs pa yis sbyor ba yin //
T02D1414:232a-21: zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis ni rgyu'i rgyud la rjes su yi rangs shing bstod pa'o //
T02D1414:232a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub dka' drin mchog / ces pa'i
T02D1414:232a-23: tshigs bcad phyed ni thabs kyi rgyud la bstod pa'o
T02D1414:232a-24: // sgrub pa'i bla ma'i bla ma ste //
T02D1414:232a-25: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis ni 'bras bu'i rgyud la bstod pa'o //
T02D1414:232a-26: legs so rdo rje'i bla ma kun //
T02D1414:232a-27: zhes pa tshigs bcad gcig gis rgyud 'bum pa 'chad pa'i gtso bo dang 'khor la bstod pa'o //
T02D1414:232a-31: // / rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po man ngag thams cad mngon
T02D1414:232a-32: zhing nges par brjod pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa pa
T02D1414:232a-33: slob dpon sh'u ram ga badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1414:232a-35: / // / bcom ldan 'das bde ba chog gi rgyud 'bum
T02D1414:232a-36: pa chen po'i gdams ngag de kho na nyid tshang
T02D1414:232a-37: bar bsdus pa man nga tham cad kyi snying po
T02D1414:232a-38: nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma
T02D1414:232a-40: bde mchog 'bum pa'i de kho na nyid nges par
T02D1414:232a-41: byed pa de kho na nyid kyi snying po zhes
T02D1414:232a-42: bya ba sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po
T02D1414:232a-43: 'phags pa shes rab kyis dzny'a na shr'i mi tra'i
